Dukapatthana of the Abhidhamma Pitaka:
I. Hetuduka
II. Sahetuduka
III. Hetusampayuttaduka
IV. Hetu-ceva-sahetukaduka
V. Hetu-ceva-hetusampayuttaduka
VI. Nahetu-sahetukaduka
VII. Sappaccayaduka
VIII. Samkhataduka
IX. Sanidassanaduka
X. Sappatighaduka
XI. Rupiduka
XII. Lokiyaduka
XIII. Kenaci-vinneyaduka
XIV. Asavaduka
XV. Sasavaduka
XVI. Asavasampayuttaduka
XVII. Asavo-ceva-sasavaduka
XVIII. Asavo-ceva-asavasampayuttaduka
XIX. Asavavippayuttasasavaduka
XX. Samyojanaduka
XXI. Samyojaniyaduka
XXII. Samyojanasampayuttaduka
XXIII. Samyojano-ceva-samyojaniduka
XXIV. Samyojano-ceva-samyojanasampayuttaduka
XXV. Samyojanavippayuttasamyojaniyaduka
XXVI. Ganthaduka
XXVII. Ganthaniyaduka
XXVIII. Ganthasampayuttaduka
XXIX. Gantho-ceva-ganthaniyaduka
XXX. Gantho-ceva-ganthasampayuttaduka
XXXI. Ganthavippayuttaganthaniyaduka
XXXII. Oghaduka
XXXIII. Nivaranaduka
XXXIV. Nivaraniyaduka
XXXV. Nivaranasampayuttaduka
XXXVI. Nivarano-ceva-nivaraniyaduka
XXXVII. Nivarano-ceva-nivaranasampayuttaduka
XXXVIII. Nivaranavippayuttanivaraniyaduka
XXXIX. Paramasaduka
XL. Paramatthaduka
XLI. Paramasasampayuttaduka
XLII. Paramaso-ceva-paramatthaduka
XLIII. Paramasavippayuttaparamatthaduka


Based on the edition Rhys Davids
London : Pali Text Society 1906 (Reprinted 1988)


Input by the Dhammakaya Foundation, Thailand, 1989-1996

NOTICE
This file is (C) Copyright the Pali Text Society and the Dhammakaya Foundation, 2015.
This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

These files are provided by courtesy of the Pali Text Society for
scholarly purposes only.
In principle they represent a digital edition (without revision or
correction) of the printed editions of the complete set of Pali
canonical texts published by the PTS. While they have been subject to a
process of checking, it should not be assumed that there is no
divergence from the printed editions and it is strongly recommended that
they are checked against the printed editions before quoting.


ADDITIONAL NOTES
Italicized catchwords of the printed edition were already reduced
to plain Roman type in the original Dhammakaya file.

set to UTF-8.)

to facilitate word search.

Dukapaṭṭhāna

[page 001]
                                                                                 1
           Namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
                         [I. DUKA-PAṬṬHĀNAṂ.
                               I.
                          HETU-DUKAṂ.]

                          [Anulomaṃ.]
     1. Hetuṃ dhammaṃ1 paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati
hetupaccayā.
     Alobhaṃ paṭicca adoso amoho; adosaṃ paṭicca alobho
amoho; amohaṃ paṭicca alobho adoso. Lobhaṃ paṭicca
moho; mohaṃ paṭicca lobho; dosaṃ paṭicca moho; mohaṃ
paṭicca doso.2 Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe3 . . .
     2. Hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati
hetupaccayā.
     Hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā citta-
samuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     3. Hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā
uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
     Alobhaṃ paṭicca adoso amoho sampayuttakā ca khandhā
cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ . . . (cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ4)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 So R. and K. B. and S. hetudhammaṃ always.
2 None of the texts collated give lobho and doso as
     mutually conditioned.
3 None of the texts collated give the excisions in this
     con- nexion. R. has nowhere . . . pe . . .
4 See above under 1. Only K. has bandhitabbaṃ.


[page 002]
2                          Hetudukaṃ.
. . . Lobhaṃ paṭicca moho sampayuttakā ca khandhā
cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ . . . pe . . . Paṭisandhik-
khaṇe . . . pe . . .
     4. Nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati
hetupaccayā.
     Nahetuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasam-
uṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ.1 Paṭisandhikkhaṇe khandhe paṭicca
vatthu,2 vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā; ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ . . .
pe . . .3
     5. Nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati
hetupaccayā.
     Nahetū khandhe paṭicca hetū. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe
vatthuṃ paṭicca hetū.
     6. Nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā
uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
     Nahetuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā hetū ca
cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve khandhe paṭicca dve
khandhā hetu ca cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ. Paṭi-
sandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca hetū ca sampayuttakā ca
khandhā.
     7. Hetuñ ca nahetuñ ca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo
uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Alobhañ ca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca adoso
amoho . . . (cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ) . . . Lobhañ ca sam-
payuttake ca khandhe paṭicca moho, dosañ ca sampayuttake
ca khandhe paṭicca moho. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe alobhañ ca
vatthuñ ca paṭicca adoso amoho . . . pe . . .
     8. Hetuñ ca na hetuñ ca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu
dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Nahetuṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca hetuñ ca paṭicca tayo khandhā
cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ. Dve khandhe ca hetuñ ca
paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ. Paṭi-
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 R. adds, Dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā
     cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ.
2 S. and K. usually read vatthuṃ. B. and R. vatthu.
     B. vatthu also in accusative.
3 All texts excise. To be read presumably with tayo . . .
     dve . . . dve. Cf. pp. 6, 7, § 4 with khandhā in this §.


[page 003]
                          Anekapaccayā.                3
sandhikkhaṇe vatthuñ ca hetuñ ca paṭicca sampayuttakā
khandhā.
     9. Hetuñ ca nahetuñ ca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu
ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
     Nahetuṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca alobhañ ca paṭicca tayo
khandhā adoso amoho cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve
khandhe ca alobhañ ca paṭicca dve khandhā adoso amoho
cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ . . . (cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ) . . .
nahetuṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca lobhañ ca paṭicca tayo khandhā
moho ca cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ . . . pe . . . dve
khandhe . . . pe . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuñ ca alo-
bhañ ca paṭicca adoso amoho sampayuttakā ca khandhā
. . . pe . . .
     Hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati āram-
maṇapaccayā . . . (rūpaṃ chaḍḍetvā arūpe yeva nava
pañhā)1 . . . adhipatipaccayā . . . (paṭisandhi natthi, pari-
puṇṇaṃ). Ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca . . . pe . . . mahā-
bhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, upādā rūpaṃ (idaṃ
ninnānaṃ)2 . . .
anantarapaccayā . . .
samanantarapaccayā . . .
sahajātapaccayā . . . (sabbe mahābhūtā yāva asaññasattā) . . .
aññamaññapaccayā . . .
nissayapaccayā . . .
upanissayapaccayā3 . . .
purejātapaccayā4 . . .
āsevanapaccayā . . . (dvīsu5 paṭisandhi natthi) . . .
kammapaccayā . . .
vipākapaccayā . . . (saṃkhittaṃ) . . .
avigatapaccayā . . .
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. ārammaṇapaccayā rūpaṃ. Chaḍḍetvā arūpe ye ca neva neva pañhā.
     B. paccayā rūpaṃ chaḍḍetvā || arūpe ca nava pañhā.
2 S. Adhipatipaccayā paṭisandhi natthi paripuṇṇaṃ. Naṃ mahābhūtaṃ
     paṭicca. Mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānan rūpaṃ idanānaṃ.
     B. Idaṃ nānaṃ. R. imaṃ nānaṃ.
3 S. omits.
4 B. pūre- always.
5 R. dvīsu pi.


[page 004]
4                          Hetudukaṃ.
          Hetuyā nava,                     sabbattha nava,
          ārammaṇe nava,                    avigate nava:--
     evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.
                          Anulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
                          [Paccaniyaṃ.]
     4. Nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati
nahetupaccayā.
     Ahetukaṃ nahetuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā
cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . .1 Ahetukapaṭisan-
dhikkhaṇe khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca
khandhā. Ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ . . . pe . . . bāhiraṃ āhāra-
samuṭṭhānaṃ utusamuṭṭhānaṃ2 . . . pe . . .
     5. Nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetudhammo uppajjati
nahetupaccayā.
     Vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca
vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
     2. Hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati
nārammaṇapaccayā.
     Hetuṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Paṭisandhik-
khaṇe . . . pe . . .
     4. Nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati
nārammaṇapaccayā.
     Nahetū khandhe3 paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . (sabbe mahābhūtā) . . .
     8. Hetuñ ca nahetuñ ca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu
dhammo uppajjati nārammaṇapaccayā.
     Hetuñ ca nahetū ca khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ
rūpaṃ. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
nādhipatipaccayā4 . . . (paripuṇṇaṃ) . . . nānantarapaccayā5
. . . nasamanantarapaccayā . . . na aññamaññapaccayā
. . . na upanissayapaccayā . . .
     1. Hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati
napurejātapaccayā.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Cf. p. 2, 6.
2 B. āhāraṃ utuṃ asañña (sic). R. āhāra || utu || asañña ||.
     S. āhāraṃ utu.
3 S. nahetu khandhaṃ.
4 R. na-adhi-.
5 R. na-anant-.


[page 005]
                Napurejātapaccayavāro. Arūpaṃ.     5
     Arūpe alobhaṃ paṭicca adoso amoho . . . (cakkaṃ
bandhitabbaṃ)1 . . . Lobhaṃ paṭicca moho, mohaṃ paṭicca
lobho . . . pe . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     2. Hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati
napurejātapaccayā.
     Arūpe hetuṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā. Hetuṃ
paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . .
pe . . .
     3. Hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā
uppajjanti napurejātapaccayā.
     Arūpe alobhaṃ paṭicca adoso amoho sampayuttakā ca
khandhā . . . (cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ) . . . Lobhaṃ paṭicca
moho sampayuttakā ca khandhā . . . pe2 . . . Paṭisan-
dhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     4. Nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati
napurejātapaccayā.
     Arūpe nahetuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā.
Dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā.3 Nahetū khandhe paṭicca
cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     5. Nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati
napurejātapaccayā.
     Arūpe nahetū khandhe paṭicca hetū. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe
. . . pe . . .
     6. Nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā
uppajjanti napurejātapaccayā.
     Arūpe nahetuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā hetū
ca; dve khandhe . . . pe . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     7. Hetuñ ca nahetuñ ca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo
uppajjati napurejātapaccayā.
     Arūpe alobhañ ca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca adoso
amoho, . . . (cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ) . . . arūpe lobhañ ca
sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca moho . . . (cakkaṃ
bandhitabbaṃ) . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     8. Hetuñ ca nahetuñ ca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu
dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Cf. p. 1 under 1. S. adds dhammaṃ.
2 B. and R. repeat cakkaṃ.
3 R. omits sentence.


[page 006]
6                          Hetudukaṃ.
     Arūpe nahetuṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca hetuñ ca paṭicca tayo
khandhā . . . pe . . . dve khandhe . . . pe . . . nahetū
khandhe ca hetuñ ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     9. Hetuñ ca nahetuñ ca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ca
nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti napurejātapaccayā.
     Arūpe nahetuṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca alobhaṃ ca paṭicca tayo
khandhā adoso amoho ca; . . . pe . . . dve khandhe
. . . (cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ) . . . nahetuṃ ekaṃ khandhañ
ca lobhañ ca paṭicca tayo khandhā moho ca; . . . (cakkaṃ
bandhitabbaṃ) . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     1. Hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati
napacchājātapaccayā: . . . pe . . . nāsevanapaccayā1
. . . pe . . .
     2. Hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati
nakammapaccayā.
     Hetuṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā cetanā.
     4. Nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati
nakammapaccayā.
     Nahetū khandhe paṭicca sampayuttakā cetanā. Bāhi-
raṃ āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ utusamuṭṭhānaṃ.
     8. Heṭuñ ca nahetuñ ca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu
dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā.
     Hetuñ ca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca sampayuttakā
cetanā.
     1. Hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati
navipākapaccayā: . . . pe . . .2
     4. Nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati
nāhārapaccayā.
     Bāhiraṃ utusamuṭṭhānaṃ3 asaññasattānaṃ. Ekaṃ mahā-
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B., R. and S. na āsev-.
2 R. adds (nava).
3 B. utuṃ asañña || na jhānapaccayā || bāhiraṃ āhāraṃ utuṃ asañña
     sattānaṃ mahābhūte paṭicca rūpajīvitindriyaṃ || najhānapaccayā ||
     pañcaviññāṇaṃ bāhiraṃ āhāraṃ utuṃ asañña namaggapaccayā ||
     S. utu . . . asañña . . . na indriyapacca . . . bāhiraṃ āhāraṃ
     utu . . . asañña indriyapacca bāhiraṃ āhāraṃ utu . . .
     asaññasattānaṃ, etc.


[page 007]
                          Paccaniyaṃ.                          7
bhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā. Mahābhūte paṭicca
kaṭattā-rūpaṃ upādā-rūpaṃ . . . pe . . .1
. . . na indriyapaccayā . . . Bāhiraṃ āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ
utusamuṭṭhānaṃ. Ekaṃ2 mahābhūtaṃ . . . pe . . . Mahā-
bhūte paṭicca upādā-rūpaṃ asaññasattānaṃ. Mahābhūte
paṭicca rūpajīvitindriyaṃ.
. . . najhānapaccayā . . . Pañcaviññāṇasahagataṃ3 ekaṃ
khandhaṃ . . . pe . . . bāhiraṃ āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ utu-
samuṭṭhānaṃ . . . pe . . .
. . . namaggapaccayā . . . Ahetukaṃ nahetuṃ ekaṃ khan-
dhaṃ paṭicca . . . pe . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe4 bāhiraṃ
āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ utusamuṭṭhānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ . . .
pe . . .
. . . nasampayuttapaccayā . . . navippayuttapaccayā . . .
(napurejātasadisaṃ, arūpe yeva.5) . . .
. . . nonatthipaccayā . . .
. . . novigatapaccayā . . .
          Nahetuyā dve,                     nakamme tīṇi,
          nārammaṇe tīṇi,                navipāke nava,
          nādhipatiyā nava,6                nāhāre ekaṃ,
          nānantare tīṇi,6                na-indriye10 ekaṃ,
          nasamanantare7 tīṇi,           najhāne ekaṃ,
          na-aññamaññe8 tīṇi,               namagge ekaṃ,
          na-upanissaye tīṇi,               nasampayutte tīṇi,
          napurejāte nava,                navippayutte nava,
          napacchājāte9 nava,               nonatthiyā tīṇi,
          nāsevane nava.6                novigate tīṇi:--
evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.
                         Paccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 R. omits last two sentences.
2 R. omits to asaññasattānaṃ.
3 S: Pañca viññāṇaṃ bāhiraṃ āhāraṃ utu . . . asañña . . .
     namaggapaccayā . . . hetukaṃ na hetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ . . .
     R. Pañcaviññāṇaṃ bāhiraṃ . . .
4 R. omits.
5 R. arūpapañhā yeva.
6 So also R.
7 B. and S. omit.
8 B. nā aññ-. S. nāññ-.
9 B. na pacch-.
10 K. nind-.


[page 008]
8                          Hetudukaṃ.
          Hetupaccayā,1 nārammaṇe2          nāsevane nava,
          tīṇi,                          nakamme tīṇi,
          nādhipatiyā nava,                navipāke nava,
          nānantare tīṇi,                nasampayutte tīṇi,
          (saṃkhittaṃ)                navippayutte nava,
          na upanissaye tīṇi,               nonatthiyā tīṇi,
          napurejāte nava,                novigate tīṇi.
          napacchājāte nava,3
                     Anulomapaccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
          Nahetupaccayā,4 ārammaṇe          indriye dve,
          dve,                          jhāne dve,
          anantare dve (saṃkhittaṃ),      magge ekaṃ,
          kamme dve,                     sampayutte dve (saṃkhittaṃ),
          vipāke ekaṃ,
          āhāre dve,                     avigate dve.
                     Paccaniyānulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.5
     (Sahajātavāro pi paṭiccavārasadiso;6 paccayavāro pi nissa-
yavāro pi paṭiccavārasadisā7 yeva pañhā.8 Mahābhūtesu
niṭṭhitesu vatthuṃ paccayāti kātabbaṃ.9 Pañcāyatanāni anu-
lome pi paccaniye pi yathā labbhanti tathā kātabbā.
Saṃsaṭṭhavāro pi sampayuttavāro pi paripuṇṇā. Rūpaṃ
natthi, arūpam eva.)
                              [Anulomaṃ.]
     1. Hetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena
paccayo.
     Alobho adosassa amohassa hetupaccayena paccayo . . .
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. nahetu.
2 R. na āram-.
3 R. omits clause.
4 B. Hetupaccayā.
5 B. and S. omit this title.
6 R. omits.
7 B. -sadiso.
8 K. yeva pañhāvāre mahābhūtesu, etc. Possibly the right reading is,
     yeva. Paccayavāre mahā-, etc. Cf. pp. 33-35.
9 R. and S. kātabbā.


[page 009]
                          Ārammaṇavāro.                         9
(cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ) . . . Lobho mohassa hetupaccayena
paccayo. Doso mohassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Paṭi-
sandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .1
     2. Hetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena
paccayo.
     Hetu2 sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañ
ca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe
. . . pe . . .
     3. Hetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa
hetupaccayena paccayo.
     Alobho adosassa amohassa sampayuttakānañ ca khan-
dhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena
paccayo . . . (cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ) . . . Lobho mohassa
. . . pe . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . .
     1. Hetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapac-
cayena paccayo.
     Hetuṃ ārabbha hetū khandhā uppajjanti.
     2. Hetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapac-
cayena paccayo.
     Hetuṃ ārabbha nahetū khandhā uppajjanti.
     3. Hetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa
ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
     Hetuṃ ārabbha hetū ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā up-
pajjanti.
     4. Nahetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇa-
paccayena paccayo.
     Dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā
taṃ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, jhānā
vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ paccavekkhati. Ariyā maggā vuṭṭha-
hitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ, nibbāṇaṃ . . .3
Nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa vodānassa maggassa phalassa
āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Ariyā nahetū
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. and S. continue to abbreviate by dropping words or
     portions of words.
2 R. Hetū.
3 I.e. paccavekkhanti.


[page 010]
10                         Hetudukaṃ.
pahīnakilese1 paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhitakilese, pubbe
samudācinne kilese jānanti, cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ,
nahetū khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti,2
. . . pe . . . domanassaṃ uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā
rūpaṃ passati,3 dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti,4 ceto-
pariyañāṇena nahetucittasamaṃgissa cittaṃ jānāti.5 Ākāsā-
nañcāyatanakiriyaṃ6 viññāṇañcāyatanakiriyassa, ākiñcaññ-
āyatanakiriyaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakiriyassa, rūpāya-
tanaṃ7 cakkhuviññāṇassa . . . pe . . . phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ
kāyaviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Nahetū8
khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa cetopariyañāṇassa pubbenivā-
sānussatiñāṇassa yathākammūpagañāṇassa anāgataṃsañāṇ-
assa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
     5. Nahetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇa-
paccayena paccayo.
     Dānaṃ datvā . . . (paṭhamagamanaṃ9 yeva. Āvajjanā
natthi. Rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa . . . pe . . .
phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassāti idaṃ natthi).
     6. Nahetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa
ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
     Dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ . . . uposathakammaṃ taṃ paccavek-
khati, taṃ ārabbha10 hetū ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā
upajjanti . . . (tatthatatthaṭṭhitena11 imaṃ kātabbaṃ
dutiyagamanasadisaṃ12).
     7. Hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā hetussa dhammassa
ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
     Hetuñ ca sampayuttake ca khandhe ārabbha hetū
uppajjanti.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 R. nahetuṃ pahīnakilesaṃ.
2 R., B. and S. omit three last words.
3 R., B. and S. omit.
4 B. and S. omit two last words. R. omits suṇāti.
5 R. jānanti.
6 R., B. and S. omit kiriy-aṃ-assa. K. does not use it
     again. Cf p. 42, etc.
7 B. rūpārupaṃ.
8 S. Hetu.
9 S. -gatāgataṃ.
10 S. ārabbhati.
11 R. -aṭhitena.
12 K. dutiyassa ārammaṇasadisaṃ.


[page 011]
                          Adhipativāro.                11
     8. Hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā nahetussa dhammassa
ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
     Hetuñ ca sampayuttake ca khandhe ārabbha nahetū
khandhā uppajjanti.
     9. Hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā hetussa ca nahetussa
ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
     Hetuñ ca sampayuttake ca khandhe ārabbha hetū ca
sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
     1. Hetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena
paccayo.
     Ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. Ārammaṇādhipati:
-- hetuṃ garuṃ katvā hetū uppajjanti. Sahajātādhipati:
-- hetu adhipati sampayuttakānaṃ hetūnaṃ adhipatipac-
cayena paccayo.
     2. Hetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa. . . .
     Ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. Ārammaṇādhipati:
-- hetuṃ garuṃ katvā nahetū khandhā uppajjanti. Sahajā-
tādhipati:-- hetu adhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ
cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
     3. Hetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca. . . .
     Ārammaṇādhipati . . .1 garuṃ katvā hetū2 ca sampay-
uttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti. Sahajātādhipati . . .3
khandhānaṃ hetūnañ ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ
adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
     4. Nahetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa. . . .
     Ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. Ārammaṇādhipati:
-- (dānaṃ datvā ti4 vitthāretabbaṃ yāva5 nahetū khandhā).
Sahajātādhipati:-- nahetu adhipati sampayuttakānaṃ. . . .6
     5. Nahetu7 dhammo hetussa dhammassa. . . .
     Ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. Ārammaṇādhipati:
-- dānaṃ datvā . . . (saṃkhittaṃ yāva vatthu8 nahetū ca
khandhā tāva kātabbaṃ). Sahajātādhipati:-- nahetu adhipati
sampayuttakānaṃ. . . .9
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 As under 1.
2 B. nahetu.
3 As under 2.
4 S. idāni.
5 B. yā ca.
6 As under 2.
7 B. Hetu.
8 Does this refer to p. 10, 11. 3, 4?
9 As under 1.


[page 012]
12                         Hetudukaṃ.
     6. Nahetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa1 ca. . . .
     Ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. Ārammaṇādhipati:
-- dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ2 pacca-
vekkhati tam garuṃ katvā nahetū khandhā ca hetū ca
uppajjanti. Pubbe suciṇṇāni . . . (yāva vatthu nahetū
khandhā ca tāva kātabbam). Sahajātādhipati:-- nahetu
adhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetūnañ ca . . .3
     7. Hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā hetussa. . . .
     Ārammaṇādhipati:-- hetuñ ca sampayuttake ca khandhe
garuṃ katvā hetū uppajjanti.
     8. Hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā nahetussa. . . .
     Ārammaṇādhipati:-- hetuñ ca sampayuttake ca khandhe
garuṃ katvā nahetū khandhā uppajjanti.
     9. Hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā hetussa ca. . . .
     Ārammaṇādhipati . . .4 katvā hetū ca sampayuttakā ca
khandhā uppajjanti.
     1. Hetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa anantarapaccayena
paccayo.
     Purimā purimā hetū pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ hetūnaṃ
anantarapaccayena paccayo.
     2. Hetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa anantarapac-
cayena paccayo.
     Purimā . . .5 pacchimānaṃ nahetūnaṃ6 khandhānaṃ
anantarapaccayena paccayo.
     3. Hetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca. . . .
     Purimā . . .7 hetūnaṃ sampayuttakānañ ca khandhānaṃ
anantarapaccayena paccayo.
     4. Nahetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa. . . .
     Purimā purimā nahetū khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchi-
mānaṃ nahetūnaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
Anulomaṃ gotrabhussa . . . (saṃkhittaṃ8) . . . Neva-

                          Upanissayavāro.               13
saññānāsaññāyatanaṃ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena
paccayo.

cayena paccayo.6 . . . (anantarasadisaṃ)7 . . . sahajāta-
paccayena paccayo . . . aññamaññapaccayena paccayo
. . . (ime dve paṭiccavārasadisā)8 . . . nissayapaccayena
paccayo. . . . (paccayavāro9 nissayavārasadiso7).

cayena paccayo.

sayo . . . pe . . . Pakatūpanissayo:-- hetū10 hetūnaṃ

dhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

[page 014]
14                         Hetudukaṃ.
     3. Hetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca. . . .
     Ārammaṇūpanissayo . . .1 hetūnaṃ2 sampayuttakānañ
ca khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

     Ārammaṇūpanissayo . . . pe . . . Pakatūpanissayo:--
saddhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti . . . pe3 . . . samāpattiṃ
uppādeti. . . . Mānaṃ jappeti4 diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti. Sīlaṃ . . . pe
. . . senāsanaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti . . . pe . . .
saṃghaṃ bhindati; saddhā . . . pe . . . senāsanaṃ
saddhāya . . . pe . . . catutthassa maggassa5 . . . pe
. . . phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

     Ārammaṇūpanissayo. . . .6 saddhaṃ . . . pe3 . . .
senāsanaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti . . . pe . . . saṃghaṃ
bhindati; saddhā . . . pe . . . senāsanaṃ saddhāya . . .
pe . . . patthanāya maggassa7 phalasamāpattiyā upanis-
sayapaccayena paccayo.

sayo . . . (dutiya-upanissayasadisaṃ).8

     Ārammaṇūpanissayo . . . pe . . . Pakatūpanissayo:--
hetū ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā hetūnaṃ upanissaya-
paccayena paccayo.
     8. Hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā nahetussa. . . .
     Ārammanūpanissayo . . .10 khandhā nahetūnaṃ11 khan-
dhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

     Ārammaṇūpanissayo . . .12 hetūnañ ca sampayuttakānañ
ca khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

[page 015]
                          Pacchājātavāro.               15
     4. Nahetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa purejātapac-
cayena paccayo.
     Ārammaṇapurejātaṃ, vatthupurejātaṃ. Ārammaṇapure-
jātaṃ:-- arahā1 cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ aniccato
dukkhato anattato vipassati; . . . pe . . . domanassaṃ
uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sota-
dhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti; rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa . . .
pe . . . phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa purejātapac-
cayena paccayo. Vatthupurejātaṃ:-- cakkhāyatanaṃ cak-
khuviññāṇassa purejātapaccayena paccayo, . . . pe . . .
kāyāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
Vatthu nahetūnaṃ2 khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena pac-
cayo.
     5. Nahetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa. . . .
     Ārammaṇapurejātaṃ, vatthupurejātaṃ. Ārammaṇapure-
jātaṃ:-- cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ aniccato . . . pe . . .
domanassaṃ uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati,
dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti. Vatthupurejātaṃ:--
vatthuṃ hetūnaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
     6. Nahetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca. . . .
     Ārammaṇapurejātaṃ . . . pe3 . . . Vatthupurejātaṃ:--
vatthu hetūnaṃ sampayuttakānañ ca khandhānaṃ pure-
jātapaccayena paccayo.
     2. Hetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa pacchājātapac-
cayena paccayo.
     Pacchājātā hetū purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājāta-
paccayena paccayo.
     4. Nahetu dhammo nahetussa4 dhammassa pacchājāta-
paccayena paccayo.
     Pacchājātā nahetū khandhā purejātassa . . .5
     8. Hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā6 nahetussa. . . .
     Pacchājātā hetū ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā purejā-
tassa.5 . . .

2 B. hetūnaṃ.

[page 016]
16                         Hetudukaṃ.
     1. Hetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena
paccayo . . . (anantarasadisaṃ).
     4. Nahetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa kammapac-
cayena paccayo.
     Sahajātā, nānākhaṇikā.1 Sahajātā:-- nahetu cetanā
sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rū-
pānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. Nānākhaṇikā:-- nahetu
cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kamma-
paccayena paccayo.
     5. Nahetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa. . . .
     Sahajātā . . .2 sampayuttakānaṃ hetūnaṃ kammapac-
cayena paccayo. Nānākhaṇikā:-- nahetu3 cetanā vipākā-
naṃ hetūnaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
     6. Nahetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca. . . .
     Sahajātā: . . .4 khandhānaṃ hetūnañ ca cittasamuṭ-
ṭhānānañ ca . . .4 khandhānaṃ hetūnañ ca kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ
kammapaccayena paccayo.
     1. Hetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa vipākapaccayena
paccayo.
     Vipāko alobho adosassa amohassa vipākapaccayena pac-
cayo . . . (paṭiccavārasadisaṃ. Vipākavibhaṃge5 nava pañhā).
     4. Nahetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa āhārapacca-
yena paccayo.
     Nahetū āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasam-
uṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo. Paṭi-
sandhikkhaṇe kabaḷiṃkāro āhāro6 imassa kāyassa āhāra-
paccayena paccayo.
     5. Nahetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa āhārapaccayena
paccayo.
     Nahetū āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ hetūnaṃ āhārapaccayena
paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     6. Nahetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa
āhārapaccayena paccayo.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. -khanikā.
2 As under 4.
3 S. hetu.
4 As under 4.
5 B. -sadisavisaga. S. -sarisavibhāgo. K. vipāke.
6 S. kabaḷiṃkārāhāro.


[page 017]
                         Vippayuttapaccayo.           17
     Nahetū āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānam hetūnaṃ
ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo.
Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     1. Hetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa indriyapaccayena
paccayo . . . (hetumūlake tīṇi).
     4. Nahetu dhammo nahetussa1 dhammassa indriyapacca-
yena paccayo.
     Nahetū indriyā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭ-
ṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo. Paṭisan-
dhikkhaṇe rūpajīvitindriyaṃ kaṭattā rūpānaṃ indriyapac-
cayena paccayo. . . . (evaṃ indriyapaccayo vitthāretabbo,
nava).
     4. Nahetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa jhānapacca-
yena paccayo . . . (tīṇi).
     1. Hetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa maggapaccayena
paccayo . . . sampayuttapaccayena paccayo . . . (imesu
dvīsu nava).
     2. Hetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa vippayuttapac-
cayena paccayo.
     Sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ.2 Sahajātā:-- hetū3 cittasamuṭṭhā-
nānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Paṭisan-
dhikkhaṇe hetū3 kaṭattā rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena
paccayo. Hetū vatthussa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
Pacchājātā4:-- hetū purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayutta-
paccayena paccayo.
     4. Nahetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa vippayutta-
paccayena paccayo.
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ.5 Sahajātā:-- nahetū
khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ6 . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe
nahetū khandhā kaṭattā rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. hetussa.
2 K. sahajātā pacchājātā. See below.
3 K. and S. hetu.
4 K. omits this sentence.
5 So also K.
6 As under 2.


[page 018]
18                         Hetudukaṃ.
paccayo. Khandhā1 vatthussa, vatthu khandhānaṃ
vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Purejātaṃ:-- cakkhāyatanaṃ
. . . pe . . . kāyāyatanaṃ2 . . . pe . . . vatthu nahetūnaṃ
khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā
nahetū khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayutta-
paccayena paccayo.
     5. Nahetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. Sahajātaṃ:-- paṭisandhikkhaṇe
vatthu hetūnaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Pure-
jātaṃ:-- vatthu hetūnaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
     6. Nahetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca . . .
     Sahajātaṃ . . .3 hetūnaṃ sampayuttakānañ ca khan-
dhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Purejātaṃ:--
vatthu hetūnaṃ sampayuttakānañ ca khandhānaṃ vippa-
yuttapaccayena paccayo.
     8. Hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā4 nahetussa5 . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. Sahajātā:-- hetū6 ca sampa-
yuttakā ca khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippa-
yuttapaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe hetū ca sampa-
yuttakā ca khandhā kaṭattā rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena
paccayo. Pacchājātā:-- hetū ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā
purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
     1. Hetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa atthipaccayena
paccayo.
     Alobho adosassa amohassa atthipaccayena paccayo . . .
(cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ) . . . Lobho mohassa atthipaccayena
paccayo . . . (cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ) . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe
. . . pe . . .
     2. Hetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. Sahajātā hetū sampayutta-
kānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ atthi-
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. omits this sentence.
2 See p. 15, under 4.
3 As under 5.
4 B. dhammo.
5 B. hetussa.
6 K. hetu always.


[page 019]
                          Atthipaccayo.                19
paccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . Pacchājātā
hetū purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena pac-
cayo.
     3. Hetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca. . . .
     Alobho adosassa amohassa sampayuttakānañ ca khan-
dhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena
paccayo . . . (cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ) . . . Lobho mohassa
sampayuttakānañ ca khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca
rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo . . . (cakkaṃ bandhi-
tabbaṃ) . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     4. Nahetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ āhāraṃ indriyaṃ.
Sahajāto1 nahetu eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ2 khandhānaṃ
cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo;
dve khandhā . . . pe . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe nahetu eko
khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ . . . (cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ)3
. . . Khandhā vatthussa atthipaccayena paccayo. Vatthu
khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
Ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ . . . pe . . . bāhiraṃ āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ
utusamuṭṭhānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ . . . pe . . . Purejātaṃ
cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ . . . pe . . . dibbena
cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ
suṇāti; rūpāyatanaṃ . . . pe . . . phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ4
. . . pe . . . cakkhāyatanaṃ . . . pe . . . kāyāyatanaṃ
kāyaviññāṇassa atthipaccayena paccayo. Vatthu nahetū-
naṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā
nahetū khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena
paccayo. Kabaliṃkāro āhāro imassa . . . Rūpajīvitin-
driyaṃ kaṭattā rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
     5. Nahetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa. . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. Sahajātā -- nahetū khandhā
sampayuttakānaṃ hetūnaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. Paṭi-
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. sahajāte.
2 B. tiṇṇaṃ. S. tinnannaṃ.
3 R., B. and S. omit after paṭisandhikkhaṇe.
4 B. proceeds: kāyavi cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuṃ|| || kāyāyatanaṃ
     kāyavatthunaṃ hetunaṃ khandhānaṃ atthi|| ||.
     S. practically agrees with B.


[page 020]
20                         Hetudukaṃ.
sandhikkhaṇe vatthu hetūnaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
Purejātaṃ cakkhuṃ . . . vatthuṃ aniccato . . . domanassaṃ
uppajjati . . . dibbena cakkhunā . . . pe1 . . . saddaṃ
suṇāti . . . Vatthu2 hetūnaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
     6. Nahetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca. . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. Sahajāto nahetu eko khandho
tiṇṇannaṃ3 khandhānaṃ hetūnaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca
rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe vat-
thu hetūnaṃ sampayuttakānañ ca khandhānaṃ atthipac-
cayena paccayo. Purejātaṃ cakkhuṃ . . . pe4 . . .
saddaṃ suṇāti. . . . Vatthuṃ hetūnaṃ sampayuttakānañ ca
khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
     7. Hetu ca nahetu5 ca dhammā hetussa. . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ.6 Sahajāto alobho ca sampayut-
takā ca khandhā adosassa amohassa atthipaccayena paccayo
. . . (cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ) . . . Lobho ca sampayuttakā
ca khandhā mohassa atthipaccayena paccayo . . . (cakkaṃ
bandhitabbaṃ) . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe alobho ca vatthu
ca adosassa amohassa atthipaccayena paccayo . . . (cakkaṃ).
     8. Hetu ca nahetu5 ca dhammā nahetussa. . . .
     Sahajātaṃ . . . pe7 . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe hetū ca
vatthu ca nahetūnaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena pac-
cayo. Sahajātā hetū ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ
rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā hetū ca
kabaḷiṃkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena pac-
cayo. Pacchājātā hetū ca rūpajīvitindriyaṃ ca kaṭattā
rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
     9. Hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā8 hetussa ca. . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. Sahajāto nahetu eko khandho
ca alobho ca tiṇṇannaṃ9 khandhānaṃ adosassa amohassa
ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo

2 B. vatthunaṃ.
3 B. tiṇṇaṃnaṃ. See p. 19.
4 As under 5.
5 So also R.
6 B. omits.

     before tiṇṇannaṃ.

                          Paccaniyaṃ.                21
. . . (cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ) . . . Nahetu eko khandho
ca lobho ca tiṇṇannaṃ1 khandhānaṃ mohassa ca cittasam-
uṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo . . .
cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ) . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe nahetu eko
khandho ca alobho ca vatthu ca adosassa amohassa
sampayuttakānaṃ ca khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo
. . . pe . . .
     natthipaccayena paccayo. . . .
     vigatapaccayena paccayo. . . .
     avigatapaccayena paccayo. . . .
          Hetuyā tīṇi,                     kamme tīṇi,
          ārammaṇe nava,                    vipāke nava,
          adhipatiyā nava,                āhāre tīṇi,
          anantare nava,                    indriye nava,
          samanantare nava,                jhāne tīṇi,
          sahajāte nava,                    magge nava,
          aññamaññe nava,                sampayutte nava,
          nissaye nava,                     vippayutte pañca,2
          upanissaye nava                atthiyā nava,
          purejāte tīṇi,                    natthiyā nava,
          pacchājāte tīṇi,                vigate nava,
          āsevane nava,                     avigate nava:--
     Evaṃ anumajjantena gaṇetabbaṃ. Anulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
                          [Paccaniyaṃ.]
     1. Hetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapac-
cayena paccayo . . . sahajāta- . . . upanissayapaccayena
paccayo. . . .
     2. Hetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇa-
. . . sahajāta- . . . upanissaya- . . . purejāta-3 . . .
pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. . . .
     3. Hetu dhammo hetussa ca . . . dhammassa. . . .4
     4. Nahetu . . . nahetussa . . . ārammaṇa- . . . sahajāta-
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 So B. and S.
2 K. omits this clause. S. has nava.
3 R. omits.
4 As under 1.

22                         Hetudukaṃ.
. . . upanissaya- . . . purejāta . . . pacchājāta- . . .
kamma- . . . āhāra- . . . indriyapaccayena paccayo.

paccayo.

          Nahetuyā nava,                (saṃkhittaṃ),
          nārammaṇe nava,                no-avigate5 nava:--
     evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.
                         Paccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
          Hetupaccayā, nārammaṇe6 tīṇi,     (saṃkhittaṃ) . . .
          nādhipatiyā tīṇi,                na magge tīṇi,
          nānantare tīṇi,                na sampayutte ekaṃ,
          nasamanantare tīṇi               navippayutte tīṇi,
          na aññamaññe7 ekaṃ,           nonatthiyā tīṇi,
          na upanissaye8 tīṇi . . .      novigate tīṇi:--
          evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.
                     Anulomapaccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
          Nahetupaccayā, ārammaṇe nava,     nissaye tīṇi,
          adhipatiyā nava,                upanissaye nava,
          anantare nava,                purejāte tīṇi,
          samanantare nava,               pacchājāte tīṇi,9
          sahajāte tīṇi,                āsevane nava,
          aññamaññe tīṇi,                kamme tīṇi,

1 As under 5.
2 As under 1.
3 As under 1.
4 As under 1.
5 B. novigate.
6 B. Hetupaccayārammaṇe.
7 K. and S. nāññ-.
8 K. nūpa-.
9 S. omits this clause.

                          Paccaniyānulomaṃ.           23
          vipāke tīṇi,                    vippayutte tīṇi,1
          āhāre tīṇi,                     atthiyā tīṇi,
          indriye tīṇi,                natthiyā nava,
          jhāne tīṇi,                     vigate nava,
          magge tīṇi,                     avigate tīṇi:--
          sampayutte tīṇi,
     evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.

[page 024]
24                     Sahetukadukaṃ.
                               [II.
                          SAHETUKA-DUKAṂ.
                              Anulomaṃ.]
     1. Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko dhammo
uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā; dve
khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . .
pe . . .
     2. Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko dhammo up-
pajjati hetupaccayā.
     Sahetuke khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     3. Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko ca. . . .
     Sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā citta-
samuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . . pe . . . Paṭisandhik-
khaṇe . . . pe . . .
     4. Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko . . .
     Vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ mohaṃ paṭicca
cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo
mahābhūtā . . . pe . . . mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭ-
ṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattā rūpaṃ upādā rūpaṃ.
     5. Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko . . .
     Vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ mohaṃ paṭicca
sampayuttakā khandhā. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca
sahetukā khandhā.
     6. Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko ca . . .
     Vicikicchāsahagataṃ1 . . . khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañ
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 As under 5.


[page 025]
                          Ārammaṇapaccayo.               25
ca rūpaṃ. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca sahetukā
khandhā; mahābhūte paṭicca kaṭattā rūpaṃ.
     7. Sahetukañ ca ahetukañ ca dhammaṃ . . .

ca mohañ ca paṭicca1 tayo khandhā; dve . . . Paṭisan-
dhikkhaṇe sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca vatthuñ ca paṭicca
tayo khandhā; dve . . . pe . . .

ṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.

hañ ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.

ca rūpaṃ; dve khandhe . . . pe . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe3
dve . . . pe . . . Sahetuke khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca
kaṭattā rūpaṃ.
     1. Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko dhammo up-
pajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
     Sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā; dve
khandhe . . . pe . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .

     Vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca
vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.

dhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā moho ca; dve . . . pe . . .

     Ahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā . . . pe
. . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca ahetukā4
khandhā.

     Vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ mohaṃ paṭicca

[page 026]
26                     Sahetukadukaṃ.
sampayuttakā khandhā. Patisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ
paṭicca sahetukā khandhā.
     7. Sahetukañ ca ahetukañ ca sahetuko1 . . .
     Vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañ
ca mohañ ca paṭicca tayo khandhā: dve khandhe . . . pe . . .
Paṭisandhikkhaṇe sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca vatthuñ
ca paṭicca tayo khandhā: dve khandhe . . . pe . . .
     1. Sahetukañ dhammañ paṭicca sahetuko dhammo up-
pajjati adhipatipaccayā.
     Sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā;
dve . . .
     2. Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko . . .
     Sahetuke khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
     3. Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko ca ahetuko . . .
     Sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā citta-
samuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . .
     4. Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko . . .
     Ekaṃ mahābhutaṃ . . . pe . . . mahābhūte paṭicca
cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ upādā rūpaṃ.
     7. Sahetukañ ca ahetukañ ca paṭicca ahetuko dhammo
uppajjati adhipatipaccayā.
     Sahetuke khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭ-
ṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
     1. Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko dhammo up-
pajjati anantarapaccayā . . . samanantarapaccayā2 . . .
sahajātapaccayā.
     Sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ . . . pe . . . Paṭisandhik-
khaṇe . . . pe . . .
     2. Sahetukañ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko dhammo up-
pajjati sahajātapaccayā.
     Sahetuke3 khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
Vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. ahetuko, i.e., formula 8.
2 B. omits.
3 B. ahetuko (sic).


[page 027]
                          Aññamaññapaccayo                    27
vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho cittasamuṭ-
ṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ. Patisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     3. sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko ca . . .
     Sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittā-
samuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . . pe . . . Vicikicchāsaha-
gataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ1 ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo
khandhā moho ca cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . .
Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     4. Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko. . . .
     Ahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā citta-
samuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve khandhe . . . pe . . . Vici-
kicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ mohaṃ paṭicca citta-
samuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe khandhe paṭicca
vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā Ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ
. . . pe . . . bāhiraṃ āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ utusamuṭṭhānaṃ
asaññasattānaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ . . . pe . . .
     5. Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko dhammo up-
pajjati sahajāpaccayā.
     (Ime pañca pañhā hetusadisā. Ninnānaṃ)2
     1. Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko3 dhammo
uppajjati aññamaññapaccayā.
     Sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā . . .
pe . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     2. Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko dhammo. . . .
     Vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca
vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato4 moho. Pati-
sandhikkhaṇe sahetuke khandhe paṭicca vatthu.
     3. Sahetukaṃ5 dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko ca . . .
     Vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ
paṭicca tayo khandhā moho ca; dve . . . pe . . . Paṭi-
sandhikkhaṇe sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo
khandhā vatthu ca; dve . . . pe . . .
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. omits.
2 K. omits Ninnānaṇ
3 S. ahetuko.
4 B. omits.
5 B. continues ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo || khandhā vatthuṇ
     khandhe || || ahetukaṃ ahetuko aññammañña, etc.


[page 028]
28                Sahetukadukaṃ.
     4. Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko dhammo. . . .
     Ahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā; dve
. . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe ahetukaṃ ekaṃ. . . .1 dve khandhe
paṭicca . . . (saṃkhittaṃ yāva asaññasattā2).
     5. Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko . . .
     Vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ mohaṃ3 paṭicca
sampayuttakā khandhā. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca
sahetukā khandhā.
     7. Sahetukañ ca ahetukañ ca dhammaṃ paṭicca sahe-
tuko. . . .
     Vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañ
ca mohañ ca paṭicca tayo khandhā; dve khandhe . . .
pe . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca
vatthuñ ca paṭicca tayo khandhā; dve khandhe . . . pe . . .
     1. Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko dhammo up-
pajjati nissayapaccayā . . .
          upanissayapaccayā . . .      (jhānam pi maggam pi4
          purejātapaccayā . . .           sahajātavārasadisā.5 Bāhirā
          āsevanapaccayā . . .           mahābhūtā natthi.)
          kammapaccayā . . .           sampayuttapaccayā . . .6
          vipākapaccayā . . .           vippayuttapaccayā . . .
          āhārapaccayā . . .           atthipaccayā . . .
          indriyapaccayā . . .           natthipaccayā . . .
          jhānapaccayā . . .           vigatapaccayā . . .
          maggapaccayā . . .           avigatapaccayā . . .
          Hetuyā nava,                    nissaye nava,
          ārammaṇe cha,                upanissaye cha,
          adhipatiyā pañca,               purejāte cha,
          anantare cha,                āsevane cha,
          samanantare cha,                kamme nava,
          sahajāte nava,                vipāke nava,
          aññamaññe cha,                āhāre nava,
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 As under 3.
2 Cf. pp. 6, 7.
3 B. omits.
4 R. and B. jhānaṃ pi maggaṃ pi.
5 R. sahajātapaccayasadisā.
6 B. omits.


[page 029]
                          Nārammaṇapaccayo.                29
          indriye nava,                     atthiyā nava,
          jhāne nava,1                     natthiyā cha,
          magge nava,                     vigate cha,
          sampayutte cha,                avigate nava:--
          vippayutte nava,
     evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.
                          Anulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
                               [Paccaniyaṃ.]
     2. Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko dhammo up-
pajjati nahetupaccayā.
     Vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca
vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
     4. Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko dhammo. . . .
     Ahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā citta-
samuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve khandhe . . . pe . . .
Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . .2 (sabbaṃ yāva asaññasattā tāva
kātabbaṃ).
     2. Sahetukaṃ3 dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko dhammo up-
pajjati nārammaṇapaccayā.
     Sahetuke khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     4. Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko dhammo up-
pajjati nārammaṇapaccayā.
     Ahetuke khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Vici-
kicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ mohaṃ paṭicca citta-
samuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe khandhe paṭicca
vatthu. . . . Ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ . . . (saṃkhittaṃ4) . . .
asaññasattānaṃ (ekaṃ) . . .
     8. Sahetukañ ca ahetukañ ca . . . ahetuko . . .
     Sahetuke khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasam-
uṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate
khandhe ca mohañ ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. omits clause.
2 B. inserts ahetukaṃ.
3 B. Ahetukaṃ.
4 Cf. above, p. 7.


[page 030]
30                Sahetukadukaṃ.
     1. Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko dhammo up-
pajjati nādhipatipaccayā . . . (anulome1 sahajātasadisā) . . .
          nānantarapaccayā . . .
          nasamanantarapaccayā . . .
          na-aññamaññapaccayā . . .
          na-upanissayapaccayā . . .
          napurejātapaccayā.2
     Arūpe sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā
. . . pe . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe sahetukaṃ . . . pe . . .
     2. Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko dhammo uppaj-
jati napurejātapaccayā.
     Arūpe vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe
paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. Sahe-
tuke khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Paṭisan-
dhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     3. Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko ca . . .
     Arūpe vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ ekaṃ
khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā moho ca, . . . pe . . .
dve khandhe . . . pe . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . .
     4. Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko . . .
     Arūpe ahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ . . . pe . . . dve
ahetuke khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Vici-
kicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ mohaṃ paṭicca citta-
samuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . (yāva asañña-
sattā tāva3 vitthāro).
     5. Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko . . .
     Arūpe vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ mohaṃ
paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ
paṭicca sahetukā khandhā.
     6. Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko ca ahetuko . . .
     Paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca sahetukā khandhā,
mahābhūte paṭicca kaṭattā rūpaṃ.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. anulomaṃ. R. and S. anulomasahaj-.
2 K. omits
3 B. has, instead, sāvavittātāva vitthāro. K has ca, S. va.


[page 031]
                          Anekapaccayā.                    31
     7. Sahetukañ ca ahetukañ ca . . . sahetuko. . . .
     Arūpe vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ ekaṃ
khandhañ ca mohañ ca paṭicca tayo khandhā . . . pe . . .
Paṭisandhikkhaṇe sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca vatthuñ
     ca paṭicca tayo khandhā; dve . . . pe . . .
     8. Sahetukañ ca ahetukañ ca . . . ahetuko . . .
     Sahetuke khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭ-
ṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate
khandhe ca mohaṃ ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
     9. Sahetukañ ca ahetukañ ca . . . sahetuko ca . . .
     Paṭisandhikkhaṇe1 . . . dve khandhe . . . pe . . .
Sahetuke khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattā rūpaṃ.
     1. Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko dhammo
uppajjati napacchājātapaccayā . . . nāsevanapaccayā2 . . .
nakammapaccayā.
     Sahetuke khandhe paṭicca sahetukā cetanā.
     4. Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko dhammo
uppajjati nakammapaccayā.
     Ahetuke khandhe paṭicca ahetukā cetanā, bāhiraṃ
āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ utusamuṭṭhānaṃ . . . pe . . .3
     5. Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko dhammo
uppajjaṭi nakammapaccayā.
     Vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ mohaṃ paṭicca
sampayuttakā cetanā.
     7. Sahetukañ ca ahetukañ ca dhammaṃ sahetuko . . .
     Vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca mohañ
ca paṭicca sampayuttakā cetanā.
     . . . na vipākapaccayā . . . (paṭisandhi4 natthi).
     4. Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko dhammo uppaj-
jati nāhārapaccayā . . . na-indriyapaccayā . . . najhāna-
paccayā . . . namaggapaccayā . . . nasampayuttapaccayā . . .
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 As under 7.
2 B. na asev-. (B. frequently has asev- for āsev-.)
3 Cf. p.7
4 K. paṭisandhikkhaṇe.


[page 032]
32                          Sahetukadukaṃ.
     1. Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko dhammo up-
pajjati navippayuttapaccayā.
     Arūpe sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ . . . pe . . .
     2. Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko dhammo . . .
     Arūpe vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe
paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato1 moho.
     3. Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko ca ahetuko . . .
     Arūpe vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ ekaṃ
khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā moho ca; dve khandhe
. . . pe . . .
     4. Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko dhammo uppaj-
jati navippayuttapaccayā.
     Arūpe ahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā;
dve . . . pe . . .
     5. Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko . . .
     Arūpe vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ mohaṃ
paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā.
     7. Sahetukañ ca ahetukañ ca . . . sahetuko2 . . .
     Arūpe vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ ekaṃ
khandhañ ca mohañ ca paṭicca tayo khandhā; dve . . .
pe . . . nonatthipaccayā . . . novigatapaccayā . . .
     Nahetuyā dve,                     nakamme cattāri,
     nārammaṇe tīṇi,                    navipāke nava,
     nadhipatiyā nava,                nāhāre ekaṃ,
     nānantare tīṇi,                    na-indriye ekaṃ,
     nasamanantare tīṇi,                najhāne ekaṃ,
     na-aññamaññe tīṇi,                namagge ekaṃ,
     na-upanissaye tīṇi,                nasampayutte tīṇi,
     napurejāte nava,                navippayutte cha,
     napacchājāte nava,                nonatthiyā tīṇi,
     nāsevane nava,                     novigate tīṇi:--
     evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.
                     Paccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. omits.
2 B. ahetuko.


[page 033]
                          Paccayavāro.                     33
          Hetupaccayā,                     napacchājāte nava,
          nārammaṇe tīṇi,                nāsevane nava,
          nādhipatiyā nava,                nakamme tīṇi,
          nānantare tīṇi,                navipāke nava,
          nasamanantare tīṇi,               nasampayutte tīṇi,
          na-aññamaññe tīṇi,                navippayutte tīṇi,
          na-upanissaye tīṇi,               nonatthiyā tīṇi,
          napurejāte nava,                novigate tīṇi:--
     evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.
                     Anulomapaccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
          Nahetupaccayā,1                indriye dve,
          ārammaṇe dve,                     jhāne dve,
          anantare dve,                     magge ekaṃ,
          sabbattha dve,                    sampayutte dve,
          vipāke ekaṃ,                     avigate dve:--
          āhāre dve,
     evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.
                     Paccaniyānulomaṃ2 niṭṭhitaṃ.
                     (Sahajātavāro paṭiccavārasadiso.)
     1. Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sahetuko dhammo uppaj-
jati hetupaccayā . . . (sahetukamūlakaṃ paṭiccasadisaṃ.
Ahetukamūlakaṃ3 paṭiccasadisaṃ yeva4).
     5. Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sahetuko dhammo uppaj-
jati hetupaccayā.
     Vatthuṃ paccayā sahetukā khandhā. Vicikicchāsahaga-
taṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ mohaṃ paccayā sampayuttakā
khandhā. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paccayā sahetukā
khandhā.
     6. Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sahetuko ca. . . .
     Vatthuṃ paccayā sahetukā khandhā. Mahābhūte paccayā
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. nahetuyā ārammaṇe. S. hetu
2 B. paccaniyā niṭṭhitaṃ. S. paccanulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
3 S. inserts dhammaṃ.
4 B. omits this clause. R. ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ || ahetuko ||
     paṭiccasadisaṃ yeva.


[page 034]
34                Sahetukadukaṃ.
cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhacca-
sahagataṃ mohaṃ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā citta-
samuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ . . .
pe . . .
     7. Sahetukañ ca ahetukañ ca1 . . . sahetuko. . . .
     Sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca vatthuñ ca paccayā tayo
khandhā, dve . . . pe . . . Vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhac-
casahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca mohañ ca paccayā tayo
khandhā, dve. . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe. . . .
     8. Sahetukañ ca ahetukañ ca . . . ahetuko . . .
     Sahetuke khandhe ca mahādhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭ-
ṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate
khandhe mohañ ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . .
     9. Sahetukañ ca ahetukañ ca dhammaṃ paccayā sahetuko
ca ahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
     Sahetukaṃ2 ekaṃ khandhañ ca vatthuñ ca paccayā tayo
khandhā; dve . . . Sahetuke khandhe ca mahābhūte ca
paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Vicikicchāsahagataṃ3
uddhaccasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca mohañ ca paccayā
tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . . Paṭi-
sandhikkhaṇe sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca vatthuñ ca
paccayā tayo khandhā; dve . . .
     1. Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sahetuko dhammo uppaj-
jati ārammaṇapaccayā.
     Sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā . . .
pe . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     2. Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ahetuko. . . .
     Vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paccayā
vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
     3. Sahetukaṃ4 dhammaṃ paccayā sahetuko ca. . . .
     Vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ
. . . pe . . . dve . . .
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. here leaps to sahetuke khandhe ca mahābhūte.
2 S. omits this sentence.
3 B. continues: ekaṃ khandhañ ca mahābhūte ca paccayā tayo, etc
4 B. Ahetukaṃ.


[page 035]
                          Sahajātavāro.                     35
     4. Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ahetuko. . . .
     Ahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ . . . pe . . . dve. . . . Paṭi-
sandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paccayā khandhā, cakkhāyatanaṃ
paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ . . . pe . . . kāyāyatanaṃ pac-
cayā kāyaviññāṇaṃ; vatthuṃ paccayā ahetukā khandhā.
     5. Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sahetuko1 . . .
     Vatthuṃ paccayā sahetukā khandhā. Vicikicchāsahaga-
taṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ mohaṃ paccayā sampayuttakā
khandhā. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     6. Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sahetuko ca ahetuko ca
dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā.
     Vatthuṃ paccayā vicikicchāsahagatā uddhaccasahagatā
khandhā ca moho ca.
     7. Sahetukañ ca ahetukañ ca dhammaṃ paccayā sahe-
tuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
     Saketukaṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca vatthuñ ca paccayā tayo
khandhā. Vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ ekaṃ
khandhañ ca mohañ ca paccayā tayo khandhā; dve . . .
Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     8. Sahetukañ ca ahetukañ ca . . . ahetuko. . . .
     Vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñ
ca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
     9. Sahetukañ ca ahetukañ ca dhammaṃ paccayā sahetuko
ca ahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā.
     Vicikicchā2 . . . khandhañ ca vatthuñ ca paccayā tayo
khandhā moho ca, . . . pe . . . Dve khandhe paccayā
dve khandhā moho ca.
     1. Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sahetuko dhammo
uppajjati adhipatipaccayā . . . (adhipatiyā nava pañhā
pavatte yeva) . . . anantarapaccayā . . . samanantara-
paccayā . . . sahajātapaccayā (tīṇi paṭiccavārasadisā).3
     4. Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ahetuko dhammo uppaj-
jati sahajātapaccayā.
     Ahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasam-
uṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ . . . pe . . . dve, . . . (paṭisandhi
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. Ahetuko.
2 As under 7.
3 B. paṭicca paccayāsadisā. S. paṭiccasadisā.


[page 036]
36                    Sahetukadukaṃ.
yāva asaññasattā).1 Cakkhāyatanaṃ paccayā cakkhuviñ-
ñāṇaṃ; kāyāyatanaṃ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṃ; vatthuṃ pac-
cayā ahetukā khandhā.
     5. Ahetukaṃ2 dhammaṃ paccayā sahetuko. . . .
     Vatthuṃ paccayā sahetukā khandhā. Vicikicchāsaha
gataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ mohaṃ paccayā sampayuttakā
khandhā. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     6. Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sahetuko ca. . . .
     Vatthuṃ paccayā sahetukā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā
cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Vicikicchāsahagataṃ.3 . . .
khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe
vatthuṃ . . . pe. . . .
     7. Sahetukañ ca ahetukañ ca dhammaṃ paccayā sahe-
tuko dhammo uppajjati sahajātapaccayā.
     Sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca vatthuñ ca paccayā tayo
khandhā; dve . . . pe . . . Vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhac-
casahagataṃ4 ekaṃ khandhañ ca mohañ ca paccayā
tayo khandhā; dve . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     8. Sahetukañ ca ahetukañ ca . . . ahetuko. . . .
     Sahetuke khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā citta-
samuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate
khandhe ca mohañ ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
Vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñ
ca5 paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
     9. Sahetukañ ca ahetukañ ca dhammaṃ paccayā sahe-
tuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti sahajātapaccayā.6
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Cf. pp. 6, 7.
2 S. omits this sentence.
3 As under 5.
4 B. omits.
5 B. continues: mohañ ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ vicik-, etc.
6 R. and B. continue: sahetukañ ekaṃ khandhañ ca
     vatthuñ ca paccayā tayo khandhā; dve . . . Sahetuke
     khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
     Vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca
     vatthuñ ca [B. adds, hetuñ ca] paccayā tayo khandhā [B.
     adds cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ] dve . . . [R. here repeats, Sahetuke
     . . . cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ]. Vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhacca-
     sahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca vatthuñ ca paccayā tayo
     khandhā moho ca. [R. expresses this in two sentences.]
     Paṭisandhikkhaṇe, etc. S. reads: sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhañ
     ca paccayā tayo khandhā . . . moho ca dve . . .
     Paṭisan- dhikkhaṇe sahetukaṃ, etc.


[page 037]
                          Nahetupaccayavāro.                37
     Vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañ
ca mohañ ca paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañ
ca rūpaṃ; dve . . . Sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca vatthuñ
ca paccayā tayo khandhā moho ca; dve . . . Paṭisan-
dhikkhaṇe sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca vatthuñ ca paccayā
. . . pe . . .
     1. Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sahetuko dhammo
uppajjati aññamaññapaccayā . . . (saṃkhittaṃ) avigata-
paccayā . . .1
          Hetuyā nava,                     sabbattha nava,
          ārammaṇe nava,                    avigate nava,
          adhipatiyā nava,
     evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.2
                          Anulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
                          [Paccaniyaṃ.]
     2. Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ahetuko dhammo
uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
     Vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paccayā
vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
     4. Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ahetuko dhammo uppaj-
jati nahetupaccayā.
     Ahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ . . . pe . . . Paṭisandhik-
khaṇe . . . (yāva asaññasattā). Cakkhāyatanaṃ paccāyā
cakkhuviññāṇaṃ; kāyāyatanaṃ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṃ;
vatthuṃ paccayā ahetukā khandha moho ca.
     8. Sahetukañ ca ahetukañ ca . . . ahetuko . . .
     Vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñ
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 As under 8. S. vigata-.
2 R. and B. omit last clause.


[page 038]
38                Sahetukadukaṃ.
ca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho . . .
(saṃkhittaṃ).
          Nahetuyā tīṇi,                    na kamme cattāri,
          nārammaṇe tīṇi,                navipāke nava,
          nādhipatiyā nava,                nāhāre ekaṃ,
          nānantare tīṇi,                na-indriye ekaṃ,
          nasamanantare1 tīṇi,           na jhāne ekaṃ,
          na-aññamaññe2 tīṇi,               namagge ekaṃ,
          [nanissaye tīṇi,3]                nasampayutte tīṇi,
          na-upanissaye tīṇi,               navippayutte4 cha,
          napurejāte nava,                nonatthiyā tīṇi,
          napacchājāte nava,                novigate tīṇi:--
          nāsevane nava,
     evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.
                         Paccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
          Hetupaccayā, nārammaṇe           napacchājāte nava,
          tīṇi,                          nāsevane6 nava,
          nādhipatiyā nava,                nakamme tīṇi,
          nānantare tīṇi,                navipāke nava,
          nasamanantare tīṇi,               nasampayutte tīṇi,
          na-aññamaññe5 tīṇi,               navippayutte tīṇi,
          na-upanissaye tīṇi,               nonatthiyā tīṇi,
          napurejāte nava,                novigate tīṇi:--
     evaṃ gaṇetabban.
                     Anulomapaccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
          Nahetupaccayā, ārammaṇe           magge tīṇi,
          tīṇi,                          sampayutte tīṇi,
          anantare tīṇi,                    [vippayutte tīṇi,7]
          (saṃkhittaṃ)                avigate tīṇi:--
          evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.
                     Paccaniyānulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. saman-.
2 S. nāññ-.
3 Only K. inserts this.
4 K. omits last two words.
5 S. nāññ-.
6 B. and S. na-āsev-.
7 Only B. inserts this clause, adding atthiyā tīṇi, natthiyā
     tīṇi, vigate tīni.


[page 039]
                          Ārammaṇavāro.                     39
                (Nissayavāro paṭiccavārasadiso.)1
                          [Anulomaṃ.]
     1. Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho sahetuko dhammo
uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā; dve
. . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     5. Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho sahetuko dhammo
uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ mohaṃ saṃ-
saṭṭhā vicikicchāsahagatā uddhaccasahagatā khandhā.
     7. Sahetukañ ca ahetukañ ca dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho
sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañ
ca mohañ ca saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā; dve . . . pe . . .
     1. Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho sahetuko dhammo
uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
     Sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā; dve
. . . pe . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     2. Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho ahetuko dhammo
uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
     Vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe saṃsaṭṭho
vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
     3. Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho sahetuko ca . . .
     Vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ
saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā moho ca . . . pe . . . dve . . . pe . . .
     4. Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho ahetuko . . .
     Ahetukaṃ ekaṃ . . . pe2 . . .
     5. Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho sahetuko . . .
     Vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ mohaṃ saṃ-
saṭṭhā vicikicchāsahagatā uddhaccasahagatā khandhā.
     Sahetukañ ca ahetukañ ca dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho sahe-
tuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.

2 As under 1.


[page 040]
40                Sahetukadukaṃ.
     Vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañ
ca mohañ ca saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā; dve . . . pe . . .
     1. Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho sahetuko dhammo
uppajjati adhipatipaccayā.
     Sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā; dve
. . . pe . . .
     Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho sahetuko dhammo up-
pajjati anantarapaccayā . . . samanantarapaccayā . . .
sahajātapaccayā . . . (saṃkhittaṃ) . . . vipākapaccayā.
     Vipākaṃ sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ . . . dve . . . pe
. . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     4. Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho ahetuko dhammo up-
pajjati vipākapaccayā.
     Vipākaṃ ahetukaṃ ekaṃ1 khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo
khandhā; dve . . . pe . . . paṭisandhikkhaṇe. . . .
pe . . .
. . . jhānapaccayā . . . (saṃkhittaṃ) . . . avigatapac-
cayā . . .
          Hetuyā tīṇi,                upanissaye cha,
          ārammaṇe cha,                purejāte cha . . . (samkhittaṃ) . . .
          adhipatiyā ekaṃ,
          anantare cha,                vipāke dve,
          samanantare cha,           āhāre cha,2
          sahajāte cha,                magge pañca,3
          aññamaññe cha,                avigate cha:--
          nissaye cha,
     evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.
                          Anulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
                          [Paccaniyaṃ.]
     2. Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho ahetuko dhammo
uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
     Vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe saṃsaṭṭho
vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.

1 S. omits.
2 R. adds, indriye cha, jhāne cha.
3 K. cha.


[page 041]
                     Hetupaccayavāro.                     41
     4. Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho ahetuko dhammo up-
pajjati nahetupaccayā.
     Ahetukaṃ ekaṃ1 khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā;
dve . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . . (saṃkhittaṃ).
          Nahetuyā dve,                     nakamme cattāri,
          nādhipatiyā cha,                navipāke cha,
          napurejāte cha,                najhāne ekaṃ,
          napacchājāte cha,                namagge ekaṃ,
          nāsevane2 cha,                    navippayutte cha:--
     evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.
                     Paccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
          Hetupaccayā, nādhipatiyā          nāsevane tīṇi,
          tīṇi,                          nakamme tīṇi,
          napurejāte tīṇi,                navipāke tīṇi,
          napacchājāte tīṇi,3               navippayutte tīṇi.
                     Anulomapaccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
          Nahetupaccayā,4 ārammaṇe          vipāke ekaṃ,
          dve,                          āhāre dve,
          anantare dve . . . (saṃkhittaṃ), magge ekaṃ,
                                         avigate dve:--
          kamme dve,
     evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.
                Paccaniyānulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
           (Sampayuttavāro saṃsaṭṭhavārasadiso.)
     1. Sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa hetupac-
cayena paccayo.
     Sahetukā hetū5 sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupac-
cayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     2. Sahetuko dhammo ahetukassa. . . .
     Sahetukā hetū6 cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupac-
cayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. omits.
2 B. na-āsev-. So R. always.
3 B. omits clause.
4 S. nahetuyā āram-.
5 B. Sahetu sampayuttakānaṃ. K. hetu throughout.
6 So also B.


[page 042]
42                Sahetukadukaṃ.
     3. Sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa ca ahetukassa. . . .
     Sahetukā1 hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ citta-
samuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     4. Ahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa. . . .
     Vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho cittasamuṭ-
ṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
     5. Ahetuko dhammo sahetukassa.2 . . .
     Vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho sampayutta-
kānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
     6. Ahetuko dhammo sahetukassa ca. . . .
     Vicikicchāsahagato . . .3 khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhān-
ānañ ca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
     1. Sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa āram-
maṇapaccayena paccayo.
     Dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ. uposathakammaṃ, taṃ paccavekkhati,
pubbe suciṇṇāni4 paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā
jhānaṃ paccavekkhati. Ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ
paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ paccavekkhanti, pahīnakilese5
. . . pe . . . vikkhambhitakilese pubbe . . . pe . . .
vatthuṃ6 sahetuke khandhe aniccato . . . pe . . .
domanassaṃ uppajjati; kusalākusale niruddhe sahetuko
vipāko tad-ārammaṇatā uppajjati; cetopariyañāṇena sahe-
tukacittasamaṃgissa cittaṃ jānāti;7 ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ
viññāṇañcāyatanassa, ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsañ-
ñāyatanassa, sahetukā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa cetopari-
yañāṇassa pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa yathākammūpagañā-
ṇassa anāgataṃsañāṇassa8 ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
Sahetuke khandhe ārabbha sahetukā khandhā uppajjanti.
     2. Sahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa. . . .
     Sahetuke khandhe aniccato . . . pe . . . domanassaṃ
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 K. omits.
2 S. omits seven lines.
3 As just above.
4 R., B. and S. omit.
5 Cf. p. 10. R. and B. -kilesaṃ, vikkhambhitaṃ.
6 R. omits. B. inserts na.
7 R. jānanti.
8 All texts omit āvajjanāya (see p. 10 and corresponding
          below).


[page 043]
                          Ārammaṇavāro.                     43
uppajjati; kusalākusale niruddhe ahetuko1 vipāko tad-āram-
maṇatā uppajjati. Sahetuke khandhe ārabbha ahetukā
khandhā ca moho ca uppajjanti.
     3. Sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa ca. . . .
     Sahetuke khandhe ārabbha vicikicchāsahagatā uddhacca-
sahagatā khandhā ca moho ca uppajjanti.
     4. Ahetuko dhammo ahetukassa. . . .
. . . pe . . . nibbānaṃ2 . . . āvajjanāya ārammaṇapac-
cayena paccayo. Cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ . . . pe
. . . ahetuke khandhe ca mohañ ca aniccato . . . pe . . .
domanassaṃ uppajjati. Kusalākusale niruddhe ahetuko
vipāko tad-ārammaṇatā uppajjati. Rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhu-
viññāṇassa . . . pe . . . phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇ-
assa . . . pe . . . Ahetuke khandhe ca mohañ ca
ārabbha ahetukā khandhā3 ca moho ca uppajjanti.
     5. Ahetuko dhammo sahetukassa. . . .
     Ariyā nibbānaṃ paccavekkhanti. Nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa4
vodānassa maggassa phalassa ārammaṇapaccayena pac-
cayo. Ariyā ahetukapahīnakilese5 paccavekkhanti. Pubbe
. . . pe . . . cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ ahetuke
khandhe ca mohañ ca aniccato . . . pe . . . domanassaṃ
uppajjati. Kusalākusale niruddhe sahetuko vipāko tad-
ārammaṇatā uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati;
dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti; cetopariyañāṇeṇa
ahetukacittasamaṃgissa cittaṃ jānāti.6 Ahetukā khandhā
iddhividhañāṇassa7 . . . ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
Ahetuke khandhe ca mohañ ca ārabbha sahetukā khandhā
uppajjanti.
     6. Ahetuko dhammo sahetukassa ca ahetukassa. . . .
     Cakkhuṃ ārabbha vicikicchāsahagatā uddhaccasahagatā
khandhā ca moho ca uppajjanti. Sotaṃ . . . pe . . .
vatthuṃ . . . pe . . . ahetuke khandhe ca mohañ ca
ārabbha vicikicchāsahagatā . . .8 uppajjanti.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. sahetuko.
2 So the texts. R. has no 'pe.' Supply from p. 10.
3 S. ahetuko khandho.
4 S. gota-.
5 R. and B. -kilesaṃ.
6 R. jānanti.
7 As under 1.
8 As just above.


[page 044]
44                Sahetukadukaṃ.
     7. Sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā sahetukassa. . . .
     Vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca mohañ
ca ārabbha sahetukā khandhā uppajjanti.
     8. Sahetuko ca ahetuko ca . . . ahetukassa. . . .
     Vicikicchāsahagate . . .1 ārabbha ahetukā khandhā ca
moho ca uppajjanti.
     9. Sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā sahetukassa ca
ahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
     Vicikicchāsahagate . . .1 ārabbha vicikicchāsahagatā
uddhaccasahagatā khandhā ca moho ca uppajjanti.
     1. Sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa adhipati-
paccayena paccayo.
     Ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. Ārammaṇādhipati:
--dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ, uposathakammaṃ, taṃ garuṃ2 katvā
paccavekkhati, jhānā . . . pe.3 . . . Ariyā maggā vuṭṭha-
hitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā phalaṃ . . . pe . . . Sahetuke
khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā
rāgo uppajjati diṭṭhi uppajjati. Sahajātādhipati:-- sahetu-
kādhipati4 sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ adhipatipacca-
yena paccayo.
     2. Sahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa. . . .
     Sahajātādhipati:-- sahetukādhipati cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ
rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
     3. Sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa ca. . . .
     Sahajātādhipati:-- sahetukādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ
khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ adhipati-
paccayena paccayo.
     4. Ahetuko dhammo ahetukassa5 dhammassa. . . .
     Ārammaṇādhipati:-- ariyā nibbānaṃ garuṃ katvā pacca-
vekkhanti. Nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa6 vodānassa phalassa
adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vat-
thuṃ . . . pe . . . ahetuke khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 As just above.
2 R., B. and S. uposathaṃ taṃ garuṃ, etc., nearly always.
3 Cf. pp. 9, 10.
4 K. sahetukā adhi-, always.
5 S. sahetukassa.
6 So also S.


[page 045]
                          Anantaravāro.                     45
abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati diṭṭhi
uppajjati.
     1. Sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa anantara
paccayena paccayo.
     Purimā purimā sahetukā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchi-
mānaṃ sahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena pac-
cayo. Anulomaṃ gotrabhussa, anulomaṃ vodānassa,
gotrabhu1 maggassa, vodānaṃ maggassa, maggo phalassa,
phalaṃ2 phalassa, anulomaṃ phalasamāpattiyā, nirodhā
vuṭṭhahantassa, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ phalasamāpat-
tiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo.
     2. Sahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa . . .
     Purimā purimā vicikicchāsahagatā uddhaccasahagatā
khandhā pacchimassa pacchimassa vicikicchāsahagatassa
uddhaccasahagatassa mohassa anantarapaccayena pac-
cayo. Sahetukaṃ cuticittaṃ ahetukassa uppatticit-
tassa3 anantarapaccayena paccayo. Sahetukaṃ bhavaṃ-
gaṃ āvajjanāya anantarapaccayena paccayo. Sahetukaṃ
bhavaṃgaṃ ahetukassa bhavaṃgassa anantarapaccayena
paccayo. Sahetukā khandhā ahetukassa vuṭṭhānassa
anantarapaccayena paccayo.
     3. Sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa ca ahetukassa . . .
     Purimā purimā vicikicchāsahagatā uddhaccasahagatā
khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ vicikicchāsahagatānaṃ
uddhaccasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca anantara-
paccayena paccayo.
     4. Ahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa . . .
     Purimo purimo vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato
moho pacchimassa pacchimassa vicikicchāsahagatassa ud-
dhaccasahagatassa mohassa anantarapaccayena paccayo-
Purimā purimā ahetukā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimā-
naṃ ahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
Āvajjanā pañcannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ anantarapaccayena pac-
cayo.
     5. Ahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa . . .

2 K. omits.
3 K., R. and B. upapatti,- always.


[page 046]
46                Sahetukadukaṃ.
     Purimo . . .1 moho pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ vicikic-
chāsahagatānaṃ uddhaccasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ anan-
tarapaccayena paccayo. Ahetukaṃ cuticittaṃ sahetukassa
uppatticittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. Ahetukaṃ
bhavaṃgaṃ sahetukassa bhavaṃgassa anantarapaccayena
paccayo. Ahetukā khandhā sahetukassa vuṭṭhānassa
anantarapaccayena paccayo. Āvajjanā sahetukānaṃ khan-
dhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
     6. Ahetuko dhammo sahetukassa ca ahetukassa . . .
     Purimo . . .2 khandhānaṃ mohassa ca anantarapac-
cayena paccayo. Āvajjanā vicikicchāsahagatānaṃ uddhac-
casahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca anantarapaccayena
paccayo.
     7. Sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā sahetukassa . . .
     Purimā . . .3 khandhā moho ca pacchimānaṃ . . .
khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
     8. Sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā ahetukassa . . .
     Purimā purimā vicikicchāsahagatā uddhaccasahagatā
khandhā ca moho ca pacchimassa pacchimassa . . .4
Vicikicchāsahagatā uddhaccasahagatā khandhā ca moho ca
ahetukassa vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
     9. Sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā sahetukassa ca . . .
     Purimā . . .5 khandhānaṃ mohassa ca anantarapac-
cayena paccayo.

paccayena paccayo . . . (paṭiccavāre sahajātasadisaṃ piha6
ghaṭanā natthi.) . . . aññamaññapaccayena paccayo . . .
(paṭiccavārasadisaṃ) . . . nissayapaccayena paccayo . . .
(paṭiccavāre nissayapaccayasadisaṃ piha7 ghaṭanā natthi) . . .
pe . . . upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

                          Sahajātavāro.                     47
sayo . . . pe . . . Pakatūpanissayo:1-- sahetukā khandhā
sahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca upanissayapaccayena

     2. Sahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa upanis-
sayapaccayena paccayo.

dhānaṃ mohassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

sahagatānaṃ uddhaccasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca
upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

     Anantarūpanissayo pakatūpanissayo . . . pe . . .

kāyikassa dukkhassa mohassa ca upanissayapaccayena
paccayo. Kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ4 . . . pe . . . utu bhojanaṃ
senāsanaṃ kāyikassa sukhassa kāyikassa dukkhassa mo-
hassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo. Moho kāyikassa
sukhassa kāyikassa dukkhassa mohassa ca upanissayapac-
cayena paccayo. Kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ5 utu
bhojanaṃ senāsanaṃ moho ca kāyikassa sukhassa kāyikassa
dukkhassa mohassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

sāya6 dānaṃ deti, . . . pe . . .7 saṃghaṃ bhindati; kāyi-
kaṃ dukkhaṃ . . . pe . . . utu bhojanaṃ senāsanaṃ . . .
pe . . . mohaṃ upanissāya6 dānaṃ deti . . . pe . . .
saṃghaṃ bhindati; kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ . . . pe . . . moho
ca saddhāya . . . pe . . . paññāya rāgassa . . . pe . . .
patthanāya maggassa phalasamāpattiyā8 upanissayapac-
cayena paccayo.

48                          Sahetukadukaṃ.

sahagatānaṃ uddhaccasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa

yapaccayena paccayo.

dhānaṃ mohassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

naṃ uddhaccasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca2 upan-
issayapaccayena paccayo.

paccayena paccayo.
