jātaṃ;-3 cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ aniccato . . . pe
. . . domanassaṃ uppajjati. Kusalākusale niruddhe ahetuko
vipāko tad-ārammaṇatā uppajjati. Rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhu-
viññāṇassa . . . pe . . . phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa
purejātapaccayena paccayo. Vatthupurejātaṃ:--4cakkhāya-
tanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa . . . pe . . . kāyāyatanaṃ kāya-
viññāṇassa purejātapaccayena paccayo. Vatthu ahetu-
kānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca purejātapaccayena
paccayo.

[page 049]
                          Kammavāro.                     49
Kusalākusale niruddhe sahetuko vipāko tad-ārammaṇatā
uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya
sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti. Vatthupurejātaṃ:--1vatthu
sahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
     6. Ahetuko dhammo sahetukassa ca ahetukassa . . .
     Ārammaṇapurejātaṃ, vatthupurejātaṃ.2 Ārammaṇāpure-
jātaṃ:-- cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ ārabbha vicikicchā-
sahagatā uddhaccasahagatā khandhā ca moho ca uppajjanti.
Vatthupurejātaṃ:-- vatthu vicikicchāsahagatānaṃ uddhac-
casahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca purejātapaccayena
paccayo.
     2. Sahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa pacchā-
jātapaccayena paccayo.
     Pacchājātā sahetukā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa
pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
     4. Ahetuko3 dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa . . .
     Pacchājātā ahetukā khandhā ca moho ca purejātassa . . .4
     8. Sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā ahetukassa . . .
     Vicikicchāsahagatā uddhaccasahagatā khandhā ca moho
ca purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
     2. Sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa āsevana-
paccayena paccayo . . . (anantarasadisaṃ.5 Āvajjanam pi
bhavaṃgam6 pi natthi. Āsevanapaccaye7 vajjetabbā nava
pi.)
     1. Sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa kamma-
paccayena paccayo.
     Sahajātā, nānākhaṇikā. Sahajātā sahetukā cetanā sam-
payuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
Nānākhaṇikā sahetukā cetanā vipākānaṃ sahetukānaṃ
khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.

50                               Sahetukadukaṃ.

khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.

. . .2 khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena
paccayo.

samuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.

paccayena paccayo.

dve . . . pe . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .

ca rūpānaṃ . . . pe . . . dve. . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe
. . . pe . . .

vatthussa vipākapaccayena paccayo.

[page 051]
                          Vippayuttavāro.                51
     Ahetukā āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasam-
uṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo. Paṭi-
sandhikkhaṇe kabaḷiṃkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa āhāra-
paccayena paccayo.
     1. Sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa indriya-
paccayena paccayo . . . (tīṇi).
     4. Ahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa . . .
     Ahetukā indriyā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ citta-
samuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo.
Paṭisandhikkhaṇe cakkhundriyaṃ1 cakkhuviññāṇassa . . .
pe . . . kāyindriyaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa, indriyapaccayena
paccayo. Rūpajīvitindriyaṃ kaṭattā rūpānaṃ indriyapacca-
yena paccayo.
     1. Sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa2 dhammassa jhāna-
paccayena paccayo . . . (tīṇi).
     4. Ahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa . . .
     Ahetukāni jhānaṃgāni3 sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ
cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ jhānapaccayena paccayo.
Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     1. Sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa magga-
paccayena paccayo . . . (tīṇi).
     1. Sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa sampa-
yuttapaccayena paccayo . . .
     (Paṭiccavāre sampayuttavārasadisaṃ4 cha5 pañhā.)
     2. Sahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa vippayutta-
paccayena paccayo.
     Sahajātaṃ,6 pacchājātaṃ. Sahajātā6 sahetukā khandhā
cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
Paṭisandhikkhaṇe sahetukā khandhā kaṭattā rūpānaṃ
vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā:-- sahetukā
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 R. and K. cakkhuindriyaṃ.
2 B. ahetukassa.
3 K. Ahetukānaṃ jhānaṃgānaṃ.
4 R. and S. omit vāra.
5 S. nava.
6 K. has purejātaṃ, -ā . . . not saha-. Cf. p. 17, 2.


[page 052]
52                               Sahetukadukaṃ.
khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena
paccayo.
     4. Ahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa. . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. Sahajātā ahetukā
khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena
paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe ahetukā khandhā kaṭattā
rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Khandhā vatthussa
. . . pe . . . vatthu khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena
paccayo. Purejātaṃ:-- cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa
. . . pe . . . kāyāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa . . . pe . . .
vatthu ahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca vippayutta-
paccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā ahetukā khandhā ca
moho ca purejātassa.1 . . .
     5. Ahetuko dhammo sahetukassa2 dhammassa. . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. Sahajātaṃ:-- paṭisandhikkhaṇe
vatthu sahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena
paccayo. Purejātaṃ:-- vatthu3 . . .
     6. Ahetuko dhammo sahetukassa ca ahetukassa. . . .
     Purejātaṃ vatthu vicikicchāsahagatānaṃ uddhaccasaha-
gatānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca vippayuttapaccayena
paccayo.
     8. Sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā ahetukassa. . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. Sahajātā vicikicchāsahagatā
uddhaccasahagatā khandhā ca moho ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ
rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā vici-
kicchāsahagatā3 . . . moho ca purejātassa imassa kāyassa
vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
     1. Sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa atthipac-
cayena paccayo.
     Sahetuko eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ; dve
. . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     2. Sahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa. . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. Sahajātā sahetukā khandhā
cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2 As under 2.
2 V. ahetu-.
3 As just above.


[page 053]
                                   Atthivāro                     53
Vicikicchāsahagatā uddhaccasahagatā khandhā mohassa
cittasamuṭṭhānānañ . . . paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe
pacchājātā sahetukā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa
atthipaccayena paccayo.
     3. Sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa ca ahetukassa. . . .
     Sahetuko eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ citta-
samuṭṭhānānañ . . . paccayo. Vicikicchāsahagato uddhac-
casahagato eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa
ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca; dve. . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe
. . . pe . . .
     4. Ahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa. . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ āhāraṃ indriyaṃ.
Sahajāto ahetuko1 eko2 . . . pe . . . dve . . . Paṭisan-
dhikkhaṇe3 vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho
cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo . . .
(paṭisandhi yāva asaññasattā kātabbaṃ.) Purejātaṃ:-- cak-
khuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ aniccato . . . pe . . . doman-
assaṃ uppajjati. Kusalākusale niruddhe ahetuko vipāko
tad-ārammaṇatā uppajjati. Rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa
. . . pe . . . phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa . . . pe
. . . cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa . . . pe . . . kāyā-
yatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa atthipaccayena paccayo. Vatthu
ahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca atthipaccayena pac-
cayo. Pacchājātā ahetukā khandhā ca moho ca purejātassa
imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. Kabaḷiṃkāro
āhāro4 imassa. . . . Rūpajīvitindriyaṃ kaṭattā rūpānaṃ
atthipaccayena paccayo.
     5. Ahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. Sahajāto vicikicchāsahagato
uddhaccasahagato moho sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ
atthipaccayena paccayo. Patisandhikkhaṇe vatthu sahe-
tukānaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. Purejātaṃ
cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ5 . . . niruddhe sahetuko
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. omits.
2 As under 3 (first sentence).
3 R. omits this word.
4 B. and S. -kārāhāro. End as just above.
5 As under 4.


[page 054]
54                Sahetukadukaṃ.
vipāko tad-ārammaṇatā uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ
passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti. Vatthu sahe-
tukānaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
     6. Ahetuko dhammo sahetukassa ca ahetukassa. . . .
     Sahajātaṃ1 . . . khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpā-
naṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. Purejātaṃ:-- cakkhuṃ . . .
pe . . . vatthuṃ ārabbha vicikicchāsahagatā uddhaccasaha-
gatā khandhā ca moho ca uppajjanti. Vatthu vicikicchāsa-
hagatānaṃ uddhaccasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca
atthipaccayena paccayo.
     7. Sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā sahetukassa. . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. Sahajāto vicikicchāsahagato
uddhaccasahagato eko khandho ca moho ca tiṇṇannaṃ
khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo; dve . . . pe . . .
Paṭisandhikkhaṇe sahetuko eko khandho ca vatthu ca
tiṇṇannaṃ2 . . . dve . . . pe . . . Purejāto3 sahetuko2
. . . dve . . . pe . . .
     8. Sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā ahetukassa. . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ āhāraṃ indriyaṃ.
Sahajātā:-- sahetukā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭ-
ṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. Vicikicchā-
sahagatā uddhaccasahagatā khandhā ca moho ca cittasam-
uṭṭhānānaṃ. . . .2 Paṭisandhikkhaṇe sahetukā khandhā ca
mahābhūtā ca kaṭattā rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
Purejātā4 vicikicchāsahagatā uddhaccasahagatā khandhā ca
vatthu ca mohassa atthipaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā
vicikicchāsahagatā uddhaccasahagatā khandhā ca moho ca
purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena pāccayo. Pac-
chājātā sahetukā khandhā ca kabaḷiṃkāro āhāro ca imassa
kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā sahetukā
khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañ ca kaṭattā rūpānaṃ atthipac-
cayena paccayo.
     9. Sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā sahetukassa ca . . .
     Sahajātaṃ5 . . . khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca
rūpānaṃ6 atthipaccayena paccayo. Purejāto3 vicikicchāsa-
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 As under 5.
2 As just above.
3 R. sahajāto.
4 R. sahajātā.
5 As under 7.
6 B. omits these two words.


[page 055]
                          Paccantiyaṃ.                     55
hagato uddhaccasahagato eko khandho ca vatthu ca
tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca atthipaccayena pac-
cayo; dve . . . pe . . .
          Hetuyā cha,                     kamme cattāri,
          ārammaṇe nava,                    vipāke cattāri,
          adhipatiyā cattāri,               āhāre cattāri,
          anantare nava,                    indriye cattāri,
          samanantare nava,1                jhāne cattāri,
          sahajāte nava,                    magge tīṇi,
          aññamaññe cha,                    sampayutte cha,
          nissaye nava,                     vippayutte pañca,
          upanissaye nava,                atthiyā nava,
          purejāte tīṇi,                    natthiyā nava,
          pacchājāte tīṇi,                vigate nava,
          āsevane nava,                     avigate nava:--
     evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.
                         Anulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
                              [Paccaniyaṃ.]
     1. Sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇa-
. . . sahajāta- . . . upanissaya- . . . kammapaccayena
paccayo.
     2. Sahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇa-
. . . sahajāta- . . . upanissaya- . . . pacchājāta- . . .
kammapaccayena paccayo.
     3. Sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa ca ahetukassa ca
dhammassa ārammaṇa- . . . sahajāta- . . . upanissaya-
. . . kammapaccayena paccayo.
     4. Ahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇa-
. . . sahajāta- . . . upanissaya- . . . purejāta- . . .
pacchājāta- . . . āhāra- . . . indriyapaccayena paccayo.2
     5. Ahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa aram-
maṇa- . . . sahajāta- . . . upanissaya- . . . purejāta-
paccayena paccayo.
     6. Ahetuko dhammo sahatukassa ca ahetukassa . . .3
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 K. omits this clause.
2 B. omits this clause.
3 As under 5.


[page 056]
56                Sahetukadukaṃ.
     7. Sahetuko ca . . . sahetukassa dhammassa āram-
maṇa- . . . sahajāta- . . . upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
     8. Sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā ahetukassa dham-
massa1 . . . pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
     9. Sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā sahetukassa ca
ahetukassa ca dhammassa . . .2
     Nahetuyā nava . . . (saṃkhittaṃ) . . . sabbattha nava,
no-avigate nava:-- evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.
                     Paccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
          Hetupaccayā,                     nārammaṇe3 (saṃkhittaṃ) . . .
          cha,                              namagge cha,
          nādhipatiyā cha,                nasampayutte dve,
          nānantare cha,                navippayutte dve,
          nasamanantare cha,               nonatthiyā cha,
          na-aññamaññe dve,                novigate cha:-- evaṃ ganetabbaṃ.
          na-upanissaye cha,
                Anulomapaccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
          Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe          kamme cattāri,
          nava,                     vipāke cattāri,
          adhipatiyā cattāri,           āhāre cattāri,
          anantare nava,                indriye cattāri,
          samanantare nava,               jhāne cattāri,
          sahajāte nava,                magge tīṇi,
          aññamaññe nava,4                sampayutte cattāri,
          nissaye nava,                vippayutte pañca,
          upanissaye nava,                atthiyā nava,
          purejāte tīṇi,                natthiyā nava,
          pacchājāte tīṇi.                vigate nava,
          āsevane nava,                avigate nava:--
     evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.
                Paccaniyānulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
                SAHETUKA-DUKAṂ niṭṭhitaṃ.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 As under 7.
2 As under 7.
3 S. Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, hetupaccayā nārammaṇe cha.
4 R. cha.


[page 057]
                               57
                               [III.
                     HETUSAMPAYUTTA-DUKAṂ.]
     Hetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetusampayutto
dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Hetusampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā
. . . pe . . . dve. . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe. . . .
     2. Hetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetuvippayutto
dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Hetusampayutte khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ
rūpaṃ. Patisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe. . . . (Iminā kāraṇeṇa1
vitthāretabbaṃ yathā Sahetukadukaṃ. Ninnānākaraṇaṃ2.)
                         HETUSAMPAYUTTA-DUKAṂ niṭṭhitaṃ.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. kārena. S. kātabbaṃ.
2 S. ninnākaraṇaṃ.


[page 058]
                               58
                               [IV.
                     HETU-CEVA-SAHETUKA-DUKAṂ.]
     1. Hetuñ ceva1 sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca2 hetu ceva
sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Alobhaṃ paṭicca adoso amoho . . . (cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ).
Lobhaṃ paṭicca moho . . . (cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ). Paṭi-
sandhikkhaṇe alobhaṃ paṭicca adoso amoho . . . (cakkaṃ).
     2. Hetuñ ceva sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko
ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Hetuṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā. Paṭisandhikkha-
ṇe . . . pe. . . .
     3. Hetuñ ceva . . . hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko
ceva na ca hetu3 ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
     Alobhaṃ paṭicca adoso amoho sampayuttakā ca khandhā
. . . (cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ) . . . Lobhaṃ paṭicca moho sam-
payuttakā ca khandhā . . . (cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ) . . .
Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe. . . .
     4. Sahetukañ ceva na ca hetuṃ . . . na ca hetu dhammo. . . .
     Sahetukañ ceva na ca hetuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo
khandhā . . . pe . . . dve . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     5. Sahetukañ ceva na ca hetuṃ4 dhammaṃ . . . sahe-
tuko. . . .
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. Hetu ceva throughout. S. varies. R. hetuṃ.
2 S. inserts hetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca.
3 B. omits next eight lines to sahetukañ ceva na ca hetu
     ekaṃ, etc.
4 S. na ca hetudhammaṃ.


[page 059]
                          Paccaniyaṃ.                     59
     Sahetuke1 ceva na ca hetū khandhe paṭicca hetū. Paṭi-
sandhikkhaṇe . . . pe. . . .
     6. Sahetukañ ceva na ca hetuṃ . . . hetu ceva sahetuko
ca sahetuko2 ceva na ca hetu ca. . . .
     Sahetukañ ceva na ca hetuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo
khandhā hetū ca . . . pe . . . dve . . . pe . . . Paṭi-
sandhikkhaṇe . . . pe. . . .
     7. Hetuñ ceva sahetukañ ca sahetukañ ceva na ca hetuṃ
ca . . . hetu ceva sahetuko.3 . . .
     Alobhañ ca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca adoso
amoho . . . (cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ). Lobhañ ca sampayut-
take ca khandhe paṭicca moho . . . (cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ).
Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe. . . .
     8. Hetuñ ceva . . . sahetuko ceva na ca hetu. . . .
     Sahetukañ ceva na ca hetuṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca hetuñ ca
paṭicca tayo khandhā . . . pe . . . dve. . . . Paṭisan-
dhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     9. Hetuñ ceva sahetukañ ca sahetukañ ceva na ca hetuñ
ca4 dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu cava5 sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva
na ca hetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
     Sahetukañ ceva na ca hetuṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca alobhañ
ca paṭicca tayo khandhā adoso amoho ca . . . pe . . .
dve. . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . . (saṅkhittaṃ),
evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ).

          ārammaṇe nava,
          adhipatiyā nava,      avigate nava:--
          anantare nava . . .
     evaṃ ganetabbaṃ.

     1. Hetuñ ceva sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva
sahetuko dhammo uppajjati nādhipatipaccayā.

[page 060]
60                          Hetucevasahetukadukaṃ.
     Alobhaṃ paṭicca adoso amoho . . . (cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ)
     Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . . (paripuṇṇaṃ nava) . . .
napurejātapaccayā1 . . . (nava) . . . napacchājātapaccayā
. . . (nava) . . . nāsevanapaccayā . . . (nava).
     2. Hetuñ ceva2 sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko
ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā.
     Hetuṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā cetanā.
     4. Sahetukañ ceva na ca hetuṃ . . . na ca hetu . . .
     Sahetuke ceva na ca hetū khandhe paṭicca sampayuttakā
cetanā.
     8. Hetuñ ceva sahetukañ ca sahetukañ ceva na ca hetuñ
ca dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo
uppajjati nakammapaccayā.
     Hetuñ ca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca sampayuttakā
cetanā . . . pe . . .
. . . navipākapaccayā . . . navippayuttapaccayā . . .
          Nādhipatiyā nava,                nakamme tīṇi,
          napurejāte nava,                navipāke nava,
          napacchājāte nava,                navippayutte nava:--
          nāsevane nava,
     evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.
                     Paccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
          Hetupaccayā,                     nādhipatiyā nāsevane nava,
           nava,                          nakamme tīṇi,
          napurejāte nava,                navipāke nava,
          napacchājāte nava,3               navippayutte nava:--
     evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.
                     Anulomapaccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
     Nādhipatipaccayā hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, anan-
tare nava . . . (saṃkhittaṃ) . . . avigate nava:-- evaṃ
gaṇetabbaṃ.
                Paccaniyānulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

1 R. napurejāte paccayā, and so on.
2 B. Sahetu ceva.
3 B. omits clause.


[page 061]
                     Arammaṇavāro.                          61
     (Sahajātavāro pi paccayavāro pi nissayavāro pi saṃsaṭṭha-
vāro pi sampayuttavāro pi paṭiccavārasadisā.1)
     1. Hetu1 ceva sahetuko dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa
dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
     Alobho adosassa amohassa hetupaccayena paccayo . . .
(paṭiccavārasadisaṃ2) . . .
     2. Hetu ceva . . . sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa . . .
     Hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena pac-
cayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     3. Hetu ceva . . . hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetu-
kassa ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena
paccayo.
     Alobho adosassa amohassa sampayuttakānañ ca khan-
dhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo . . . (vitthāretabbaṃ).
     1. Hetu ceva sahetuko ca hetussa ceva sahetukassa
dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
     Hetuṃ ārabbha hetū uppajjanti.
     2. Hetu ceva.. na ca hetussa . . .
     Hetuṃ ārabbha sahetukā ceva na ca hetū khandhā
uppajjanti.
     3. Hetu ceva . . . hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetukassa
ceva na ca hetussa . . .
     Hetuṃ arabbha hetū ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā
uppajjanti.
     4. Sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo sahetukassa ceva
na ca hetussa . . .
     Dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ uposathakammaṃ taṃ paccavekkhati,
pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ
paccavekkhati. Ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ pacca-
vekkhanti, phalaṃ paccavekkhanti, pahīnakilese pacca-
vekkhanti, vikkhambhitakilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe3
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 R. -sadiso.
2 R. and B. yathā paṭiccasadisaṃ.
3 B. pubbesu, omitting next three words.


[page 062]
62                          Hetucevasahetukadukaṃ.
samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti. Sahetuke1 ceva na ca hetū
khandhe aniccato . . . pe . . . domanassaṃ uppajjati; ceto-
pariyañāṇena sahetukañ ceva na ca hetu cittasamaṃgissa
cittaṃ jānāti; ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanassa,
ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa ārammaṇa-
paccayena paccayo. Sahetukā ceva na ca hetū khandhā
iddhividhañāṇassa cetopariyañāṇassa pubbenivāsānussa-
tiñāṇassa yathākammūpagañāṇassa anāgataṃsañāṇassa
ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
     5. Sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo hetussa ceva
sahetukassa . . .
     Dānaṃ datvā . . . (paṭhamagamanaṃ; ninnānaṃ).
     6. Sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo hetussa ceva
sahetukassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca heṭussa ca . . .
     Dānaṃ datvā . . . (yathā paṭhamagamanaṃ; evaṃ
ninnānaṃ).
     7. Hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca
dhammā2 hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca3 . . .
     Hetuñ ca sampayuttake ca khandhe ārabbha hetū
uppajjanti.
     8. Hetu ceva . . . dhammā2 sahetukassa ceva na ca
hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
     Hetuñ ca sampayuttake ca khandhe ārabbha sahetukā
ceva na ca hetu khandhā uppajjanti.
     9. Hetu ceva . . . dhammā2 hetussa ceva sahetukassa
ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇa-
paccayena paccayo.
     Hetuñ ca sampayuttake ca khandhe ārabbha hetū ca
sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
     1. Hetu ceva sahetuko dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa
dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
     Ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. Ārammaṇādhi-
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. ahetuko. Cf. p. 10, l. 3.
2 B. dhammo.
3 B. hetu dhammassa ceva sahetukassa ārammaṇa.


[page 063]
                          Adhipativāro.                     63
pati:-- hetuṃ garuṃ katvā hetū uppajjanti. Sahajātādhi-
pati:-- hetu ceva sahetukādhipati1 sampayuttakānaṃ
hetūnaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
     2. Hetu ceva . . . sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa . . .
     Ārammaṇādhipati2 . . . katvā sahetukā ceva na ca hetū
khandhā uppajjanti. Sahajātādhipati:-- hetu ceva sahetuk-
ādhipati3 sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ adhipatipaccayena
paccayo.
     3. Hetu ceva . . . hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetu-
kassa ceva na ca hetussa ca . . .
     Ārammaṇādhipati4 . . . katvā hetū ca sampayuttakā ca
khandhā uppajjanti. Sahajātādhipati:-- hetu5 ceva . . .
khandhānaṃ hetūnañ ca adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
     4. Sahetuko ceva na ca hetu . . . na ca hetussa . . .
     Ārammaṇādhipati6 . . . dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ uposathā-
kammaṃ katvā, taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, pubbe . . .
pe . . . jhānā . . . pe . . . Ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā
maggaṃ garuṃ katvā . . . pe . . . phalaṃ garuṃ katvā
paccavekkhanti. Sahetuke ceva na ca hetū khandhe
garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati,7 taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo
uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. Sahajātādhipati:-- sahetuko8
ceva na ca hetu adhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ
adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
     5. Sahetuko ceva na ca hetu sahetukassa . . .
     Ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. Ārammaṇādhipati:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 K. and S. omit ceva sahetuka.
2 As under 1.
3 S. sahetuko adhi-.
4 As under 1.
5 B. omits hetu ceva. As under 2.
6 As under 1. S. here inserts: Hetu garuṃ katvā hetu
     sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti, sahajātādhipati hetu
     ceva sahetukā adhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ
     hetunañ ca adhipati. Sahetuko ceva na ca hetu sahetukā
     adhipati ārammaṇadhipati. Sahajātā arammaṇādhipati
     dānaṃ, etc.
7 B. and S. omit.
8 K. sahetukā.


[page 064]
64                          Hetucevasahetukadukaṃ.
--dānaṃ datvā . . . (paṭhamagamanaṃ1 yeva). Sahajātādhi-
pati:-- . . .2 sampayuttakānaṃ hetūnaṃ adhipatipaccayena
paccayo.
     6. Sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo hetussa ceva
sahetukassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa ca . . .
     Ārammaṇādhipati . . . dānaṃ datvā . . . (paṭhamagama-
naṃ1 yeva). Sahajātādhipati:-- sahetuko . . .3 khandhānaṃ
hetūnañ ca adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
     7. Hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca
dhammā hetussa ceva sahetukassa dhammassa adhipati-
paccayena paccayo.
     Ārammaṇādhipati:-- hetuñ4 ca sampayuttake ca khandhe
garuṃ katvā hetū uppajjanti.
     8. Hetu ceva . . . sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa . . .
     Ārammaṇādhipati:-- hetuñ ca . . .5 katvā sahetukā
ceva na ca hetū khandhā uppajjanti.
     9. Hetu ceva . . . hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetu-
kassa ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena
paccayo.
     Ārammaṇādhipati:-- hetuñ ca . . .5 hetū ca sampay-
uttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
     1. Hetu ceva sahetuko . . . sahetukassa dhammassa
anantarapaccayena paccayo.
     Purimā purimā hetū6 pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ hetūnaṃ
anantarapaccayena paccayo.
     2. Hetu ceva sahetuko . . . na ca hetussa . . .
     Purimā . . .7 pacchimānaṃ sahetukānañ ceva na ca
hetūnaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
     3. Hetu ceva sahetuko . . . sahetukassa ca sahetukassa
ceva na ca hetussa . . .
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. omits paṭhama. R. gatagamanaṃ yeva.
2 As under 4. K. sahetukā.
3 As under 5.
4 R. hetū.
5 So also R. As under 7.
6 All but R. read hetu.
7 As under 1.


[page 065]
                          Anantaravāro.                     65
     Purimā . . .1 hetūnaṃ sampayuttakānañ ca khandhānaṃ
anantarapaccayena paccayo.
     4. Sahetuko ceva na ca hetu . . .
     Purimā purimā sahetukā ceva na ca hetū khandhā
pacchimānaṃ . . .2 Anulomaṃ gotrabhussa anulomaṃ
vodānassa . . . (saṅkhittaṃ).3 Nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa
nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapac-
cayena paccayo.
     5. Sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo hetussa ceva
sahetukassa . . .
     Purimā purimā sahetukā ceva na ca hetū khandhā pacchi-
mānaṃ . . .4 Anulomaṃ gotrabhussa . . . (saṃkhittaṃ).
     6. Sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca . . . sahetukassa ceva
na ca hetussa ca . . .
     Purimā . . .5 pacchimānaṃ hetūnaṃ sampayuttakānañ
ca khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. Anulomaṃ
gotrabhussa . . . pe . . . (sahetuko ceva na ca hetumū-
lakaṃ, tīṇi pi ekasadisā).
     7. Hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca
dhammā hetussa ceva sahetukassa dhammassa anantara-
paccayena paccayo.
     Purimā purimā hetū6 ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā
pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ hetūnaṃ anantarapaccayena
paccayo.
     8. Hetu ceva . . . sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa . . .
     Purimā . . .7 pacchimānaṃ sahetukānañ ceva na ca
hetūnaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
     9. Hetu ceva . . . hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetu-
kassa ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena
paccayo.
     Purimā . . .8 hetūnaṃ sampayuttakānañ ca khandhānaṃ
anantarapaccayena paccayo.
     1. Hetu ceva . . . sahetuko dhammo uppajjati sahajāta-
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 As under 1.

66                          Hetucevasahetukadukaṃ.
paccayena paccayo . . . aññamaññapaccayena paccayo
. . . nissayapaccayena paccayo . . . (tīṇi pi paccayā
paṭiccavāre hetusadisā) . . . upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
     Ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanis-
sayo . . . pe . . . Pakatūpanissayo:-- hetū hetūnaṃ
upanissayapaccayena paccayo. Hetū sahetukānañ ceva na
ca hetūnaṃ khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
Hetū hetūnaṃ sampayuttakānañ ceva khandhānaṃ upanis-
sayapaccayena paccayo. (Imesaṃ dvinnam pi pañhānaṃ
mūlāni pucchitabbāni.)
     4. Sahetuko ceva na ca hetu . . .
     Ārammaṇūpanissayo . . .1 pe . . . Pakatūpanissayo:--
saddhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti . . . pe . . . samāpattiṃ
uppādeti . . . pe . . . mānaṃ jappeti, . . . pe . . . diṭṭhiṃ
gaṇhāti. Sīlaṃ . . . pe . . . patthanaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ
deti, . . . pe . . . saṃghaṃ bhindati. Saddhā . . . pe . . .
patthanā saddhāya . . . pe . . . patthanāya upanissaya-
paccayena paccayo. (Sahetuko ceva na ca hetu-mūlakaṃ
iminā kāraṇena2 vitthāretabbaṃ3; avasesā dve pañhā.)
     7. Hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca
dhammā hetussa ceva sahetukassa . . .4
     Ārammaṇūpanissayo5 . . . pe . . . Pakatūpanissayo:--
hetū ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā hetūnaṃ upanissaya-
paccayena paccayo . . . (mūlaṃ pucchitabbaṃ).6
     Hetū ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā hetūnaṃ sampayut-
takānañ ca khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
     1. Hetu ceva sahetuko . . . āsevanapaccayena paccayo
. . . (anantarasadisaṃ).
     4. Sahetuko ceva na ca hetu . . . kammapaccayena
paccayo.
     Sahajātā, nānākhaṇikā. Sahajātā:-- sahetukā ceva na
ca hetū cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapac-
cayena paccayo. Nānākhaṇikā:-- sahetukā ceva na ca
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 As under 1.
2 R. kārena.
3 K. vitthāretabbā.
4 B. ahetu-.
5 As under 1.
6 B. mūlāni pucchitabbāni.


[page 067]
                                    Anulomaṃ.           67
hetū cetanā vipākānaṃ sahetukānaṃ ceva na ca hetūnaṃ
khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
     5. Sahetuko ceva na ca hetu . . . sahetukassa dham-
massa kammapaccayena paccayo.
     Sahajātā, nānākhanikā. Sahajātā:-- sahetukā . . .1
sampayuttakānaṃ hetūnaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
Nānākhaṇikā:-- sahetukā . . .1 vipākānaṃ hetūnaṃ kam-
mapaccayena paccayo.
     6. Sahetuko ceva . . . na ca hetussa ca . . .
     Sahajātā, nānākhaṇikā. Sahajātā:-- sahetukā . . .1
khandhānaṃ hetūnañ ca kammapaccayena paccayo.
Nānākhaṇikā . . .1 vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetūnañ ca
kammapaccayena paccayo.
     1. Hetu ceva . . . vipākapaccayena paccayo.
     Vipāko alobho adosassa amohassa vipākapaccayena
paccayo. (Paṭisandhikkhaṇe alobho yathā hetupaccayā evaṃ
vitthāretabbaṃ. Nava pi vipākan ti niyāmetabbaṃ.)
     4. Sahetuko ceva na ca hetu . . . āhārapaccayena pac-
cayo . . . (tīṇi).
     1. Hetu ceva . . . indriyapaccayena paccayo . . .
(indriyan ti niyāmetabbaṃ. Paripuṇṇaṃ2).
     4. Sahetuko ceva na ca hetu . . . jhānapaccayena
paccayo . . . (tīṇi).
     1. Hetu ceva . . . maggapaccayena paccayo . . . pe . . .
sampayutta- . . . atthi- . . . natthi- . . . vigata- . . .
avigatapaccayena paccayo.
          Hetuyā tīṇi,                     aññamaññe nava,
          ārammaṇe nava,                    nissaye nava,
          adhipatiyā nava,                upanissaye nava,
          anantare nava,3                āsevane nava,
          sahājāte nava,                    kamme tīṇi,
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 As under 4.
2 B. and S. nava pi paripuṇṇaṃ.
3 R., B. and S. add, samanantare nava.


[page 068]
68                          Hetucevasahetukadukaṃ.
          vipāke nava,                     sampayutte nava,1
          āhāre tīṇi,                     atthiyā nava,
          indriye nava,                     natthiyā nava,
          jhāne tīṇi,                     vigate nava,2
          magge nava,                     avigate nava:--
     evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.
                          Anulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
                               [Paccaniyaṃ.]
     1. Hetu ceva sahetuko dhammo hetussa ceva . . .
ārammaṇa-, sahajāta-, upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
     2. Hetu ceva . . . sahetukassa na ca hetussa . . .3
     3. Hetu ceva . . . sahetukassa ca sahetukassa ceva na
ca hetussa . . .4
     4. Sahetuko ceva na ca hetu . . . na ca hetussa āram-
maṇa-, sahajāta,-upanissaya-, kammapaccayena paccayo.5
     5. Sahetuko ceva na ca hetu . . . sahetukassa . . .6
     6. Sahetuko ceva na ca hetu . . . sahetukassa ceva na
ca hetussa ca . . .7
     7. Hetu ceva sahetuko ca . . . sahetukassa . . .8
     8. Hetu ceva sahetuko ca . . . na ca hetussa . . .8
     9. Hetu ceva sahetuko ca . . . sahetukasa ceva na ca
hetussa ca dhammassa . . .8
     Nahetuyā nava . . . (saṃkhittaṃ) . . . sabbattha nava:
-- evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.
                              Paccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
     Hetupaccayā, nārammaṇe tīṇi, nādhipatiyā tīṇi,9 nānan-
tare tīṇi, nasamanantare10 tīṇi . . . (saṃkhittaṃ) . . . sab-
battha tīṇi, namagge tīṇi, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi:--
evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.
                          Anulomapaccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. tīṇi, vippayutte nava.
2 B. tīṇi.
3 As in 1.
4 As in 1. B. adds kammapacca.
5 S. omits clause.
6 As in 4, but S. omits last two clauses.
7 As in 4.
8 As in 1.
9 B. nava.
10 B. and S. samanantare tīṇi, na upanissaye tīṇi.


[page 069]
                          Hetucevahetusampayuttadukaṃ.                69
          Nahetupaccayā, ārammaṇe           kamme tīṇi,
           nava,                          vipāke tīṇi,
          adhipatiyā nava,                āhāre tīṇi,
          anantare nava,                    indriye tīṇi,
          samanantare tīṇi,1                jhāne tīṇi,
          sāhajāte tīṇi,                    magge tīṇi,
          aññamaññe tīṇi,                sampayutte tīṇi,
          nissaye tīṇi,                     atthiyā tīṇi,
          upanissaye tīṇi,2                natthiyā tīṇi,
          āsevana nava,                     vigate tīṇi:--
     evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.
                          Paccaniyānulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
                     HETU-CEVA-SAHETUKA-DUKAṂ niṭṭhitaṃ
                                    [V.
                         HETU-CEVA-HETUSAMPAYUTTA-DUKAṂ.]3
           (Yathā2 Hetu-ceva-sahetuka-dukaṃ evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
                               Ninnānākaraṇaṃ.)4
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 R. nava.
2 R. nava.
3 R. Hetuṃ ceva.
4 K. has only the last three words, adding Hetu . . .
     sampayuttadukaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.


[page 070]
                                    70
                                    [VI.
                          NAHETU-SAHETUKA-DUKAṂ.
                               Anulomaṃ.]
     1. Nahetu-sahetukaṃ1 dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu-sahetuko
dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Nahetu-sahetukaṃ1 ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā
. . . pe . . . dve . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe nahetu-sahetu-
kaṃ . . . pe . . .
     2. Nahetu-sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu-ahetuko
dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Nahetu-sahetuke khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ
rūpaṃ. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     3. Nahetu-sahetukaṃ . . . nahetu-sahetuko ca nahetu-
ahetuko ca . . .
     Nahetu-sahetukaṃ . . . (cf. 1) khandhā cittasamuṭṭhā-
nañ ca rūpaṃ, . . . pe . . . dve . . . pe . . . Paṭisan-
dhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     4. Nahetu-ahetukaṃ . . . nahetu-ahetuko. . . .
     Ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā . . . pe . . .
mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, kaṭattā rūpaṃ
upādā rūpaṃ.
     5. Nahetu-ahetukaṃ . . . nahetu-sahetuko. . . .
     Paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca nahetu-sahetukā
khandhā.
     6. Nahetu-ahetukaṃ . . . nahetu-ahetuko ca. . . .
     Paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca nahetu-sahetukā
khandhā; mahābhūte paṭicca kaṭattā rūpaṃ upādā rūpaṃ.
     7. Nahetu-sahetukañ ca nahetu-sahetuko. . . .
     Paṭisandhikkhaṇe nahetu-sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 R. nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ.


[page 071]
                              Ārammaṇavāro.                     71
vatthuñ ca paṭicca tayo khandhā . . . pe . . . dve . . .
pe. . . .
     8. Nahetu-sahetukañ ca . . . nahetu-ahetuko . . .
     Nahetu-sahetuke khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca
cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     9. Nahetu sahetukañ ca nahetu-ahetukañ ca dhammaṃ
paṭicca nahetu-sahetuko ca nahetu-ahetuko ca dhammā
uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
     Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . .1 dve . . . pe . . . Nahetu-
sahetuke khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattā-rūpaṃ
upādā-rūpaṃ.
     1. Nahetu-sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ. . . . ārammaṇapac-
cayā.
     Nahetu-sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ . . . paṭicca tayo
khandhā . . . pe . . . dve. . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe. . . .
pe. . . .2
     4. Nahetu-ahetukaṃ . . . nahetu-ahetuko . . . āram-
maṇapaccayā.
     Nahetu-ahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ . . . pe . . . Paṭi-
sandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     5. Nahetu-ahetukaṃ . . . nahetu-sahetuko. . . .
     Paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca nahetu-sahetukā
khandhā.
     7. Nahetu-sahetukañ ca nahetu-ahetukañ ca dhammaṃ
paṭicca nahetu-sahetuko. . . .
     Paṭisandhikkhaṇe nahetu-sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca
vatthuñ ca paṭicca tayo khandhā . . . pe . . . dve . . .
(saṃkhittaṃ evaṃ vibhajitabbaṃ).
          Hetuyā nava,                     samanantare cattāri,
          ārammaṇe cattāri,                sahajāte nava,
          adhipatiyā pañca,                aññamaññe cha,
          anantare cattāri,                nissaye nava,
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 As under 7.
2 B. inserts vatthuṃ, and elides remainder of section, to
     saṃkhittaṃ.


[page 072]
72                          Nahetusahetukadukaṃ.
          upanissaye cattari,               sampayutte cattāri,
          purejāte dve,                     vippayutte nava,
          āsevane dve,1                     atthiyā nava,
          kamme nava,                     natthiyā cattāri,
          vipāke nava,                     vigate cattāri,
          āhāre nava . . . (saṃkhittaṃ)     avigate nava:--
           . . . sabbattha nava,
     evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.
                               Anulomaṃ niṭṭhiṭaṃ.
                                    [Paccaniyaṃ]
     4. Nahetu-ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu-ahetuko
dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
     Nahetu-ahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā
cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ . . . pe . . . dve . . . pe.
. . . (paṭisandhi yāva asaññasattā. Moho natthi).
     2. Nahetu-sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu-ahetuko
dhammo uppajjati nārammaṇapaccayā.
     Nahetu-sahetuke khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ
rūpaṃ.
     4. Nahetu-ahetukaṃ . . . nahetu-ahetuko. . . .
     Nahetu-ahetuko khandhe.2 . . . (paṭisandhikkhaṇe yāva
asaññasattā).
     8. Nahetu-sahetukañ ca nahetu-ahetukañ ca dhammaṃ
paṭicca nahetu-ahetuko dhammo uppajjati nārammaṇa-
paccayā.
     Nahetu-sahetuke khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca
cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ . . . (paṭisandhi saṃkhittaṃ).
          Nahetuyā ekaṃ,                    na-upanissaye tīṇi,
          nārammaṇe tīṇi,                napurejāte nava,
          nādhipatiyā nava,                napacchājāte nava,
          nānantare tīṇi,                nāsevane nava,
          nasamanantare tīṇi,               nakamme dve,
          na-aññamaññe tīṇi,                navipāke pañca,
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. omits clause.
2 As under 2.


[page 073]
                          Paccayavāro.                          73
          nāhāre ekaṃ,                     nasampayutte tīṇi,
          na-indriye ekaṃ,                navippayutte dve,
          najhāne ekaṃ,                     nonatthiyā tīṇi,
          namagge ekaṃ,                     novigate tīṇi:--
     evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.
                              Paccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
          Hetupaccayā, nārammaṇe           napacchājāte nava,
           tīṇi,                          nāsevane nava,1
          nādhipatiyā nava,                nakamme ekaṃ,
          nānantare nava,                navipāke pañca,
          nasamanantare nava,               nasampayutte tīṇi,
          na-aññamaññe nava,                navippayutte ekaṃ,
          na-upanissaye tīṇi,               nonatthiyā tīṇi,
          napurejāte nava,                novigate tīṇi:--
     evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.
                          Anulomapaccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
           Nahetupaccayā, ārammaṇe          ekaṃ, sampayutte ekaṃ,
           . . . (saṃkhittaṃ) . . . jhāne     vippayutte ekaṃ,
           ekaṃ,                          vigate ekaṃ,
           magge ekaṃ,                     avigate ekaṃ:--
     evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.
                          Paccaniyānulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
                     (Sahajātavāre pi evaṃ kāretabbaṃ.)2
     1. Nahetu-sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nahetu-sahetuko
dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā . . . (tīṇi).
     4. Nahetu-ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nahetu-ahetuko
dhammo uppajjati hetupaccaya.
     Ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paccayā tayo mahābhūtā . . . pe . . .
Mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattā-rūpaṃ
upādā-rūpaṃ.
     5. Nahetu-ahetukaṃ . . . nahetu-sahetuko. . . .
     Vatthuṃ paccayā nahetu-sahetukā khandhā. Paṭisan-
dhikkhaṇe. . . . pe. . . .
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. omits clause.
2 S. kātabbaṃ.


[page 074]
74                              Nahetusahetukadukaṃ.
     6. Nahetu-ahetukaṃ . . . nahetu-sahetuko ca nahetu-
ahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
     Vatthuṃ paccayā nahetu-sahetukā khandhā. Mahābhūte
paccayā1 cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . .
pe . . .
     7. Nahetu-sahetukañ ca nahetu-ahetukañ ca dham-
maṃ paccayā nahetu-sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetu-
paccayā . . . (ghaṭanā tīṇi; pavattipaṭisandhi2 paripuṇṇaṃ,
saṃkhittaṃ).
     Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, avigate nava:-- evaṃ
gaṇetabbaṃ.
                                    Anulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
     Nahetuyā ekaṃ, nārammaṇe tīṇi . . . (saṃkhittaṃ) . . .
novigate tīṇi.
                              Paccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
                     (Nissayavāro paccayavārasadiso.)
     1. Nahetu-sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho nahetu-
sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Nahetu-sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ . . . pe . . . Paṭi-
sandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     Hetuyā ekaṃ,                sabbattha dve,
     ārammaṇe dve,                magge ekaṃ,
     adhipatiyā ekaṃ,               avigate dve.
     anantare dve,
                                    Anulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
     4. Nahetu-ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho nahetu-
ahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
     Nahetu-ahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ . . . pe . . . Paṭi-
sandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     Nahetuyā ekaṃ,                nakamme dve,
     nādhipaṭiyā dve,               navipāke dve,
     napurejāte dve,                najhāne ekaṃ,
     napacchājāte dve,           namagge ekaṃ,
     nāsevane dve,                navippayutte dve.
                     Paccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. paṭicca.
2 K. pavattapaṭi-.


[page 075]
                          Arammaṇavāro.                         75
     (Evaṃ avasesā1 dve gaṇanā gaṇetabbā. Sampayuttavāro
saṃsaṭṭhavārasadiso.)
     1. Nahetu-sahetuko dhammo nahetu-sahetukassa dham-
massa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
     Dānaṃ . . . pe2 . . . sīlaṃ . . . uposathakammaṃ . . .
pubbe . . . jhānaṃ . . . Ariyā . . . maggaṃ . . . phalaṃ
paccavekkhanti . . . pahīnakilese . . . vikkhambhitakilese
pubbe . . . pe . . . Nahetu-sahetuke khandhe aniccato . . . pe
. . . domanassaṃ uppajjati. Kusalākusale niruddhe nahetu-
sahetuko vipāko tad-ārammaṇatā uppajjati; cetopariyaña-
ṇena nahetu-sahetukacittasamaṃgissa cittaṃ jānāti; ākā-
sānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanassa . . . pe . . . ākiñcañ-
ñāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa . . . pe . . . Nahetu-
sahetukā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa cetopariyañāṇassa
pubbe nivāsānussatiñāṇassa yathākammūpagañāṇassa anā-
gataṃsañāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Nahetu-
sahetuke khandhe ārabbha nahetu-sahetukā khandhā
uppajjanti.
     2. Nahetu-sahetuko . . . nahetu-ahetukassa . . .3
     Nahetu-sahetuke khandhe aniccato . . . pe . . . doman-
assaṃ uppajjati. Kusalākusale niruddhe nahetu-ahetuko
vipāko tad-ārammaṇatā uppajjati. Nahetu-sahetuke
khandhe ārabbha nahetu-ahetukā khandhā uppajjanti.
     4. Nahetu-ahetuko . . . nahetu-ahetukassa . . .
     Nibbānaṃ āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
Cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ . . . pe . . . nahetu-ahetuke
khandhe aniccato . . . pe . . . domanassaṃ uppajjati.
Kusalākusale niruddhe nahetu-ahetuko vipāko tad-āram-
maṇatā uppajjati. Rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa . . .
pe . . . phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa ārammaṇa-
paccayena paccayo. Nahetu-ahetuke khandhe ārabbha
nahetu-ahetukā khandhā uppajjanti.
     5. Nahetu-ahetuko . . . nahetu-sahetukassa. . . .
     Ariyā nibbānaṃ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ4 gotrabhussa
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. adds pi.
2 See p. 10.
3 B. omits next sentence.
4 B. ariyā nibbānaṃ hetu gotrabhussa, etc.


[page 076]
76                          Nahetusahetukadukaṃ.
vodānassa maggassa phalassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
Cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ . . . nahetu-ahetuke
khandhe aniccato . . . pe . . . domanassaṃ uppajjati.
Kusalākusale niruddhe nahetu-sahetuko vipāko tad-āram-
maṇatā uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati; dibbāya
sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, cetopariyañāṇena nahetu-
ahetuka-cittasamaṃgissa cittaṃ jānāti;1 nahetu-ahetukā
khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa cetopariyañāṇassa pubbe nivās-
ānussatiñāṇassa yathākammūpagañāṇassa anāgataṃsañā-
ṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Nahetu-ahetuke
khandhe ārabbha nahetu-sahetukā khandhā uppajjanti.
     1. Nahetu-sahetuko . . . adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
     Ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. Ārammaṇādhipati:
-- dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ karitvā
taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavek-
khati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavek-
khati. Ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā
paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti.
Nahetu-sahetuke khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinan-
dati taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati . . . pe . . . diṭṭhi
uppajjati. Sahajātādhipati:-- nahetu-sahetukādhipati2
sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
     2. Nahetu-sahetuko . . . nahetu-ahetukassa. . . .
     Sahajātādhipati:-- nahetu-sahetukādhipati cittasam-
uṭṭhānaṃ rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
     3. Nahetu-sahetuko . . . nahetu-sahetukassa ca nahetu-
ahetukassa ca. . . .
     Sahajātādhipati:-- nahetu-sahetukādhipati . . .3 khan-
dhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena
paccayo.
     5. Nahetu-ahetuko . . . nahetu-sahetukassa. . . .
     Ārammaṇādhipati:-- ariyā nibbānaṃ garuṃ katvā pacca-
vekkhanti, nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa vodānassa maggassa
phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Cakkhuṃ . . . pe
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. omits this clause. S. also, except the word cetop-.
2 K. sahetukā adhi-.
3 As under 1. R. here has also sahetukā adhi-.


[page 077]
                          Anekavārā.                              77
. . . vatthuṃ . . . pe . . . nahetu-ahetuke khandhe garuṃ
katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati,
diṭṭhi uppajjati.
     1. Nahetu-sahetuko dhammo nahetu-sahetukassa dham-
massa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
     Purimā purimā nahetu-sahetukā khandhā pacchimānaṃ
pacchimānaṃ nahetu-sahetukānaṃ1 khandhānaṃ anantara-
paccayena paccayo. Anulomaṃ gotrabhussa . . . (saṃ-
khittaṃ2) . . . Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ phalasamāpattiyā
anantarapaccayenapaccayo.
     2. Nahetu-sahetuko . . . nahetu-ahetukassa. . . .
     Nahetu-sahetukaṃ cuticittaṃ nahetu-ahetukassa uppat-
ticittassa3 anantarapaccayena paccayo. Nahetu-sahetukaṃ
bhavaṃgaṃ āvajjanāya,4 nahetu-sahetukaṃ bhavaṃgaṃ
nahetu-ahetukassa bhavaṃgassa, nahetu-sahetukā khandhā
nahetu-ahetukassa vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
     4. Nahetu-ahetuko5 . . . nahetu-ahetukassa. . . .
     Purimā purimā nahetu-ahetukā khandhā pacchimānaṃ
. . .6Āvajjanā pañcannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ anantarapaccayena
paccayo.
     5. Nahetu-ahetuko . . . nahetu-sahetukassa. . . .
     Nahetu-ahetukaṃ cuticittaṃ nahetu-sahetukassa . . .7
Āvajjanā nahetu-sahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapacca-
yena paccayo. Nahetu-ahetukā khandhā nahetu-sahetu-
kassa vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
     1. Nahetu-sahetuko dhammo nahetu-sahetukassa dham-
massa samanantarapaccayena paccayo. . . .
     sahajātapaccayena paccayo . . . (miha8 ghaṭanā natthi;
satta pañhā) . . . pe . . . aññamaññapaccayena paccayo

     anantarapacca nahetusahetukā khandhā, &c.

7 As under 2. K. omits.

[page 078]
78                              Nahetusahetukadukaṃ.
. . . (cha pañhā) . . . nissayapaccayena paccayo..
(pavattipaṭisandhi,1 satta pañhā; miha2 ghaṭanā natthi) . . .
. . . upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
     Ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanis-
sayo . . . pe . . . Pakatūpanissayo:-- saddhaṃ upanissāya
dānaṃ deti . . . (saṃkhittaṃ) . . . mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ
gaṇhāti. Sīlaṃ . . . pe . . . patthanaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ
deti . . . pe . . . saṃghaṃ bhindati. Saddhāya . . . pe
. . . patthanāya3 saddhā . . . pe . . . patthanā mag-
gassa phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
     2. Nahetu-sahetuko . . . nahetu-ahetukassa. . . .
     Anantarūpanissayo . . . pakatūpanissayo . . . pe . . .
Pakatūpanissayo:-- saddhā kāyikassa sukhassa kāyikassa
dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. Sīlaṃ . . . pe
. . . patthanā kāyikassa sukhassa kāyikassa dukkhassa
upanissayapaccayena paccayo.4
     4. Nahetu-ahetuko . . . nahetu-ahetukassa. . . .
     Anantarūpanissayo5 . . . pe . . . Pakatūpanissayo:--
kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ kāyikassa sukhassa kāyikassa dukkhassa
upanissayapaccayena paccayo. Kāyikaṃ6 dukkhaṃ . . .
pe . . . utu bhojanaṃ senāsanaṃ kāyikassa sukhassa kāyi-
kassa dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. kāyikaṃ
sukhaṃ kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ utu bhojanaṃ senāsanaṃ kāyi-
kassa7 sukhassa kāyikassa dukkhassa8 upanissayapaccayena
paccayo.
     5. Nahetu-ahetuko . . . nahetu-sahetukassa. . . .
     Ārammaṇūpanissayo. . . .9 Pakatūpanissayo:-- kāyikaṃ
sukhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti . . . pe . . . saṃghaṃ
bhindati. Kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ utuṃ bhojanaṃ senāsanaṃ
upanissāya dānaṃ deti . . . pe . . . saṃghaṃ bhindati.

1 K. pavatta-.
2 See p. 77, n. 8.
3 R. saddhā patthanā saddhā patthanāya.
4 R. and B., add, saddhā patthanā kāyikassa sukhassa kāyikassa
     dukkhassa upanissaya.
5 As under 1.
6 B. inserts sukhaṃ kāyikaṃ.
7 K. omits last 2 words.
8 S. omits to saddhāya 7 lines below.
9 As under 1.


[page 079]
                          Āsevanavāro.                          79
Kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ . . . pe . . . senāsanaṃ saddhāya . . .
pe . . . patthanāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
     4. Nahetu-ahetuko1 dhammo nahetu-ahetukassa1 dham-
massa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
     Ārammaṇapurejātaṃ, vatthupurejātaṃ. Ārammaṇapure-
jātaṃ:-- cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ aniccato . . . pe
. . . domanassaṃ uppajjati. Kusalākusale niruddhe nahetu-
ahetuko vipāko tad-ārammaṇatā uppajjati. Rūpāyatanaṃ
cakkhuviññāṇassa . . . pe . . . phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāya-
viññāṇassa purejātapaccayena paccayo. Vatthupurejātaṃ:
-- cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa . . . pe . . . kāyāyata-
naṃ kāyaviññāṇassa . . . pe . . . vatthu nahetu-ahetu-
kānaṃ khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
     5. Nahetu-ahetuko . . . nahetu-sahetukassa. . . .
     Ārammaṇapurejātaṃ2 . . . niruddhe nahetu-sahetuko
vipāko tad-ārammaṇatā uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ
passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti; vatthu
nahetu-sahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena pac-
cayo.
     2. Nahetu-sahetuko dhammo nahetu-ahetukassa3
dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
     Nahetu-sahetukā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa
pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
     4. Nahetu-ahetuko . . . nahetu-ahetukassa. . . .
     Nahetu-ahetukā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa
pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
     1. Nahetu-sahetuko dhammo nahetu-sahetukassa dham-
massa āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
     Purimā purimā nahetu-sahetukā khandhā pacchimānaṃ
pacchimānaṃ nahetu-sahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ āsevana-
paccayena paccayo. Anulomaṃ gotrabhussa anulomaṃ
vodānassa; gotrabhu maggassa vodānaṃ maggassa āsevana-
paccayena paccayo.
     4. Nahetu-ahetuko . . . nahetu-ahetukassa. . . .
     Purimā purimā nahetu-ahetukā khandhā pacchimānaṃ
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. sahetu-.
2 As under 4.
3 B. sahetukassa.


[page 080]
80                              Nahetusahetukadukaṃ.
pacchimānaṃ nahetu-ahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ āsevanapac-
cayena paccayo.
     1. Nahetu-sahetuko dhammo nahetu-sahetukassa dham-
massa kammapaccayena paccayo.
     Sahajātā, nānākhaṇikā. Sahajātā:-- nahetu-sahetukā
cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena
paccayo. Nānākhaṇikā:-- nahetu-sahetukā cetanā vipākā-
naṃ nahetu-sahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena
paccayo.
     2. Nahetu-sahetuko . . . nahetu-ahetukassa. . . .
     Sahajātā, nānākhaṇikā. Sahajātā:-- nahetu-sahetukā
cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena pac-
cayo. Nānākhaṇikā:-- nahetu-sahetukā cetanā vipākānaṃ
nahetu-ahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kam-
mapaccayena paccayo.
     3. Nahetu-sahetuko . . . nahetu-sahetukassa ca . . .
     Sahajātā, nānākhaṇikā. Sahajātā:-- nahetu-sahetukā
cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañ
ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. Nānākhaṇikā1 . . .
nahetu-sahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ.1 . . .
     4. Nahetu-ahetuko . . . nahetu-ahetukassa. . . .
     Nahetu-ahetukā cetanā2 paccayo . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe
nahetuahetukā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ
kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
     1. Nahetu-sahetuko dhammo nahetu-sahetukassa dham-
massa vipākapaccayena paccayo . . . (tīṇi).
     4. Nahetu-ahetuko dhammo nahetu-ahetukassa dham-
massa vipākapaccayena paccayo . . . (ekaṃ).
     1. Nahetu-sahetuko dhammo nahetu sahetukassa dham-
massa āhārapaccayena paccayo . . . (tīṇi).
     4. Nahetu-ahetuko . . . nahetu-ahetukassa . . .
     Nahetu-ahetukā āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ
cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo.
Paṭisandhikkhaṇe kabaḷiṃkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa āhāra-
paccayena paccayo.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 As under 2.
2 As under 3.


[page 081]
                          Vippayuttavāro.                         81
     1. Nahetu-sahetuko . . . indriyapaccayena paccayo . . .
(tīṇi).
     4. Nahetu-ahetuko . . . nahetu-ahetukassa . . .
     Nahetu-ahetukā indriyā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ
cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo.
Paṭisandhikkhaṇe rūpajīvitindriyaṃ kaṭattā rūpānaṃ indri-
yapaccayena paccayo.
     1. Nahetu-sahetuko . . . jhānapaccayena paccayo . . .
(cattāri pi kātabbāni)1 . . . maggapaccayena paccayo . . .
(tīṇi) . . . sampayuttapaccayena paccayo.
     Nahetu-sahetuko eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ . . . pe . . .
Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     4. Nahetu-ahetuko dhammo nahetu-ahetukassa dham-
massa sampayuttapaccayena paccayo.
     Nahetu-ahetuko eko khandho . . . pe . . . (paṭisandhi).
     2. Nahetu-sahetuko dhammo nahetu-ahetukassa2 dham-
massa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
     Sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. Sahajātā nahetu-sahetukā3
khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena
paccayo . . . (paṭisandhi). Pacchājātā nahetu-sahetukā3
khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena
paccayo.
     4. Nahetu-ahetuko . . . nahetu-ahetukassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. Sahajātā nahetu-
ahetukā khandhā . . .4 Paṭisandhikkhaṇe khandhā vat-
thussa, vatthu khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
Purejātaṃ:-- cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa . . .
kāyāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa, vatthu nahetu-ahetukānaṃ
khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā
nahetu-ahetukā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa
vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. kātabbaṃ. K. kātabbā.
2 B. sahetukassa, but cf. p. 17, § 2.
3 R. nahetū-.
4 As under 2.


[page 082]
82                          Nahetusahetukadukaṃ.
     5. Nahetu-ahetuko . . . nahetu-sahetukassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. Sahajātaṃ:-- paṭisandhikkhaṇe
vatthu nahetu-sahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ vippayuttapac-
cayena paccayo. Purejātaṃ vatthu nahetu-sahetukānaṃ
khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
     1. Nahetu-sahetuko . . . atthipaccayena paccayo.
     Nahetu-sahetuko eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ1 . . . pe . . .
Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     2. Nahetu-sahetuko . . . nahetu-ahetukassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, pacchajātaṃ . . . pe . . .
     3. Nahetu-sahetuko . . . nahetu-sahetukassa ca . . .
     Nahetu-sahetuko eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ
cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     4. Nahetu-ahetuko . . . nahetu-ahetukassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ āhāraṃ indriyaṃ.
Sahajāto nahetu-ahetuko eko khandho2 . . . (yāva asañ-
ñasattā).3 Purejātaṃ:-- cakkhuṃ, vatthuṃ aniccato . . .
pe . . . domanassaṃ uppajjati; rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviñ-
ñāṇassa . . . phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa, cakkhā-
yatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa . . . kāyāyatanaṃ kayaviñ-
ñāṇassa, vatthu nahetu-ahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ atthi-
paccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā nahetu-ahetukā khandhā
purejātassa imassa kāyassa, kabaḷiṃkāro āhāro imassa
kāyassa, rūpājīvitindriyaṃ kaṭattā rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena
paccayo.
     5. Nahetu-ahetuko . . . nahetu-sahetukassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. Sahajātaṃ:-- paṭisandhikkhaṇe
vatthu nahetu-sahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena
paccayo. Purejātaṃ:-- cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . .4 uppajjati.
Kusalākusale niruddhe nahetu-sahetuko vipāko tad-āram-
maṇatā uppajjati.
     7. Nahetu-sahetuko ca nahetu-ahetuko ca . . .
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 See p. 19, § 4.
2 As under 3.
3 S. omits.
4 As under 4.


[page 083]
                          Paccaniyaṃ.                          83
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. Sahājāto nahetu-sahetuko eko
khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ . . . pe . . .
Paṭisandhikkhaṇe nahetu-sahetuko eko khandho ca vat-
thuñ ca tiṇṇannaṃ . . . pe . . .
     8. Nahetu-sahetuko ca . . . nahetu-ahetukassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ āhāraṃ indriyaṃ. Sahajātā
nahetu-sahetukā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhā-
nānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā
nahetu-sahetukā khandhā ca kabaḷiṃkāro āhāro ca imassa
kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā nahetu-sahe-
tukā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañ ca kaṭattā rūpānaṃ
atthipaccayena paccayo.
          Ārammaṇe cattāri,                vipāke cattāri,
          adhipatiyā cattāri,               āhāre cattāri,
          anantare cattāri,                indriye cattāri,
          samanantare cattāri,           jhāne cattāri,
          sahajāte satta,                magge tīṇi,
          aññamaññe cha,                    sampayutte dve,
          nissaye satta,                    vippayutte tīṇi,
          upanissaye cattāri,               atthiyā satta,
          purejāte dve,                     natthiyā cattāri,
          pacchājāte dve,                vigate cattāri,
          āsevane dve,                     avigate satta:--
          kamme cattāri,
     evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.
                               Anulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
                               [Paccaniyaṃ.]
     1. Nahetu-sahetuko dhammo nahetu-sahetukassa dham-
massa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo . . . sahajāta-, upanis-
saya-, kammapaccayena paccayo.
     2. Nahetu-sahetuko dhammo . . . ārammaṇa-, saha-
jāta-, upanissaya-, pacchājāta-, kammapaccayena paccayo.
     3. Nahetu-sahetuko . . . nahetu-sahetukassa ca . . .
sahajāta-, kammapaccayena paccayo.
     4. Nahetu-ahetuko . . . ārammaṇa-sahajāta-, upanis-
saya-, purejāta-, pacchājāta-, āhāra-, indriyapaccayena
paccayo.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------

[page 084]
84                          Nahetusahetukadukaṃ.
     5. Nahetu-ahetuko . . . nahetu-sahetukassa . . . āram-
maṇa-sahajāta-, upanissaya-, purejātapaccayena paccayo.
     7. Nahetu-sahetuko ca . . . nahetu-sahetukassa dham-
massa sahajāta-, purejātapaccayena paccayo.
     8. Nahetu-sahetuko ca . . . nahetu-ahetukassa . . .
sahajāta-, pacchājātā-, āhāra-, indriyapaccayena paccayo.
          Nahetuyā satta,                sabbattha satta;1
          nārammaṇe satta . . .           nasampayutte cha,
           (saṃkhittaṃ) . . .           navippayutte pañca,
          sabbattha satta;                no-atthiyā pañca,
          nasahajāte cha,                nonatthiyā satta,2
          na-aññamaññe cha,                novigate satta,
          nanissaye cha,                    no-avigate pañca:--
     evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.
                          Paccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
          Ārammaṇapaccayā, nādhi-           nonatthiyā cattāri,
          patiyā cattāri,                novigate cattāri,
          nānantare cattāri,                no-avigate3 cattāri:--
          sabbattha cattāri;
     evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.
                          Anulomapaccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
     Nahetupaccayā, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā cattāri,
avigate satta:-- evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.
                     Paccaniyānulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
                     NAHETU-SAHETUKA-DUKAṂ niṭṭhitaṃ.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Full repetition given in K. and B.
2 B. has pañca, then repeats nonatthiyā with satta.
3 B. avigate.


[page 085]
                               85
                     [VII. SAPPACCAYA-DUKAṂ.]
     1. Sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaccayo dhammo
uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Sappaccayaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā citta-
samuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ, . . . pe . . . dve . . . pe . . .
Paṭisandhikkhaṇe khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca
khandhā, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ . . . pe . . . mahābhūte paṭicca
cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattā rūpaṃ upādā rūpaṃ.
     1. Sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaccayo dhammo
uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā . . . (saṃkhittaṃ) . . . avi-
gatapaccayā . . .
     Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ . . . (saṃkhittaṃ) . . .
avigate ekaṃ.
                               Anulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
     1. Sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaccayo dhammo
uppajjati nahetu-paccayā.
     Ahetukaṃ sappaccayaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo
khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ, . . . pe . . . dve
. . . pe . . . (ahetukapaṭisandhi yāva asaññasattā). Vici-
kicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikic-
chāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho . . . (saṃkhittaṃ) . . .
     Nahetuyā ekaṃ, nārammaṇe ekaṃ,1 nādhipatiyā ekaṃ,
novigate ekaṃ.
                              Paccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. omits clause.


[page 086]
86                               Sappaccayadukaṃ.
     Hetupaccayā, nārammaṇe ekaṃ, nādhipatiyā ekaṃ . . .
(saṃkhittaṃ) . . . novigate ekaṃ.
                               Anulomapaccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
     Nahetupaccayā, ārammaṇe1 ekaṃ, anantare ekaṃ . . .
(saṃkhittaṃ) . . . avigate ekaṃ.
                               Paccaniyānulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
     (Sahajātavāro paṭiccavārasadiso.2)
     1. Sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sappaccayo dhammo
uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Sappaccayaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā
cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ . . . pe . . . Paṭisandhik-
khaṇe khandhe paccayā vatthu, vatthuṃ paccayā
khandhā; ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ paccayā
khandhā.
     1. Sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sappaccayo dhammo
uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā . . . (saṃkhittaṃ. Evaṃ pac-
cayavāro pi nissayavāro pi saṃsaṭṭhavāro pi sampayuttavāro
pi vitthāretabbo.3 Sabbattha ekā yeva pañhā.)
     1. Sappaccayo4 dhammo sappaccayassa dhammassa
hetupaccayena paccayo.
     Sappaccayā5 hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ citta-
samuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. Paṭi-
sandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     1. Sappaccayo dhammo sappaccayassa dhammassa āram-
maṇapaccayena paccayo.
     Dānaṃ datvā, sīlaṃ . . . uposathakammaṃ . . . taṃ pac-
cavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭha-
hitvā jhānaṃ paccavekkhati. Ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā
maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ paccavekkhanti, pahīnaki-
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. nārammaṇe.
2 B. omits vāra-.
3 K. -tabbā.
4 B. omits this section.
5 K. and B. sappaccayā hetu.


[page 087]
                          Adhipativāro                          87
lese vikkhambhitakilese1 paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudā-
ciṇṇe kilese jānanti. Cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ
sappaccaye khandhe aniccato . . . pe . . . domanassaṃ
uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sota-
dhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, cetopariyañāṇena sappaccayacitta-
samaṃgissa cittaṃ jānāti; ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañ-
cāyatanassa, ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa,
rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa . . . pe . . . phoṭṭhabbā-
yatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa sappaccayā khandhā iddhividha-
ñāṇassa cetopariyañāṇassa pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa
yathākammūpagañāṇassa anāgataṃsañāṇassa āvajjanāya
ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
     5. Appaccayo dhammo sappaccayassa dhammassa āram-
maṇapaccayena paccayo.
     Ariyā nibbānaṃ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa
vodānassa maggassa phalassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapacca-
yena paccayo.
     1. Sappaccayo dhammo sappaccayassa dhammassa adhi-
patipaccayena paccayo.
     Ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. Ārammaṇādhipati:--
dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ uposathakammaṃ taṃ garuṃ katvā pacca-
vekkhati, pubbe . . . pe . . . jhānaṃ . . . pe . . . Ariyā
maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti,
phalaṃ garuṃ . . . pe . . . Cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ
sappaccaye khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ
garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. Sahajātādhi-
pati:-- sappaccayādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ
cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
     5. Appaccayo dhammo sappaccayassa . . .
     Ārammaṇādhipati:-- ariyā nibbānaṃ garuṃ katvā pacca-
vekkhanti, nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa vodānassa maggassa2
phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
     1. Sappaccayo dhammo sappaccayassa dhammassa anan-
tarapaccayena paccayo . . . (saṃkhittaṃ) . . . upanissaya-
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 R. -kilesaṃ.
2 B. omits.


[page 088]
88                               Sappaccayadukaṃ.
paccayena paccayo . . . (dve pañhā va,1 upanissayamūlaṃ2)
. . . purejātapaccayena paccayo . . . (saṃkhittaṃ) . . .
avigatapaccayena paccayo . . . (sabbattha ekā3 yeva4
pañhā).
          Hetuyā5 ekaṃ,                     aññamaññe ekaṃ,
          ārammaṇe dve,                     nissaye ekaṃ,
          adhipatiyā dve,                upanissaye dve,
          anantare ekaṃ,                    purejāte ekaṃ,
          samanantare ekaṃ,6                sabbattha ekaṃ;
          sahajāte ekaṃ,                    avigate ekaṃ:--
evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.
                         Anulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
     1. Sappaccayo7 dhammo sappaccayassa dhammassa
ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo, sahajāta-, upanissaya, pure-
jāta-, pacchājāta-, kamma-,8 āhāra-, indriya-, paccayena
paccayo.
     5. Appaccayo dhammo sappaccayassa dhammassa āram-
maṇapaccayena paccayo . . . upanissayapaccayena pac-
cayo . . .
          Nahetuyā9 dve,               . . . na-upanissaye10 dve,
          nārammaṇe ekaṃ,           napurejāte dve11 . . . (saṃkhittaṃ),
          nādhipatiyā ekaṃ,
          nānantare dve,               . . . novigate12 dve,
          nasamanantare dve . . .     no-avigate dve:--
           (saṃkhittaṃ) . . .
     evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.
                                   Paccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

8 B. omits clause.
9 S. omits last two clauses.
10 B. and S. upan-.
11 B. purejāte.

[page 089]
                          Paccaniyānulomaṃ                     89
          Hetupaccayā, nārammaṇe     na-upanissaye ekaṃ . . .
           ekaṃ,                     (saṃkhittaṃ) . . .,3
          nādhipatiyā ekaṃ,           nasampayutte ekaṃ,
          nānantare dve,1           navippayutte ekaṃ,4
          nasamanantare ekaṃ,          nonatthiyā ekaṃ,
          na-aññamaññe2 ekaṃ,          novigate ekaṃ:--
     evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.
                         Anulomapaccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
           Nahetupaccayā,           ārammaṇe upanissaye dve,
           dve,                     purejāte ekaṃ . . . (saṃkhittaṃ) . . .,
           adhipatiyā dve,
           anantare4 ekaṃ . . .      avigate ekaṃ:--
           (saṃkittaṃ) . . .,
     evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.
                          Paccaniyānulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
                          SAPPACCAYA-DUKAṂ niṭṭhitaṃ.

1 R. and B. ekaṃ,

4 K. dve.


[page 090]
                                    90
                                    [VIII.
                               SAṂKHATA-DUKAṂ.]
     1. Saṃkhataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃkhato dhammo uppaj-
jati hetupaccayā.
     Saṃkhataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasam-
uṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe khandhe paṭicca
vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā; ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ . . .
pe . . . mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattā
rūpaṃ upādā rūpaṃ. (Imaṃ dukaṃ yathā Sappaccayadukaṃ
evaṃ kātabbaṃ;1 ninnānākaraṇaṃ.)
                          SAṂKHATA-DUKAṂ niṭṭhitaṃ.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. gaṇetabbaṃ.


[page 091]
                                    91
                                    [IX.
                               SANIDASSANA-DUKAṂ.]
     4. Anidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassano dhammo
uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Anidassanaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā
anidassanaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . . Paṭi-
sandhikkhaṇe anidassanaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo
khandhā anidassanaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ . . . dve . . .
khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā; ekaṃ
mahābhūtaṃ . . . pe . . . mahābhūte paṭicca anidassanaṃ
cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattā rūpaṃ upādā rūpaṃ.
     5. Anidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassano . . .
dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.1
     Anidassane khandhe paṭicca sanidassanaṃ cittasamuṭṭhā-
naṃ rūpaṃ. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe mahābhūte paṭicca sanidas-
sanaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattā rūpaṃ upādā rūpaṃ.
     6. Anidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassano ca anidas-
sano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
     Anidassanaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā.
Sanidassanañ ca anidassanañ ca cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca
rūpaṃ; dve . . . pe . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe mahābhūte
paṭicca sanidassanañ ca anidassanañ ca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ
rūpaṃ kaṭattā rūpaṃ upādā rūpaṃ.
     4. Anidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassano dhammo
uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. nahetu.


[page 092]
92                               Sanidassanadukaṃ.
     Anidassanaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā;
dve . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe khandhe paṭicca vatthu,
vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā.
     4. Anidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassano dhammo
uppajjati adhipatipaccayā.
     Anidassanaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā ani-
dassanaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . . pe . . .;
ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā; dve . . . pe
. . . mahābhūte paṭicca anidassanaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ
rūpaṃ upādā rūpaṃ.
     5. Anidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassano . . .
     Anidassane khandhe paṭicca sanidassanaṃ cittasamuṭ-
ṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, mahābhūte paṭicca sanidassanaṃ cittasamuṭ-
ṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ upādā rūpaṃ.
     6. Anidassanaṃ . . . sanidassano ca anidassano ca . . .
     Anidassanaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā sani-
dassanañ ca anidassanañ ca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ; dve
. . . pe . . .; mahābhūte paṭicca sanidassanañ ca ani-
dassanañ ca1 cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ upādā rūpaṃ . . .
(saṃkhittaṃ sabbe kātabbā).
          Hetuyā tīṇi,                     Kamme tīṇi,
          ārammaṇe ekaṃ,                    vipāke tīṇi,
          adhipatiyā tīṇi,                sabbattha tīṇi;
          anantare ekaṃ,                    magge tīṇi,
          samanantare ekaṃ,                sampayutte ekaṃ,
          sahajāte tīṇi,                    vippayutte tīṇi,
          aññamaññe ekaṃ,                atthiyā tīṇi,
          nissaye tīṇi,                     natthiyā ekaṃ,
          upanissaye ekaṃ,                vigate ekaṃ,
          purejāte ekaṃ,                    avigate tīṇi:--
          āsevane ekaṃ,
     evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.
                          Anulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
     4. Anidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassano dhammo
uppajjati nahetupaccayā.2
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 K. omits anidassanañ ca.
2 S. hetu-.


[page 093]
                          Paccaniyaṃ                              93
     Ahetukaṃ anidassanaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo
khandhā, anidassanaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve
. . . pe . . . Ahetuka paṭisandhikkhaṇe1 khandhe paṭicca
vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā; ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ . . .
pe . . . mahābhūte paṭicca anidassanaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ
rūpaṃ katattā rūpaṃ upādā rūpaṃ. Bāhiraṃ āhārasamuṭ-
ṭhānaṃ2 utusamuṭṭhānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ. Vicikicchāsaha-
gate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato
uddhaccasahagato moho.
     5. Anidassanaṃ . . . sanidassano . . . nahetupaccayā.
     Ahetuke anidassane khandhe paṭicca sanidassanaṃ citta-
samuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe mahābhūte paṭicca
sanidassanaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattā rūpaṃ upādā
rūpaṃ . . . Bāhiraṃ āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ4 utusamuṭṭhānaṃ
asaññasattānaṃ . . . pe . . . mahābhūte paṭicca sanidas-
sanaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattā rūpaṃ upādā rūpaṃ.
     6. Anidassanaṃ . . . sanidassano ca anidassano . . .
     Ahetukaṃ anidassanaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca sanidassa-
nañ ca anidassanañ ca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ . . . dve . . .
Paṭisandhikkhaṇe mahābhūte paṭicca . . . pe . . . Bāhiraṃ
āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ utusamuṭṭhānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ . . . pe
. . . mahābhūte paṭicca sanidassanañ ca anidassanañ ca
katattā rūpaṃ upādā rūpaṃ . . . (evaṃ sabbe kātabbā).
          Nahetuyā tīṇi,                    navipāke tīṇi.
          nārammaṇe tīṇi,                nāhāre tīṇi,
          nadhipatiyā tīṇi,                na-indriye tīṇi,
          nānantare tīṇi,                najhāne tīṇi,
          nasamanantare tīṇi,               namagge tīṇi,
          na-aññamaññe tīṇi,                nasampayutte tīṇi,
          na-upanissaye tīṇi,               navippayutte tīṇi,
          napurejāte tīṇi,                nonatthiyā tīṇi,
          napacchājāte tīṇi,                novigate tīṇi.5
          nakamme tīṇi.
                              Paccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 K. ahetukappaṭi-.
2 B. bāhīraṃ, here and below.
3 B. and S. omit.
4 So also B. and S.
5 B. omits clause.


[page 094]
94                          Sanidassanadukaṃ.
          Hetupaccayā, nārammaṇe           navipāke tīṇi,
           tīṇi,                          nasampayutte tīṇi,1
          nādhipatiyā tīṇi,                navippayutte ekaṃ,
          sabbattha tīṇi;                nonatthiyā tīṇi,
          nakamme ekaṃ,                     novigate tīṇi.
                     Anulomapaccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
          Nahetupaccayā, ārammaṇe           kamme tīṇi . . . (saṃkhittaṃ)4
           ekaṃ,
          anantare ekaṃ,           jhāne tīṇi,
          samanantare ekaṃ,          magge ekaṃ,
          sahajāte tīṇi,           sampayutte tīṇi,
          aññamaññe ekaṃ,           vippayutte tīṇi,
          nissaye ekaṃ,2           atthiyā tīṇi,
          upanissaye tīṇi,3          natthiyā ekaṃ,5
          purejāte ekaṃ,           vigate ekaṃ,
          āsevane ekaṃ,           avigate tīṇi.
                     Paccaniyānulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
     4. Anidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassano dhammo
uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Anidassanaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā
anidassanaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . . Paṭi-
sandhikkhaṇe khandhe paccayā vatthu, vatthuṃ paccayā
khandhā; ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paccayā . . . pe . . . mahā-
bhūte paccayā anidassanaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattā
rūpaṃ upādā rūpaṃ; vatthuṃ paccayā anidassanā khandhā.
(Itare pi dve pañhā kātabbā.)
     4. Anidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassano dhammo
uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
     Anidassanaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ . . . pe . . . dve . . .
Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ paccayā khandhā,
cakkhāyatanaṃ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, kāyāyatanaṃ
