1 B. omits clause.
2 B. and S. tīṇi.
3 B. ekaṃ.
4 S. omits.
5 B. omits clause.


[page 095]
                          Saṃsaṭṭhavāro                          95
paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā anidassanā khandhā
. . . (saṃkhittaṃ).
     Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ, adhipatiyā tīṇi, avigate tīṇi.1
                                    Anulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
     4. Anidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassano dhammo
uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
     Ahetukaṃ anidassanaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo
khandhā anidassanaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ; dve . . .
(ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe2 yāva asaññasattā). Cakkhāya-
tanaṃ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, kāyāyatanaṃ paccayā kāya-
viññāṇaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā ahetukā anidassanā khandhā.
Vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñ
ca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho . . .
(Itare pi dve kātabbā saṃkhittaṃ.)
     Nahetuyā tīṇi, nārammaṇe tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
                                   Paccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
     Hetupaccayā, nārammaṇe tīṇi, nakamme ekaṃ, navippa-
yutte ekaṃ, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
                          Anulomapaccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
     Nahetupaccayā, ārammaṇe ekaṃ, magge ekaṃ, avigate tīṇi.
                               Paccaniyānulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
     (Nissayavāro pi evaṃ kātabbo.)
     4. Anidassanaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho anidassano dhammo
uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Anidassanaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā
. . . dve . . . (paṭisandhi).
     4. Anidassanaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho anidassano dhammo
uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā . . . (Evaṃ sabbaṃ paccaya-
gaṇanāhi saddhiṃ kātabbaṃ.3 Sampayuttavāro pi saṃsaṭṭha-
vārasadiso.)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. omits clause.
2 K. ahetukapp-. S. ahetupati-.
3 B. sabbaṃ sappaccayagaṇanāhi paṭisandhikaṃ kātabbaṃ.
     S. sabbe paccaniyā gaṇhāhi saddhiṃ kātabbaṃ.
     K. sabba paccaya (sic) gaṇanāhi . . . saddhiṃ kātabbā.


[page 096]
96                               Sanidassanadukaṃ.
     4. Anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa hetu-
paccayena paccayo.
     Anidassanā1 hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ anidas-
sanaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena
paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     5. Anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa . . .
     Anidassanā2 hetū sanidassanānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ
rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . .
pe . . .
     6. Anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa ca . . .
     Anidassanā2 hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ sani-
dassanānañ ca anidassanānañ ca3 cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca
rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . .
pe . . .
     2. Sanidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa
ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
     Sanidassane rūpe4 aniccato . . . pe . . . domanassaṃ
uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunā . . . pe . . . rūpāyatanaṃ
cakkhuviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Sanidas-
sanā khandhā ca iddhividhañāṇassa pubbenivāsānussatiñā-
ṇassa yathakammūpagañāṇassa anāgataṃsañāṇassa āvaj-
janāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
     4. Anidassano dhammo anidassanassa . . .
     Dānaṃ, sīlaṃ, uposathakammaṃ taṃ paccavekkhati, pubbe
suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ pac-
cavekkhati. Ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ pacca-
vekkhanti, phalaṃ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ paccavek-
khanti. Nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa vodānassa maggassa phalassa
āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Ariyā pahīna-
kilese paccavekkhanti vikkhambhitakilese . . . pe . . .
Pubbe cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . kāyaṃ vatthuṃ5 anidassane
khandhe aniccato . . . pe . . . domanassaṃ uppajjati;
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. anidassanahetu. K. -ssanā hetu.
2 So also B.
3 S. omits.
4 R. -sanaṃ rūpaṃ.
5 R. kāyaṃ || sadde || vatthuṃ ||.


[page 097]
                          Anantaravāro.                          97
dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, cetopariyañāṇena ani-
dassanacittasamaṃgissa cittaṃ jānāti, ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ
viññāṇañcāyatanassa ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññā-
yatanassa saddāyatanaṃ sotaviññāṇassa . . . pe . . .
phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa, anidassanā khandhā
iddhividhañāṇassa cetopariyañāṇassa pubbenivāsānussa-
tiñāṇassa yathākammūpagañāṇassa anāgataṃsañāṇassa
āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
     2. Sanidassano1 dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa
adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
     Ārammaṇādhipati:-- sanidassanaṃ rūpaṃ garuṃ katvā
assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati diṭṭhi
uppajjati.
     4. Anidassano dhammo anidassanassa . . .
     Ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. Ārammaṇādhipati:
-- dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ uposathakammaṃ, taṃ garuṃ katvā
. . . pe . . . pubbe suciṇṇāni . . . jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā . . . pe
. . . Ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā phalaṃ
garuṃ katvā . . . Nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa vodānassa mag-
gassa phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Cakkhuṃ . . .
vatthuṃ anidassane khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinan-
dati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
Sahajātādhipati:-- anidassanādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ
khandhānaṃ anidassanānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ
adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
     5. Anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa . . .
     Sahajātādhipati:-- anidassanādhipati sanidassanānaṃ
cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
     6. Anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa ca . . .
     Sahajātādhipati:-- anidassanādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ
khandhānaṃ sanidassanānañ ca anidassanānañ ca citta-
samuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
     4. Anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa anan-
tarapaccayena paccayo.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. anidassano.


[page 098]
98                          Sanidassanadukaṃ.
     Purimā purimā anidassanā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchi-
mānaṃ anidassanānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena
paccayo. Anulomaṃ gotrabhussa1 nevasaññānāsaññāya-
tanaṃ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo.
     4. Anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa
samanantarapaccayena paccayo . . . sahajātāpaccayena
paccayo (tīṇi) . . . aññamaññapaccayena paccayo (ekaṃ)
     . . . nissayapaccayena paccayo (tīṇi).
     2. Sanidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa
upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
     Ārammanūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo . . . Pakatū-
panissayo, vaṇṇasampadaṃ patthayamāno2 dānaṃ sīlaṃ
uposathakammaṃ karoti; vaṇṇasampadā3 saddhāya . . .
pe4 . . . patthanāya kāyikassa sukhassa kāyikassa duk-
khassa maggassa phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena
paccayo.
     4. Anidassano dhammo anidassanassa . . .
     Ārammaṇūpanissayo . . . pe5 . . . Pakatūpanissayo:--
saddhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti . . . pe . . . samāpattiṃ
uppādeti mānaṃ jappeti diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti; sīlaṃ . . . pe . . .
senāsanaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti . . . pe . . . saṃghaṃ
bhindati; saddhā . . . pe4 . . . senāsanaṃ saddhāya . . .
pe4 . . . phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
     2. Sanidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa pure-
jātapaccayena paccayo.
     Sanidassane rūpe6 aniccato . . . pe . . . domanassaṃ
uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati; rūpāyatanaṃ
cakkhuviññāṇassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
     4. Anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa pure-
jātapaccayena paccayo.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. anulomagotra-.
2 B. vaṇṇasaraṃ pattharamāno.
3 B. vaṇṇasampadhaṃ. S. vaṇṇaṃ karoti sampadāya.
4 R. has no lacuna.
5 As under 2.
6 R. -sanaṃ rūpaṃ.


[page 099]
                               Kammavāro.                         99
     Ārammaṇapurejātaṃ, vatthupurejātaṃ. Ārammaṇapure-
jātaṃ cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ aniccato . . . pe . . .
domanassaṃ uppajjati; dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti;
saddāyatanaṃ sotaviññāṇassa . . . phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ
kāyaviññāṇassa purejātapaccayena paccayo. Vatthu-
purejātaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa . . . kāyā-
yatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa vatthu anidassanānaṃ khandhānaṃ
purejātapaccayena paccayo.
     8. Sanidassano ca anidassano ca dhammā anidassanassa
dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
     Ārammaṇapurejātaṃ:-- rūpāyatanañ ca vatthu ca ani-
dassanānaṃ khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo; rūpā-
yatanañ ca cakkhāyatanañ ca cakkhuviññāṇassa purejāta-
paccayena paccayo.
     4. Anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa pac-
chājātapaccayena paccayo.
     Pacchājātā anidassanā khandhā purejātassa imassa ani-
dassanassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
     5. Anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa . . .
     Pacchājātā . . . imassa sanidassanassa kāyassa . . .
     6. Anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa ca . . .
     Pacchājātā anidassanā khandhā purejātassa imassa sani-
dassanassa ca anidassanassa ca kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena
paccayo.
     4. Anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa āse-
vanapaccayena paccayo.
     Purimā purimā . . . pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ . . .
pe . . .
     . . . kammapaccayena paccayo.
     Sahajātā, nānākhaṇikā. Sahājātā anidassanā cetanā
sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ anidassanānaṃ cittasamuṭ-
ṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. Nānā-
khaṇikā anidassanā cetanā vipākānaṃ anidassanānaṃ
khandhānaṃ anidassanānañ ca kaṭattā rūpānaṃ kamma-
paccayena paccayo.
     5. Anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa . . .
--------------------------------------------------------------------------

[page 100]
100                               Sanidassanadukaṃ.
     Sahajātā, nānākhaṇikā . . . (vitthāretabbaṃ).
     6. Anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa ca anidassanassa
ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo.
     Sahajātā, nānākhaṇikā . . . (vitthāretabbaṃ).
     4. Anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa vipā-
kapaccayena paccayo . . . (tīṇi) . . . āhārapaccayena
paccayo . . . (tīṇi, tīsu1 pi kabaḷiṃkāro āhāro kātabbo) . . .
indriyapaccayena paccayo . . . (tīṇi, tisū1 pi rūpajīvitin-
driyaṃ) . . . jhānapaccayena paccayo . . . (tīṇi) . . .
maggapaccayena paccayo . . . (tīṇi)2 . . . sampayutta-
paccayena paccayo . . . (ekaṃ).
     4. Anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa vippa-
yuttapaccayena paccayo.
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. Sahajātā anidassanā
khandhā anidassanānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippa-
yuttapaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe anidassanā
khandhā anidassanānaṃ kaṭattā rūpānaṃ vippayuttapac-
cayena paccayo. Khandhā vatthussa vippayuttapaccayena
paccayo, vatthu khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
Purejātaṃ:-- cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa . . . kāyā-
yatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa, vatthu anidassanānaṃ khandhā-
naṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā anidassanā
khandhā purejātassa imassa anidassanassa kāyassa vippa-
yuttapaccayena paccayo.
     5. Anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa dhammassa
vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
     Sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ.3 Sahajātā anidassanā khandhā
sanidassanānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayutta-
paccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe pacchājātā anidas-
sanā khandhā purejātassa imassa sanidassanassa kāyassa
vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
     6. Anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa ca . . .4
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 K. tāsu.
2 B. omits clause.
3 B. omits.
4 B. omits to atthipacca || sanidassanaṃ rūpaṃ (sic) aniccato,
     in following section.


[page 101]
                          Atthivāro.                              101
     Sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. Sahājātā anidassanā khandhā
sanidassanānañ ca anidassanānañ ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ
rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe
pacchājātā anidassanā khandhā purejātassa imassa sani-
dassanassa ca anidassanassa ca kāyassa vippayuttapacca-
yena paccayo.
     2. Sanidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa atthi-
paccayena paccayo.
     Sanidassane rūpe1 aniccato . . . pe . . . domanassaṃ
uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati; rūpāyatanaṃ
cakkhuviññāṇassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
     4. Anidassano dhammo anidassanassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ āhāraṃ indriyaṃ.
Sahajāto anidassano eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ
anidassanānañ ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipacca-
yena paccayo. Dve . . . (saṃkhittaṃ, yāva asaññasattā).
Purejātaṃ cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ aniccato . . .
pe . . . domanassaṃ uppajjati; dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ
suṇāti, saddāyatanaṃ sotaviññāṇassa . . . phoṭṭhabbāya-
tanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa; cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa
. . . kāyāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa, vatthu anidassanānaṃ
khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā ani-
dassanā khandhā purejātassa imassa anidassanassa kāyassa
atthipaccayena paccayo. Kabaḷiṃkāro āhāro imassa anidas-
sanassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. Rūpajīvitindriyaṃ
anidassanānaṃ kaṭattā rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
     5. Anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ āhāraṃ indriyaṃ. Sahajātā
anidassanā khandhā sanidassanānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ
rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe mahā-
bhūtā sanidassanānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kaṭaṭṭā
rūpānaṃ2 upādā rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. Bāhiraṃ
āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ utusamuṭṭhānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ mahā-
bhūtā3 sanidassanassa . . .4 Pacchājātā anidassanā khandhā
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 R. and S. sanidassanaṃ rūpaṃ.
2 B. omits.
3 B. -bhūtānaṃ.
4 K. has no lacuna.


[page 102]
102                               Sanidassanadukaṃ
purejātassa imassa sanidassanassa kāyassa atthipaccayena
paccayo. Kabaḷiṃkāro āhāro imassa sanidassanassa kāyassa
atthipaccayena paccayo. Rūpajīvitindriyaṃ sanidassanānaṃ
kaṭattā rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
     6. Anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa ca . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ āhāraṃ indriyaṃ. Sahajāto ani-
dassano eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ sanidassa-
nānañ ca anidassanānañ ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ
atthipaccayena paccayo; dve khandhā . . . Paṭisandhik-
khaṇe mahābhūtā sanidassanānañ ca anidassanānañ ca
cittasamuṭṭhānānañ . . .1 Bāhiraṃ2 mahābhūtā sanidassa-
nānañ ca anidassanānañ ca kaṭattā-rūpānaṃ upādā-rūpānaṃ
atthipaccayena paccayo.
     8. Sanidassano ca . . . anidassanassa . . .
     Purejātaṃ rūpāyatanañ ca vatthu ca anidassanānaṃ
khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. Rūpāyatanañ ca
cakkhāyatanañ ca cakkhuviññāṇassa atthipaccayena pac-
cayo . . . natthi- . . . vigata- . . . avigatapaccayena
paccayo.
          Hetuyā tīṇi,                     Kamme tīṇi,
          ārammaṇe dve,                     vipāke tīṇi,
          adhipatiyā cattāri,               āhāre tīṇi,
          anantare ekaṃ,                    indriye tīṇi,
          samanantare ekaṃ,                jhāne tīṇi,
          sahajāte tīṇi,                    magge tīṇi,
          aññamaññe ekaṃ,                sampayutte ekaṃ,4
          nissaye tīṇi,                     vippayutte tīṇi,
          upanissaye dve,                atthiyā pañca,
          purejāte tīṇi,                    natthiyā ekaṃ,
          pacchājāte tīṇi,3                vigate ekaṃ,
          āsevane ekaṃ,                     avigate pañca:--
     evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.
                          Anulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 As under 5.
2 B. bāhīraṃ.
3 B. omits clause.
4 B. tīṇi.


[page 103]
                          Anulomapaccaniyaṃ.                    103
     1. Sanidassano dhammo sanidassanassa1 dhammassa
ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo . . . upanissayapaccayena
paccayo . . .
     4. Anidassano dhammo anidassanassa2 dhammassa
ārammaṇa-, sahajāta-, upanissaya-, purejāta-, pacchājāta-,3
kamma-, āhāra-, indriyapaccayena paccayo.
     5. Anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa dhammassa
sahajāta-, pacchājāta-, kamma-, āhāra-, indriyapaccayena
paccayo.
     6. Anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa ca anidassanassa
ca dhammassa . . .4
     9. Sanidassano ca . . . sanidassanassa5 ca . . . pure-
jātapaccayena paccayo.
          Nahetuyā pañca,                napurejāte cattāri,
          nārammaṇe cattāri,                napacchājāte pañca,
          nādhipatiyā pañca,                sabbattha pañca;
          nānantare pañca,                nasampayutte pañca,
          nasamanantare pañca,           navippayutte cattāri,
          nasahajāte pañca,                no-atthiyā cattāri,7
          na-aññamaññe6 pañca,           nonatthiyā pañca,
          nanissaye cattāri,                novigate pañca,
          na-upanissaye pañca,           no-avigate cattāri.
                     Paccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
          Hetupaccayā, nārammaṇe     na-upanissaye tīṇi,7 . . .
           tīṇi,                     (saṃkhittaṃ),
          nādhipatiyā tīṇi,          nasampayutte tīṇi,
          nānantare tīṇi,           navippayutte ekaṃ,
          nasamanantare tīṇi,      nonatthiyā tīṇi,
          na-aññamaññe6 tīṇi,      novigate tīṇi.
                Anulomapaccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

1 S. anid-.
2 S. sanid-.
3 K. omits pacchājata-, . . .
4 As under 5.
5 S. omits. R. has formula 8.
6 K. and S. nāññam-.
7 B. omits clause.


[page 104]
104                     Sanidassanadukaṃ.
          Nahetupaccayā, ārammaṇe     āsevane ekaṃ,1
           dve,                     kamme tīṇi . . . (saṃkhittaṃ) . . .
          adhipatiyā cattāri,
          anantare ekaṃ,           magge tīṇi,
          samanantare ekaṃ,          sampayutte ekaṃ,
          sahajāte tīṇi,           vippayutte tīṇi,
          aññamaññe ekaṃ,           atthiyā pañca,
          nissaye tīṇi,           natthiyā ekaṃ,
          upanissaye dve,           vigate ekaṃ,
          purejāte tīṇi,           avigate pañca.
          pacchājāte tīṇi,
                Paccaniyānulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

1 R. tīṇi.


[page 105]
                                    105
                          [X. SAPPAṬIGHA-DUKAṂ.]
     1. Sappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho dhammo
uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Sappaṭighaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca dve mahābhūtā;
dve mahābhūte . . . ekaṃ . . . Sappaṭighe mahābhūte
paṭicca sappaṭighaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattā
rūpaṃ upādā rūpaṃ. Phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ paṭicca cakkhā-
yatanaṃ rasāyatanaṃ.
     2. Sappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appaṭigho . . .
     Sappaṭighe mahābhūte paṭicca āpodhātu. Sappaṭighe
mahābhūte paṭicca appaṭighaṃ1 cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ
kaṭattā rūpaṃ upādā rūpaṃ. Phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ paṭicca
āpodhātu itthindriyaṃ2 . . . kabaḷiṃkāro āhāro.
     3. Sappaṭighaṃ . . . sappaṭigho ca appaṭigho ca . . .
     Sappaṭighaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca dve mahābhūtā
āpodhātu ca; dve mahābhūte . . . pe . . . Sappaṭighe
mahabhūte paṭicca sappaṭighañ ca appaṭighañ ca cittasam-
uṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattā rūpaṃ upādā rūpaṃ. Phoṭṭhabbā-
yatanaṃ paṭicca cakkhāyatanaṃ rasāyatanaṃ apodhātu
itthindriyaṃ . . . kabaḷiṃkāro āhāro.
     4. Appaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appaṭigho . . .
     Appaṭighaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo kahandhā appaṭi-
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. sappaṭighaṃ.
2 So R. throughout. B. here only, atthi indriyaṃ. K. and
     S. have indriyaṃ throughout. Only R. gives a lacuna. The
     text should run, purisindriyaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ. Cf. p. 112.


[page 106]
106                     Sappaṭighadukaṃ.
ghaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . . pe . . . Paṭi-
sandhikkhaṇe khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca
khandhā. Āpodhātuṃ paṭicca appaṭighaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ
rūpaṃ kaṭattā rūpaṃ upādā rūpaṃ. Āpodhātuṃ paṭicca
itthindriyaṃ . . . kabaḷiṃkāro āhāro.
     5. Appaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho . . .
     Appaṭighe khandhe paṭicca sappaṭighaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ
rūpaṃ. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe āpodhātuṃ paṭicca sappaṭighā
mahābhūtā; āpodhātuṃ paṭicca sappaṭighaṃ cittasamuṭ-
ṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattā rūpaṃ upādā rūpaṃ; āpodhātuṃ paṭicca
cakkhāyatanaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ.
     6. Appaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho ca appaṭigho
ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
     Appaṭighaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā, sappa-
ṭighañ ca appaṭighañ ca cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve
. . . pe . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe āpodhātuṃ paṭicca sappa-
ṭighañ ca appatighañ ca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattā
rūpaṃ upādā rūpaṃ. Āpodhātuṃ paṭicca cakkhāyatanaṃ
phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ itthindriyaṃ . . . kabaḷiṃkāro āhāro.
     7. Sappaṭighañ ca . . . sappaṭigho dhammo . . .
     Appaṭighe1 khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca sappaṭighaṃ
cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe sappaṭighaṃ
ekaṃ mahābhūtañ ca āpodhātuñ ca paṭicca dve mahābhūtā;
sappaṭighe mahābhūte ca āpodhātuñ ca paṭicca sappa-
ṭighaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattā rūpaṃ upādā rūpaṃ.2
Phoṭṭhabbāyatanañ ca āpodhātuñ ca paṭicca cakkhāyatanaṃ
rasāyatanaṃ.
     8. Sappaṭighañ ca . . . appaṭigho dhammo . . .
     Appaṭighe1 khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca appaṭighaṃ
cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe appaṭighe
khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca appaṭighaṃ kaṭattā
rūpaṃ. Phoṭṭhabbāyatanañ ca āpodhātuñ ca paṭicca appa-
ṭighaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattā rūpaṃ3 upādā rūpaṃ.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 R. sappaṭighe.
2 B. omits to Paṭisandhikkhaṇe, 5 lines below.
3 R. and B. omit.


[page 107]
                          Aññamaññavāro.                107
Phoṭṭhabbāyatanañ ca āpodhātuñ ca paṭicca itthindriyaṃ1
. . . kabaḷiṃkāro āhāro.
     9. Sappaṭighañ ca . . . sappaṭigho ca . . .
     Appaṭighe2 khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca sappaṭighañ
ca appatighañ ca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Paṭisandhik-
khaṇe appaṭighe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattā
rūpaṃ. Phoṭṭhabbāyatanañ ca āpodhātuñ ca paṭicca sappa-
ṭighañ ca appaṭighañ ca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattā
rūpaṃ upādā rūpaṃ. Phoṭṭhabbāyatanañ ca āpodhātuñ ca
paṭicca cakkhāyatanaṃ rasāyatanaṃ itthindriyaṃ . . .
kabaḷiṃkāro āhāro.
     5. Appaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho dhammo
uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
     Appaṭighaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā . . . pe . . .
dve . . . pe . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā.
     2. Sappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appaṭigho3 dhammo
uppajjati adhipatipaccayā . . . (paṭisandhi vajjetabbā
kaṭattā rūpā ca.) . . . anantarapaccayā . . . samanantara-
paccayā . . . sahajātapaccayā . . . (sabbe mahābhūtā
kātabbā) . . . pe . . . aññamaññapaccayā.
     Sappaṭighaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca dve mahābhūtā;
dve . . .
     2. Sappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appaṭigho dhammo
uppajjati aññamaññapaccayā.
     Sappaṭighe mahābhūte paṭicca āpodhātu.
     3. Sappaṭighaṃ . . . sappaṭigho ca . . .
     Sappaṭighaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca dve mahābhūtā
ca āpodhātu ca; dve . . . pe . . .
     4. Appaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appaṭigho . . .
     Appaṭighaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā; dve
. . . pe . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe khandhe paṭicca vatthu,
vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā.
     5. Appaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho . . .
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 So also B.
2 So also R.
3 K. sappaṭ-.


[page 108]
108                     Sappaṭighadukaṃ.
     Apodhātuṃ paṭicca sappaṭighā mahābhūtā . . . (ime
ajjhatikā bāhirā1 mahābhūtā kātabbā).
     7. Sappaṭighañ ca appaṭighañ ca dhammaṃ paṭicca
sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati aññamaññapaccayā.
     Sappaṭighaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtañ ca āpodhātuñ ca paṭicca
dve mahābhūtā . . . nissayapaccayā . . . avigatapac-
cayā . . .
          Hetuyā nava,                     vipāke nava,
          ārammaṇe ekaṃ,                    āhāre nava,
          adhipatiyā nava,                indriye nava,
          anantare ekaṃ,                    jhāne nava,
          samanantare ekaṃ,                magge nava,
          sahajāte nava,                    sampayutte ekaṃ,3
          aññamaññe cha,                    vippayutte nava,4
          nissaye nava,                     atthiyā nava,
          upanissaye ekaṃ,2                natthiyā ekaṃ,
          purejāte ekaṃ,                    vigate ekaṃ,
          āsevane ekaṃ,                     avigate nava.
          kamme nava,
                          Anulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
     1. Sappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho dhammo
uppajjati nahetupaccayā . . . (tīṇi).
     4. Appaṭighaṃ . . . appaṭigho . . . nahetupaccayā.
     Ahetukaṃ appaṭighaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo
khandhā appaṭighaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . .
pe . . . Ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe5 khandhe paṭicca vatthu,
vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā; āpodhātuṃ paṭicca appaṭighaṃ
cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattā rūpaṃ upādā rūpaṃ; āpo-
dhātuṃ paṭicca itthindriyaṃ . . . kabaḷiṃkāro āhāro. Bāhiraṃ
āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ utusamuṭṭhānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ. Āpo-
dhātuṃ paṭicca appaṭighaṃ kaṭattā rūpaṃ upādā rūpaṃ;
vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 R. and K. ajjhattikabāhirā. Cf. p. 109.
2 B. tīṇi eva.
3 B. nava.
4 B. omits clause.
5 K. ahetukapp-.


[page 109]
                          Paccaniyānulomaṃ.           109
vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. (Appaṭi-
ghamūlakaṃ1 itare pi dve pañhā kātabbā; ghaṭane2 pi tīṇi
pañhā kātabbā; ajjhattikā bāhirā3 mahābhūtā sabbe jānitvā
kātabbā.)
     1. Sappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho dhammo
uppajjati nārammaṇapaccayā . . . (sabbaṃ saṃkhittaṃ) . . .
novigatapaccayā.
          Nahetuyā nava,                    nakamme nava,
          narammaṇe nava,                navipāke nava,
          nādhipatiyā nava,                nāhāre nava,
          nānantare nava,                na-indriye nava,
          nasamanantare4 nava,           najhāne nava,
          na-aññamaññe nava,                namagge nava,
          na-upanissaye nava,               nasampayutte5 nava,
          napurejāte nava,                navippayutte nava,
          napacchājāte nava,                nonatthiyā nava,
          nāsevane nava,                    novigate nava.
                         Paccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
          Hetupaccayā,                     nārammaṇe napacchājāte nava,
           nava,                          nāsevane nava,
          nādhipatiyā nava,                nakamme ekaṃ,
          nānantare nava,                navipāke nava,
          nasamanantare nava,               nasampayutte nava,
          na-aññamaññe nava,                navippayutte ekaṃ,
          na-upanissaye nava,               nonatthiyā nava,
          napurejāte nava,                novigate nava.
                     Anulomapaccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
          Nahetupaccayā,                    ārammaṇe sahajāte nava,
           ekaṃ,                          aññamaññe cha,
          anantare6 ekaṃ,                nissaye nava,
          samanantare ekaṃ,                upanissaye ekaṃ,
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. -mūlaṃ.
2 S. ghaṭarena.
3 So all the texts. Cf. p. 107.
4 B. samanantare, etc., all positive after first 4.
5 B. resumes negatives.
6 B. omits clause.


[page 110]
110                     Sappaṭighadukaṃ.
          Purejāte ekaṃ,                    vippayutte nava,
          āsevane ekaṃ,1                    atthiyā nava,
          kamme nava . . .                natthiyā ekaṃ,
           (saṃkhittaṃ) . . .           vigate ekaṃ,
          magge ekaṃ,                     avigate nava.
          sampayutte ekaṃ,
                     Paccaniyānulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
                (Sahajātavāro pi paṭiccavārasadiso.)
     1. Sappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sappaṭigho dhammo
uppajjati hetupaccayā . . . (tīṇi).
     4. Appaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā appaṭigho2 . . .
     Appaṭighaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā appaṭi-
ghaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . . pe . . .
Paṭisandhikkhaṇe āpodhātuṃ paccayā appaṭighaṃ citta-
samuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattā rūpaṃ upādā rūpaṃ; āpodhā-
tuṃ paccayā itthindriyaṃ . . . kabaḷiṃkāro āhāro; vatthuṃ
paccayā appaṭighā khandhā . . . (avasesā pañca pañhā
paṭiccavārasadisā3).
     2. Sappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā appaṭigho dhammo
uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
     Cakkhāyatanaṃ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ . . . kāyāya-
tanaṃ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṃ.
     4. Appaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā appaṭigho . . .
     Appaṭighaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā; dve
. . . pe . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paccayā appaṭighā
khandhā.4
     8. Sappaṭighañ ca appaṭighañ ca . . . appaṭigho . . .
     Cakkhuviññāṇasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca cakkhā-
yatanañ ca paccayā tayo khandhā . . . kāyaviññāṇasaha-
gataṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca kāyāyatanañ ca paccayā tayo
khandhā . . . adhipatigaccayā . . . (saṃkhittaṃ) . . .
avigatapaccayā . . .
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. breaks off here.
2 B. sappa-.
3 B. omits -vāra.
4 S. appaṭighaṃ khandhaṃ.


[page 111]
                          Arammaṇavāro.                          111
          Hetuyā nava,                     nissaye nava,
          ārammaṇe tīṇi,                    upanissaye1 tīṇi,
          adhipatiyā nava,                purejāte tīṇi,
          anantare tīṇi,                    āsevane ekaṃ,
          samanantare tīṇi,                kamme nava,
          sahajāte nava,                    avigate nava.
          aññamaññe cha,
     (Evaṃ paccaniyagaṇanā pi2 kātabbā. Nissayavāro pi
paccayavārasadiso. Saṃsaṭṭhavāre sabbattha ekā yeva pañhā.3
Dve pi vārā kātabbā.)
     4. Appaṭigho dhammo appaṭighassa dhammassa hetu-
paccayena paccayo.
     Appaṭighā4 hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ5 appaṭi-
ghānañ ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena6
paccayo . . . (paṭisandhi).
     5. Appaṭigho7 dhammo sappaṭighassa . . .
     Appaṭighā hetū sappaṭighānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ
rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo . . . (paṭisandhi).
     6. Appaṭigho dhammo sappaṭighassa ca . . .
     Appaṭighā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ sappa-
ṭighānañ ca appaṭighānañ ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca
rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. . . . (paṭisandhi).
     2. Sappaṭigho dhammo appaṭighassa dhammassa āram-
maṇapaccayena paccayo.
     Rūpe8 . . . pe . . . phoṭṭhabbe aniccato . . . pe . . .
domanassaṃ uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati,
dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti. Rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhu-
viññāṇassa . . . phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa sappa-
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. omits nava, upanissaye.
2 B. and S. paccayampi. K. paccaniyaṃpi gaṇanāpi.
3 R. sabbattha ekaṃ, adding saṃkhittaṃ || avigatapaccayā
     ekā yeva pañhā.
4 B. sapp-.
5 S. -ānañca.
6 S. nahetu-.
7 B. omits this section.
8 R., B. and S. cakkhu.


[page 112]
112                          Sappaṭighadukaṃ.
ṭighā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa pubbenivāsānussatiñā-
ṇassa yathākammūpagañāṇassa anāgataṃsañāṇassa āvajja-
nāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
     4. Appaṭigho dhammo appatighassa dhammassa āram-
maṇapaccayena paccayo.
     Dānaṃ sīlaṃ uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati,
pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ
paccavekkhati. Ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ pacca-
vekkhanti, phalaṃ paccavekkhanti.1 Nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa
vodānassa maggassa phalassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapac-
cayena paccayo. Ariyā pahīnakilese paccavekkhanti,
vikkhambhitakilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe
kilese jānanti. Vatthuṃ itthindriyaṃ purisindriyaṃ jīvit-
indriyaṃ āpodhātuṃ kabaḷiṃkāraṃ āhāraṃ aniccato . . . pe
. . . domanassaṃ uppajjati, cetopariyañāṇena appaṭighacit-
tasamaṃgissa cittaṃ jānāti; ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañ-
cāyatanassa, ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa,
appaṭighā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa cetopariyañāṇassa
pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa yathākammūpagañāṇassa anā-
gataṃsañāṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
     2. Sappaṭigho dhammo appaṭighassa dhammassa adhi-
patipaccayena paccayo.
     Ārammaṇādhipati:-- cakkhuṃ phoṭṭhabbe2 garuṃ katvā
assādeti abhinandati . . . (saṃkhittaṃ) . . . taṃ garuṃ
katvā rāgo uppajjati diṭṭhi uppajjati.
     4. Appaṭigho dhammo appaṭighassa . . .
     Ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. Ārammaṇādhipati:
-- dānaṃ sīlaṃ uposathakammaṃ taṃ garuṃ katvā pubbe
suciṇṇāni . . . jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ garuṃ katvā
paccavekkhati. Ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ
katvā paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ garuṃ katvā . . . Nibbānaṃ
gotrabhussa vodānassa maggassa phalassa adhipatipacca-
yena paccayo. Vatthuṃ itthindriyaṃ purisindriyaṃ jīvit-
indriyaṃ āpodhātuṃ kabaḷiṃkāraṃ āhāraṃ garuṃ katvā
assādeti abhinandati taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati diṭṭhi
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 R. -vekkhati.
2 B. and S. phoṭṭhabbo.


[page 113]
                          Upanissayavāro.                         113
uppajjati. Sahajātādhipati:-- appaṭighādhipati sampa-
yuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ appaṭighānañ ca cittasamuṭṭhānā-
naṃ rūpānaṃ adhipaṭipaccayena paccayo.
     5. Appaṭigho dhammo sappaṭighassa . . .
     Sahajātādhipati:-- appaṭighādhipati sappaṭighānaṃ citta-
samuṭṭhānānaṃ . . .1
     6. Appaṭigho dhammo sappaṭighassa ca . . .
     Sahajātādhipati:-- appaṭighādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ
khandhānaṃ sappaṭighānañ ca appaṭighānañ ca cittasamuṭ-
ṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
     4. Appaṭigho dhammo appaṭighassa dhammassa anan-
tarapaccayena paccayo.
     Purimā purimā appaṭighā . . . pe2 . . . phalasamā-
pattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo.
     4. Appaṭigho dhammo appaṭighassa dhammassa saman-
antarapaccayena paccayo.
     Sappaṭigho dhammo sappaṭighassa dhammassa saha-
jātapaccayena paccayo . . . (nava) . . . aññamaññapacca-
yena paccayo . . . (cha) . . . nissayapaccayena paccayo
. . . (nava).
     2. Sappaṭigho dhammo appaṭighassa dhammassa upanis-
sayapaccayena paccayo.
     Ārammaṇūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo . . . pe . . .
Pakaṭūpanissayo:-- utuṃ . . . pe . . . senāsanaṃ upa-
nissāya dānaṃ deti . . . pe . . . saṃghaṃ bhindati,
utu . . . pe . . . senāsanaṃ saddhāya . . . pe . . .
phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
     4. Appaṭigho dhammo appaṭighassa . . .
     Ārammaṇūpanissayo . . . pe . . .3 pakatūpanissayo:--
saddhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti . . . pe . . . diṭṭhiṃ
gaṇhāti. Sīlaṃ . . . pe . . . kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ kāyikaṃ
dukkhaṃ bhojanaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti . . . pe . . .
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 As just above.
2 Cf. p. 12, § 4.
3 As under 2.


[page 114]
114                     Sappaṭighadukaṃ.
saṃghaṃ bhindati. Saddhā . . . pe . . . bhojanaṃ saddhāya
. . . pe . . . phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena pac-
cayo.
     2. Sappaṭigho dhammo appaṭighassa dhammassa pure-
jātapaccayena paccayo.
     Ārammaṇapurejātaṃ, vatthupurejātaṃ. Ārammaṇapure-
jātaṃ:-- cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . phoṭṭhabbe aniccato . . .
pe . . . domanassaṃ uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ
passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti; rūpāyatanaṃ
cakkhuviññāṇassa, . . . phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññā-
ṇassa purejātapaccayena paccayo. Vatthupurejātaṃ:--
cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa . . . kāyāyatanaṃ kāya-
viññāṇassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
     4. Appaṭigho dhammo appaṭighassa . . .
     Ārammaṇapurejātanaṃ, vatthupurejātaṃ. Ārammaṇapure-
jātaṃ:-- vatthuṃ itthindriyaṃ purisindriyaṃ jivitindriyaṃ
āpodhātuṃ kabaḷiṃkāraṃ āhāraṃ aniccato . . . pe . . .
domanassaṃ uppajjati. Vatthupurejātaṃ:-- vatthu appaṭi-
ghānaṃ khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
     8. Sappaṭigho ca . . . dhammā appaṭighassa . . .
     Ārammaṇapurejātaṃ1 cakkhāyatanañ ca vatthu ca . . .
phoṭṭhabbāyatanañ ca vatthu ca2 . . . appaṭighānaṃ
khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
     4. Appaṭigho dhammo appaṭighassa dhammassa pacchā-
jātapaccayena paccayo.
     Pacchājātā appaṭighā khandhā purejātassa imassa appaṭi-
ghassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā
appaṭighā khandhā purejātassa imassa sappaṭighassa
kāyassa, pacchājātā appaṭighā khandhā purejātassa imassa
sappaṭighassa ca appaṭighassa ca kāyassa pacchājātapacca-
yena paccayo. (Dvinnam pi mūlā3 kātabbā.)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 R. inserts vatthupure ||.
2 K. omits vatthu ca.
3 B. mūlaṃ.


[page 115]
                          Āhāravāro.                115
     4. Appaṭigho1 dhammo appaṭighassa dhammassa āseva-
napaccayena paccayo.
     Purimā purimā appaṭighā . . . pe . . . vodānassa2
maggassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
     4. Appaṭigho dhammo appaṭighassa dhammassa kamma-
paccayena paccayo.
     Sahajātā, nānākhaṇikā. Sahajātā appaṭighā cetanā sam-
payuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ appaṭighānañ ca cittasamuṭ-
ṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. Nānākhaṇikā
appaṭighā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ3 appaṭighānañ ca
kaṭattā rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
     5. Appaṭigho dhammo sappaṭighassa . . .
     Sahajātā, nānākhaṇikā4 . . . khandhānaṃ sappaṭighānañ
ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
Nānākhaṇikā . . .5 khandhānaṃ sappaṭighānañ ca6 kaṭattā
rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
     6. Appaṭigho dhammo sappaṭighassa ca . . .
     Sahajātā, nānākhaṇikā . . . pe . . .
     4. Appaṭigho dhammo appaṭighassa dhammassa vipāka-
paccayena paccayo . . . (vipāko appaṭigho tīṇi).
     4. Appaṭigho dhammo appaṭighassa dhammassa āhāra-
paccayena paccayo.
     Appaṭighā āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ appaṭi-
ghānañ ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena
paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe kabaḷiṃkāro āhāro imassa
appaṭighassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo. (Avasesā
dve pi pañhā kātabbā. Paṭisandhi kabaḷiṃkāro āhāro dvīsu7
pi kātabbā agge.8)

1 S. sappaṭigho.
2 K. vodānaṃ. Cf. p. 79, § 1.
3 B. omits.
4 As under 4. B. omits next five lines.
5 As under 4.
6 S. appaṭi-.
7 B. dvisu.
8 B. magge.


[page 116]
116                     Sappaṭighadukaṃ.
     2. Sappaṭigho dhammo appaṭighassa dhammassa indriya-
paccayena paccayo.
     Cakkhundriyaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa . . . kāyindriyaṃ
kāyaviññāṇassa indriyapaccayena paccayo.
     4. Appaṭigho dhammo appaṭighassa . . . (tīṇi, tisu ca1
jīvitindriyaṃ agge kātabbaṃ).
     8. Sappaṭigho ca . . . dhammā appaṭighassa . . .
     Cakkhundriyañ ca cakkhuviññāṇañ ca cakkhuviññāṇa-
sahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo. Kāy-
indriyañ ca kāyaviññāṇañ ca kāyaviññāṇasahagatānaṃ
khandhānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo . . . jhānapacca-
yena paccayo . . . (tīṇi) . . . maggapaccayena paccayo
. . . (tīṇi) . . . sampayuttapaccayena paccayo . . . (ekaṃ).
     2. Sappaṭigho dhammo appaṭighassa dhammassa vippa-
yuttapaccayena paccayo.
     Purejātaṃ cakkhāyatanañ ca cakkhuviññāṇassa . . .
kāyāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa vippayuttappaccayena paccayo.
     4. Appaṭigho dhammo appaṭighassa . . .
     Sahajātanaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. Sahājātā appaṭighā
khandhā appaṭighānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vip-
payuttapaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe khandhā
vatthussa, vatthu khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena pac-
cayo. Purejātaṃ vatthu appaṭighānaṃ khandhānaṃ vippa-
yuttapaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā appaṭighā khandhā
purejātassa imassa appaṭighassa kāyassa vippayuttapacca-
yena paccayo.
     5. Appaṭigho dhammo sappaṭighassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. Sahajātā2 appaṭighā khandhā
sappaṭighānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayutta-
paccayena paccayo . . . (paṭisandhi). Pacchājātā appa-
ṭighā khandhā purejātassa imassa sappaṭighassa kāyassa
vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
     6. Appaṭigho dhammo sappaṭighassa ca . . .
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. tīsu pi. B. tesu pi.
2 B. pacchājātā. S. omits down to next recurring sahajātā.


[page 117]
                          Atthivāro.                117
     Sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. Sahajātā appaṭighā khandhā
sappaṭighānañ ca appaṭighānañ ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ
rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe
pacchājātā1 . . . imassa sappaṭighassa ca appaṭighassa ca
kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
     1. Sappaṭigho dhammo sappaṭighassa dhammassa atthi-
paccayena paccayo . . . (ekaṃ paṭiccasadisā paṭhamapañhā).
     2. Sappaṭigho dhammo appaṭighassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. Sahajātā sappaṭighā mahābhūtā
apodhātuyā atthipaccayena paccayo. Sappaṭighā mahā-
bhūtā appaṭighānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kaṭattā
rūpānaṃ upādā rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. Phoṭ-
ṭhabbāyatanaṃ itthindriyassa2 . . . kabaḷiṃkārassa āhārassa3
atthipaccayena paccayo. Bāhiraṃ utusamuṭṭhānaṃ asañ-
ñasattānaṃ4 . . . Purejātaṃ:-- cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . phoṭ-
ṭhabbe aniccato . . . pe . . . domanassaṃ uppajjati;5 dibbena
cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti;
rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa . . . phoṭṭhābbāyatanaṃ
kāyaviññāṇassa, cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa . . .
kāyāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
     3. Sappaṭigho dhammo sappaṭighassa ca . . .
     Sappaṭighaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ dvinnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ
āpodhātuyā ca atthipaccayena paccayo . . . pe . . . (paṭi-
sandhi6 yāva asaññasattā).
     4. Appaṭigho dhammo appaṭighassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ āhāraṃ indriyaṃ. Saha-
jāto appaṭigho eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ . . . (yāva asañ-
ñasattā). Purejātaṃ vatthuṃ itthindriyaṃ purisindriyaṃ
jīvitindriyaṃ āpodhātuṃ kabaḷiṃkāraṃ āhāraṃ aniccato . . .
pe . . . domanassaṃ uppajjati; vatthu appaṭighānaṃ khan-
dhānaṃ7 atthipaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā appaṭighā
khandhā purejātassa imassa appaṭighassa kāyassa atthipac-
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 As under 5.
2 K. indriyassa.
3 S. kabaliṃkārāhārassa.
4 K. -sattā. Cf. pp. 6, 19.
5 K. omits.
6 B. paṭiccasandhiyaṃ.
7 S. inserts kaṭattā.


[page 118]
118                     Sappaṭighadukaṃ.
cayena paccayo. Kabaḷiṃkāro āhāro imassa . . .1 Rūpa-
jīvitindriyaṃ appaṭighānaṃ kaṭattā rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena
paccayo.
     5. Appaṭigho dhammo sappaṭighassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ2 āhāraṃ indriyaṃ. Sahajātā
appaṭighā khandhā sappaṭighānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ
rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe āpo-
dhātu sappaṭighānaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ atthipaccayena pac-
cayo; āpodhātu sappaṭighānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ
kaṭattā rūpānaṃ upādā rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo;
āpodhātu cakkhāyatanassa . . . phoṭṭhabbāyatanassa
atthipaccayena paccayo. Bāhiraṃ āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ
utusamuṭṭhānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ . . . Pacchājātā appaṭighā
khandhā purejātassa imassa sappaṭighassa kāyassa atthi-
paccayena paccayo. Kabaḷiṃkāro3 āhāro imassa . . .4
Rūpajīvitindriyaṃ sappaṭighānaṃ kaṭattā rūpānaṃ atthi-
paccayena paccayo.
     6. Appaṭigho dhammo sappaṭighassa ca . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ āhāraṃ indriyaṃ. Sahajāto appa-
ṭigho eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ sappaṭighānañ
ca appaṭighānañ ca . . . (paṭiccasadisaṃ yāva asaññasattā).
Pacchājātā appaṭighā khandhā purejātassa imassa sappaṭi-
ghassa ca appaṭighassa ca kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
Kabaḷiṃkāro āhāro imassa . . .4 Rūpajīvitindriyaṃ sappa-
ṭighānañ ca appaṭighānañ ca5 kaṭattā rūpānaṃ atthipacca-
yena paccayo.
     7. Sappaṭigho ca appaṭigho ca dhammā sappaṭighassa
. . . (paṭiccasadisaṃ yāva asaññasattā).
     8. Sappaṭigho ca . . . appaṭighassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. Sahajātā appaṭighā khandhā ca
mahābhūtā ca appaṭighānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ
. . . (paṭiccasadisaṃ6 yāva asaññasattā). Sahajāto cakkhuviñ-
ñāṇasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhāyatanañ ca tiṇṇannaṃ
khandhānaṃ; dve . . . Kāyaviññāṇasahagato eko khandho
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 As just above.
2 B. omits.
3 B. omits down to sahajātaṃ.
4 As just above.
5 B. and S. have only sappaṭighānaṃ.
6 S. paccayā-sadisā.


[page 119]
                               Mātikā.                          119
ca kāyāyatanañ ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena
paccayo; dve . . .
     9. Sappaṭigho ca appaṭigho ca dhammā sappaṭighassa
ca appaṭighassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo
. . . (paṭiccasadisaṃ).
          Hetuyā tīṇi,                     kamme tīṇi,
          ārammaṇe dve,1                    vipāke tīṇi,
          adhipatiyā cattāri,               āhāre tīṇi,
          anantare ekaṃ,                    indriye pañca,
          samanantare ekaṃ,                jhāne tīṇi,
          sahajāte nava,                    magge tīṇi,2
          aññamaññe cha,                    sampayutte ekaṃ,
          nissaye nava,                     vippayutte cattāri,
          upanissaye dve,                atthiyā nava,
          purejāte tīṇi,                    natthiyā ekaṃ,
          pacchājāte tīṇi,                vigate ekaṃ,
          āsevane ekaṃ,                     avigate nava:--
     evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.
                          Anulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
     1. Sappaṭigho dhammo sappaṭighassa . . . sahajāta-
paccayena paccayo.
     2. Sappaṭigho dhammo appaṭighassa . . . ārammaṇa-,
sahajāta-, upanissaya-, purejātapaccayena paccayo.
     3. Sappaṭigho dhammo sappaṭighassa ca . . . sahajāta-
paccayena paccayo.
     4. Appaṭigho dhammo appaṭighassa . . . ārammaṇa-,
sahajāta-, upanissaya-, purejāta-, pacchājāta-, kamma-,
āhāra-indriyapaccayena paccayo.
     5. Appaṭigho dhammo sappaṭighassa . . . sahajāta-,
pacchājāta-, kamma-, āhāra-, indriyapaccayena paccayo.
     6. Appaṭigho dhammo sappaṭighassa ca . . . sahajāta-,3
pacchājāta-, kamma-, āhāra-, indriyapaccayena paccayo.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 K. tīṇi.
2 B. omits clause.
3 B. omits remaining alternatives.


[page 120]
120                     Sappaṭighadukaṃ.
     7. Sappaṭigho ca appaṭigho ca dhammā sappaṭighassa
. . . sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
     8. Sappaṭigho ca appaṭigho ca appaṭighassa . . . saha-
jāta-, purejāta-, pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.1
     9. Sappaṭigho ca appaṭigho ca . . . sahajātapaccayena
paccayo.
     Nahetuyā nava . . . (saṃkhittaṃ),     napurejāte nava . . . (saṃkhittaṃ),
     nānantare nava,2                    nasampayutte nava,
     nasamanantare nava,                navippayutte nava,
     nasahajāte cattāri,                no-atthiyā3 cattāri,
     na-aññamaññe nava,                nonatthiyā nava,
     nanissaye cattāri,                novigate nava,
     na-upanissaye nava,                no-avigate cattāri.
                         Paccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
     Hetupaccayā, nārammaṇe     na-upanissaye tīṇi . . . (saṃkhittaṃ) . . .,
     tīṇi . . . (saṃkhittaṃ) . . .,4
                               nasampayutte tīṇi,
     nasamanantare tīṇi,      navippayutte ekaṃ,
     na-aññamaññe tīṇi,          nonatthiyā tīṇi,
                     novigate tīṇi.
                    Anulomapaccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
     Nahetupaccayā, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā cattāri . . .
(anulomamātikā gaṇetabbā)5 . . . avigate nava.6
                     Paccaniyānulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
                     SAPPAṬIGHA-DUKAṂ niṭṭhitaṃ.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 R. omits last clause.
2 R. and B. omit clause.
3 B. anatthiyā.
4 R. inserts na-anantare tīṇi.
5 R. gahetabbā.
6 K. inserts vigate nava.


[page 121]
                               121
                          [XI. RŪPI-DUKAṂ.]
     1. Rūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpī dhammo1 uppajjati
hetupaccayā.
     Ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā; dve . . .
pe . . . Mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ
kaṭattā rūpaṃ upādā rūpaṃ.
     2. Rūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca arūpī dhammo uppajjati
hetupaccayā.
     Paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca arūpino khandhā.2
     3. Rūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpī ca arūpī ca dhammā
uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
     Paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca arūpino khandhā;
mahābhūte paṭicca kaṭattā rūpaṃ.
     4. Arūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca arūpī dhammo . . .
     Arūpiṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā; dve . . .
(paṭisandhi).
     5. Arūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpī dhammo . . .
     Arūpino khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ . . .
(paṭisandhi).
     6. Arūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpī ca arūpī ca . . .
     Arūpiṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasam-
uṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . . (paṭisandhi).3
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. and S. rūpidhammo.
2 B. and S. arūpikhandhā always. R. arūpī-.
3 B. omits.


[page 122]
122                     Rūpidukaṃ.
     7. Rūpiñ1 ca arūpiñ ca dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpī . . .2
     Arūpino khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭ-
ṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     8. Rūpiñ ca arūpiñ ca dhammaṃ paṭicca arūpī . . .
     Paṭisandhikkhaṇe arūpiṃ3 ekaṃ khandhañ ca vatthuñ ca
paṭicca tayo khandhā; dve . . .
     9. Rūpiñ ca arūpiñ ca dhammaṃ . . . rūpī ca arūpī ca
dhammā . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe arūpiṃ ekaṃ khandhañ
ca vatthuñ ca paṭicca tayo khandhā; dve . . .
     Arūpino khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattā rūpaṃ
. . . (saṃkhittaṃ).
          Hetuyā nava,                     vipāke nava,5
          ārammaṇe tīṇi,                    āhāre nava,
          adhipatiyā pañca,                indriye nava,
          anantare tīṇi,                    jhāne nava,
          samanantare tīṇi,4                magge nava,5
          sahajāte nava,                    sampayutte tīṇi,
          aññamaññe cha,                    vippayutte nava,
          nissaye nava,                     atthiyā nava,
          upanissaye tīṇi,                natthiyā tīṇi,
          purejāte ekaṃ,                    vigate tīṇi,
          āsevane ekaṃ,                     avigate nava.
          kamme nava,
                          Anulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
     1. Rūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpī dhammo uppajjati
nahetupaccayā . . . (tīṇi).
     4. Arūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca arūpī . . . nahetupaccayā.
     Ahetukaṃ arūpiṃ6 ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā;
dve . . . Ahetupaṭisandhikkhaṇe7 vicikicchāsahagate
uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato
uddhaccasahagato moho.
     (Nahetupaccayā nava pañhā, ahetukan ti niyāmetabbaṃ.)

1 R. and K. rūpiṃ ca throughout.
2 B. omits next six lines.
3 S. rūpi ca.
4 K. omits clause.
5 B. omits clause.
6 S. rūpi.
7 B. ahetukapaṭi-. K. ahetuppaṭi.- S. ahetukaṃ paṭisan-.


[page 123]
                               Paccayavāro.                     123
          Nahetuyā nava,                    nakamme dve,
          nārammaṇe tīṇi,                navipāke pañca,
          nādhipatiyā nava,                nāhāre1 ekaṃ,
          nānantare tīṇi,                na-indriye ekaṃ,
          nasamanantare tīṇi,               najhāne dve,
          na-aññamaññe tīṇi,                namagge nava,
          na-upanissaye tīṇi,               nasampayutte tīṇi,
          napurejāte nava,                navippayutte dve,
          napacchājāte nava,                nonatthiyā tīṇi,
          nāsevane nava,                    novigate tīṇi.
                         Paccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
          Hetupaccayā, nārammaṇe           napacchājāte nava,
           tīṇi,                          nāsevane nava,2
          nādhipatiyā nava,                nakamme ekaṃ,
          nānantare tīṇi,                navipāke pañca,
          nasamanantare tīṇi,               nasampayutte tīṇi,
          na-aññamaññe tīṇi,                navippayutte ekaṃ,
          na-upanissaye tīṇi,               nonatthiyā tīṇi,
          napurejāte nava,                novigate tīṇi.
                     Anulomapaccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
          Nahetupaccayā, ārammaṇe3          vipāke nava,
           tīṇi,                          āhāre nava,
          anantare tīṇi,                    indriye nava,4
          samanantare tīṇi,                jhāne nava,
          sahajāte nava,                    magge ekaṃ,
          aññamaññe cha,                    sampayutte tīṇi,5
          nissaye nava,                     vippayutte nava,
          upanissaye tīṇi,                atthiyā nava,
          purejāte ekaṃ,                    natthiyā tīṇi,
          āsevane ekaṃ,                     vigate tīṇi,
          kamme nava,                     avigate nava.
                     Paccaniyānulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
                (Sahajātavāro pi paṭiccavārasadiso6.)

1 B. na āhāre.
2 B. tīṇi.
3 B. and S. nāram-.
4 K. omits last two clauses.
5 B. ekaṃ.
6 S. paccayavāra-. In B. the copyist has transcribed the
     following Anulomaṃ, Paccaniyaṃ and two following mātikā
     twice. Many discrepancies occurring the first time do not
     appear in the repetition, and are therefore not noted here.


[page 124]
124                     Rūpidukaṃ.
     1. Rūpiṃ dhammaṃ paccayā rūpī dhammo uppajjati
hetupaccayā.
     Ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ . . . (paṭiccasadisaṃ).
     2 Rūpiṃ dhammaṃ paccayā arūpī . . . hetupaccayā.
     Vatthuṃ paccayā arūpino khandhā . . . (paṭisandhi).
     3. Rūpiṃ dhammaṃ paccayā rūpī ca . . .
     Vatthuṃ . . .1 Mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ
rūpaṃ . . . (paṭisandhi. Evaṃ avasesā pañhā, pavattipaṭi-
sandhi vibhajitabbā).
     2. Rūpiṃ dhammaṃ paccayā arūpī . . . ārammaṇapaccayā.
     Cakkhāyatanaṃ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ . . . kāyāyata-
naṃ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā arūpino
khandhā . . . (paṭisandhi).
     4. Arūpiṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ārūpī . . .
     Arūpiṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ . . . pe . . . dve . . . (paṭi-
sandhi).
     8. Rūpiñ ca arūpiñ ca dhammaṃ . . . arūpī . . .
     Cakkhuviññāṇasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca cakkhā-
yatanañ ca paccayā tayo khandhā; dve . . . kāyaviññāṇa-
sahagataṃ . . . pe . . . Arūpiṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca vatthuñ
ca paccayā tayo khandhā; dve . . .
          Hetuyā nava,                     āsevane tīṇi,
          ārammaṇe tīṇi,                    kamme nava . . . (saṃkhittaṃ),
          adhipatiyā nava,
          anantare tīṇi,                    magge nava,
          samanantare tīṇi,                sampayutte tīṇi,
          sahajāte nava,                    vippayutte nava,
          aññamaññe cha,                    atthiyā tīṇi,2
          nissaye nava,                     natthiyā tīṇi,
          upanissaye tīṇi,                vigate tīṇi,
          purejāte tīṇi,                    avigate nava.
                          Anulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 As under 2.
2 R. and B. nava.


[page 125]
                          Paccayavāro.                          125
     1. Rūpiṃ dhammaṃ paccayā rūpī dhammo uppajjati
nahetupaccayā.
     Ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ . . . pe1 . . . asaññasattānaṃ, ekaṃ
mahābhūtaṃ . . . pe . . .
     2. Rūpiṃ dhammaṃ paccayā arūpī . . . nahetupaccayā.
     Cakkhāyatanaṃ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ . . . kāyā-
yatanaṃ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā ahetukā
arūpino khandhā. Ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe2 vatthuṃ
paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
     3. Rūpiṃ dhammaṃ paccayā rupī ca . . . nahetupaccayā.
     (Pavattipaṭisandhi3 kātabbā.)
     4. Arūpiṃ dhammaṃ paccayā arūpī . . .
     Ahetukaṃ arūpiṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ . . . pe . . . Paṭisan-
dhikkhaṇe vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe
paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
     5. Arūpiṃ dhammaṃ paccayā rūpī . . .
     Arūpino khandhe paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ . . .
(paṭisandhi).
     6. Arūpiṃ . . . rūpī ca arūpī ca dhammā . . .
     Arūpiṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭ-
ṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . . (paṭisandhi).
     7. Rūpiñ ca arūpiñ ca dhammaṃ paccayā rūpī . . .
     Arūpino khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭ-
ṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ . . . (paṭisandhi).
     8. Rūpiñ ca arūpiñ ca dhammaṃ paccayā arūpī . . .
     Cakkhuviññāṇasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca cakkhā-
yatanañ ca paccayā tayo khandhā; dve . . . kāyaviññā-
ṇasahagataṃ . . . pe . . . arūpiṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca vatthuñ
ca paccayā tayo khandhā; dve . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe
vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñ
ca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasapagato moho.
     9. Rūpiñ ca arūpiñ ca dhammaṃ paccayā rūpī ca arūpī
ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā.
     Arūpiṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca vatthuñ ca paccayā4 tayo
khandhā; dve . . . Arūpino khandhe ca mahābhūte ca
paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ . . . (paṭisandhi).
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Cf. p. 4.
2 B. ahetukāpaṭi-. K. ahetukappaṭi-.
3 K. pavatta-.
4 R. inserts ahetukā.


[page 126]
126                               Rūpidukaṃ.
          Nahetuyā nava,                    nakamme cattāri,
          nārammaṇe tīṇi,                navipāke nava,
          nādhipatiyā nava,                nāhāre ekaṃ,
          nānantare tīṇi,                na-indriye ekaṃ,
          nasamanantare tīṇi,               najhāne cattāri,
          na-aññamaññe tīṇi,                namagge nava,
          na-upanissaye tīṇi,               nasampayutte tīṇi,
          napurejāte nava,                navippayutte dve,
          napacchājāte nava,                nonatthiyā tīṇi,
          nāsevane nava,                    novigate tīṇi.
                         Paccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
          Hetupaccayā, nārammaṇe           nasampayutte tīṇi,
           tīṇi . . .                     navippayutte ekaṃ,
           (saṃkhittaṃ, sabbe kātabbā) . . . nonatthiyā tīṇi,
          nakamme tīṇi,                     novigate tīṇi.
          navipāke nava,
                     Anulomapaccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
     Nahetupaccayā, ārammaṇe tīṇi, . . . (sabbe kātabbā)
. . . jhāne nava, magge tīṇi, . . . (saṃkhittaṃ) . . . avigate
nava.
                     Paccaniyānulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
     (Nissayavāro pi paccayavārasadiso.)
     4. Arūpiṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho arūpī dhammo uppajjati
hetupaccayā.
     Arūpiṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā; dve . . .
(paṭisandhi).
     Hetuyā ekaṃ, avigate ekaṃ. (Evaṃ paccaniyā1 pi tīṇi
gaṇanā pi sampayuttavāre2 pi sabbe kātabbā.3 Ekā yeva
pañhā.)
     4. Arūpi dhammo arūpissa dhammassa hetupaccayena
paccayo.
     Arūpī hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena
paccayo . . . (paṭisandhi).
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 K. -yampi. B. -yaṃ pi.
2 K. -vāro.
3 B. kātabbo.


[page 127]
                               Arammaṇavāro.                     127
     5. Arūpī dhammo rūpissa dhammassa . . .
     Arūpī hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena
paccayo . . . (paṭisandhi).
     6. Arūpī dhammo rūpissa ca arūpissa ca1 . . .
     Arūpī hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭ-
ṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo . . . (paṭi-
sandhi).
     2. Rūpī dhammo arūpissa dhammassa ārammaṇapacca-
yena paccayo.
     Cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ itthindriyaṃ purisindriyaṃ
jīvitindriyaṃ āpodhātuṃ kabaḷiṃkāraṃ āhāraṃ aniccato . . .
pe . . . domanassaṃ uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ
passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti. Rūpāyata-
naṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo . . .
phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena
paccayo. Rūpino khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa . . . pe
. . . anāgataṃsañāṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena
paccayo.
     4. Arūpī dhammo arūpissa dhammassa . . .
     Dānaṃ, sīlaṃ, uposathakammaṃ taṃ paccavekkhati, pubbe2
jhānā . . . Ariyā maggā . . . phalaṃ paccavekkhanti.
Nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa vodānassa maggassa phalassa āvajja-
nāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Ariyā pahīnakilese . . .
(saṃkhittaṃ)3 . . . vikkhambhitakilese. . . pubbe . . . Arūpino
khandhe aniccato . . . pe . . . domanassaṃ uppajjati;
cetopariyañāṇena arūpicittasamaṃgissa4 cittaṃ jānāti, ākāsā-
nañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanassa ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ neva-
saññānāsaññāyatanassa arūpino khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa
cetopariyañāṇassa pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa yathākam-
mūpagañāṇassa anāgataṃsañāṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇa-
paccayena paccayo.
     2. Rūpī dhammo arūpissa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena
paccayo.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. arūpissa ca sarūpissa ca.
2 B. pubbesu.
3 Cf. pp. 9, 10, § 4.
4 R. arūpī-.


[page 128]
128                          Rūpidukaṃ.
     Ārammaṇādhipati:-- cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . kabaḷiṃkāraṃ
āhāraṃ garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā
rāgo uppajjati diṭṭhi uppajjati.
     4. Arūpī dhammo arūpissa dhammassa . . .
     Ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. Ārammaṇādhipati:--
dānaṃ . . . (saṃkhittaṃ) . . . nibbānaṃ maggassa phalassa
adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Arūpino khandhe garuṃ katvā
assādeti . . . rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. Sahajātādhi-
pāti:-- arūpī adhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ adhi-
patipaccayena paccayo.
     5. Arūpī dhammo rūpissa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena
paccayo.
     Sahajātādhipati:-- arūpī adhipati cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ
rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
     6. Arūpī dhammo rūpissa . . . ca arūpissa . . .
     Sahajātādhipati:-- arūpī adhipati sampayuttakānaṃ
khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ adhipatipacca-
yena paccayo.
     4. Arūpī dhammo arūpissa dhammassa anantarapacca-
yena paccayo.
     Purimā purimā arūpino khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchi-
mānaṃ arūpīnaṃ1 khandhānaṃ phalasamāpattiyā anantara-
paccayena paccayo . . . samanantarapaccayena paccayo
. . . sahajātapaccayena paccayo . . . (satta, miha
ghaṭanā2 natthi) . . . aññamaññapaccayena paccayo . . .
nissayapaccayena paccayo . . . (satta pañhā, miha ghaṭanā2
natthi).
     2. Rūpī dhammo arūpissa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
     Ārammaṇūpanissayo pakatūpanissayo . . . pe . . . Paka-
tūpanissayo:-- utu3 bhojanaṃ senāsanaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ
deti . . . pe . . . saṃghaṃ bhindati. Utu3 bhojanaṃ senā-
sanaṃ saddhāya . . . pe4 . . . phalasamāpattiyā upanissaya-
paccayena paccayo.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 So K. (R. omits.)
2 K. pi ha ghaṭanā. B. pi hāṃ kaṭanā.
3 B. omits utu.
4 R. has no pe.


[page 129]
                               Kammavāro.                         129
     4. Arūpī dhammo arūpissa dhammassa upannissayapac-
cayena paccayo.
     Ārammaṇūpanissayo . . .1pe . . . Pakatūpanissayo:--
saddhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti . . . pe . . . sīlaṃ . . . kāyi-
kaṃ dukkhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti . . . pe . . . saṃghaṃ
bhindati; saddhā . . . pe . . . kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ saddhāya . . .
pe . . . phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
     2. Rūpī dhammo arūpissa2 dhammassa purejātapacca-
yena paccayo.
     Ārammaṇapurejātaṃ, vatthupurejātaṃ. Ārammaṇapure-
jātaṃ:-- cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ kabaḷiṃkāraṃ āhāraṃ
aniccato . . . pe . . . domanassaṃ uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunā
rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti; rūpā-
yatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa . . . phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāya-
viññāṇassa. . . . Vatthupurejātaṃ:-- cakkhāyatanaṃ cak-
khuviññāṇassa . . . kāyāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa vatthu
arūpīnaṃ3 dhammānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
     5. Arūpī dhammo rūpissa4 dhammassa pacchājātapac-
cayena paccayo.
     Pacchājātā arūpino khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa
pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
     4. Arūpī dhammo arūpissa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena
paccayo.
     Purimā purimā . . . pe5 . . . pacchimānaṃ . . .
     4. Arūpī dhammo arūpissa dhammassa kammapaccayena
paccayo.
     Sahajātā, nānākhaṇikā. Sahajātā arūpī cetanā sampa-
yuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. Nānā-
khaṇikā arūpī cetanā6 vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapac-
cayena paccayo.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 As under 2.
2 B. arūpi . . . arūpissa. K. rupi . . . rūpissa.
3 S. rūpīnaṃ.
4 S. arūpissa.
5 Cf. p. 115 (āsevanavāro).
6 B. has kaṭattā kamma; then omits next three sentences.


[page 130]
130                               Rūpidukaṃ.
     5. Arūpī dhammo rūpissa dhammassa . . .
     Sahajātā, nānākhaṇikā. Sahājātā arūpī cetanā cittasam-
uṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. Nānā-
khaṇikā arūpī cetanā kaṭattā rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena
paccayo.
     6. Arūpī dhammo rūpissa ca arūpissa . . .
     Sahajātā, nānākhaṇikā. Sahajātā arūpī cetanā sampa-
yuttakānaṃ1 khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ
kammapaccayena paccayo. Nānākhaṇikā2 arūpī cetanā
vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapacca-
yena paccayo.
     4. Arūpī dhammo arūpissa dhammassa vipākapaccayena
paccayo . . . (tīṇi).
     1. Rūpī3 dhammo rūpissa dhammassa āhārapaccayena
paccayo.
     Kabaḷiṃkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena pac-
cayo.
     4. Arūpī dhammo arūpissa dhammassa āhārapaccayena
paccayo . . . (tīṇi).
     1. Rūpī dhammo rūpissa dhammassa indriyapaccayena
paccayo.
     Rūpajīvitindriyaṃ kaṭattā rūpānaṃ indriyapaccayena pac-
cayo.
     2. Rūpī dhammo arūpissa dhammassa . . .
     Cakkhundriyaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa . . . kāyindriyaṃ
kāyaviññāṇassa indriyapaccayena paccayo.
     4. Arūpī dhammo arūpissa dhammassa indriyapaccayena
paccayo . . . (tīṇi).
     8. Rūpī ca arūpī ca . . . arūpissa4 . . .
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. has vipākanaṃ khandhānaṃ kamma ||.
2 B. inserts sahajātā and finishes foregoing sentence over
     again twice.
3 B. sarūpi.
4 K. rūpissa. Cf. p. 116, § 8.


[page 131]
                          Atthivāro.                131
     Cakkhundriyañ ca cakkhuviññāṇañ ca cakkhuviññāṇa-
sahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo. Kāy-
indriyañ ca . . . pe . . .
     4. Arūpī dhammo arūpissa dhammassa jhānapaccayena
paccayo . . . (tīṇi) . . . maggapaccayena paccayo . . .
(tīṇi) . . . sampayuttapaccayena paccayo . . . (ekaṃ).
     2. Rūpī dhammo arūpissa dhammassa vippayuttapacca-
yena paccayo.
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. Sahajātaṃ:-- paṭisandhikkhaṇe
vatthu arūpīnaṃ khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena pac-
cayo. Purejātaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa . . .
kāyāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa, vatthu arūpīnaṃ khandhānaṃ
vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
     5. Arūpī dhammo rūpissa1 dhammassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. Sahajātā arūpino khandhā
cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena pac-
cayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe arūpī khandhā kaṭattā rūpānaṃ
vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā arūpino khandhā
purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
     1. Rūpī dhammo rūpissa dhammassa atthipaccayena
paccayo.
     Sahājātaṃ āhāraṃ indriyaṃ. Sahajātaṃ ekaṃ mahā-
bhūtaṃ . . . (yāva asaññasattā). Kabaḷiṃkāro āhāro imassa
kāyassa atthiyapaccayena paccayo. Rūpajīvitindriyaṃ kaṭattā
rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
     2. Rūpī dhammo arūpissa dhammassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. Sahajātaṃ:-- paṭisandhikkhaṇe
vatthu arūpīnaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
Purejātaṃ:-- cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . kabaḷiṃkāraṃ āhāraṃ
aniccato . . . pe . . . domanassaṃ uppajjati; dibbena
cakkhunā.. pe . . . dibbāya sotadhātuyā . . . pe . . .
rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa . . . phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ
kāyaviññāṇassa, cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa . . .
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. arūpissa.


[page 132]
132                     Rūpidukaṃ.
kāyāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa, vatthu arūpīnaṃ khandhānaṃ
atthipaccayena paccayo.
     4. Arūpī1 dhammo arūpissa1 dhammassa . . .
     Arūpī eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ . . . pe . . .
dve . . . pe . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     5. Arūpī dhammo rūpissa dhammassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. Sahajātā arūpino khandhā
cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
Paṭisandhikkhaṇe pacchājātā arūpino khandhā purejātassa
imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
     6. Arūpī dhammo rūpissa ca arūpissa ca . . .
     Arūpī eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭ-
ṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo . . . pe . . .
dve . . . pe . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     7. Rūpī ca arūpī ca dhammā rūpissa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ āhāraṃ indriyaṃ. Sahajātā
arūpino khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ
rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā arūpino
khandhā ca kabaḷiṃkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthi-
paccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā arūpino khandhā ca rūpa-
jīvitindriyañ ca kaṭattā rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
     8. Rūpī ca arūpī ca dhammā arūpissa2 . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. Sahajāto cakkhuviññāṇasahagato
eko khandho ca cakkhāyatanañ ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ
atthipaccayena paccayo . . . pe . . . dve . . . pe . . .
Kāyaviññāṇasahagato arūpī eko khandho ca vatthu ca
tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo . . . pe
. . . dve . . . pe . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe arūpī eko
khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ . . . pe
. . . dve . . . pe . . . natthipaccayena paccayo . . .
vigata- . . . avigatapaccayena paccayo.
          Hetuyā tīṇi,                     anantare ekaṃ,
          ārammaṇe dve,                     samanantare ekaṃ,
          adhipatiyā cattāri,               sahajāte satta,
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. omits this and three following paragraphs.
2 B. rūpissa.


[page 133]
                          Paccaniyaṃ.                133
          aññamaññe cha,                    indriye cha,
          nissaye satta,                    jhāne tīṇi,
          upanissaye dve,                magge tīṇi,
          purejāte ekaṃ,                    sampayutte ekaṃ,
          pacchājāte ekaṃ,                vippayutte dve,
          āsevane ekaṃ,                     atthiyā satta,
          kamme tīṇi,                     natthiyā ekaṃ,
          vipāke tīṇi,                     vigate ekaṃ,
          āhāre cattāri,                    avigate satta:--
     evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.1
                          Anulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
     1. Rūpī dhammo rūpissa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena
paccayo . . . āhāra-, indriya-paccayena paccayo.
     2. Rūpī dhammo arūpissa dhammassa ārammaṇa-, . . .
sahajāta-, upanissaya-, purejāta-paccayena paccayo.
     4. Arūpī dhammo arūpissa dhammassa ārammaṇa-, saha-
jāta-, upanissaya-, kammapaccayena paccayo.
     5. Arūpī dhammo rūpissa dhammassa sahajāta-, pacchā-
jātā-, kammapaccayena paccayo.2
     6. Arūpī dhammo rūpissa ca arūpicca ca dhammassa
sahajāta-, kammapaccayena paccayo.
     7. Rūpī ca arūpi ca dhammā rūpissa dhammassa saha-
jāta-, pacchājāta-, āhāra-, indriyapaccayena paccayo.
     8. Rūpī ca arūpī ca dhammā arūpissa dhammassa saha-
jāta-, purejātapaccayena paccayo.
          Nahetuyā satta,                na-aññamaññe cha,
          nārammaṇe satta,                nanissaye cha,
          nādhipatiyā satta,3               na-upanissaye satta,
          nānantare satta,                napurejāte satta . . .
          nasamanantare satta,                (saṃkhittaṃ), . . .
          nasahajāte cha,4                namagge satta,
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. and S. omit the two words.
2 B. adds upanissaya || purejāta || ||.
3 K. omits clause.
4 B. nava.


[page 134]
134                     Rūpidukaṃ.
          nasampayutte cha,1                nonatthiyā satta,
          navippayutte pañca,               novigate satta,
          no-atthiyā cattāri,               no-avigate cattāri:--
     evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.2
                         Paccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
          Hetupaccayā, nārammaṇe           na-upanissaye tīṇi,
           tīṇi,                          sabbattha tīṇi;
          nādhipatiyā tīṇi,                nasampayutte ekaṃ,
          nānantare tīṇi,                navippayutte ekaṃ,
          nasamanantare tīṇi,               nonatthiyā tīṇi,
          na-aññamaññe ekaṃ,                novigate3 tīṇi:--
     evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.2
                     Anulomapaccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
     Nahetupaccayā, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā cattāri . . .
(anulomamātikā kātabbā) . . . avigate satta.
                     Paccaniyānulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
                         RŪPI-DUKAṂ niṭṭhitaṃ.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. pañca, omitting next clause.
2 R. and S. omit the two words.
3 R. no-avigate.


[page 135]
                               135
                          [XII. LOKIYA-DUKAṂ.]
     1. Lokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo dhammo uppajjati
hetupaccayā.
     Lokiyaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasam-
uṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ, . . . pe . . . dve . . . pe . . . Paṭi-
sandhikkhaṇe1 khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca
khandhā; ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ . . . pe . . . mahābhūte
paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattā rūpaṃ upādā rūpaṃ.
     4. Lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokuttaro dhammo
uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Lokuttaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā . . .
pe . . . dve . . . pe . . .
     5. Lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo dhammo uppaj-
jati hetupaccayā.
     Lokuttare khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
     6. Lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo ca lokuttaro ca
dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayo.
     Lokuttaraṃ ekaṃ2 . . . dve . . . pe . . .
     7. Lokiyañ ca lokuttarañ ca dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo
dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Lokuttare khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭ-
ṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ . . . (saṃkhittaṃ) . . .
          Hetuyā pañca,                     adhipatiyā pañca,
          ārammaṇe dve,                     anantare dve,
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. omits this word.
2 As under 1.


[page 136]
136                     Lokiyadukaṃ.
          samanantare dve,1                indriye pañca,
          sahājāte pañca,2                jhāne pañca,
          aññamaññe dve,                    magge pañca,
          nissaye pañca,                    sampayutte dve,
          upanissaye dve,3                vippayutte pañca,5
          purejāte dve,                     atthiyā pañca,
          āsevane dve,                     natthiyā dve,
          kamme pañca,                     vigate dve,6
          vipāke pañca,                     avigate pañca.
          āhāre pañca,4
                          Anulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
     1. Lokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo dhammo uppajjati
nahetupaccayā.
     Ahetukaṃ lokiyaṃ7 ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā
cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ . . . pe . . . (ahetukapaṭisandhi
yāva asaññasattā). Vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate
khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho
. . . (saṃkhittaṃ) . . .
          Nahetuyā ekaṃ,                    na-aññamaññe tīṇi,
          nārammaṇe tīṇi,                na-upanissaye tīṇi,
          nādhipatiyā dve,                napurejāte cattāri,
          nānantare tīṇi,                napacchājāte pañca,
          nasamanantare tīṇi,8           nāsevane pañca,
     (nāsevanamulake lokuttare suddhake arūpe vipāko ti niyā-
metabbaṃ.9 Avasesā pakatikā yeva)
          nakamme dve,                     na-indriye ekaṃ,
          navipāke pañca,                najhāne ekaṃ,
          nāhāre ekaṃ,                     namagge ekaṃ,
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. and S. omit clause.
2 S. dve.
3 B. omits clause.
4 K. omits clause.
5 S. dve.
6 R. pañca.
7 K. omits lokiyaṃ.
8 S. omits clause.
9 B. saddhake arūpe vipāko tīṇi yāmetabbaṃ.
     S. su: arūpe vipāke tīṇi yāmetabbaṃ.
     R. vipāko tīṇi niyām-. Cf. p. 138, § 1.


[page 137]
                          Paccayavāro.                137
          nasampayutte tīṇi,                nonatthiyā tīṇi,
          navippayutte dve,1                novigate tīṇi.
                         Paccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
          Hetupaccayā, nārammaṇe tīṇi,               nasampayutte tīṇi,
          nādhipatiyā dve                          navippayutte dve,
           (nānantarepadādi paccaniyasadisā2)     nonatthiyā tīṇi,
          navipāke pañca,                          novigate tīṇi.
                     Anulomapaccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
     Nahetupaccayā, ārammaṇe ekaṃ, anantare ekaṃ . . .
(saṃkhittaṃ) . . . avigate ekaṃ.
                     Paccaniyānulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
     (Sahajātavāro paṭiccavārasadiso.)3
                              [Anulomaṃ.]
     1. Lokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā lokiyo dhammo uppajjati
hetupaccayā.
     Lokiyaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā . . . (saṃkhittaṃ) . . .
ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ . . . pe . . . mahābhūte paccayā citta-
samuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattā rūpaṃ upādā rūpaṃ. Vatthuṃ
paccayā lokiyā khandhā.
     2. Lokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā lokuttaro . . .
     Vatthuṃ paccayā lokuttarā khandhā.
     3. Lokiyaṃ . . . lokiyo ca lokuttaro ca . . .
     Vatthuṃ paccayā lokuttarā khandhā. Mahābhūte paccayā
cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
     4. Lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā lokuttaro . . . (tīṇi).
     7. Lokiyañ ca lokuttarañ ca dhammaṃ paccayā lokiyo
. . . hetupaccayā.
     Lokuttare khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭ-
ṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. ekaṃ.
2 K. anantarapadā paṭhamasarisā. B. anantarepadā paṭhamesadisā.
     S. anantarapadā paṭhamasarisā.
3 S. paccayavāra-.


[page 138]
138                     Lokiyadukaṃ.
     8. Lokiyañ ca lokuttarañ ca dhammaṃ paccayā lokuttaro
dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Lokuttaraṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca vatthuñ ca paccayā tayo
khandhā . . . pe . . . dve.. pe . . .
     9. Lokiyañ ca . . . lokiyo ca lokuttaro ca dhammā . . .
     Lokuttaraṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca vatthuñ ca paccayā tayo
khandhā . . . pe . . . dve . . . pe . . . Lokuttare
khandhe ca mahabhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ
. . . (saṃkhittaṃ).
          Hetuyā nava,                kamme nava,
          ārammaṇe cattāri,           vipāke nava . . . (saṃkhittaṃ) . . .
          adhipatiyā nava,
          anantare cattāri,           magge nava,
          samanantare cattāri,           sampayutte cattāri,
          sahajāte nava,                vippayutte nava,
          aññamaññe cattāri,           atthiyā nava,
          nissaye nava,                natthiyā cattāri,
          upanissaye cattāri,           vigate cattāri,1
          purejāte cattāri,           avigate nava.
          āsevane cattāri,
                          Anulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
     1. Lokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā lokiyo dhammo uppajjati
nahetupaccayā.
     Ahetukaṃ lokiyaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ . . . (yāva asañña-
sattā). Cakkhāyatanaṃ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ.. kāyā-
yatanaṃ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā ahetukā
lokiyā khandhā, vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate
khandhe ca vatthuñ ca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhac-
chasahagato moho . . . (saṃkhittaṃ).

          nārammaṇe tīṇi,                napurejāte cattāri,
          nādhipatiyā cattāri,           napacchājāte nava,

           (saṃkhittaṃ) . . .

1 B. omits clause.

[page 139]
                               Hetuvāro.                          139
          nakamme cattāri,                namagge ekaṃ,
          navipāke nava,                    nasampayutte tīṇi,
          nāhāre ekaṃ,                     navippayutte dve,
          na-indriye ekaṃ,                nonatthiyā tīṇi,
          najhāne ekaṃ,                     novigate tīṇi.

          Hetupaccayā, nārammaṇe tīṇi,           nasampayutte tīṇi,
