          navipāke nava,                          novigate tīṇi.
                     Anulomapaccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
     Nahetupaccayā, ārammaṇe2 ekaṃ, anantare ekaṃ, avigate
ekaṃ.
                     Paccaniyānulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
     1. Lokiyaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho lokiyo dhammo uppaj-
jati hetupaccayā.
     Lokiyaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā . . .
pe . . . dve . . . pe . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     4. Lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho lokuttaro . . .
     Lokuttaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā . . .
pe . . . dve . . . pe . . . (Saṃsaṭṭhavāro evaṃ vitthāretabbo
saha gaṇanāhi dve pañhā. Sampayuttavāro saṃsaṭṭhavāra-
sadiso.)
                              [Anulomaṃ.]
     1. Lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa hetupaccayena
paccayo.
     Lokiyā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ3 khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭ-
ṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. Paṭisan-
dhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     4. Lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa . . . (tīṇi).
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 R. and B. insert nānantare tīṇi, adding nasamanantarapadādi,
     etc.
2 B. nahetuyā āram-.
3 B. lokiyakhandhānaṃ citta-.


[page 140]
140                               Lokiyadukaṃ.
     1. Lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa ārammaṇa-
paccayena paccayo.
     Dānaṃ sīlaṃ uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavek-
khati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati. Jhānā . . . pe
. . . Ariyā gotrabhuṃ1 paccavekkhanti, vodānaṃ pac-
cavekkhanti, pahīnakilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhita-
kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti.
Cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ . . . pe . . . lokiye
khandhe aniccato . . . pe . . . domanassaṃ uppajjati;
dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā
saddaṃ suṇāti, cetopariyañāṇena lokiyacittasamaṃgissa
cittaṃ jānāti, ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanassa, ākiñ-
caññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa, rūpāyatanaṃ
cakkhuviññāṇassa . . . pe . . . phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāya-
viññāṇassa, lokiyā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa cetopari-
yañāṇassa pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa yathākammūpaga-
ñāṇassa anāgataṃsañāṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena
paccayo.
     4. Lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa . . .
     Nibbānaṃ maggassa phalassa ārammaṇapaccayena pac-
cayo.
     5. Lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa . . .
     Ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ
paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ gotra-
bhussa vodānassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
Ariyā cetopariyañāṇena lokuttaracittasamaṃgissa cittaṃ
jānanti. Lokuttarā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa pubbenivā-
sānussatiñāṇassa yathākammūpagañāṇassa anāgataṃsañā-
ṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
     1. Lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa adhipatipacca-
yena paccayo.
     Ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. Ārammaṇādhipati:
-- dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ uposathakammaṃ . . . pubbe . . . jhānā
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. gotrabhū.


[page 141]
                               Anantaravāro.                     141
. . . pe . . . sekhā1 gotrabhuṃ garuṃ katvā . . . pe . . .
vodānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti. Cakkhuṃ . . . pe
. . . vatthuṃ lokiye khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinan-
dati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati diṭṭhi uppajjati. Saha-
jātādhipati:-- lokiyādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ
cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
     4. Lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa . . .
     Ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. Ārammaṇādhipati:
-- nibbānaṃ maggassa phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
Sahajātādhipati:-- lokuttarādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khan-
dhānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
     5. Lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa . . .
     Ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. Ārammaṇādhipati:
-- ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ, phalaṃ, nib-
bānaṃ2 garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti; nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa
vodānassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Sahajātādhipati:--
lokuttarādhipati cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ adhipati-
paccayena paccayo.
     6. Lokuttaro dhammo lokuyassa ca . . .
     Sahajātādhipati:-- lokuttarādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ
khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ adhipati-
paccayena paccayo.
     1. Lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa anantarapacca-
yena paccayo.
     Purimā purimā lokiyā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchi-
mānaṃ lokiyānaṃ khandhānaṃ . . . pe . . . anulomaṃ
gotrabhussa anulomaṃ vodānassa anantarapaccayena pac-
cayo.
     2. Lokiyo dhammo lokuttarassa . . .
     Gotrabhū maggassa, vodānaṃ maggassa,3 anulomaṃ phala-
samāpattiyā, nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññā-
yatanaṃ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo.
     4. Lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa . . .
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 K., R. and B. sekkhā. S. sekho.
2 K. and S. omit nibbānaṃ.
3 S. gotrabhussa vodānassa maggassa. K. and S. gotrabhu.


[page 142]
142                          Lokiyadukaṃ.
     Purimā purimā lokuttarā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchi-
mānaṃ lokuttarānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena pac-
cayo. Magge phalassa, phalaṃ phalassa anantarapaccayena
paccayo.
     5. Lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa . . .
     Phalaṃ vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
     1. Lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa samanantara-
paccayena paccayo . . . sahajātapaccayena paccayo (pañca
pañhā,1 ghaṭanā natthi) . . . aññamaññapaccayena pac-
cayo . . . (dve) . . . nissayapaccayena paccayo . . .
upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
     Ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanis-
sayo . . . pe . . . Pakatūpanissayo:-- lokiyaṃ saddhaṃ
upanissāya dānaṃ deti . . . pe . . . vipassanaṃ uppādeti,
abhiññaṃ uppādeti, samāpattiṃ uppādeti; mānaṃ jappeti,
diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti; lokiyaṃ sīlaṃ . . . pe . . . senāsanaṃ upanis-
sāya dānaṃ deti . . . pe . . . saṃghaṃ bhindati. Lokiyā
saddhā . . . pe2 . . . senāsanaṃ lokiyāya saddhāya . . . pe2 . . .
kāyikassa dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. Kusa-
lākusalaṃ kammaṃ vipākassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
     2. Lokiyo dhammo lokuttarassa . . .
     Anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo . . . pe . . .
Pakatūpanissayo:-- paṭhamassa maggassa parikammaṃ3
paṭhamassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo, . . .
pe . . . catutthassa maggassa parikammaṃ catutthassa
maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
     4. Lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa . . .
     Ārammaṇūpanissayo . . . pe . . .4 Pakatūpanissayo:--
paṭhamo maggo dutiyassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena
paccayo. Tatiyo maggo catutthassa maggassa upanissaya-
paccayena paccayo.
     5. Lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa . . .
     Ārammaṇūpanissayo . . . pe . . .4 Pakatūpanissayo:--
ariyā maggaṃ upanissāya anuppannaṃ samāpattiṃ5 uppā-
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. pañcarihaṃ.
2 R. has no hiatus.
3 S. omits this word.
4 As under 1.
5 S. anuppannasamā-


[page 143]
                               Āsevanavāro.                     143
denti, uppannaṃ samāpajjanti; saṃkhāre aniccato1 dukkhato
anattato vipassanti, tesaṃ maggo . . . pe . . . ṭhānā-
ṭhānakosallassa phalasamāpattiyā kāyikassa sukhassa
upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
     1. Lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa purejātapac-
cayena paccayo.
     Ārammaṇapurejātaṃ, vatthupurejātaṃ. Ārammaṇapure-
jātaṃ cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ aniccato dukkhato
anattato2 . . . pe . . . domanassaṃ uppajjati; dibbena
cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ
suṇāti; rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa . . . pe . . .
phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa, vatthupurejātaṃ cak-
khāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa . . . pe . . . kāyāyatanaṃ
kāyaviññāṇassa, vatthu lokiyānaṃ khandhānaṃ purejāta-
paccayena paccayo.
     2. Lokiyo dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa purejāta-
paccayena paccayo.
     Vatthu3 lokuttarānaṃ khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena
paccayo . . .
     1. Lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa pacchājāta-
paccayena paccayo.
     Pacchajātā lokiyā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa
pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
     5. Lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa . . .
     Pacchājātā lokuttarā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa
pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
     1. Lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa āsevanapacca-
yena paccayo.
     Purimā purimā lokiyā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimā-
naṃ lokiyānaṃ khandhānaṃ āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 R. and B. continue ṭhānāṭhānato sattassa upani ||
     || phalasamāpattiyā, etc. S. continues ṭhānāṭhānākosallassa
     upanissaya.
2 R., B. and S. omit last two words.
3 Preceded in R. by vatthu purejātaṃ ||.


[page 144]
144                     Lokiyadukaṃ.
Anulomaṃ gotrabhussa anulomaṃ vodānassa āsevanapac-
cayena paccayo.
     2. Lokiyo dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa āsevana-
paccayena paccayo.
     Gotrabhū1 maggassa vodānaṃ maggassa āsevanapacca-
yena paccayo.
     1. Lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa kammapacca-
yena paccayo.
     Sahajātā, nānākhaṇikā. Sahajātā lokiyā cetanā sampa-
yuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ
kammapaccayena paccayo. Nānākhaṇikā lokiyā cetanā
vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapacca-
yena paccayo.
     4. Lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa . . .
     Sahajātā, nānākhaṇikā. Sahajātā lokuttarā cetanā sam-
payuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
Nānākhaṇikā lokuttarā cetanā vipakānaṃ lokuttarānaṃ2
khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
     5. Lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa . . .
     Lokuttarā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kamma-
paccayena paccayo.
     6. Lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa ca . . .
     Lokuttarā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ citta-
samuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
     1. Lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa vipākapacca-
yena paccayo.
     Vipāko lokiyo eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ3
vipākapaccayena paccayo . . . pe . . . dve . . . Paṭi-
sandhikkhaṇe . . . pe . . .
     4. Lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa vipāka-
paccayena paccayo . . . (tīṇi).
     1. Lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena
paccayo.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 K. and S. -bhu.
2 B. omits.
3 R. adds cittasamu ||.


[page 145]
                          Vippayuttavāro.                         145
     Lokiyā āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭ-
ṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo. Paṭisan-
dhikkhaṇe kabaḷiṃkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa āhārapacca-
yena paccayo.
     4. Lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa āhāra-
paccayena paccayo . . . (tīṇi).
     1. Lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa indriyapacca-
yena paccayo.
     (Paṭisandhikhaṇo1 kātabbo.) Cakkhundriyaṃ cakkhuviñ-
ñāṇassa . . . pe . . . kāyindriyaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa indriya-
paccayena paccayo. Rūpajīvitindriyaṃ kaṭattā rūpānaṃ
indriyapaccayena paccayo.
     4. Lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa indriya-
paccayena paccayo . . . (tīṇi).
     1. Lokiyo2 dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa jhānapacca-
yena paccayo . . . (ekaṃ, lokuttare tīṇi) . . . maggapacca-
yena paccayo . . . (lokiye ekaṃ, lokuttare tīṇi).
     1. Lokiyo dhammassa lokiyassa dhammassa sampayutta-
paccayena paccayo . . . (ekaṃ, lokuttare eko).
     1. Lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa vippayuttapac-
cayena paccayo.
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. Sahajātā lokiyā
khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena
paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe khandhā vatthussa vippayutta-
paccayena paccayo, vatthu khandhānaṃ vippayuttapac-
cayena paccayo. Purejātaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññā-
ṇassa . . . pe . . . kāyāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa, vatthu
lokiyānaṃ khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
Pacchājātā lokiyā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa
vippayuttapāccayena paccayo.
     2. Lokiyo dhammo lokuttarassa . . .
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 K. (paṭisandhi kātabbā).
2 B. omits this and next section (five lines).


[page 146]
146                          Lokiyadukaṃ.
     Purejātaṃ vatthu lokuttarānaṃ khandhānaṃ vippayutta-
paccayena paccayo.
     5. Lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. Sahajātā lokuttarā khandhā
cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena pac-
cayo. Pacchājātā lokuttarā khandhā purejātassa . . .1
     1. Lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa atthipaccayena
paccayo.
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ āhāraṃ indriyaṃ.
Sahajāto lokiyo eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ citta-
samuṭṭhānānañ ca . . . (yāva asaññasattā). Purejāta:--
cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ . . . (purejātasadisaṃ2).
Vatthu lokiyānaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
Pacchājātā lokiyā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa
atthipaccayena paccayo. Kabaḷiṃkāro āhāro imassa kāy-
assa atthipaccayena paccayo. Rūpajīvitindriyaṃ kaṭattā
rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
     2. Lokiyo dhammo lokuttarassa . . .
     Purejātaṃ vatthu lokuttarānaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipacca-
yena paccayo.
     4. Lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa . . .3
     Lokuttaro eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipac-
cayena paccayo . . . pe . . . dve . . . pe . . .
     5. Lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. Sahajātā lokuttarā khandhā
cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
Pacchājātā lokuttarā khandhā . . .4
     6. Lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa ca . . .
     Lokuttaro eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasam-
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 As under 1.
2 B. has purejātaṃ saha cakkhuṃ vatthuṃ purejātasadisaṃ.
3 B. inserts purejātaṃ vatthuṃ lokuttarānaṃ khandhānaṃ atthi ||
     Lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa ||.
4 As under 1.


[page 147]
                               Mātikā.                147
uṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo . . . pe
. . . dve . . . pe . . .
     7. Lokiyo ca lokuttaro ca dhammā lokiyassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ1 āhāraṃ indriyaṃ. Sahajātā
lokuttarā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ
rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā2 lokuttarā
khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ
atthipaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā lokuttarā khandhā ca
kabaḷiṃkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena pac-
cayo. Pacchājātā lokuttarā khandhā ca rūpājīvitindriyañ
ca kaṭattā rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
     8. Lokiyo ca lokuttaro ca dhammā lokuttarassa dham-
massa atthipaccayena paccayo.
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. Sahajāto lokuttaro eko khandho
ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena
paccayo . . . pe . . . dve . . . pe . . . natthipaccayena
paccayo . . . vigatapaccayena paccayo . . . avigata pacca-
yena paccayo.3
          Hetuyā cattāri,                kamme cattāri,
          ārammaṇe4 tīṇi,                vipāke cattāri,
          adhipatiyā cattāri,               āhāre cattāri,6
          anantare cattāri,                indriye cattāri,
          samanantare cattāri,5           jhāne7 cattāri,
          sahajāte pañca,                magge cattāri,
          aññamaññe dve,                    sampayutte dve,
          nissaye satta,                    vippayutte tīṇi,
          upanissaye cattāri,               atthiyā satta,
          purejāte dve,                     natthiyā cattāri,
          pacchājāte dve,                vigate cattāri,
          āsevane dve,                     avigate satta.
                          Anulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
     1. Lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa ārammaṇa-

4 B. sārammaṇe.
5 S. omits clause.

148                     Lokiyadukaṃ.
paccayena paccayo . . . sahajāta-, upanissaya-, pure-
jāta-, pacchājāta-, kamma-, āhāra-, indriyapaccayena
paccayo.
     2. Lokiyo dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa upanissaya-,
purejātapaccayena paccayo.1
     4. Lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa āram-
maṇa-, sahajāta-, upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
     5. Lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa ārammaṇa-,
sahajāta-, upanissaya-, pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
     6. Lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa ca lokuttarassa ca
dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
     7. Lokiyo ca lokuttaro ca dhammā lokiyassa dhammassa
sahajāta-, pacchājāta-, āhāra-, indriyapaccayena paccayo.
     8. Lokiyo ca lokuttaro ca dhammā lokuttarassa dham-
massa sahajātapaccayena paccayo, purejātapaccayena pac-
cayo.3
          Nahetuyā satta . . .           napacchājāte satta . . .
           (saṃkhittaṃ) . . .,               (saṃkhittaṃ) . . .,
          nasamanantare satta,           namagge satta,
          nasahajāte pañca,                nasampayutte pañca,5
          na-aññamaññe pañca,               navippayutte cattāri,
          nanissaye pañca,                no-atthiyā6 cattāri,
          na-upanissaye satta,4           nonatthiyā7 satta,
          napurejāte cha,                novigate satta,
                                         no-avigate cattāri.
                         Paccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
          Hetupaccayā, nārammaṇe           na-aññamaññe dve,
           cattāri . . .                na-upanissaye cattāri . . .
           (saṃkhittaṃ) . . .,               (saṃkhittaṃ) . . .,
          nasamanantare cattāri,           namagge cattāri,

1 S. omits clause.
2 K. omits last clause.
3 K. omits this clause.
4 K. pañca.
5 B. nava, and omits next clause.
6 R. and B. na atthiyā.
7 S. nonatthiyā cattāri, natthiyā satta.

          nasampayutte dve,                nonatthiyā cattāri,
          navippayutte dve,                novigate cattāri.
                     Anulomapaccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

                               [XIII.
                     KENACI-VIÑÑEYYA-DUKAṂ.]
     1. Kenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kenaci viññeyyo
dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Kenaci viññeyyaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo
khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ, . . . pe . . . dve
. . . pe . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe khandhe paṭicca
vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā; ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ
paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā,1 . . . pe . . . mahābhūte paṭicca
cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattā rūpaṃ upādā rūpaṃ.
     2. Kenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kenaci naviñ-
ñeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Kenaci viññeyyaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca kenaci naviñ-
ñeyyā tayo khandhā . . . pe . . .2 upādā rūpaṃ.
     3. Kenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kenaci viññeyyo
ca kenaci naviññeyyo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
     Kenaci viññeyyaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca kenaci viñ-
ñeyyā ca kenaci naviññeyyā ca tayo khandhā3 . . . pe . . .
     4. Kenaci naviññeyyaṃ . . . kenaci naviññeyyo . . .
     Kenaci naviññeyyaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca kenaci
naviññeyyā tayo khandhā4 . . . pe . . .
     5. Kenaci naviññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ . . . kenaci viññeyyo . . .
     Kenaci naviññeyyaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca kenaci
viññeyyā tayo khandhā . . . pe5 . . .
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. khandhā.
2 As in 1.
3 B. naviññeyyaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ. Finish as in 1.
4 B. naviññeyyaṃ ekaṃ khandhā. Finish as in 1.
5 As in 1.


[page 151]
                              Hetuvāro.                          151
     6. Kenaci naviññeyyaṃ . . . kenaci viññeyyo ca . . .
     Kenaci naviññeyyaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca kenaci
viññeyyā ca kenaci naviññeyyā ca tayo khandhā . . .
pe1 . . .
     7. Kenaci viññeyyañ ca kenaci naviññeyyañ ca dhammaṃ
paṭicca kenaci viññeyyo . . . hetupaccayā.
     Kenaci viññeyyañ ca kenaci naviññeyyañ ca ekaṃ khan-
dhaṃ paṭicca kenaci viññeyyā tayo khandhā . . . pe . . .1
     8. Kenaci viññeyyañ ca . . . kenaci naviññeyyo . . .
     Kenaci viññeyyañ ca kenaci naviññeyyañ ca ekaṃ
khandhaṃ paṭicca kenaci naviññeyyā tayo khandhā . . .
pe . . .2
     9. Kenaci viññeyyañ ca kenaci naviññeyyañ ca dhammaṃ
paṭicca kenaci viññeyyo ca kenaci naviññeyyo ca dhammā
uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
     Kenaci viññeyyañ ca kenaci naviññeyyañ ca ekaṃ khan-
dhaṃ paṭicca kenaci viññeyyā ca kenaci naviññeyyā ca tayo
khandhā . . . pe . . .1
     Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava . . . (saṃkhittaṃ) . . .
avigate nava.
                          Anulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
     Nahetuyā nava, nārammaṇe nava . . . [saṃkhittaṃ) . . .
novigate nava. (Evaṃ cattāri pi gaṇanā paripuṇṇā.)3
     (Sahajātavāro pi paccayavāro pi nissayavāro pi saṃsaṭṭha-
vāro pi sampayuttavāro pi evaṃ vitthāretabbā; paccayavāre
vatthu ca pañcāyatanā ca dassetabbā4; yatthā yathā labbhati
taṃ taṃ kātabbaṃ.)5
     1. Kenaci viññeyyo dhammo kenaci viññeyyassa dham-
massa hetupaccayena paccayo.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 As in 1.
2 As in 1. B. has here saṃkhittaṃ, eliding remainder of
     Anulomaṃ.
3 K. and S. omit this sentence.
4 R. -āyatanāni ca dassetabbāni.
5 K., B. and S. omit last three words. K. has labhati.


[page 152]
152                Kenaciviññeyyadukaṃ.
     Kenaci viññeyyā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ
cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
. . . (paṭisandhi saṃkhittaṃ).
     Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava . . . (saṃkhittaṃ) . . .
avigate nava.
                          Anulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
     Nahetuyā1 nava, novigate nava.
                         Paccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
     Evaṃ cattāri pi gaṇanā paripuṇṇā.2
                KENACI-VIÑÑEYYA-DUKAṂ niṭṭhitaṃ.

1 B. hetupaccayā.
2 S. gananā (sic) puṇṇā.


[page 153]
                               153
                               [XIV.
                          ĀSAVA-DUKAṂ.]
                              [Anulomaṃ.]
     1. Āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo dhammo uppajjati
hetupaccayā.
     Kāmāsavaṃ paṭicca diṭṭhāsavo avijjāsavo. Diṭṭhāsavaṃ
paṭicca kāmāsavo avijjāsavo. Avijjāsavaṃ paṭicca kāmā-
savo diṭṭhāsavo.1 Bhavāsavaṃ paṭicca avijjāsavo. Diṭṭhā-
savaṃ paṭicca avijjāsavo. (Ekekamhi2 cakkaṃ kātabbaṃ.)
     2. Āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca no-āsavo3 dhammo uppajjati
hetupaccayā.
     Āsavaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā4 khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañ
ca rūpaṃ.
     3. Āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ca no-āsavo ca
dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
     Kāmāsavaṃ paṭicca diṭṭhāsavo avijjāsavo sampayuttakā
ca khandhā5 cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ . . . [cakkaṃ
bandhitabbaṃ).
     4. No-āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca no-āsavo . . .
     No-āsavaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā citta-
samuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ . . . pe . . . dve . . . pe . . .
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 K., B. and S. omit second and third sentences.
2 S. ekakamhi. R. ekekampi.
3 S. has nāsav- nearly always, occasionally no-āsav-.
     R. has nvāsav-.
4 R. āsavasampay-, here only.
5 B. sampayuttakañ ca khandhaṃ.


[page 154]
154                     Āsavadukaṃ.
Paṭisandhikkhaṇe khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca
khandhā; ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ . . . pe . . . mahābhūte
paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattā rūpaṃ upādā
rūpaṃ.
     5. No-āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo . . .
     No-āsave khandhe paṭicca [cattāro1] āsavā.
     6. No-āsavaṃ . . . āsavo ca no-āsavo ca dhammā uppaj-
janti hetupaccayā.
     No-āsavaṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca2 paṭicca tayo khandhā
āsavā cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ . . . (cakkaṃ bandhi-
tabbaṃ).
     7. Āsavañ ca no-āsavañ ca dhammaṃ paṭicca . . . āsavo
dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Kāmāsavañ ca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca diṭṭhā-
savo avijjāsavo . . . (cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ).
     8. Āsavañ ca no-āsavañ ca . . . no-āsavo . . .
     No-āsavaṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca āsave ca paṭicca tayo
khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ . . . pe . . . dve
. . . pe . . .
     9. Āsavañ ca no-āsavañ ca . . . āsavo ca no-āsavo
ca . . .
     No-āsavaṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca kāmāsavañ ca paṭicca tayo
khandhā diṭṭhāsavo avijjāsavo cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ,
dve . . . [cakkaṃ, saṃkhittaṃ).
          Hetuyā nava,                     vipāke ekaṃ,
          ārammaṇe nava,                    āhāre nava,
          sabbattha nava;3                avigate nava.
                          Anulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
                          [Paccaniyaṃ.]
     4. No-āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca no-āsavo dhammo uppaj-
jati nahetupaccayā.
     Ahetukaṃ no-āsavaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā
cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ, . . . pe . . . dve . . .
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 R. and B. omit.
2 K. inserts vatthuñ ca.
3 S. omits clause.


[page 155]
                          Anulomapaccaniyaṃ.               155
pe . . . Ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe1 khandhe paṭicca
vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā . . . ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ
. . . (yāva asaññasattā).
     5. No-āsavaṃ . . . āsavo . . . nahetupaccayā.
     Vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca
vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
     2. Āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca no-āsavo dhammo uppajjati
nārammaṇapaccayā.
     Āsavaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
     4. No-āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca no-āsavo . . .
     No-āsave khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
Paṭisandhikkhaṇe khandhe paṭicca vatthu . . . ekaṃ
mahābhūtaṃ . . . (yāva asaññasattā).
     8. Āsavañ ca no-āsavañ ca dhammaṃ . . . no-āsavo . . .
     Āsave ca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca cittasam-
uṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ . . . (saṃkhittaṃ) . . .
          Nahetuyā dve,                     nakamme tīṇi,
          nārammaṇe tīṇi,                navipāke nava,
          nādhipatiyā nava,                nāhāre ekaṃ,
          nānantare tīṇi,                na-indriye ekaṃ,
          nasamanantare tīṇi,               najhāne ekaṃ,
          na-aññamaññe tīṇi,                namagge ekaṃ,
          na-upanissaye tīṇi,               nasampayutte tīṇi,
          napurejāte nava,                navippayutte nava,
          napacchājāte nava,                nonatthiyā tīṇi,
          nāsavane nava,                    novigate tīṇi.2
                         Paccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
          Hetupaccayā, nārammaṇe           na-aññamaññe tīṇi,3
           tīṇi,                          na-upanissaye tīṇi,
          nādhipatiyā nava,                napurejāte nava,
          nānantare tīṇi,                napacchājāte nava,
          nasamanantare tīṇi,3           nāsevane nava,
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 K. ahetukapp-. B. ahetukaṃ paṭi-.
2 K. nava.
3 K. omits clause.


[page 156]
156                     Āsavadukaṃ.
          nakamme tīṇi,                     navippayutte nava,
          navipāke nava,                    nonatthiyā tīṇi,1
          nasampayutte tīṇi,                novigate tīṇi.
                     Anulomapaccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
          Nahetupaccayā, ārammaṇe,2      magge ekaṃ,
           dve,                          vigate ekaṃ,3
          anantare dve,                     avigate ekaṃ,4
          vipāke ekaṃ,
                     Paccaniyānulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
     (Sahajātavāro paṭiccavārasadiso.)
     Āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā āsavo dhammo uppajjati
hetupaccayā . . . (āsavamūlakaṃ tīṇi paṭiccasadisā).
     4. No-āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā no-āsavo . . .
     No-āsavaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasam-
uṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ . . . pe . . . dve . . . pe . . . Paṭi-
sandhikkhaṇe khandhe paccayā vatthu, vatthuṃ paccayā
khandhā; . . . pe . . . mahābhūte paccayā cittasam-
uṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattā rūpaṃ upādā rūpaṃ; vatthuṃ pac-
cayā no-āsavā khandhā.
     5. No-āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā āsavo . . .
     No-āsave khandhe paccayā āsavā, vatthuṃ paccayā āsavā.
     6. No-āsavaṃ . . . āsavo ca no-āsavo ca dhammā . . .
     No-āsavaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā āsavā5
ca cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ . . . pe . . . dve . . . pe . . .
Vatthuṃ paccayā āsavā sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
     7. Āsavañ ca no-āsavañ ca dhammaṃ . . . āsavo . . .
     Kāmāsavañ ca sampayuttake ca khandhe paccayā diṭṭhā-
savo avijjāsavo . . . (cakkaṃ) . . . kāmāsavañ ca vatthuñ
ca paccayā diṭṭhāsavo avijjāsavo . . . (cakkaṃ).
     8. Āsavañ ca no-āsavañ ca . . . no-āsavo . . .
     No-āsavaṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca āsave ca paccayā tayo
khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ, . . . pe . . . dve
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 K. nava.
2 B. nāram-.
3 B. omits clause.
4 B. and S. nava. R. dve.
5 S. omits.


[page 157]
                          Saṃsaṭṭhavāro.                157
. . . pe . . . Āsavañ ca vatthuñ ca paccayā no-āsavā
khandhā.
     9. Āsavañ ca no-āsavañ ca dhammaṃ paccayā āsavo ca
no-āsavo ca dhammā1 uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
     No-āsavaṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca kāmāsavañ ca paccayā
tayo khandhā diṭṭhāsavo avijjāsavo cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca
rūpaṃ; dve . . . (cakkaṃ) . . . Kāmāsavañ ca vatthuñ ca
paccayā diṭṭhāsavo avijjāsavo sampayuttakā ca khandhā
. . . (cakkaṃ, saṃkhittaṃ).
     Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava . . .
(saṃkhittaṃ),.., vipāke ekaṃ, avigate nava.
                          Anulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
     4. No-āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā no-āsavo dhammo
uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
     Ahetukaṃ2 no-āsavaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayo tayo
khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ, . . . pe . . . dve
. . . pe . . . (ahetukapaṭisandhi yāva asaññasattā).
Cakkhāyatanaṃ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ . . . kāyāyatanaṃ
. . . .3 vatthuṃ paccayā ahetukā no-āsavā khandhā.
     5. No-āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā āsavo . . .
     Vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñ
ca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
          Nahetuyā dve,                     navippayutte nava,
          nārammaṇe tīṇi,                nonatthiyā tīṇi,
          nādhipatiyā nava,                novigate tīṇi:--
          nakamme tīṇi,
     evaṃ sabbe gaṇanā gaṇetabbā.
                         Paccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
     (Nissayavāro paccayavārasadiso.)
     1. Āsavaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho āsavo dhammo uppajjati
hetupaccayā.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. dhammo (verb elided).
2 S. ahetu.
3 K. omits and has no hiatus.


[page 158]
158                     Āsavadukaṃ.
     Kāmāsavaṃ saṃsaṭṭho diṭṭhāsavo avijjāsavo, . . . (cakkaṃ,
saṃkhittaṃ).
          Hetuyā nava,                     vipāke ekaṃ,
          ārammaṇe nava,                    avigate nava.
          sabbattha nava;
          Nahetuyā dve,                     nakamme tīṇi,
          nādhipatiyā nava,                navipāke nava,
          napurejāte nava,                najhāne ekaṃ,
          napacchājāte nava,1               namagge ekaṃ,2
          nāsavane nava,                    navippayutte nava . . .
     (gaṇanā pi sampayuttavāro pi saṃsaṭṭhavārasadisā).
     1. Āsavo dhammo āsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena
paccayo.
     Kāmāsavo diṭṭhāsavassa avijjāsavassa hetupaccayena
paccayo. Bhavāsavo avijjāsavassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
. . . . (cakkaṃ).
     2. Āsavo dhammo no-āsavassa . . .
     Āsavā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasam-
uṭṭhānañ ca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
     3. Āsavo dhammo āsavassa ca no-āsavassa . . .
     Kāmāsavo diṭṭhāsavassa avijjāsavassa sampayuttakānañ
ca khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ hetupacca-
yena paccayo.
     4. No-āsavo dhammo no-āsavassa . . .
     No-āsavā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasam-
uṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo . . . (paṭi-
sandhi).
     5. No-āsavo dhammo āsavassa . . .
     No-āsavā3 hetū sampayuttakānaṃ āsavānaṃ hetupaccayena
paccayo.
     6. No-āsavo dhammo āsavassa ca no-āsavassa . . .
     No-āsavā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ āsavānaṃ4 cittasam-
uṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 K. omits.
2 B. omits clause.
3 B. nāsavo hetu.
4 R. and B. khandhānaṃ.


[page 159]
                          Ārammaṇavāro.                159
     8. Āsavo ca no-āsavo ca dhammā no-āsavassa dhammassa
hetupaccayena paccayo.
     Āsavā ca no-āsavā ca hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ
cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
     1. Āsavo dhammo āsavassa dhammassa ārammaṇapac-
cayena paccayo.
     Āsave ārabbha āsavā uppajjanti.
     2. Āsavo dhammo no-āsavassa . . .
     Āsave ārabbha no-āsavā khandhā uppajjanti.
     3. Āsavo . . . āsavassa ca no-āsavassa ca . . .
     Āsave ārabbha āsavā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppaj-
janti.
     4. No-āsavo dhammo no-āsavassa dhammassa ārammaṇa-
paccayena1 paccayo.
     No-āsavaṃ khandhaṃ ārabbha2 dānaṃ . . . sīlaṃ . . .
uposathakammaṃ . . . jhānā . . . Ariyā maggā vuṭṭha-
hitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ, nibbānaṃ pacca-
vekkhanti. Nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa vodānassa maggassa
phalassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Ariyā3
no-āsave pahīnakilese vikkhambhitakilese, pubbe samu-
dāciṇṇe kilese jānanti, cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ
no-āsave khandhe aniccato . . . domanassaṃ uppajjati;
dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā
saddaṃ suṇāti, cetopariyañāṇena no-āsavacittasamaṃgissa
cittaṃ jānāti, ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanassa
ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa, rūpāyata-
naṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa . . . pe . . . phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ
kāyaviññāṇassa no-āsavā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa ceto-
pariyañāṇassa pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa yathākammūpa-
gañāṇassa anāgataṃsañāṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapacca-
yena paccayo.
     5. No āsavo dhammo āsavassa . . .
     Dānaṃ datvā . . . taṃ assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha āsavā
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 K. hetu-. S. āhāra.
2 S. and R. omit last three words.
3 K. omits Ariyā.


[page 160]
160                     Āsavadukaṃ.
uppajjanti, sīlaṃ . . . pe . . .uposathakammaṃ . . .
jhānaṃ . . . cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . no-āsave khandhe
assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha āsavā uppajjanti.
     6. No-āsavo . . . āsavassa ca no-āsavassa ca . . .
     Dānaṃ deti . . . (dutiyagamanaṃ). No-āsave khandhe
assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha āsavā ca sampayuttakā ca
khandhā uppajjanti.
     7. Āsavo ca no-āsavo ca . . . āsavassa . . .
     Āsāve ca sampayuttake ca khandhe ārabbha āsavā uppaj-
janti.
     8. Āsavo ca no-āsavo ca . . . no-āsavassa . . .
     Āsave ca sampayuttake ca khandhe ārabbha no-āsavā
khandhā uppajjanti.
     9. Āsavo ca no-āsavo ca dhammā āsavassa ca no-āsavassa
ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
     Āsave ca sampayuttake ca khandhe ārabbha āsavā ca
sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
     1. Āsavo dhammo āsavassa dhammassa adhipatipacca-
yena paccayo.
     Ārammaṇādhipati:-- āsave garuṃ katvā āsavā uppajjanti
. . . (tīṇi1; ārammaṇasadisā garukārammaṇā kātabbā).
     4. No-āsavo dhammo no-āsavassa . . .
     Ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. Ārammaṇādhipati:--
dānaṃ . . . sīlaṃ . . . uposathakammaṃ . . . pubbe . . .
Ariyā maggā . . . phalaṃ . . . nibbānaṃ garuṃ . . . Nib-
bānaṃ gotrabhussa vodānassa2 maggassa phalassa adhipati-
paccayena paccayo. Cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ . . .
pe . . . no-āsave khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti; taṃ
garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati diṭṭhi uppajjati. Sahajātā-
dhipati:-- no-āsavādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ
cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ3 adhipatipaccayena
paccayo.
     5. No-āsavo dhammo āsavassa . . .
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 K. omits tīṇi.
2 K. and S. vodānaṃ.
3 S. has adhipatikhandhānaṃ.


[page 161]
                          Anantaravāro.                161
     Ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. Ārammaṇādhipati:
-- dānaṃ . . . pe . . . no-āsave khandhe garuṃ katvā
assādeti abhinandati; taṃ garuṃ katvā āsavā uppajjanti.
Sahajātādhipati:-- no-āsavādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ āsa-
vānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
     6. No-āsavo . . . āsavassa ca no-āsavassa ca . . .
     Ārammaṇādhipati . . .1 taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati
diṭṭhi uppajjati. Sahajātādhipati:-- no-āsavādhipati sam-
payuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ āsavānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañ
ca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
     7. Āsavo ca no-āsavo ca dhammā āsavassa . . .
     Ārammaṇādhipati:-- āsave ca sampayuttake ca khandhe
garuṃ katvā assādeti . . . pe2 . . . āsavā uppajjanti3 . . .
(tīṇi garukārammaṇā).
     1. Āsavo dhammo āsavassa dhammassa anantarapacca-
yena paccayo.
     Purimā purimā āsavā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ āsavānaṃ
anantarapaccayena paccayo.
     2. Āsavo dhammo no-āsavassa . . .
     Purimā . . .4 pacchimānaṃ no-āsavānaṃ5 khandhānaṃ
anantarapaccayena paccayo. Āsavā vuṭṭhānassa anantara-
paccayena paccayo.
     3. Āsavo dhammo āsavassa ca . . .
     Purimā . . .4 pacchimānaṃ āsavānañ ca sampayuttakānañ
ca khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
     4. No-āsavo dhammo no-āsavassa . . .
     Purimā purimā no-āsavā khandhā pacchimānaṃ . . .
Anulomaṃ gotrabhussa phalasamāpattiyā anantarapacca-
yena paccayo.
     5. No-āsavo dhammo āsavassa . . .
     Purimā purimā no-āsavā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchi-
mānaṃ āsavānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
     6. No-āsavo . . . āsavassa ca no-āsavassa ca . . .
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 As under 5.
2 Cf. above, § 5.
3 K. and S. diṭṭhi uppajjati.
4 As under 1.
5 K. sampayuttakānaṃ.


[page 162]
162                     Āsavadukaṃ.
     Purimā purimā no-āsavā khandhā pacchimānaṃ . . .1
     7. Āsavo ca no-āsavo ca dhammā āsavassa . . . (tīṇi).
     1. Āsavo dhammo āsavassa dhammassa samanantarapac-
cayena paccayo . . . sahajāta-, . . . (nava) . . . aññamañña-,
. . . (nava) nissayapaccayena paccayo . . . (nava)2 . . .
(Vatthu ca dassetabbaṃ3) . . . upanissayapaccayena pac-
cayo.
     Ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanis-
sayo . . . pe . . . Pakatūpanissayo:-- āsavā āsavānaṃ
upanissayapaccayena paccayo . . . (tīṇi).
     4. No-āsavo dhammo no-āsavassa . . .
     Ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanis-
sayo; . . . pe . . . Pakatūpanissayo:-- saddhaṃ upanis-
sāya dānaṃ deti . . . pe . . . samāpattiṃ uppādeti; mānaṃ
jappeti diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti; sīlaṃ . . . pe . . . senāsanaṃ
upanissāya dānaṃ deti . . . pe . . . saṃghaṃ bhindati.
Saddhā . . . pe . . . senāsanaṃ saddhāya . . . pe . . .
phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
     5. No-āsavo dhammo āsavassa . . .
     Ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanis-
sayo . . . pe . . . Pakatūpanissayo:-- saddhaṃ upanissāya
mānaṃ jappeti diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti; sīlaṃ . . . pe . . . saṃghaṃ
bhindati; saddhā . . . pe . . . senāsanaṃ rāgassa . . . pe
. . . patthanāya4 upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
     6. No-āsavo . . . āsavassa ca no-āsavassa ca . . .
     Ārammaṇāpanissayo, . . . pe5 . . . sīlaṃ . . . pe . . .
senāsanaṃ upanissāya pānaṃ hanati6 . . . pe . . . saṃghaṃ
bhindati; saddhā . . . pe . . . senāsanaṃ rāgassa . . .
pe . . . patthanāya4 upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
     7. Āsavo ca no-āsavo ca dhammā āsavassa . . .
     Ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanis-
sayo . . . (tīṇi).
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 As under 3.
2 S. pañca.
3 B. vibhajitabbaṃ.
4 R. rāgassa patthanāya.
5 As under 5.
6 B. mānajappeti (sic).


[page 163]
                          Kammavāro.                163
     4. No-āsavo dhammo no-āsavassa dhammassa purejāta-
paccayena paccayo.
     Ārammaṇapurejātaṃ, vatthupurejātaṃ. Ārammaṇapure-
jātaṃ:-- cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ . . . (evaṃ vitthāre-
tabbaṃ) . . . phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa purejāta-
paccayena paccayo. Vatthupurejātaṃ:-- cakkhāyatanaṃ cak-
khuviññāṇassa . . . kāyāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa, vatthu
no-āsavānaṃ khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
     5. No-āsavo dhammo āsavassa dhammassa purejātapac-
cayena paccayo.
     Ārammaṇapurejātaṃ, vatthupurejātaṃ. Ārammaṇapure-
jātaṃ:-- cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ assādeti abhinandati,
taṃ ārabbha āsavā uppajjanti. Vatthupurejātaṃ:-- vatthu
āsavānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
     6. No-āsavo dhammo āsavassa ca . . . paccayo.1
     Ārammaṇapurejātaṃ . . .2 taṃ ārabbha āsavā ca sampa-
yuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti. Vatthupurejātaṃ:--
vatthu āsavānañ ca sampayuttakānañ ca khandhānaṃ
purejātapaccayena paccayo.
     2. Āsavo dhammo no-āsavassa dhammassa pacchājāta-
paccayena paccayo.
     Pacchājātā āsavā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchā-
jātapaccayena paccayo.
     4. No-āsavo dhammo no-āsavassa . . .
     Pacchājātā no-āsavā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa
pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
     8. Āsavo ca no-āsavo ca dhammā no-āsavassa . . .
     Pacchājātā āsavā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā pure-
jātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
     1. Āsavo dhammo āsavassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena
paccayo . . . (nava).
     4. No-āsavo dhammo no-āsavassa dhammassa kamma-
paccayena paccayo.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. omits to p. 165, § 1.
2 As under 5.


[page 164]
164                     Āsavadukaṃ.
     Sahajātā, nānākhaṇikā. Sahajātā no-āsavā cetanā sam-
payuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ
kammapaccayena paccayo. Nānākhaṇikā:-- no-āsavā cetanā
vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapacca-
yena paccayo.
     5. No-āsavo dhammo āsavassa . . .
     No-āsavā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ āsavānaṃ kammapac-
cayena paccayo.
     6. No-āsavo dhammo āsavassa ca . . .
     No-āsavā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ āsavānañ
ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena pac-
cayo.
     4. No-āsavo dhammo no-āsavassa dhammassa vipāka-
paccayena paccayo . . . (ekaṃ) . . . āhārapaccayena pac-
cayo.
     No-āsavā āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasam-
uṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo. Paṭi-
sandhikkhaṇe kabaḷiṃkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa āhāra-
paccayena paccayo.
     5. No-āsavo dhammo . . . āsavassa . . .
     No āsavā āharā sampayuttakānaṃ āsavānaṃ āhārapacca
yena paccayo.
     6. No-āsavo dhammo āsavassa ca no-āsavassa ca dham-
massa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
     No-āsavā āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ āsavānañ
ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena pac-
cayo.
     4. no-āsavo dhammo no-āsavassa dhammassa indriya-
paccayena paccayo.
     No-āsavā indriyā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasam-
uṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo. Paṭi-
sandhikkhaṇe cakkhundriyaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa . . . kāy-
indriyaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa indriyapaccayena paccayo. Rūpa-
jīvitindriyaṃ kaṭattā rūpānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo . . .
(tīṇi), jhāna-, . . . (tīṇi), magga-, . . . (nava), sampa-
yuttapaccayena paccayo . . . (nava).
--------------------------------------------------------------------------

[page 165]
                          Atthivāro.                          165
     2. Āsavo dhammo no-āsavassa dhammassa vippayutta-
paccayena paccayo.
     Sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. Sahajātā āsavā cittasamuṭṭhā-
nānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā
āsavā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena pac-
cayo.
     4. No-āsavo dhammo no-āsavassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ.1 Sahajātā no-āsavā
khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena
paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe khandhā vatthussa, vatthu
khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Purejātaṃ cak-
khāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa . . . pe . . . kāyāyatanaṃ
kāyaviññāṇassa, vatthu no-āsavānaṃ khandhānaṃ vippa-
yuttapaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā no-āsavā khandhā
purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
     5. No-āsavo dhammo āsavassa . . .
     Purejātaṃ vatthu āsavānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena pac-
cayo.
     6. No-āsavo dhammo āsavassa ca . . .
     Purejātaṃ vatthu āsavānaṃ sampayuttakānañ ca khan-
dhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
     8. Āsavo ca . . . dhammā no-āsavassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. Sahajātā āsavā ca sampa-
yuttakā ca khandhā2 cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippa-
yuttapaccayena paccayo.
     Pacchājātā āsavā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā pure-
jātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
     1. Āsavo dhammo āsavassa dhammassa atthipaccayena
paccayo.
     Kāmāsavo diṭṭhāsavassa avijjāsavassa atthipaccayena
paccayo.. (cakkaṃ3).
     2. Āsavo dhammo no-āsavassa dhammassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. Sahajātā āsavā sampayutta-
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 K. and S. omit.
2 S. sampayuttakānaṃ khandhanaṃ.
3 Cf. p. 153, § 1.


[page 166]
166                     Āsavadukaṃ.
kānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ atthi-
paccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā āsavā purejātassa imassa
kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
     3. Āsavo dhammo āsavassa ca . . .
     Kāmāsavo diṭṭhāsavassa avijjāsavassa sampayuttakānañ
ca khandhānaṃ . . .1 rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
     4. No-āsavo dhammo no-āsavassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ āhāraṃ indriyaṃ.
Sahajāto no-āsavo eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ . . .
(yāva asaññasattā). Purejātaṃ:-- cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . .
vatthuṃ aniccato . . . pe . . . domanassaṃ uppajjati;
dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā
saddaṃ suṇāti; rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa . . .
phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa, cakkhāyatanaṃ cak-
khuviññāṇassa . . . kāyāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa, vatthu
no-āsavānaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. Pacchā-
jātā no-āsavā2 khandhā purejātassa . . .1 Kabaḷiṃkāro
āhāro imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. Rūpajīvit-
indriyaṃ kaṭattā rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
     5. No āsavo dhammo āsavassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. Sahajātā no-āsavā khandhā āsa-
vānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. Purejātaṃ:-- cakkhuṃ . . .
pe . . . vatthuṃ assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha āsavā
uppajjanti.3
     6. No-āsavo dhammo āsavassa ca no-āsavassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ.4 Sahajāto no-āsavo eko khandho
tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ āsavānañ ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca
rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo . . . (cakkaṃ).
     7. Āsavo ca no-āsavo ca . . . āsavassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. Sahajāto kāmāsavo ca no-āsavā5
sampayuttakā ca khandhā diṭṭhāsavassa avijjāsavassa atthi-
paccayena paccayo . . . (cakkaṃ) . . . Kāmāsavo ca vatthu
ca diṭṭhāsavassa avijjāsavassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
     8. Āsavo ca no-āsavo ca . . . no-āsavassa . . .
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 As under 2.
2 K. omits.
3 S. inserts vatthuṃ āsavānaṃ atthip.
4 K. omits.
5 B. sahajāto sahāsavo sampay-, etc. R. omits no-āsavā.


[page 167]
                               Mātikā.                167
     Sahajātaṃ,1 pacchājātaṃ āhāraṃ indriyaṃ. Sahajāto
no-āsavo eko khandho ca āsavo ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ
cittasamuṭṭhānañ2 ca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
Āsavā ca vatthu ca no-āsavānaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena
paccayo.3 Sahajātā āsavā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasam-
uṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā
āsavā ca kabaḷiṃkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipacca-
yena paccayo. Pacchājātā āsavā ca rūpajīvitindriyaṃ ca
kaṭattā rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.,
     9. Āsavo ca no-āsavo ca . . . āsavassa ca . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. Sahajāto no-āsavo eko khandho
ca kāmāsavo ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ diṭṭhāsavassa avij-
jāsavassa cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena
paccayo . . . pe . . . dve . . . pe . . . (cakkaṃ bandhi-
tabbaṃ). Sahajāto kāmāsavo ca vatthu ca diṭṭhāsavassa
avijjāsavassa sampayuttakānañ ca khandhānaṃ atthipacca-
yena paccayo . . . (cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ).
          Hetuyā satta,                     kamme tīṇi,
          ārammaṇe nava,                    vipāke ekaṃ,
          adhipatiyā nava,                āhāre tīṇi . . .
          anantare nava,                     (saṃkhittaṃ) . . .,
          samanantare nava,4                magge nava,
          sahajāte nava,                    sampayutte nava,
          aññamaññe nava,                vippayutte pañca,
          nissaye nava,                     atthiyā nava,4
          upanissaye nava,                natthiyā nava,
          purejāte tīṇi,                    vigate nava,
          pacchājāte tīṇi,5                avigate nava.
          āsevane nava,
                               Anulomaṃ.
     1. Āsavo dhammo . . . ārammaṇa-, . . . sahajāta-,
. . . upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
     2. Āsavo dhammo . . . ārammaṇa-, . . . sahajāta-, . . .
upanissaya-, . . . pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.

2 K. āsavassa.
3 R. omits this sentence.
4 K. omits clause.
5 S. omits clause.


[page 168]
168                     Āsavadukaṃ.
     3. Āsavo dhammo . . . ārammaṇa-, . . . sahajāta-, . . .
upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
     4. No-āsavo dhammo . . . ārammaṇa-, . . . sahajāta-,
. . . upanissaya-, . . . purejāta-, . . . pacchājāta-, . . .
kamma-, . . . āhāra-, . . . indriyapaccayena paccayo.
     5. No-āsavo . . . ārammaṇa-, . . . sahajāta-, . . .
upanissaya-, . . . purejātapaccayena paccayo.
     6. No-āsavo . . . ārammaṇa-, . . . sahajāta-, . . .
upanissaya-, . . . purejātapaccayena paccayo.2
     7. Āsavo ca no-āsavo ca . . . ārammaṇa-, . . . saha-
jāta-, . . . upanissayapaccayena paccayo.3
     8. Āsavo ca no-āsavo ca . . . ārammaṇa-, . . . saha-
jāta-, . . . upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
     9. Āsavo ca no-āsavo ca . . . ārammaṇa-, . . . saha-
jāta-, . . . upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
          Nahetuyā nava,                    sabbattha nava;
          nārammaṇe nava,                novigate nava.
          nādhipatiyā nava,
                              Paccaniyaṃ.
          Hetupaccayā,                     nārammaṇe sabbattha satta;4
           satta,                         namagge satta,
          nādhipatiyā satta,                nasampayutte tīṇi,5
          nānantare satta,                navippayutte satta,
          nasamanantare satta,           nonatthiyā satta,
          na-aññamaññe tīṇi,                novigate satta.
          na-upanissaye satta,
                          Anulomapaccaniyaṃ.
     Nahetupaccayā, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava . . .
(anulomapadā paripuṇṇā) . . . avigate nava.
                          Paccaniyānulomaṃ.
                     ĀSAVA-DUKAṂ niṭṭhitaṃ.

2 B. omits last clause.
3 B. inserts pacchājāta-. K. inserts purejāta-.
4 K. and S. omit clause.
5 K. and B. satta.


[page 169]
                               169
                               [XV.
                          SĀSAVA-DUKAṂ.]
     1. Sāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo dhammo uppajjati
hetupaccayā.
     Sāsavaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasam-
uṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ . . . pe . . . dve . . . pe . . . Paṭi-
sandhikkhaṇe khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca
khandhā; ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ . . . pe . . . mahābhūte
paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kāṭattā rūpaṃ upādā rūpaṃ.
     4. Anāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anāsavo dhammo uppaj-
jati hetupaccayā.
     Anāsavaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā, . . . pe
. . . dve . . . pe . . .
     5. Anāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo . . .
     Anāsave khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
     6. Anāsavaṃ . . . sāsavo ca anāsavo ca dhammā . . .
     Anāsavaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā citta-
samuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . . pe . . .
     7. Sāsavañ ca anāsavañ ca dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo1
dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Anāsave khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasam-
uṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ (yathā cūlantaraduke2 lokiya-dukaṃ,3 evaṃ
kātabbaṃ; ninnānākaraṇaṃ).
                     SĀSAVA-DUKAṂ niṭṭhitaṃ.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. anāsavo.
2 S. cūḷakaduke.
3 B. inserts ekaṃ.


[page 170]
                               170
                               [XVI.
                     ĀSAVASAMPAYUTTA-DUKAṂ.
                              Anulomaṃ.]
     1. Āsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavasampayutto
dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     (a) Āsavasampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo
khandhā; dve . . . pe . . .
     2. Āsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto
dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     (b) Āsavasampayutte khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ
rūpaṃ. Domanassasahagate [vicikicchāsahagate uddhacca-
sahagate1] khandhe paṭicca moho cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca
rūpaṃ.
     3. Āsavasampayuttaṃ . . . āsavasampayutto ca āsava-
vippayutto ca dhammā . . .
     (c) Āsavasampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo
khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ, . . . pe . . . dve . . .
Domanassasahagataṃ [vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasaha-
gataṃ1] ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā moho citta-
samuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ . . . dve . . .
     4. Āsavavippayuttaṃ . . . āsavavippayutto . . .
     (d) Āsavavippayuttaṃ ekaṃ . . . pe2 . . . dve . . .
Domanassahagataṃ vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ3
mohaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe
khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā; ekaṃ
mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā, tayo mahābhūte
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 R., B. and S. omit last two compounds.
2 As in (c).
3 So also R., B. and S.


[page 171]
                          Paṭiccavāro.                171
paṭicca ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ; dve . . . mahābhūte paṭicca
cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattā rūpaṃ upādā rūpaṃ.
     5. Āsavavippayuttaṃ . . . āsavasampayutto . . .
     (e) Domanassasahagataṃ vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhacca-
sahagataṃ1 mohaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā.
     6. Āsavavippayuttaṃ . . . āsavasampayutto ca āsava-
vippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
     (f) Domanassasahagataṃ vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhacca-
sahagataṃ mohaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasam-
uṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ.
     7. Āsavasampayuttañ ca āsavavippayuttañ ca dhammaṃ
paṭicca āsavasampayutto . . .
     (g) Domanassasahagataṃ vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhacca-
sahagataṃ2 ekaṃ khandhañ ca mohañ ca paṭicca tayo
khandhā . . . pe . . . dve . . .
     8. Āsavasampayuttañ ca āsavavippayuttañ ca dhammaṃ
paṭicca āsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     (h) Āsavasampayutte khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca
cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Domanassasahagate vicikicchā-
sahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca mohañ ca paṭicca
cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
     9. Āsavasampayuttañ ca āsavavippayuttañ ca dhammaṃ
paṭicca āsavasampayutto ca āsavavippayutto ca dhammā
uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
     (i) Domanassasahagataṃ . . . pe . . .3
     1. Āsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavasampayutto
dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
     Āsavasampayuttaṃ ekaṃ . . . pe . . .4
     2. Āsavasampayuttaṃ . . . āsavavippayutto . . .
     Domanassasahagate vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate
khandhe paṭicca moho.
     3. Āsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavasampayutto
ca āsavavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapac-
cayā.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. B. omits this compound only.
2 So also B.
3 As in (g).
4 As in (a).


[page 172]
172                Āsavasampayuttadukaṃ.
     Domanassasahagataṃ . . . pe1 . . .
     4. Āsavavippayuttaṃ . . . āsavavippayutto . . .
     Āsavavippayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā,
. . . dve . . . pe . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe khandhe paṭicca
vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā.
     5. Āsavavippayuttaṃ . . . āsavasampayutto . . .
     Domanassasahagataṃ . . . pe . . .2
     7. Āsavasampayuttañ ca āsavavippayuttañ ca dhammaṃ
paṭicca āsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapac-
cayā.
     Domanassasahagataṃ . . . pe . . .3
     1. Āsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavasampayutto
dhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayā . . . (tīṇi).
     4. Āsavavippayuttaṃ . . . āsavavippayutto . . .
     Āsavavippayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā
cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . . Domanassasaha-
gataṃ vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ4 mohaṃ
paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.5 Ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ . . .
pe . . .; mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ
upādā rūpaṃ.
     5. Āsavavippayuttaṃ . . . āsavasampayutto . . .
     Domanassasahagataṃ . . . pe . . .3
     6. Āsavavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavasampayutto
ca āsavavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti adhipatipaccayā.
     Domanassasahagataṃ . . . pe . . .6
     7. Āsavasampayuttañ ca āsavavippayuttañ ca dham-
maṃ . . .
     Domanassasahagataṃ . . .3
     8. Āsavasampayuttañ ca āsavavippayuttañ ca . . .
     Āsavasampayutte khandhe ca . . . pe . . .7
     9. Āsavasampayuttañ ca asavavippayuttañ ca dhammaṃ
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 As in (c).
2 As in (e).
3 As in (g).
4 R. and B. omit last two compounds.
5 B. has instead sampayuttakā khandhā.
6 As in 4 (one sentence).
7 As in (h).


[page 173]
                          Paṭiccavāro.                173
paṭicca āsavasampayutto ca āsavavippayutto ca dhammā
uppajjanti adhipatipaccayā.
     Domanassasahagataṃ [vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhacca-
sahagataṃ] ekaṃ khandhañ ca mohañ ca paṭicca tayo . . .1
dve . . . (evaṃ sabbe paccayā vittharetabbā, saṃkhittaṃ).
          Hetuyā nava,                     vipāke ekaṃ,
          ārammaṇe cha,                     āhāre nava,
          adhipatiyā nava,                indriye nava,
          anantare cha,                     jhāne nava,
          samanantare cha,                magge nava,
          sahagāte nava,                    sampayutte cha,
          aññamaññe cha,                    vippayutte nava,
          nissaye nava,                     atthiyā nava,
          upanissaye cha,                natthiyā cha,
          purejāte cha,                     vigate cha,2
          āsevane cha,2                     avigate nava.
          kamme nava,
                         Anulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.3
     2. Āsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto
dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā,
     Vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca
vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
     4. Āsavavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto
dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
     Ahetukaṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo
khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . . (ahetuka-
paṭisandhi yāva asaññasattā).
     2. Āsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto
dhammo uppajjati nārammaṇapaccayā.
     Āsavasampayutte khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ
rūpaṃ.
     4. Āsavavippayuttaṃ . . . nārammaṇapaccayā.
     Āsavavippayutte khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 As in 4. R., B. and S. omit vicikicchā- uddhacca-.
2 B. omits clause.
3 B. and S. omit this title.

174                Asavasampayuttadukaṃ.
rūpaṃ. Domanassasahagataṃ vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhac-
casahagataṃ1 mohaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
Paṭisandhikkhaṇe khandhe paṭicca vatthu, . . . pe . . .
ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ . . . (yāva asaññasattā).
     8. Āsavasampayuttañ ca āsavavippayuttañ ca dhammaṃ
paṭicca āsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati nārammaṇa-
paccayā.
     Āsavasampayutte khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca
cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Domanassasahagate vicikicchā-
sahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca mohañ ca paṭicca
cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
     1. Āsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavasampa-
yutto dhammo uppajjati nādhipatipaccayā . . . (saṃkhittaṃ)
. . . napurejātapaccayā.
     Arūpe āsavasampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo
khandhā; dve . . .
     2. Āsavasampayuttaṃ . . . āsavavippayutto . . .
     Arūpe vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe
paṭicca moho. Āsavasampayutte khandhe paṭicca citta-
samuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
     3. Āsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavasampayutto
ca āsavavippayutto ca . . .

khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā moho ca; dve . . .
     4. Āsavavippayuttaṃ . . . napurejātapaccayā.
     Arūpe āsavavippayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo
khandhā; dve . . . Āsavavippayutte khandhe paṭicca
cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Domanassasahagataṃ vicikicchā-
sahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ mohaṃ paṭicca cittasam-
uṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. (Paṭisandhi yāva asaññasattā.)

     Arūpe vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ mohaṃ
paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā.

paṭicca āsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati napurejātapac-
cayā.

     Arūpe vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ ekaṃ khan-
dhañ ca mohañ ca paṭicca tayo khandhā; dve . . .

gate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca mohañ ca paṭicca citta-

dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā.

dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā.

kammapaccayā.

gataṃ mohaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā cetanā.

cayā.

indriyapaccayā . . . najhānapaccayā . . . namaggapac-
cayā . . . nasampayuttapaccayā . . . navippayuttapaccayā
. . . (cha1) . . . nonatthiyāpaccayā . . . novigatapaccayā . . .

          nārammaṇe tīṇi,                napacchājāte nava,
          nādhipatiyā nava,                nāsevane nava,
          nānantare tīṇi,                nakamme cattāri,

          na-upanissaye tīṇi,               nāhāre ekaṃ,

176                Āsavasampayuttadukaṃ.
          na-indriye ekaṃ,                navippayutte cha,
          najhāne ekaṃ,1                    nonatthiyā tīṇi,
          namagge ekaṃ,                     novigate tīṇi.
          nasampayutte tīṇi,
                         Paccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
          Hetupaccayā, nārammaṇe           nasampayutte tīṇi,
           tīṇi,                          navippayutte cattāri,
          napurejāte cha,                nonatthiyā tīṇi,
          navipāke nava,                    novigate tīṇi.
                          Anulomapaccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
          Nahetupaccayā, ārammaṇe           āhāre dve,
           dve,                          magge ekaṃ,
          anantare dve,                     sampayutte dve,
          samanantare dve,2                vippayutte dve,
          kamme dve,3                     vigate dve,4
          vipāke ekaṃ,                     avigate dve.
                     Paccaniyānulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
     (Sahajātavāro paṭiccavārasadiso.)
     1. Āsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā āsavasampayutto
dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā . . . (tīṇi, paṭiccavārasa-
disā).
     4. Āsavavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā . . .
     Āsavavippayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā
cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . .5 Domanassasaha-
gataṃ vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ mohaṃ pac-
cayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe khandhe
paccayā vatthu, vatthuṃ paccayā khandhā; ekaṃ mahā-
bhūtaṃ paccayā tayo mahābhūtā . . . pe . . . mahābhūte
paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattā rūpaṃ upādā rūpaṃ.

2 K., B. and S. omit clause.

                          Paccayavāro.                177
Vatthuṃ paccayā1 āsavavippayuttā khandhā; vatthuṃ pac-
cayā domanassasahagato vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasaha-
gato moho.
     5. Āsavavippayuttaṃ . . . paccayā āsavasampayutto . . .
     Vatthuṃ paccayā āsavasampayuttā khandhā.2 Doman-
assasahagataṃ vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ
mohaṃ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā.
     6. Āsavavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā āsavasampayutto
ca āsavavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
     Vatthuṃ paccayā āsavasampayuttā khandhā. Mahābhūte
paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Domanassasahagataṃ
. . . pe3 . . . khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Vatthuṃ
paccayā domanassasahagatā [vicikicchāsahagatā uddhacca-
sahagatā4] khandhā ca moho ca.

paccayā āsavasampayutto . . .

tayo khandhā; dve . . . Domanassasahagataṃ vicikicchā-
sahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca mohañ ca
paccayā tayo khandhā; dve . . .

paccayā āsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Domanassasahagate vicikicchā-
sahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca mohañ ca paccayā
cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Domanassasahagate khandhe ca
vatthuñ ca paccayā domanassasahagato moho.

uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

assasahagataṃ vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ ekaṃ

dve . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paccayā khandhā, cak-
khāyatanaṃ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, kāyāyatanaṃ paccayā

sahagataṃ vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ mohaṃ
paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā.

     Vatthuṃ paccayā domanassasahagatā vicikicchāsahagatā
uddhaccasahagatā khandhā ca moho ca.

yutto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.

tayo khandhā; dve . . . Domanassasahagataṃ2 vicikicchā-

paccayā tayo khandhā; dve . . .

     paccayā domanassasahagato, etc.

[page 179]
                     Paccayavāro; Paccaniyaṃ.          179
     9. Asavasampayuttañ ca āsavavippayuttañ ca dhammaṃ
paccayā āsavasampayutto ca āsavavippayutto ca dhammā
uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā.
     Domanassasahagataṃ vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasaha-
gataṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca vatthuñ ca1 paccayā tayo khandhā
moho ca; dve, . . .
     . . . adhipatipaccayā . . . anantarapaccayā . . .
avigatapaccayā . . .
          Hetuyā nava,                     kamme nava,
          ārammaṇe nava,                    vipāke ekaṃ,
          sabbattha nava;                avigate nava.
                          Anulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
                          [Paccaniyaṃ.]
     1. Āsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā āsavavippayutto
dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
     Vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paccayā
vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
     4. Āsavavippayuttaṃ . . . nahetupaccayā.
     Ahetukaṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo
khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ; dve . . . (ahetukapaṭi-
sandhi yāva asaññasattā). Cakkhāyatanaṃ paccayā cakkhu-
viññāṇaṃ . . . kāyāyatanaṃ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṃ,2 vatthuṃ
paccayā ahetukā āsavavippayuttā khandhā, vatthuṃ paccayā
vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
     8. Āsavasampayuttañ ca āsavavippayuttañ ca dhammaṃ
paccayā āsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupac-
cayā.
     Vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñ
ca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho . . .
(saṃkhittaṃ).
          Nahetuyā tīṇi,                    nānantare tīṇi,
          narammaṇe tīṇi,                nasamanantare tīṇi,
          nādhipatiyā nava,                na-annamaññe tīṇi,3
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. omits vatthuñ ca.
2 S. inserts ahetukaṃ.
3 K. and S. omit clause.


[page 180]
180                Āsavasampayuttadukaṃ.
          na-upanissaye tīṇi,               na-indriye ekaṃ,
          napurejāte satta,                najhāne ekaṃ,1
          napacchājāte nava,                na magge ekaṃ,
          nāsevane nava,                    nasampayutte tīṇi,
          nakamme cattāri,                navippayutte cha,
          navipāke nava,                    nonatthiyā tīṇi,
          nāhāre ekaṃ,                     novigate tīṇi.
     (Evaṃ itare pi dve gaṇanā kātabbā,2 nissayavāro pi
paccayavāro sadiso.)
                         Paccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
     1. Asavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho āsavasampa-
yutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā . . .
          Hetuyā cha,                     sabbattha cha;
          ārammaṇe cha,                     vipāke ekaṃ,
          adhipatiyā cha,                avigate cha.
                          Anulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
     2. Āsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho āsavavippa-
yutto3 dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
     Vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe saṃsaṭṭho
vicikicchā-uddhacca-sahagato moho.
     4. Āsavavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho . . .
          Nahetuyā dve,                     navipāke cha,
          nādhipatiyā cattāri,4           najhāne ekaṃ,
          napurejāte cha,                namagge ekaṃ,
          napacchājāte cha,                navippayutte cha,
          nāsevane cha,                     [nonatthiyā tīṇi,
          nakamme cattāri,                novigate tīṇi.5]
     (Evaṃ itare pi dve gaṇanā kātabbā6 sampayuttavāram pi
saṃsaṭṭhavārasadisaṃ.)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 K. omits
2 S. gaṇanātabbā.
3 S. -sampayutto.
4 R. and B. cha.
5 R., B. and S. omit last two clauses.
6 S. gaṇetabbā.


[page 181]
                              Hetuvāro.                181
     1. Asavasampayutto dhammo āsavasampayuttassa dham-
massa hetupaccayena paccayo.
     Āsavasampayuttā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ
hetupaccayena paccayo.
     2. Āsavasampayutto1 . . . āsavavippayuttassa . . .
     Āsavasampayuttā hetū domanassa-, vicikicchā-, uddhacca-
sahagatassa mohassa cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ hetu-
paccayena paccayo.2
     3. Āsavasampayutto3 . . . āsavasampayuttassa ca . . .
     Āsavasampayuttā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ
mohassa4 . . .
     4. Āsavavippayutto dhammo . . .
     Āsavavippayuttā hetū . . . pe5 . . . rūpānaṃ hetu-
paccayena paccayo. Domanassa-, vicikicchā-, uddhacca-
sahagato moho cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena
paccayo . . . (paṭisandhi).
     5. Āsavavippayutto . . . āsavasampayuttassa . . .
     Domanassa-, vicikicchā-, uddhacca-sahagato moho sam-
payuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
     6. Āsavavippayutto . . . āsavasampayuttassa ca . . .
     Domanassasahagato . . . pe6 . . . khandhānaṃ citta-
samuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
     7. Āsavasampayutto . . . dhammā āsavasampayuttassa . . .
     Doso ca moho ca sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetu-
paccayena paccayo.
     8. Āsavasampayutto ca . . . āsavavippayuttassa . . .
     Doso ca moho ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupac-
cayena paccayo.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. omits this sentence.
2 R. omits from domanassa- to mohassa, but adds doso mohassa
     cittasamuṭṭhā || hetu ||.
3 S. omits this and next sentence.
4 As under 2. R. for mohassa reads cittasamu || hetu || adding
     doso sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa cittasamu || hetu ||.
5 As under 3. R. omits mohassa only.
6 As under 5.


[page 182]
182                Āsavasampayuttadukaṃ.
     9. Āsavasampayutto ca . . . dhammā āsavasampayut-
tassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
     Doso ca . . .1 khandhānaṃ citta- . . .2
     1. Āsavasampayutto dhammo āsavasampayuttassa dham-
massa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
     Āsavasampayutte khandhe ārabbha āsavasampayuttā
khandhā uppajjanti.
     2. Āsavasampayutto . . . āsavavippayuttassa . . .
     Āsavasampayutte khandhe ārabbha āsavavippayuttā
khandhā ca moho ca uppajjanti.
     3. Āsavasampayutto . . . āsavasampayuttassa ca . . .
     Āsavasampayutte khandhe ārabbha domanassa-vici-
kicchā-uddhacca-sahagatā khandhā ca moho ca uppajjanti.
     4. Āsavavippayutto . . . āsavavippayuttassa . . .
     Dānaṃ sīlaṃ uposathakammaṃ taṃ paccavekkhati, pubbe
suciṇṇāni . . . jhānā . . .3 Ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā mag-
gaṃ, phalaṃ, nibbānaṃ . . . nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa vodānassa
maggassa phalassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena pac-
cayo. Ariyā āsavavippayutte pahīnakilese paccavekkhanti,
vikkhāmbhitakilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe . . . pe . . .
cakkhuṃ, vatthuṃ āsavavippayutte khandhe aniccato duk-
khato anattato vipassanti (idha assādanā natthi4). Dibbena
cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti,
cetopariyañāṇena āsavavippayuttacittasamaṃgissa cittaṃ
jānāti; ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanassa, ākiñcaññā-
yatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa, rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhu-
viññāṇassa, . . . phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa, āsava-
vippayuttā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa cetopariyañāṇassa
pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa yathākammūpagañāṇassa anā-
gataṃsañāṇassa āvajjanāya mohassa ārammaṇapaccayena
paccayo.
     5. Āsavavippayutto . . . āsavasampayuttassa . . .
     Dānaṃ sīlaṃ uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ assādeti abhi-
nandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati diṭṭhi uppajjati vici-
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 As under 7.
2 As under 8.
3 Cf. p. 9, § 4.
4 Cf. § 5. B. has ariyānanatthi.


[page 183]
                          Adhipativāro.                183
kicchā, uddhaccaṃ, domanassaṃ uppajjati; pubbe suciṇṇāni
. . . jhānā1 vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ . . . cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . .
vatthuṃ āsavavippayutte khandhe assādeti abhinandati; taṃ
ārabbha rāgo, diṭṭhi2 . . . domanassaṃ uppajjati.
     6. Āsavavippayutto . . . āsavasampayuttassa ca . . .
     Cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ āsavavippayutte khandhe
ārabbha domanassa-, vicikicchā-, uddhacca-sahagatā
khandhā ca moho ca uppajjanti.
     7. Āsavasampayutto ca . . . āsavasampayuttassa . . .
     Domanassa-, vicikicchā-, uddhacca-sahagate khandhe ca
mohañ ca ārabbha āsavasampayuttā khandhā uppajjanti.
     8. Āsavasampayutto ca . . . dhammā āsavavippa-
yuttassa . . .
     Domanassa-, vicikicchā-, uddhacca-sahagate khandhe ca
mohañ ca ārabbha āsavavippayuttā khandhā ca moho ca
uppajjanti.
     9. Āsavasampayutto ca āsavavippayutto ca dhammā
āsavasampayuttassa ca āsavavippayuttassa ca . . .
     Domanassa-, vicikicchā-, uddhacca-sahagate khandhe ca
mohañ ca ārabbha domanassa-vicikicchā-uddhacca-saha-
gatā khandhā ca moho ca uppajjanti.
     1. Āsavasampayutto dhammo āsavasampayuttassa dham-
massa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
     Ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. Ārammaṇādhipati:--
āsavasampayutte khandhe garuṃ katvā āsavasampayuttā
khandhā uppajjanti. Sahajātādhipati:-- āsavasampayuttā-
dhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ adhipatipaccayena
paccayo.
     2. Āsavasampayutto dhammo āsavavippayuttassa . . .
     Sahajātādhipati:-- āsavasampayuttādhipati cittasam-
uṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Doman-
assasahagatādhipati mohassa cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpā-
naṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. jhānāni, omitting next two words.
2 As just above.


[page 184]
184                Āsavasampayuttadukaṃ.
     3. Āsavasampayutto dhammo āsavasampayuttassa ca
āsavavippayuttassa ca . . .
     Sahajātā āsavasampayuttādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ
khandhānaṃ1 cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ adhipati-
paccayena paccayo. Domanassasahagatādhipati2 sampa-
yuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañ
ca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
     4. Āsavavippayutto dhammo āsavavippayuttassa . . .
     Ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. Ārammaṇādhipati:--
dānaṃ sīlaṃ uposathakammaṃ3 . . . taṃ garuṃ katvā pacca-
vekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni . . . jhānā4 vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ
. . . Ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ phalaṃ garuṃ katvā
paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ . . . Nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa
vodānassa maggassa phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
Sahajātādhipati:-- āsavavippayuttādhipati sampayutta-
kānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ adhi-
patipaccayena paccayo.
     5. Āsavavippayutto dhammo āsavasampayuttassa . . .
     Ārammaṇādhipati:-- dānaṃ sīlaṃ uposathakammaṃ5 katvā
taṃ garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo
uppajjati diṭṭhi uppajjati . . . pe . . . pubbe suciṇṇāni
. . . jhānā . . . cakkhuṃ . . . vatthuṃ āsavavippayutte6
khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti . . .7 pe . . . uppajjati.8
     1. Āsavasampayutto dhammo āsavasampayuttassa dham-
massa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
     Purimā purimā āsavasampayuttā khandhā pacchimānaṃ
pacchimānaṃ āsavasampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantara-
paccayena paccayo.
     2. Āsavasampayutto dhammo āsavavippayuttassa . . .
     Purimā purimā domanassa-vicikicchā-uddhacca-sahagatā

2 B. omits this sentence.
3 So, too, B. and S. for the first time, instead of uposathaṃ.

5 B. and S. uposathaṃ kammaṃ,
6 B. -sampayutte.
7 As above.

                          Anantaravāro.                185
khandhā pacchimassa pacchimassa domanassa-vicikicchā-
uddhaccasahagatassa mohassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
Āsavasampayuttā khandhā vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena
paccayo.
     3. Āsavasampayutto dhammo āsavasampayuttassa ca
āsavavippayuttassa ca . . .1
     Purimā purimā domanassa-vicikicchā-uddhacca-sahagatā
khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ domanassa-vicikicchā-
uddhacca-sahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca anantara-
paccayena paccayo.
     4. Āsavavippayutto dhammo āsavavippayuttassa . . .
     Purimo purimo domanassa-vicikicchā-uddhacca-saha-
gato moho pacchimassa pacchimassa domanassa-vicikicchā-
uddhacca-sahagatassa mohassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
Purimā purimā āsavavippayuttā khandhā pacchimānaṃ
pacchimānaṃ āsavavippayuttānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantara-
paccayena paccayo. Anulomaṃ gotrabhussa phalasamā-
pattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo,
     5. Āsavavippayutto dhammo āsavasampayuttassa . . .
     Purimo purimo domanassa-vicikicchā-uddhacca-sahagato
moho pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ domanassa-vicikicchā-
uddhacca-sahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena pac-
cayo. Āvajjanā āsavasampayuttānaṃ khandhānaṃ anan-
tarapaccayena paccayo.

āsavavippayuttassa ca . . .

uddhacca-sahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca anantara-
paccayena paccayo. Āvajjanā domanassa-vicikicchā-
uddhacca-sahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca anantara-
paccayena paccayo.

sayapaccayena paccayo.

saddhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ . . . pe . . .
paññaṃ, kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ, senāsanaṃ mohaṃ upanissāya

                          Purejātavāro.                187
samāpattiṃ uppādeti, saddhā . . . pe . . . paññā, kāyikaṃ

naṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo (pucchitabbaṃ mūlaṃ).

jātaṃ:-- cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ aniccato dukkhato
anattato vipassati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya

sampayuttānaṃ khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo.

moho ca uppajjanti. Vatthupurejātaṃ:-- vatthu doma-
nassa-vicikicchā-uddhacca-sahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ
mohassa ca purejātapaccayena paccayo.
     2. Āsavasampayutto dhammo āsavavippayuttassa dham-
massa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
     Pacchājātā āsavasampayuttā khandhā purejātassa imassa
kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
     4. Āsavavippayutto . . . āsavavippayuttassa . . .
     Pacchājātā āsavavippayuttā khandhā ca moho ca pure-
jātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
     8. Āsavasampayutto ca . . . āsavavippayuttassa . . .

khandhā ca moho ca purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājāta-
paccayena paccayo.

massa āsevanapaccayena paccayo . . . (nava. Āvajjanā pi
vuṭṭhānam pi natthi).
