1 B. sampay-.
2 As under 4.


[page 189]
                          Āhāravāro.                189
     1. Āsavasampayutto dhammo āsavasampayuttassa dham-
massa kammapaccayena paccayo.
     Āsavasampayuttā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ1 khandhānaṃ
kammapaccayena paccayo.
     2. Āsavasampayutto dhammo āsavavippayuttassa . . .
     Sahajātā, nānākhaṇikā. Sahajātā āsavasampayuttā cetanā
cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
Nānākhaṇikā āsavasampayuttā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhā-
naṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. Doman-
assa-, vicikicchā-, uddhacca-sahagatā cetanā mohassa citta-
samuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
     3. Āsavasampayutto . . . āsavasampayuttassa ca . . .
     Āsavasampayuttā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ
cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
Domanassa-, vicikicchā-, uddhacca-sahagatā cetanā sampa-
yuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañ
ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
     4.2 Āsavavippayutto . . . āsavavippayuttassa . . .
     Sahajātā, nānākhaṇikā. Sahajātā āsavavippayuttā3
cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañ
ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. Nānākhaṇikā āsa-
vavippayuttā4 cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca
rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
     4. Āsavavippayutto dhammo āsavavippayuttassa dham-
massa vipākapaccayena paccayo . . . (ekaṃ).
     1. Āsavasampayutto dhammo āsavasampayuttassa dham-
massa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
     Āsavasampayuttā āhārā5 sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ
āhārapaccayena paccayo.
     2. Āsavasampayutto . . . āsavavippayuttassa . . .
     Āsavasampayuttā āhārā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ
āhārapaccayena paccayo. Domanassa-vicikicchā-uddhac-
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. āsavasamp-.
2 K. has formula 6.
3 B. -sampayuttā.
4 S. and R. sampayuttā.
5 S. has āsava-.


[page 190]
190                Asavasampayuttadukaṃ.
ca-sahagatā āhārā mohassa cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ
āhārapaccayena paccayo.
     3. Āsavasampayutto . . . āsavasampayuttassa ca . . .
     Āsavasampayuttā āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ
cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo.1
Domanassa-, vicikicchā-, uddhacca-sahagatā āhārā sam-
payuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañ
ca rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo.
     4.2 Āsavavippayutto . . . āsavavippayuttassa . . .
     Āsavavippayuttā āhārā . . . pe . . .3 Paṭisandhikkhaṇe
kabaḷiṃkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
     1. Āsavasampayutto dhammo āsavasampayuttassa dham-
massa indriyapaccayena paccayo . . . (cattāri) . . . jhāna-
paccayena paccayo . . . (cattāri) . . . maggapaccayena
paccayo . . . (cattāri) . . . sampayuttapaccayena paccayo
. . . (cha).
     2. Āsavasampayutto dhammo āsavavippayuttassa dham-
massa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
     Sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. Sahajātā āsavasampayuttā
khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena
paccayo. Pacchājātā āsavasampayuttā khandhā purejātassa
imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
     4. Āsavavippayutto . . . āsavavippayuttassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ . . . (saṃkhittaṃ, vitthā-
retabbaṃ).
     5. Āsavavippayutto . . . āsavasampayuttassa . . .
     Purejātaṃ:-- vatthu āsavasampayuttānaṃ khandhānaṃ
vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
     6. Āsavavippayutto . . . āsavasampayuttassa ca . . .
     Purejātaṃ:-- vatthu domanassa-vicikicchā-uddhacca-
sahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca vippayuttapaccayena
paccayo.
     8. Āsavasampayutto ca . . . āsavavippayuttassa . . .
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. omits remainder of section.
2 S. has formula 9.
3 As under 3, one sentence.


[page 191]
                          Atthivāro.                191
     Sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. Sahajātā domanassa-vicikicchā-
uddhacca-sahagatā khandhā ca moho ca cittasamuṭṭhā-
nānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā
domanassa-vicikicchā-uddhacca-sahagatā khandhā ca moho
ca purejātassa1 imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena pac-
cayo.
     1. Āsavasampayutto dhammo āsavasampayuttassa dham-
massa atthipaccayena paccayo . . . (ekaṃ).
     2. Āsavasampayutto . . . āsavavippayuttassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. Sahajātā āsavasampayuttā
khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena pac-
cayo. Domanassa-vicikicchā-, uddhacca-sahagatā khandhā
mohassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena
paccayo. Pacchājātā āsavasampayuttā khandhā purejātassa
imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
     3. Āsavasampayutto . . . āsavasampayuttassa ca . . .
(sahajātasadisaṃ).
     4. Āsavavippayutto dhammo āsavavipayuttassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ āhāraṃ indriyaṃ . . . (saṃkhittaṃ,
vitthāretabbaṃ).
     5. Āsavavippayutto . . . āsavasampayuttassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. Sahajāto domanassa-, vicikicchā-,
uddhacca-sahagato moho sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ
atthipaccayena paccayo. Purejātaṃ cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . .
vatthuṃ assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati,
diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā, uddhaccaṃ, domanassaṃ uppaj-
jati. Vatthu āsavasampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ atthi-
paccayena paccayo.
     6. Āsavavippayutto . . . āsavasampayuttassa ca . . .
     Sahajātaṃ . . . pe2 . . . khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhā-
nānañ ca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. Purejātaṃ
cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ ārabbha domanassa-vici-
kicchā-uddhacca-sahagatā khandhā ca moho ca uppaj-
janti.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 R. and B. purejātaṃ vippa||.
2 As under 5.


[page 192]
192                Asavasampayuttadukaṃ.
     7. Āsavasampayutto ca . . . āsavasampayuttassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ.1 Sahajāto āsavasampayutto eko
khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipacca-
yena paccayo; dve2 . . . Domanassa-vicikicchā-uddhacca-
sahagato eko khandho ca moho ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ
atthipaccayena paccayo; dve . . .2
     8. Āsavasampayutto ca . . . āsavavippayuttassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ,3 pacchājātaṃ āhāraṃ indriyaṃ. Sahajātā
āsavasampayuttā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhā-
nānaṃ rūpānaṃ domanassa-vicikicchā-uddhacca-sahagatā
khandhā ca moho ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthi-
paccayena paccayo. Domanassa-4 vicikicchā-uddhacca-
sahagatā khandhā ca vatthu ca mohassa atthipaccayena
paccayo. Pacchājātā āsavasampayuttā khandhā ca kabaḷiṃ-
kāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
Pacchājātā āsavasampayuttā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañ
ca kaṭattā rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
     9. Āsavasampayutto ca . . . āsavasampayuttassa
ca . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. Sahajāto domanassa-vicikicchā-
uddhacca-sahagato eko khandho ca moho ca tiṇṇannaṃ
khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ atthipacca-
yena paccayo; dve . . . pe . . .
          Hetuyā nava,                     purejāte tīṇi,
          ārammaṇe nava,                    pacchājāte tīṇi,
          adhipatiyā pañca,                āsevane nava,
          anantare nava,                    kamme cattāri,6
          samanantare nava,5                vipāke ekaṃ,
          sahajāte nava,                    āhāre cattāri,
          aññamaññe cha,                    indriye cattāri,
          nissaye nava,                     jhāne cattāri,
          upanissaye nava,                magge cattāri,
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. adds pacchājātaṃ.
2 S. omits.
3 R. and S. insert purejātaṃ.
4 S. omits sentence.
5 B. omits clause.
6 B. inserts jhāne cattāri here. S. omits it quite.


[page 193]
                               Mātikā.                193
          sampayutte cha,                natthiyā nava,2
          vippayutte pañca,1                vigate nava,
          atthiyā nava,                     avigate nava.3
                          Anulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
                          [Paccaniyaṃ.]
     1. Āsavasampayutto dhammo . . . ārammaṇa-, . . .
sahajāta-, . . . upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
     2. Āsavasampayutto dhammo . . . ārammaṇa-, . . .
sahajāta-, . . . upanissaya-, . . . pacchājāta-, . . . kamma-
paccayena paccayo.
     3. Āsavasampayutto dhammo . . . ārammaṇa-, . . .
sahajāta-, . . . upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
     4. Āsavavippayutto dhammo . . . ārammaṇa-, . . .
sahajāta-, . . . upanissaya-, . . . purejāta-, . . . pacchā-
jāta-, . . . kamma-, . . . āhāra-,4 . . . indriyapaccayena
paccayo.
     5. Āsavavippayutto dhammo . . . ārammaṇa-, . . .
sahajāta-, . . . upanissaya-, . . . purejātapaccayena pac-
cayo.
     6. Āsavavippayutto dhammo . . . ārammaṇa-, . . .
sahajāta-, . . . upanissaya-, . . . purejātapaccayena pac-
cayo.5
     7. Āsavasampayutto ca āsavavippayutto ca dhammā
. . . ārammaṇa-, . . . sahajāta-, . . . upanissayapaccayena
paccayo.
     8. Āsavasampayutto ca āsavavippayutto ca dhammā . . .
ārammaṇa-, . . . sahajāta-, . . . upanissaya-, . . . pacchā-
jātapaccayena paccayo6.
     9. Āsavasampayutto ca āsavavippayutto ca dhammā
. . . ārammaṇa-, . . . sahajāta-, . . . upanissayapacca-
yena paccayo.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. cha.
2 K. and S. omit clause.
3 S. omits clause.
4 B. omits clause.
5 S. omits clause.
6 K. omits clause.


[page 194]
194                Āsavasampayuttadukaṃ.
          Nahetuyā nava,                sabbattha nava;
          nārammaṇe nava,                novigate1 nava.
          nādhipatiyā nava,
                         Paccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
          Hetupaccayā, nārammaṇe nava,     namagge nava,
          nādhipatiyā nava . . . (saṃkhittaṃ), nasampayutte tīṇi,
          nasamanantare nava,           navippayutte cha,2
          na-aññamaññe tīṇi,           nonatthiyā nava,
          na-upanissaye nava . . .      novigate nava.
           (saṃkhittaṃ),
                     Anulomapaccaniyaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
     Nahetupaccayā, ārammaṇe3 nava, adhipatiyā pañca . . .
(saṃkhittaṃ, anulomagaṇanā4), avigate nava.
                     Paccaniyānulomaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
                ĀSAVASAMPAYUTTA-DUKAṂ niṭṭhitaṃ.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 R. no-avigate. Cf. p. 56, n. 3.
2 R. nava.
3 B. and S. nārammaṇe.
4 S. -gananāya. R. omits the compound.


[page 195]
                               195
                               [XVII.
                     ĀSAVO-CEVA-SĀSAVA-DUKAṂ.]
     1. Āsavañ ceva sāsavañ ca dhammaṃ1 paṭicca āsavo ceva
sāsavo ca dhammo2 uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Kāmāsavaṃ paṭicca3 diṭṭhāsavo avijjāsavo . . . (cakkaṃ
bandhitabbaṃ). Bhavāsavaṃ paṭicca4 avijjāsavo . . .
(cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ). Diṭṭhāsavaṃ paṭicca avijjāsavo.
     2. Āsavañ ceva sāsavañ ca dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo ceva
no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Āsave5 paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañ
ca rūpaṃ.
     3. Āsavañ ceva sāsavañ ca dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ceva
sāsavo ca sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo ca dhammā6 uppajjanti
hetupaccayā.
     Kāmāsavaṃ paṭicca diṭṭhāsavo avijjāsavo sampayuttakā
khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ. Bhavāsavaṃ . . .
(cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ).
     4. Sāsavaṃ ceva no ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo
ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Sāsavaṃ ceva no ca āsavaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo
khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . . Paṭisan-
dhikkhaṇe khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca
khandhā; ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ . . . pe . . .
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. āsavacevasāsavadhammaṃ. Only R. has ca.
2 So also B.
3 B. kāmāsavapaṭ-.
4 So also B.
5 R. Āsavaṃ. Cf. p. 236, § 2.
6 R. dhammo (verb omitted).


[page 196]
196                Āsavo-ceva-sāsavadukaṃ.
     5. Sāsavaṃ ceva no ca āsavaṃ paṭicca āsavo ceva sāsavo
dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Sāsave1 ceva no ca āsave khandhe paṭicca āsavā.
     6. Sāsavañ ceva no ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo
ceva sāsavo ca sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo dhammā uppaj-
janti hetupaccayā.
     Sāsavañ ceva no ca āsavaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo
khandhā āsavā ca cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve2 . . .
     7. Āsavaṃ ceva sāsavañ ca sāsavañ ceva no ca āsavañ ca
dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ceva sāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati
hetupaccayā.
     Kāmāsavañ ca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca diṭṭhā-
savo avijjāsavo . . . (evaṃ cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ3).
     8. Āsavañ ceva sāsavañ ca sāsavañ ceva no ca āsavaṃ
dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppaj-
jati hetupaccayā.
     Sāsavañ ceva no ca āsavaṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca āsave ca
paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . .
     9. Āsavañ ceva sāsavañ ca sāsavañ ceva no ca āsavaṃ
dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ceva sāsavo ca sāsavo ceva no ca
āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti4 hetupaccayā.
     Sāsavañ ceva no ca āsavaṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca kāmāsavañ
ca paṭicca tayo khandhā diṭṭhāsavo avijjāsavo cittasam-
uṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . . (cakkaṃ saṃkhittaṃ. Evaṃ
paṭiccavāro pi sahajātavāro pi paccayavāro pi nissayavāro pi
saṃsaṭṭhavāro pi sampayuttavāro pi yathā Āsava-dukaṃ evaṃ
kātabbaṃ. Ninnānaṃ. Hetupaccaye5 pi6 ārammaṇapaccaye
pi7 lokuttaraṃ8 na kātabbaṃ. Sekhā9 gotrabhuṃ paccavek-
khanti vodānaṃ paccavekkhantīti kātabbaṃ. Adhipatipac-
caye10 pi sabbaṃ jānitvā11 kātabbaṃ).
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. omits this sentence.
2 B. adds khandhe paṭicca āsavā.
3 S. evañ ca sabbe cakkaṃ. R. and B. evaṃ cakkaṃ.
4 B. dhammo uppajjati.
5 R. Pañhāvāre hetu-.
6 K. and B. -yaṃ pi.
7 S. -paccayaṃ pi.
8 B. lokuttare.
9 B. sekkho.
10 K. -paccayaṃ. S. -paccayaṃ pi.
11 S. sabbe jānaṃ pi.


[page 197]
                          Anantaravāro.                197
     1. Āsavo ceva sāsavo ca dhammo āsavassa ceva sāsavassa
ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
     Purimā purimā āsavā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ āsavānaṃ
anantarapaccayena paccayo.
     2. Āsavo ceva sāsavo dhammo sāsavassa ceva no ca āsa-
vassa . . .
     Purimā . . .1 pacchimānaṃ sāsavānañ2 ceva no ca āsavānaṃ
khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. Āsavā vuṭṭhā-
nassa anantara- . . .
     3. Āsavo ceva sāsavo ca dhammo āsavassa ceva sāsavassa
ca sāsavassa ceva no ca āsavassa . . .
     Purimā . . .1 pacchimānaṃ āsavānaṃ sampayuttakānañ
ca khandhānaṃ anantara- . . .
     4. Sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo dhammo sāsavassa ceva no ca
āsavassa . . .
     Purimā purimā sāsavā ceva no ca āsavā khandhā
pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ sāsavānañ ceva no ca āsavānaṃ
khandhānaṃ anantara- . . . Anulomaṃ gotrabhussa, anulo-
maṃ vodānassa, āvajjanā sāsavānañ ceva no ca āsavānaṃ
khandhānaṃ anantara- . . .
     5. Sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo dhammo āsavassa ceva sāsa-
vassa ca . . .
     Purimā3 . . . pacchimānaṃ āsavānaṃ anantara- . . .
Āvajjanā āsavānaṃ anantara- . . .
     6. Sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo dhammo āsavassa ceva sāsa-
vassa ca sāsavassa ceva no ca āsavassa ca . . .
     Purimā purimā sāsavā ceva no ca āsavā khandhā pacchi-
mānaṃ pacchimānaṃ āsavānaṃ sampayuttakānañ ca khan-
dhānaṃ anantara- . . . Āvajjanā āsavānaṃ sampayutta-
kānañ ca khandhānaṃ anantara- . . .
     7. Āsavo ceva sāsavo ca sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo ca
dhammā āsavassa ceva sāsavassa . . .
     Purimā purimā āsavā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā
pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ āsavānaṃ anantara- . . .
     8. Āsavo ceva sāsavo ca sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo ca
dhammā sāsavassa ceva no ca āsavassa . . .
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 As under 1.
2 R. sāsavañ.
3 As under 4.


[page 198]
198                Āsavo-ceva-sāsavadukaṃ.
     Purimā . . .1 pacchimānaṃ sāsavānañ ceva1 no ca
āsavānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantara- . . . Āsavā ca sampa-
yuttakā ca khandhā vuṭṭhānassa anantara- . . .
     9. Āsavo ceva sāsavo ca sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo
dhammā āsavassa ceva sāsavassa ca sāsavassa ceva no ca
āsavassa ca . . .
     Purimā . . .2 pacchimānaṃ āsavānaṃ sampayuttakānañ ca
khandhānaṃ anantara- . . . (Evaṃ sabbaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
Āsava-duke pi anantaraṃ imassa sadisaṃ kātabbaṃ. Āvajjanā
pi vuṭṭhānam pi evam pi ettha samuddiṭṭhaṃ3 saṃkhittaṃ, sabbaṃ
paripuṇṇaṃ. Āsava-dukasadisaṃ kātabbaṃ; ninnānaṃ.)
                ĀSAVO-CEVA-SĀSAVA-DUKAṂ niṭṭhitaṃ.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 As under 7.
2 B. follows with sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ only.
3 R. evaṃ samuddiṭṭhaṃ saṃkhittaṃ. K. samuṭṭhānaṃ.


[page 199]
                               199
                               [XVIII.
                ĀSAVO-CEVA-ĀSAVASAMPAYUTTA-DUKAṂ.]
     1. Āsavañ ceva āsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca
āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Kāmāsavaṃ paṭicca diṭṭhāsavo avijjāsavo . . . (cakkaṃ
bandhitabbaṃ). Bhavāsavaṃ paṭicca avijjāsavo . . . (cakkaṃ).
Diṭṭhāsavaṃ paṭicca avijjāsavo.
     2. Āsavañ ceva āsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca
āsavasampayutto ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetu-
paccayā.
     Āsave paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā.
     3. Āsavañ ceva āsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca
āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca āsavasampayutto ceva no
ca āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
     Kāmāsavaṃ1 paṭicca diṭṭhāsavo avijjāsavo sampayuttakā
ca khandhā . . . (sabbaṃ cakkaṃ).
     4. Āsavasampayuttañ ceva no ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ
paṭicca āsavasampayutto ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppaj-
jati hetupaccayā.
     Āsavasampayuttañ ceva no ca āsavaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ
paṭicca tayo khandhā; dve . . .
     5. Āsavasampayuttañ ceva no ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ
paṭicca āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati
hetupaccayā.
     Āsavasampayutte ceva no ca āsave khandhe paṭicca
āsavā.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 R. Āsavasampayuttaṃ kāmāsavaṃ.


[page 200]
200           Asavo-ceva-āsavasampayuttadukaṃ.
     6. Āsavasampayuttañ ceva no ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ
paṭicca āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca āsavasampayutto
ceva no ca āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
     Āsavasampayuttañ ceva1 . . . khandhā āsavā ca;
dve . . .
     7. Āsavañ2 ceva āsavasampayuttañ ca āsavasampayuttañ
ceva no ca āsavañ ca dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ceva āsava-
sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Kāmāsavañ ca āsavasampayutte ca khandhe paṭicca
diṭṭhāsavo avijjāsavo . . . (sabbaṃ cakkaṃ).
     8. Āsavañ2 ceva āsavasampayuttañ ca āsavasampa-
yuttañ ceva no ca āsavañ ca dhammaṃ paṭicca āsava-
sampayutto ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetu-
paccayā.
     Āsavasampayuttañ ceva3 no ca āsavaṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca
āsave ca paṭicca tayo khandhā; dve . . .
     9. Āsavañ ceva āsavasampayuttañ ca āsavasampayuttañ
ceva no ca āsavañ ca dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ceva āsava-
sampayutto ca āsavasampayutto ceva no ca āsavo ca
dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
     Āsavasampayuttañ ceva no ca āsavaṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca
kāmāsavañ ca paṭicca tayo khandhā diṭṭhāsavo avijjāsavo;
dve . . . (cakkaṃ. Evaṃ sabbe paccayā kātabbā).
          Hetuyā nava,                     kamme nava,
          ārammaṇe nava,                    (vipākaṃ natthi),
          adhipatiyā nava,                āhāre nava,
          sabbattha nava4 . . .           avigate nava.
           (saṃkhittaṃ), . . .
     Āsavañ ceva āsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo
ceva āsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati nādhipatipaccayā
. . . (nahetumūlakaṃ natthi) . . . napurejātapaccayā . . .
napacchājātapaccayā . . . (saṃkhittaṃ) . . .
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 As under 4.
2 B. omits these two sentences.
3 B. kāmāsava-.
4 B. adds sampayutte nava.


[page 201]
                          Arammaṇavāro.                          201
          Nādhipatiyā nava,                nakamme tīṇi,
          napurejāte nava,                navipāke nava,
          napacchājāte nava,                navippayutte nava . . .
          nāsevane nava,
     (Evaṃ itare dve gaṇanā pi sahajātavāro1 pi paccayavāro
pi2 nissayavāro pi saṃsaṭṭhavāro pi paripuṇṇā paṭiccasadisā.)
     1. Āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto dhammo āsavassa ceva
āsavasampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo
. . . (tīṇi).
     5. Āsavasampayutto ceva no ca āsavo dhammo āsava-
sampayuttassa ceva no ca āsavassa3 . . .
     Āsavasampayuttā ceva no ca āsavā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ
khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
     1. Āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto dhammo āsavassa ceva
āsavasampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena pac-
cayo . . . (tīṇi).
     4. Āsavasampayutto ceva no ca āsavo dhammo āsava-
sampayuttassa ceva no ca āsavassa . . .
     Āsavasampayutte ceva no ca āsave khandhe ārabbha
āsavasampayuttā ceva no ca āsavā khandhā uppajjanti.
     5. Āsavasampayutto ceva no ca āsavo dhammo āsamassa
ceva āsavasampayuttassa . . .
     Āsavasampayutte ceva no ca āsave khandhe ārabbha
āsavā uppajjanti.
     6. Āsavasampayutto ceva no ca āsavo dhammo āsavassa
ceva āsavasampayuttassa ca āsavasampayuttassa ceva no ca
āsavassa ca . . .
     Āsavasampayutte4 . . . āsavā ca sampayuttakā5 ca
khandhā uppajjanti.
     7. Āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca āsavasampayutto ceva
no ca āsavo ca dhammā āsavassa ceva āsavasampayuttassa
dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo . . . (tīṇi) . . .
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 R. and B. have -vāraṃ pi always, paripuṇṇaṃ, etc.
2 B. omits clause.
3 As under 1.
4 As under4.
5 R. āsavā ca āsavasampayuttakā.


[page 202]
202                Āsavo-ceva-āsavasampayuttadukaṃ.
adhipatipaccayena paccayo . . . (ārammaṇasadiso; garu-
kārammaṇo1) . . . anantarapaccayena paccayo . . . (āram-
maṇasadiso yeva; purimā purimāti kātabbaṃ) . . . samanan-
tara- . . . sahajāta- . . . aññanañña- . . . nissaya- . . .
upanissayapaccayena paccayo . . . (ārammaṇasadisā yeva;
vibhajanā natthi; tīṇi upanissayaṃ sabbaṃ kātabbaṃ2).
     Āsavasampayutto ceva no ca āsamo dhammo āsavasam-
payuttassa ceva no ca āsavassa dhammassa kammapacca-
yena paccayo . . . (tīṇi) . . . āhāra- . . . (tīṇi) . . .
indriya- . . . jhāna- . . . magga- . . . (nava) . . . sam-
payutta- . . . (nava) . . . atthi- . . . natthi- . . .
vigata- . . . avigatapaccayena paccayo.
          Hetuyā3 cattāri,                kamme tīṇi,4
          ārammaṇe nava,                    āhāre tīṇi,
          adhipatiyā nava,                indriye tīṇi,
          anantare nava,                    jhāne tīṇi,5
          samanantare nava,                magge nava,
          sahajāte nava,                    sampayutte nava,
          aññamaññe nava,                atthiyā nava,
          nissaye nava,                     natthiyā nava,
          upanissaye nava.                vigate nava,
          āsevane nava,                     avigate nava.
     1. Āsavo ceva āsavasampayuto ca dhammo āsavassa
ceva āsavasampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇa-, . . .
sahajāta-, . . . upanissayapaccayena paccayo . . . pe6 . . .
          Nahetuyā nava,                    sabbattha nava;
          nārammaṇe cattāri7 . . .          no-avigate nava.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 K. omits garukṭārammaṇo.
2 K. tiṇi pi upanissayasadisaṃ kātabbaṃ
3 B. hetupaccayā.
4 R. nava.
5 B. omits clause.
6 The other eight formula follow, with the same three qualifying
     conditions in each.
7 R. nava.


[page 203]
                               Mātīkā.                         203
          Hetupaccayā, nārammaṇe           namagge cattāri,
           cattāri . . . (saṃkhittaṃ),     navippayutte cattāri,
          nasamanantare cattāri,           nonatthiyā cattāri,
          na-upanissaye cattāri,           novigate cattāri.
          Nahetupaccayā, ārammaṇe nava,     adhipatiyā nava . . .
     (anulomapadāni gaṇitabbāni1) . . . avigate nava.
               ĀSAVO-CEVA-ĀSAVASAMPAYUTTA-DUKAṂ niṭṭhitaṃ.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. -padā gaṇitabbāni. S. ganitabbāni. K. gaṇe-.


[page 204]
                               204
                               [XIX.
                     ĀSAVAVIPPAYUTTA-SĀSAVA-DUKAṂ.]
     1. Āsavavippayuttasāsavaṃ1 dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavip-
payuttasāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Āsavavippayuttasāsavaṃ ekaṃ. khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo
kkandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ, . . . dve . . . Paṭi-
sandhikkhaṇe khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca
khandhā; ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ . . . pe . . .
     4. Āsavavippayutta-anāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavip-
payutta-anāsavo2 dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā . . .
(tīṇi; yathā cūḷantaraduke.3 Lokiyadukaṃ, evaṃ vitthāre-
tabbaṃ Ninnānākaraṇaṃ. Saṃkhittaṃ).
               ĀSAVAVIPPAYUTTA-SĀSAVA-DUKAṂ niṭṭhitaṃ.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 R. -vippayuttaṃ sāsavaṃ . . . anāsavaṃ--so throughout.
2 S. -vippayutto-.
3 S. anantara-.


[page 205]
                               205
                               [XX.
                          SAṂYOJANA-DUKAṂ]
     1. Saṃyojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃyojano dhammo
uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ1 paṭicca diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ avijjā-
saṃyojanaṃ. Kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ paṭicca sīlabbataparā-
māsasaṃyojanaṃ avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ.2 Kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ
paṭicca mānasaṃyojanaṃ avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ. Kāmarāgasaṃ-
yojanaṃ paṭicca avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ. Paṭighasaṃyojanaṃ
paṭicca issāsaṃyojanaṃ avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ. Paṭighasaṃyo-
janaṃ paṭicca macchariyasaṃyojanaṃ avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ.
Paṭighasaṃyojanaṃ paṭicca avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ. Mānasaṃyo-
janaṃ paṭicca bhavarāgasaṃyojanaṃ avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ.
Bhavarāgasaṃyojanaṃ paṭicca avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ. Vicikic-
chāsaṃyojanaṃ paṭicca avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ.3
     2. Saṃyojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nosaṃyojano dhammo
uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Saṃyojane paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasam-
uṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ.
     3. Saṃyojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃyojano ca nosaṃyo-
jano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
     Kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ paṭicca diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ avijjāsaṃ-
yojanaṃ sampayuttakā ca khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca
rūpaṃ . . . (cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ) . . .
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. omits this sentence.
2 S. omits.
3 B. adds avijjasaññojanaṃ paṭicca vicikicchāsaññojanaṃ.
     S. and K. omit both sentences.


[page 206]
206                         Saṃyojanadukaṃ.
     4. Nosaṃyojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nosaṃyojano dhammo
uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Nosaṃyojanaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā
cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe
khandhe paṭica vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā; ekaṃ
mahābhūtaṃ . . . pe . . . mahābhūte paṭicca cittasam-
uṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattā rūpaṃ upādā rūpaṃ.
     5. Nosaṃyojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃyojano dhammo
uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Nosaṃyojane khandhe paṭicca saṃyojanā.
     6. Nosaṃyojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃyojano ca nosaṃ-
yojano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
     Nosaṃyojanaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā saṃyo-
janā cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . .
     7. Saṃyojananañ ca nosaṃyojanañ ca dhammaṃ paṭicca
saṃyojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Kāmarāgasaṃyojanañ ca sampayuttake ca khandhe
paṭicca diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ . . . (cakkaṃ
bandhitabbaṃ) . . .
     8. Saṃyojanañ ca nosaṃyojanañ ca dhammaṃ paṭicca
nosaṃyojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Nosaṃyojanaṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca saṃyojane1 ca paṭicca
tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . .
     9. Saṃyojanañ ca nosaṃyojanañ ca dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃ-
yojano ca nosaṃyojano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
     Nosaṃyojanaṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca kāmarāgasaṃyojanañ
ca paṭicca tayo khandhā diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ
cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ . . . (cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ.
Saṃkhittaṃ. Arammaṇapaccaye rūpaṃ natthi. Adhipati-
paccayo hetusadiso. Vicikicchāsaṃyojanaṃ natthi).
     . . . anantarapaccayā . . . avigatapaccayā. . . .
          Hetuyā nava,                     sabbattha nava;
          ārammaṇe nava,                    vipāke-ekaṃ,
          adhipatiyā nava,                āhāre nava,
          anantare nava,                    avigate nava.2

1 B. -janaṃ.
2 B. omits clause.


[page 207]
                          Nahetupaccayo.                          207
     1. Saṃyojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃyojano dhammo up-
pajjati nahetupaccayā.
     Vicikicchāsaṃyojanaṃ paṭicca avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ.
     4. Nosaṃyojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nosaṃyojano dhammo
uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Ahetukaṃ nosaṃyojanaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo
khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . . (yāva asañ-
ñasattā).
     5. Nosaṃyojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃyojano dhammo
uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
     Vicikicchāsahagati uddhaccasahagate1 khandhe paṭicca
avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ.
     7. Saṃyojanañ ca nosaṃyojanañ ca dhammaṃ paṭicca
saṃyojano dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā . . .
     Vicikicchāsaṃyojanañ ca sampayuttake ca khandhe
paṭicca avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ . . . (saṃkhittaṃ. Asavagocchaka-
sadisaṃ. Nārammañe pi sabbe uddharitabbā).2
          Nahetuyā cattāri,                nakamme tīṇi,
          nārammaṇe tīṇi,                navipāke nava,
          nādhipatiyā nava,                nāhāre ekaṃ,
          nānantare tīṇi                    na-indriye ekaṃ,
          nasamanantare tīṇi.               najhāne ekaṃ,
          na-aññamaññe tīṇi,                namagge ekaṃ,
          na-upanissaye tīṇi,               nasampayutte tīṇi,
          napurejāte nava,                navippayutte nava,
          napacchājāte nava,                nonatthiyā tīṇi,
          nāsevane nava,                    novigate tīṇi.
     Hetupaccayā, nārammaṇe tīṇi, nādhipatiyā nava, . . .
(evaṃ sesañ ca3 gaṇetabbaṃ4).
          Nahetupaccayā, ārammaṇe           āhāre cattāri,
          cattāri,                          magge tīṇi,
          sabbattha cattāri;5               sampayutte cattāri,
          vipāke ekaṃ,                     avigate cattāri.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. omits.
2 B. uttaritabbā. K. veditabbā.
3 R. and S. evaṃ sabbaṃ . . . B. evaṃ sabbaṃ sa[disaṃ].
4 So all the texts. Cf. p. 203
5 B. omits clause.


[page 208]
208                         Saṃyojanadukaṃ.
     Saṃyoyanaṃ dhammaṃ sahajāto1 . . .
     1. Saṃyojanaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā2 saṃyojano dhammo
uppajjati hetupaccayā . . . (tīṇi, paṭiccasadisaṃ).
     4. Nosaṃyojanaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā . . .
     Nosaṃyojanaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā citta-
samuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . . Patisandhikkhaṇe khandhe
paccayā vatthu, vatthuṃ paccayā khandhā; ekaṃ mahā-
bhūtaṃ . . . pe . . . mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ
rūpaṃ kaṭattā rūpaṃ upādā rūpaṃ. Vatthuṃ paccayā nosaṃ-
yojanā khandhā.
     5. Nosaṃyojanaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā saṃyojano . . .
     Nosaṃyojane khandhe paccayā saṃyojanā.
     6. Nosaṃyojanaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā saṃyojano ca . . .
     Nosaṃyojanaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā saṃ-
yojanā cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . . Vatthuṃ paccayā
saṃyojanā. Mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
Vatthuṃ paccayā saṃyojanā sampayuttakā khandhā.
     7. Saṃyojanañ ca nosaṃyojanañ ca dhammaṃ paccayā . . .
     Kāmarāgasaṃyojanañ ca sampayuttake ca khandhe pac-
cayā diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ. Kāmarāgasaṃyo-
janañ ca vatthuñ ca paccayā diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ avijjāsaṃyo-
janaṃ, . . . (cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ) . . .
     8. Saṃyojanañ ca nosaṃyojanañ ca dhammaṃ paccayā . . .
     Nosaṃyojanaṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca saṃyojanañ ca paccayā
tāyo khandhā ciṭṭasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . . (cakkaṃ)
. . . Saṃyojanaṃ ca vatthuñ ca paccayā nosaṃyojanā
khandhā.
     9. Saṃyojanañ ca nosaṃyojanañ ca dhammaṃ paccayā
saṃyojano ca . . .
     Nosaṃyojana. ekaṃ khandhañ ca kāmarāgasaṃyojanañ
ca paccayā tayo khandhā diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ
cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . . (cakkaṃ) . . .
Kāmarāgasaṃyojanañ ca vatthuñ ca paccayā diṭṭhisaṃyo-
janaṃ avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ sampayuttakā ca khandhā . . .
(cakkaṃ saṃkhittaṃ) . . .
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 K. and B. omit.
2 B. has sahajātaṃ for paccayā.


[page 209]
                          Ārammaṇavāro.                          209
          Hetuyā nava,                     vipāke ekaṃ,
          ārammaṇe nava,                    avigate ekaṃ.1
          sabbattha nava,
     Nahetuyā cattāri . . . (yattha yattha vatthu labbhati, tattha
tattha ninnānaṃ kātabbaṃ2) . . . nārammaṇe tīṇi, novigate
tīṇi. (Evaṃ itare pi dve gaṇanā ca nissayavāro ca kātabbā.
     Saṃyojanaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho saṃyojano dhammo
uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Kāmarāgasanyojanaṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ avij-
jāsaṃyojanaṃ . . . (evaṃ3 nava pañhā, arūpā yeva kātabbā.
Saṃsaṭṭhavāro pi sampayuttavāro pi4 evaṃ kātabbā).
     1. Saṃyojano dhammo saṃyojanassa dhammassa hetu-
paccayena paccayo.
     Saṃyojanā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ hetu-
paccayena paccayo.
     2. Saṃyojano dhammo nosaṃyojanassa . . .
     Saṃyojanā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasam-
uṭṭānānañ ca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
     3. Saṃyojano dhammo saṃyojanassa ca nosaṃyojanassa
ca . . .
     Saṃyojanā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ saṃyo-
janānañ ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena
paccayo.
     4. Nosaṃyojano dhammo nosaṃyojanassa . . .
     Nosaṃyojanā hetū . . .5 paccayo (paṭisandhi).
     1. Saṃyojano dhammo saṃyojanassa dhammassa āram-
maṇapaccayena paccayo.
     Saṃyojane ārabbha saṃyojanā uppajjanti . . . (mūlay)
kātabbaṃ) . . . Saṃyojane ārabbha nosaṃyojanā khandhā
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 R. nava.
2 B. tattha tattha niddhetabbānaṃ. R. ninnetabbaṃ.
3 B. inserts ninnānaṃ.
4 B. omits the two words.
5 As under 2.


[page 210]
210                         Saṃyojanadukaṃ.
uppajjanti . . . (mūlaṃ kātabbaṃ) . . . Saṃyojane ārabbha
saṃyojanā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
     4. Nosaṃyojano1 dhammo nosaṃyojanassa . . .
     Dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ uposathakammaṃ taṃ paccavekkhati,
pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ
paccavekkhati. Ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ pacca-
vekkhanti, phalaṃ, nibbānaṃ paccavekkhanti. Nibbānaṃ
gotrabhussa vodānassa maggassa phalassa āvajjanāya . . .
Ariyā nosaṃyojane pahīnakilese vikkhambhitakilese . . .
pubbe cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ nosaṃyojane khan-
dhe aniccato . . . pe . . . domanassaṃ uppajjati, dibbena
cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ
suṇāti, cetopariyañāṇena nosaṃyojanacittasamaṃgissa
cittaṃ jānāti, ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanassa,
ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa rūpāyā-
tanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa . . . phoṭṭhabbāyatannaṃ kāyā-
viññāṇassa nosaṃyojanā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa ceto-
pariyañāṇassa pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa yathākammū-
pagañāṇassa anāgataṃsañāṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇa-
paccayena paccayo.
     5. Nosaṃyojano dhammo saṃyojanassa . . .
     Dānaṃ sīlaṃ . . . pe . . . pubbe . . . jhānā . . . cakkhuṃ . . .
pe . . . vatthuṃ nosaṃyojane khandhe assādeti abhinan-
dati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo . . . pe . . . domanassaṃ uppaj-
jati.
     6. Nosaṃyojano dhammo saṃyojanassa ca . . .
     Dānaṃ, . . .2 taṃ ārabbha saṃyojanā ca sampayuttakā ca3
khandhā uppajjanti.
     7. Saṃyojano ca nosaṃyojano ca dhammā saṃyojanassa
. . . (tīṇi. Ārabbha yeva kātabbā).
     1. Saṃyojano dhammo saṃyojanassa dhammassa adhipati-
paccayena paccayo.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 R. has formula 2. Cf.p.159, § 4.
2 As under 5.
3 R. saṃyojanañ ca saṃyojanasampayuttakā ca.


[page 211]
                          Upanissayavāro.                         211
     Ārammaṇādhipati:-- saṃyojane garuṃ katvā . . . (tīṇi
garukārammaṇā).
     4. Nosaṃyojano dhammo nosaṃyojanassa . . .
     Ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. Ārammaṇādhipati:
-- dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ . . . (tīṇi, tiṇṇam pi ārammanādhipati
sahajātādhipati pi kātabbā. Vibhajitabbā1 tīṇi pi).
     7. Saṃyojano ca nosaṃyojano ca dhammā saṃyoja-
nassa . . .
     Ārammaṇādhipati:-- saṃyojane ca sampayuttake ca
khandhe garuṃ katvā . . . (tīṇi).
     1. Saṃyojano dhammo saṃyojanassa dhammassa anan-
tarapaccayena paccayo.
     Purimā purimā saṃyojanā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ
saṃyojanānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo . . . (tīṇi).
     4. Nosaṃyojano dhammo nosaṃyojanassa . . .
     Purimā purimā nosaṃyojanā khandhā pacchimānaṃ . . .
pe . . . phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo.
     5. Nosaṃyojano dhammo saṃyojanassa . . .
     Purimā purimā nosaṃyojanā khandhā pacchimāmaṃ . . .
pe2 . . . (evaṃ dve pi kātabbā.)
     7. Saṃyojano ca nosaṃyojano ca dhammā saṃyojanassa
. . . (tīṇi).
     1. Saṃyojano dhammo saṃyojanassa dhammassa saman-
tarapaccayena paccayo . . . (nava), sahajāta- . . . (nava),
aññamañña-3 . . . (nava), nissaya- . . . (nava),upanissaya-
paccayena paccayo.
     Ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo
. . . Pakatūpanissayo saṃyojanā saṃyojanaṃ upanissaya-
paccayena paccayo . . . (evaṃ tīṇi).
     4. Nosaṃyojano dhammo nosaṃyojanassa . . .
     Ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanis-
sayo . . . pe . . . Pakatūpanissayo:-- saddhaṃ upanis-
sāya dānaṃ deti . . . pe . . . samāpattiṃ uppādeti, mānaṃ
jappeti diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti; sīlaṃ . . . pe . . . paññaṃ rāgaṃ

2 As under 1.
3 S. omits.


[page 212]
212                         Saṃyojanadukaṃ.
. . . pe . . . patthanaṃ senāsanaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ diti,
. . . pe . . . saṃghaṃ bhindati; saddhā . . . pe . . .
senāsanaṃ saddhāya . . . pe . . . phalasamāpattiyā
upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
     5. Nosaṃyojano dhammo saṃyojanassa . . .
     Ārammaṇūpanissayo . . .1 saddhaṃ upanissāya mānaṃ
jappeti . . . pe . . .1 senāsanaṃ upanissāya pāṇaṃ hanati
. . . pe . . . saṃghaṃ bhindati, saddhā . . . pe . . .
senāsanaṃ rāgassa . . . pe . . . patthanāya2 upanissaya-
paccayena paccayo.

     Ārammaṇūpanissayo . . .3saddhā . . . pe . . . senā-
sanaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ sampayuttakānañ ca khandhānaṃ
upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
     7. Saṃyojano ca nosaṃyojano ca dhammā saṃyojanassa
. . . (tīṇi).
     4. Nosaṃyojano dhammo nosaṃyojanassa dhammassa
purejātapaccayena paccayo.
     Ārammaṇapurejātaṃ, vatthupurejātaṃ. Ārammaṇapure-
jātaṃ:-- cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ aniccato . . . pe
. . . domanassaṃ uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ
passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti; rūpāyatanaṃ
cakkhuviññāṇassa . . . phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa
ārammaṇapaccatena paccayo. Vatthupurejātaṃ:-- cakkhā-
yatanaṃ cakkhuviññānassa . . . kāyāyatanaṃ kāyaviññā-
ṇassa, vatthu nosaṃyojanānaṃ khandhānaṃ purejātapacca-
yena paccayo.
     5. Nosaṃyojano dhammo saṃyojanassa . . .
     Ārammaṇapurijātaṃ . . . pe4 . . . vatthuṃ assādeti
abhinandati; taṃ ārabbha rāgo . . . pe . . . domanassaṃ
uppajjati. Vatthupurejātaṃ:-- vatthuṃ saṃyojanānaṃ pure-
jātapaccayena paccayo.
     6. Nosaṃyojano dhammo saṃyojanassa ca . . .

[page 213]
                          Atthivāro.                              213
     Ārammaṇapurejātaṃ . . .1 taṃ ārabbha saṃyojanā ca
sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti. Vatthupurejātaṃ:--
vatthu saṃyojanānaṃ sampayuttakānañ ca khandhānaṃ
purejātapaccayena paccayo.
     2. Saṃyojano dhammo nosaṃyojanassa dhammassa
pacchājātapaccayena paccayo . . . (ekaṃ).
     4. Nosaṃyojano dhammo nosaṃyojanassa . . .
     8. Saṃyojano ca nosaṃyojano ca dhammā nosaṃyojanassa
dhammassa pacchājātā paccayena paccayo . . .

paccayena paccayo . . . (nava).

kammapaccayena paccayo . . . (tīṇi) . . . vipāka- . . .
(ekaṃ) . . . āhāra- . . . (tīṇi) . . . indriya- . . .
(tīṇi) . . . jhāna- . . . (tīṇi) . . . magga- . . .
(nava) . . . sampayuttapaccayena paccayo . . . (nava).

payuttapaccayena paccayo.
     Sahajātaṃ,2 pacchājātaṃ . . . (vibhajitabbaṃ).
     4. Nosaṃyojano dhammo nosaṃyojanassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ,3 pacchājātaṃ . . . (vibhajitabbaṃ).

paccayo.

     Purejātaṃ:-- vatthu saṃyojanānaṃ sampayuttakānañ ca
khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.

nassa . . .

sadisaṃ).

(saṃkhittaṃ).

domanassaṃ uppajjati; vatthu saṃyojanānaṃ atthipacca-
yena paccayo.

(vibhajitabbaṃ. Āsavasadisaṃ).

          ārammaṇe nava,                    pacchājāte tīṇi,
          adhipatiyā nava,                āsevane nava,

          samanantare nava,                vipāke ekaṃ,

          aññamaññe nava,                indriye tīṇi,

[page 215]
                          Mātikā.                               215
          sampayutte nava,                natthiyā nava,
          vippayutte pañca,                vigate nava,
          atthiyā nava,                     avigate nava.
     1. Saṃyojano dhammo saṃyojanassa dhammassa āram-
maṇa-. . . . sahajāta-, . . . upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

jātapaccayena paccayo.

janassa ca . . .1

jāta-, . . . pacchājāta-, . . . kamma-, . . . āhāra-, . . .
indriyapaccayena paccayo.

paccayena paccayo.

ca . . .2

nassa . . .1

nassa . . .1 pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.

ca nosaṃyojanassa ca . . .1
          Nahetuyā nava,                    sabbattha nava;
          nārammaṇe nava,                avigate nava.
          Hetupaccayā, nārammaṇe           namagge cattāri,
           cattāri . . . saṃkhittaṃ),     nasampayutte dve,

          na-upanissaye cattāri . . .     novigate cattāri.
           (saṃkhittaṃ).

(anulomamātikā) . . . avigate nava.

[page 216]
                               216
                               [XXI.
                         SAṂYOJANIYA-DUKAṂ.]
     Saṃyojaniyaṃ1 dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃyojaniyo dhammo
uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Saṃyojaniyaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā
cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe
khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā; ekaṃ
mahābhūtaṃ . . . pe . . . (cūḷantaraduke2 Lokiyaduka-
sadisaṃ. Ninnānākaraṇaṃ).
                         SAṂYOJANIYA-DUKAṂ niṭṭhitaṃ.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. has twice -janīyaṃ, once -janiyaṃ.
2 S. cullantara-.


[page 217]
                               217
                               [XXII.
                     SAṂYOJANASAMPAYUTTA-DUKAṂ.]
     1. Saṃyojanasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃyojana-
sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Saṃyojanasampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo
khandhā; dve . . .
     2. Saṃyojanasampayuttaṃ1 dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃyojana-
vippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Saṃyojanasampayutte khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ
rūpaṃ.
     3. Saṃyojanasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃyojana-
sampayutto ca saṃyojanavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti
hetupaccayā.
     Saṃyojanasampayuttaṃ . . . (cf. 1). tayo khandhā citta-
samuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . .
     4. Saṃyojanavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃyojana-
vippayutto . . .
     Saṃyojanavippayuttaṃ ekaṃ . . . (cf. 3). Uddhaccasaha-
gataṃ mohaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ2 (paṭisandhi).
     5. Saṃyojanavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃyojana-
sampayutto . . .
     Uddhaccasahagataṃ mohaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā
khandhā.
     6. Saṃyojanavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃyojana-
sampayutto ca . . .

1 S. omits 2 and 3.
2 R. and B. add dve.


[page 218]
218                Saṃyojanasampayuttadukaṃ.
     Uddhaccasahagataṃ mohaṃ paṭicca khandhā cittasam-
uṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ.
     7. Saṃyojanasampayuttañ ca saṃyojanavippayuttañ
ca . . .
     Uddhaccasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca mohañ ca paṭicca
tayo khandhā; dve . . .
     8. Saṃyojanasampayuttañ ca saṃyojanavippayuttañ
ca . . .
     Saṃyojanasampayutte khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca
cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca
mohañ ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
     9. Saṃyojanasampayuttañ ca Saṃyojanavippayuttañ
ca . . .
     Uddhaccasahagataṃ . . . (cf. 7) . . . khandhā citta-
samuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . .
     1. Saṃyojanasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃyojana-
sampayutto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
     Saṃyojanasampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ . . . pe1 . . .
dve . . .
     2. Saṃyojanasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃyojana-
vippayutto . . .
     Uddhaccasahagate khandhe2 paṭicca uddhaccasahagato
moho.
     3. Saṃyojanasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃyojana-
sampāyutto ca . . .
     Uddhaccasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā
moho3 ca; dve . . .
     4. Saṃyojanavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca . . .
     Saṃyojanavippayuttaṃ ekaṃ . . .4 dve . . . Paṭisan-
dhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā.
     5. Saṃyojanavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca . . .
     Uddhaccasahagataṃ mohaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā
khandhā.

2 S. -sahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ.

[page 219]
                          Nahetupaccayo.           219
     7. Saṃyojanasampayutto ca . . .
     Uddhaccasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca1 mohañ ca paṭicca
tayo khandhā; dve . . .
     1. Saṃyojanavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃyojana-
sampayutto dhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayā . . . (tīṇi).
     4. Saṃyojanasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃyojanavip-
payutto dhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayā . . . (ekaṃ).
     8. Saṃyojanasampayuttaṃ ca saṃyojanavippayuttañ ca
dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃyojanavippayutto dhammo uppajjati
adhipatipaccayā.
     Saṃyojanasampayutte khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca
cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ . . . (saṃkhittaṃ).
          Hetuyā nava,                     vipāke ekaṃ,
          ārammaṇe cha,                     āhāre nava,
          adhipatiyā pañca,                indriye nava,
          anantare cha,                     jhāne nava,
          samanantare cha,                magge nava,4
          sahajāte nava,                    sampayutte cha,
          aññamaññe cha,                    vippayutte nava,
          nissaye nava,                     atthiyā nava,5
          upanissaye cha2,                natthiyā cha,6
          purejāte cha,3                    vigate cha,
          āsevane cha,                     avigate nava.
          kamme nava,
     1. Saṃyojanasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃyojana-
sampayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
     Vicikicchāsahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato
moho.
     2. Saṃyojanasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃyojana-
vippayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
     Uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca uddhaccasahagato
moho.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. and S. omit last two words.
2 K. omits clause.
3 B. and S. omit clause.
4 B. omits last two clauses.
5 B. omits clause.
6 S. nava.


[page 220]
220                     Saṃyojanasampayuttadukaṃ.
     4. Saṃyojanavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃyojana-
vippayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
     Ahetukaṃ saṃyojanavippayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ . . .
yāva asaññasaṭṭā).
          Nahetuyā tīṇi,                    nakamme cattāri,
          nārammaṇe tīṇi,                navipāke nava,
          nādhipatiyā nava,                nāhāre ekaṃ,
          nānantare tīṇi,1                na-indriye ekaṃ,3
          nasamanantare tīṇi,               najhāne ekaṃ,
          na-aññamaññe tīṇi,                namagge ekaṃ,4
          na-upanissaye tīṇi,               nasampayutte tīṇi,
          napurejāte satta,2                navippayutte cha,
          napacchājāte nava,                nonatthiyā tīṇi,
          nāsevane nava,                    novigate tīṇi,
          Hetupaccayā, nārammaṇe tīṇi,     nakamme cattāri,
          nādhipatiyā nava,                navipāke nava,
          na-upanissaye tīṇi,               nasampayutte tīṇi,
          napurejāte cha,                navippayutte cattāri,
          napacchājāte nava,                nonatthiyā tīṇi,
          nāsevane nava,                    novigate tīṇi.
          Nahetupaccayā, ārammaṇe           āhāre tīṇi,5
           tīṇi,                          magge dve,
          vipake ekaṃ,                     avigate tīṇi.
     (Sahajātavāro pi paṭiccavārasadiso.)
     1. Saṃyojanasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃyojana-
sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā . . . (tīṇi,
paṭiccasadisaṃ).
     4. Saṃyojanavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā saṃyojana-
vippayutto . . . yāva paṭisandhi, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ).
     Vatthuṃ paccayā saṃyojanavippayuttā khandhā. Vatthuṃ
paccayā uddhaccasahagato moho.
     5. Saṃyojanavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā saṃyojana-
sampayutto . . .
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. nava.
2 B. tīṇi.
3 S. omits clause.
4 K. omits clause.
5 B. omits last two clauses.


[page 221]
                          Arammaṇapaccayo.                     221
     Vatthuṃ paccayā saṃyojanasampayuttā khandhā. Uddhac-
casahagataṃ mohaṃ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā.
     6. Saṃyojanavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃyojana-
sampayutto ca . . .
     Vatthuṃ paccayā saṃyojanasampayuttā khandhā.
Mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Uddhacca-
sahagataṃ . . . (cf. 5) khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca
rūpaṃ.
     7. Saṃyojanasampayuttaṃ ca saṃyojanavippayuttañ ca
dhammaṃ paccayā . . .
     Saṃyojanasampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca vatthuñ ca
paccayā tayo khandhā; dve . . . Uddhaccasahagataṃ
ekaṃ khandhañ ca mohañ ca paccayā tayo khandhā;
dve . . .
     8. Saṃyojanasampayuttañ ca saṃyojanavippayuttañ
ca . . .
     Saṃyojanasampayutte khandhe ca mahābhūti ca paccayā
cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca
mohañ ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
     9. Saṃyojanasampayuttañ ca saṃyojanavippayuttañ ca . . .
     Saṃyojanasampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca vatthuñ1 ca
paccayā tayo khandhā; dve . . . Saṃyojanasampayutte
khandhe . . .2 Uddhaccasahagataṃ . . .3 khandhā citta-
samuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . .
     1. Saṃyojanasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā saṃyojana-
sampayutto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā . . .
(tīṇi, paṭiccasadisā).
     4. Saṃyojanavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃyojana-
vippayutto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā . . .
(yāva paṭisandhi).
     Vatthuṃ paṭicca saṃyojanavippayuttā khandhā. Cak-
khāyatanaṃ paccayā cakkhuviññaṇaṃ . . . kāyāyatanaṃ
paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṃ. Vatthuṃ paccayā saṃyojanavippa-
yuttā khandhā,4 uddhaccasahagato moho ca.

2 As under 8.
3 As under 7.
4 R. and B. repeat vatthuṃ paccayā, omitting ca.


[page 222]
222                    Saṃyojanasampayuttadukaṃ.
     5. Saṃyojanavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā . . .
     Vatthuṃ paccayā saṃyojanasampayuttā khandhā. Uddhac-
casahagataṃ mohaṃ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā.
     6. Saṃyojanavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā . . .
     Vatthuṃ paccayā uddhaccasahagatā khandhā moho ca.
     7. Saṃyojanasampayuttañ ca saṃyojanavippayuttañ
ca . . .
     Saṃyojanasampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca vatthuñ ca
paccayā tayo khandhā; dve . . . Uddhaccasahagataṃ ekaṃ
khandhañ ca mohañ1 ca paccayā tayo khandhā;2 dve . . .
     8. Saṃyojanasampayuttañ ca saṃyojanavippayuttañ
ca . . .
     Uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñ ca paccayā
uddhaccasahagato moho.
     9. Saṃyojanasampayuttañ ca saṃyojanavippayuttañ
ca . . .
     Uddhaccasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca vatthuñ ca pac-
cayā tayo khandhā moho ca; dve . . .
     Saṃyojanasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā saṃyojana-
sampayutto dhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayā . . .
          Hetuyā nava,                     vipāke ekaṃ,
          ārammaṇe nava,                    āhāre nava,
          adhipatiyā nava,                avigate nava.
          sabbattha nava;
     1. Saṃyojanasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā saṃyojana-
sampayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
     Vicikicchāsahagate khandhe paccayā vicidicchāsahagato
moho.
     2. Saṃyojanasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā . . .
     Uddhaccasahagate khandhe paccayā uddhaccasahagato
moho.
     4. Saṃyojanavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā . . .
     Ahetukaṃ saṃyojanavippayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ . . .
(yāva asaññasattā). Cakkhāyatanaṃ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. vatthuñ.
2 S. inserts moho ca.


[page 223]
                         Saṃsaṭṭhavāro.           223
. . . kāyāyatanaṃ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṃ. Vatthuṃ pac-
cayā ahetukā saṃyojanavippayuttā khandhā uddhaccasaha-
gato moho ca.
     5. Saṃyojanavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā . . .
     Vatthuṃ paccayā vicikicchāsahagato moho.
     7. Saṃyojanasampayuttañ ca saṃyojanavippayuttañ
ca . . .
     Vicikicchāsahagate khandhe ca vatthuñ ca paccayā vici-
kicchāsahagato moho.
     8. Saṃyojanasampayuttañ ca saṃyojanavippayuttañ
ca . . .
     Uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñ ca paccayā
uddhaccasahagato moho . . . (saṃkhittaṃ).
          Nahetuyā cha,                     nakamme cattāri,
          nārammaṇe tīṇi,                navipāke nava,
          nādhipatiyā nava,                nāhāre ekaṃ,
          nānantare tīṇi,                na-indriye ekaṃ,
          nasamanantare tīṇi,               najhāne ekaṃ,
          na-aññamaññe tīṇi,                namagge ekaṃ,
          na-upanissaye tīṇi,               nasampayutte tīṇi,
          napurejāte satta,                navippayutte cha,
          napacchājāte nava,                nonatthiyā tīṇi,
          nāsevane nava,                    novigate tīṇi,
          Hetupaccayā, nārammaṇe tīṇi,
          nādhipatiyā nava . . .
          (evaṃ kātabbaṃ).
          nahetupaccayā, ārammaṇe           āhāre cha,
           cha,                          magge cha,
          sabbattha cha;                    avigate cha.
          vipāke ekaṃ,
     (Nissayavāro pi paccayavārasadiso.)
     1. Saṃyojanasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho saṃyo-
janasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Saṃyojanasampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo
khandhā; dve . . .
     2. Saṃyojanavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho saṃyojana-
vippayutto . . .
--------------------------------------------------------------------------

[page 224]
224                     Saṃyojanasampayuttadukaṃ.
     Saṃyojanavippayuttaṃ ekaṃ . . . (cf. 1) (paṭisandhi).
     5. Saṃyojanavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho saṃyojana-
sampayutto . . .
     Uddhaccasahagataṃ mohaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā sampayuttakā
khandhā.

ca . . .
     Uddhaccasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca mohañ ca
saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā . . . (saṃkhittaṃ).
          Hituyā cattāri,                anantare cha,
          ārammaṇe cha,                     samanantare cha,
          adhipatiyā dve,                avigate cha.
          Nahetuyā tīṇi,                    nakamme cattāri,
          nādhipatiyā cha,                navipāke cha,
          napurejāte cha,                najhāne ekaṃ,
          napacchājāte cha,                namagge ekaṃ,
          nāsevane cha,                     navippayutte cha . . .
     (itare dve gaṇanā pi sampayuttavāro pi kātabbā1.
     1. Saṃyojanasampayutto dhammo saṃyojanasampayut-
tassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
     Saṃyojanasampayuttā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhā-
naṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
     2. Saṃyojanasampayutto2 dhammo saṃyojanavippa-
yuttassa . . .
     Saṃyojanasampayuttā hetū cittasamuṭṭānānaṃ rūpānaṃ
hetupaccayena paccayo.
     3. Saṃyojanasampayutto dhammo saṃyojanasampa
yuttassa ca . . .
     Saṃyojanasampayuttā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhā-
naṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena pac-
cayo.

tassa . . .

2 B. omits § 2.


[page 225]
                          Ārammaṇavāro.           225
     Saṃyojanavippayuttā1 hetū2 . . . Uddhaccasahagato
moho cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
. . . (paṭisandhi.)
     5. Saṃyojanavippayuttaṃ dhammo saṃyojanasampayut-
tassa . . .
     Uddhaccasahagato moho sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ
hetupaccayena paccayo.
     6. Saṃyojanavippayutto dhammo saṃyojanasampayut-
tassa ca . . .
     Uddhaccasahagato moho sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ
cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
     1. Saṃyojanasampayutto dhammo saṃyojanasampayut-
tassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
     Saṃyojanasampayutte khandhe ārabbha saṃyojanasam-
payuttā khandhā uppajjanti . . . (mūlaṃ kātabbaṃ).
Saṃyojanasampayutte khandhe ārabbha saṃyojanavippa-
yuttā khandhā ca moho ca uppajjanti . . . (mūlaṃ
kātabbaṃ). Saṃyojanasampayutte khandhe ārabbha uddhac-
casahagatā khandhā ca moho ca uppajjanti.
     4. Saṃyojanavippayutto dhammo saṃyojanavippayut-
tassa . . .
     Dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ uposathakammaṃ taṃ paccavekkhati,
pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ
paccavekkhati. Ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavek-
khanti, phalaṃ nibbānaṃ paccavekkhanti. Nibbānaṃ gotra-
bhussa vodānassa maggassa phalassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇa-
paccayena paccayo. Ariyā saṃyojanavippayutte pahīna-
kilese3 paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhitakilese4 paccavekkhanti,
pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilesa jānanti, cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . .
vatthuṃ saṃyojanavippayutte khandhe ca mohañ ca aniccato
. . . pe . . . vipassanti. Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati,
dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, cetopariyāñāṇena saṃ-
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S., B., and K. -yutto hetu; elesewhere, -yuttā hetu.
2 As under 3.
3 B. -vippayuttaṃ pahinaṃ (sic) kilesaṃ. So R., always
     (with pahīnaṃ).
4 B. vikkhambhitaṃ.


[page 226]
226           Saṃyojanasampayuttadukaṃ.
yojanavippayuttacittasamaṃgissa cittaṃ jānāti; ākāsānañ-
cāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanassa . . . pe . . . rūpāyatanaṃ
. . . pe . . . phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ . . . pe . . . saṃyojana-
vippāyuttā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa cetopariyañāṇassa
pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa yathākammūpagañāṇassa anā-
gataṃsañāṇassa āmajjanāyā ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
     5. Saṃyojanavippayutto dhammo saṃyojanasampayut-
tassa . . .
     Dānaṃ sīlaṃ uposathakammaṃ . . . pubbe suciṇṇāni . . .
jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ . . . cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ
saṃyojanavippayutte khandhe ca mohañ ca assādeti abhinan-
dati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo . . . pe . . . domanassaṃ uppajjati.
     6. Saṃyojanavippayutto dhammo saṃyojanasampayut-
tassa ca . . .
     Cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ saṃyojanavippayutte
khandhe1 ārabbha uddhaccasahagatā khandhā ca moho ca
uppajjanti.
     7. Saṃyojanasampayutto ca saṃyojanavippayutto ca . . .
     Uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca mohañ ca ārabbha saṃyo-
janasampayuttā khandhā uppajjanti . . . (mūlaṃ kātabbaṃ).
Uddhaccasahagate . . .2 saṃyojanavippayuttā khandhā ca
moho ca uppajjanti . . . (mūlaṃ kātabbaṃ). Uddhacca-
sahagate khandhe ca mohañ ca ārabbha uddhaccasahagatā
khandhā ca moho ca uppajjanti.
     1. Saṃyojanasampayutto dhammo saṃyojanasampayut-
tassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
     Ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. Ārammaṇādhipati:--
rāgaṃ diṭṭhiṃ3 garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ
katvā rāgo, diṭṭhi uppajjati. Sahajātādhipati:-- saṃyo-
janasampayuttādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ
adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 R. and B. insert mohaṃ.
2 As above.
3 K. omits, treating of diṭṭhi in separate sentence (in same
     terms).


[page 227]
                     Anantaravāro.                227
     2. Saṃyojanasampayutto dhammo saṃyojanavippayut-
tassa . . .
     Sahajātādhipati:-- saṃyojanasampayuttādhipati citta-
samuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
     3. Saṃyojanasampayutto dhammo saṃyojanasampayut-
tassa ca . . .
     Sahajātādhipati:-- . . .1 khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānā-
nañ ca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
     4. Saṃyojanavippayutto dhammo . . .
     Ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. Ārammaṇādhipati:
-- dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ uposathakammaṃ taṃ garuṃ katvā
paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni . . .2 jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā . . .
Ariyā maggā . . . phalaṃ . . . nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa vodān-
assa maggassa phalassa3 abhipatipaccayena paccayo. Saha-
jātādhipati:-- saṃyojanavippayuttādhipati . . .
     5. Saṃyojanavippayutto dhammo . . .
     Ārammaṇādhipati:-- dānaṃ . . .5 katvā assādeti abhi
nandati;6 taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati;
pubbe suciṇṇāni . . . jhānā . . . cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . .
vatthuṃ saṃyojanavippayutte khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti
abhinandati . . . uppajjati.7
     1. Saṃyojanasampayutto dhammo saṃyojanasampayut-
tassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
     Purimā purimā saṃyojanasampayuttā khandhā pacchi-
mānaṃ pacchimānaṃ saṃyojanasampayuttānaṃ khandhānaṃ
anantarapaccayena paccayo.
     2. Saṃyojanasampayutto dhammo . . .
     Purimā purimā uddhaccasahagatā khandhā pacchimassa
pacchimassa uddhaccasahagatassa mohassa anantarapacca-
yena paccayo.
     Saṃyojanasampayuttā khandhā vuṭṭhānassa anantara-
paccayena paccayo.

1 As under 1.
2 Cf.p. 225. 4.
3 All omit āvajjanāya.
4 As under 3.
5 As under 4.
6 B. omits remainder of section.
7 As just above.


[page 228]
228                               Saṃyojanasampayuttadukaṃ.
     3. Saṃyojanasampayutto dhammo . . .
     Purimā purimā uddhaccasahagatā khandhā pacchimānaṃ
pacchimānaṃ uddhaccasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa
ca anantarapaccayena paccayo.
     4. Saṃyojanasampayutto dhammo . . .
     Purimā purimā uddhaccasahagato moho pacchimassa
. . .1 Purimā purimā saṃyojanavippayuttā khandhā
pacchinānaṃ . . . pe2 . . . phalasamāpattiyā nanatara-
paccayena paccayo.
     5. Saṃyojanavippayutto dhammo . . .
     Purimā purimā uddhaccasahagato moho pacchimānaṃ
pacchimānaṃ uddhaccasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ nanatara-
paccayena paccayo. Āvajjanā saṃyojanasampayuttānaṃ
khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
     6. Saṃyojanavippayutto dhammo . . .
     Purimā . . .3 khandhānaṃ mohassa ca anantarapacca-
yena paccayo. Āvajjanā uddhaccasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ
mohassa ca anantarapaccayena paccayo.
     7. Saṃyojanasampayutto ca saṃyojanavippayutto ca . . .
     Purimā purimā uddhaccasahagatā khandhā ca moho ca
pacchimānaṃ . . .4
     8. Saṃyojanasampayutto ca . . .
     Purimā purimā uddhaccasahagatā khanahā ca moho ca
pacchimassa . . .1 Uddhaccasahagatā khandhā ca moho
ca vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
     9. Saṃyojanasampayutto ca . . .
     Purimā . . .5 pacchimānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca
anantarapaccayena paccayo.
     Saṃyojanasampayutto dhammo saṃyojanasampayuttassa
dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo . . . (nava) . . .
sahajāta- . . . (nava) . . . aññamañña- . . . (cha) . . .
nissayapaccayena paccayo (nava) . . . upanissayapacca-
yena paccayo.

1 As under 2.
2 So all the texts, cf.p. 12.
3 As under 5.
4 As under 5 (one sentence).
5 As under 7.


[page 229]
                          Upanissayavāro.          229
     Ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanis-
sayo; . . . pe . . . Pakatūpanissayo:-- saṃyojanasam-
payuttā khandhā saṃyojanasampayuttānaṃ khandhānaṃ
upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
     2. Saṃyojanasampayutto dhammo . . .
     Anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo . . . pe . . . Pakat-
ūpanissayo:-- saṃyojanasampayuttā khandhā saṃyojanavip-
payuttānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca upanissayapaccayena
paccayo.
     3. Saṃyojanasampayutto dhammo . . .
     Anantarūpanissayo . . .1 khandhā uddhaccasahagatānaṃ
khandhānaṃ mohassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
     4. Saṃyojanavippayutto dhammo . . .
     Ārammaṇūpanissayo . . . pe . . . Pakatūpanissayo:--
saddhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti, . . . pe2 . . . samāpattiṃ
uppādeti; sīlaṃ . . . pe . . . paññaṃ, kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ, kāyikaṃ
dukkhaṃ, senāsanaṃ, mohaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti . . .
pe . . . samāpattiṃ uppādeti; saddhā . . . pe . . . senā-
sanaṃ maho ca saddhāya . . . pe4 . . . phalasamāpattiyā
upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
     5. Saṃyojanavippayutto dhammo . . .
     Ārammaṇūpanissayo . . . pe . . . Pakatūpanissayo:--
saddhaṃ upanissāya mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti. sīlaṃ
. . . pe . . . paññaṃ kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ5 . . . pe . . . senā-
sanaṃ, mohaṃ upanissāya pānaṃ hanati6 . . . pe . . .
saṃghaṃ bhindati: saddhā . . . pe4 . . . senāsanaṃ moho
rāgassa . . . pe . . . patthanāya upanissayapaccayena
paccayo.
     6. Saṃyojanavippayutto dhammo . . .
     Anantarūpanissayo . . . pe . . . Pakatūpanissayo:--
saddhā . . . pe4 . . . paññā kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ . . . pe4
. . . senādanaṃ moho ca uddhaccasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ
mohassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
     7. Saṃyojanasampayutto ca saṃyojanavippayutto ca . . .
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 As above.
2 Cf.p. 186, § 4.
3 S. mohassa ca.
4 R. has no lacuna.
5 R. dukkhaṃ
6 S. hanti.


[page 230]
230                Saṃyojanasampayuttadukaṃ.
     Anantarūpanissayo . . . pe . . . Pakatūpanissayo:--
uddhaccasahagatā khandhā ca moho ca saṃyojanasampa-
yuttānaṃ1 khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
     8. Saṃyojanasampayutto ca . . .
     Anantarūpanissayo . . .2 moho ca saṃyojanavippa-
yuttānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca upanissayapaccayena
paccayo.
     9. Saṃyojanasampayutto ca . . .
     Anantarūpanissayo . . .2 moho ca uddhaccasahagatānaṃ
khandhānaṃ mohassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
     4. Saṃyojanavippayutto dhammo saṃyojanavippayut-
tassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
     Ārammaṇapurejātaṃ, vatthupurejātaṃ. Ārammaṇapure-
jātaṃ:-- cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ aniccato . . . pe
. . . dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā
saddaṃ suṇāti; rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa . . . pe . . .
phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa . . . Vatthupurejātaṃ:--
cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa . . . pe . . . kāyāyatanaṃ
kāyaviññāṇassa, vatthu saṃyojanavippayuttānaṃ khandhā-
naṃ mohassa ca purejātapaccayena paccayo.
     5. Saṃyojanavippayutto dhammo saṃyojanasampayut-
tassa . . .
     Ārammaṇapurejātaṃ . . . pe3 . . . vatthuṃ assādeti
abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo . . . pe . . . domanassaṃ
uppajjati. Vatthupurejātaṃ:-- vatthuṃ saṃyojanasampa-
yuttānaṃ1 khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
     6. Saṃyojanavippayutto dhammo . . .
     Ārammaṇapurejātaṃ . . .4 pe . . . vatthuṃ ārabbha
uddhaccasahagatā khandhā ca moho ca uppajjanti. Vatthu
uddhaccasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca purejāta-
paccayena paccayo.
     2. Saṃyojanasampayutto dhammo saṃyojanavippayut-
tassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 R. and B. -yuttakānaṃ.
2 As under 7.
3 As under 4.
4 As under 5.


[page 231]
                     Kammavāro.                         231
     Pacchājātā saṃyojanasampayuttā khandhā purejātassa
imassa kāyassa pacchājārapaccayena paccayo.
     4. Saṃyojanavippayutto dhammo . . .
     Pacchājārā saṃyojanavippayuttā khandhā ca moho ca
purejātassa . . .1
     8. Saṃyojanasampayutto ca saṃyojanavippayutto ca
dhammā saṃyojanavippayuttassa . . .
     Pacchājātā uddhaccasahagatā khandhā ca moho ca pure-
jātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
     1. Saṃyojanasampayutto dhammo saṃyojanasampayut-
tassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo . . . (nava.
Āvajjanā pi vuṭṭhānam pi natthi) . . . kammapaccayena pac-
cayo.
     Saṃyojanasampayuttā cetanā saṃyojanasampayuttānaṃ2
khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
     2. Saṃyojanasampayutto dhammo . . .
     Sahajātā, nānākhaṇikā. Sahajātā:-- saṃyojanasampa-
yuttā cetanā3 cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapacca-
yena paccayo. Uddhaccasahagatā cetanā mohassa citta-
samuṭṭhānañ ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
Nānākhaṇikā:-- saṃyojanasampayuttā2 cetanā vipākānaṃ
khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
     3. Saṃyojanasampayutto dhammo saṃyojanasampa-
yuttassa ca . . .
     Saṃyojanasampayutto cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ4 khan-
dhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena
paccayo. Uddhaccasahagatā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ4
khandhānaṃ mohassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca . . .
     4. Saṃyojanavippayutto dhammo . . .
     Sahajātā, nānākhaṇikā. Sahajātā saṃyojanavippayuttā
cetanā . . .5 Paṭisandhikkhaṇe nānākhaṇikā saṃyojana-
vippayuttā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca
rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 As under 2.
2 R. -yuttakā[naṃ].
3 B. omit to vipākānaṃ.
4 So also K.
5 As under 3 (one sentence).


[page 232]
232           Saṃyojanasampayuttadukaṃ.
     4. Saṃyojanavippayutto dhammo saṃyojanavippayut-
tassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo . . . (ekaṃ).
     1. Saṃyojanasampayutto dhammo saṃyojanasampayut-
tassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo . . . (cattāri) . . .
indriya- . . . (cattāri) . . . jhāna- . . . (cattāri) . . . magga-
. . . (cattāri) . . . sampayuttapaccayena paccayo . . . (cha).
     2. Saṃyojanasampayutto dhammo saṃyojanavippayut-
tassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
     Sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ . . . (saṃkhittaṃ).
     4. Saṃyojanavippayutto dhammo . . .2 vippayuttapacca-
yena paccayo.
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ . . . (saṃkhittaṃ).
     5. Saṃyojanavippayutto dhammo . . .
     Purejātaṃ vatthu saṃyojanasampayuttānaṃ khandhānaṃ
vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
     6. Saṃyojanavippayutto dhammo . . .
     Purejātaṃ3 vatthu uddhaccasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ
mohassa ca vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
     8. Saṃyojanasampayutto ca saṃyojanavippayutto ca
dhammā saṃyojanavippayuttassa dhammassa vippayutta-
paccayena paccayo.
     Sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ . . . (saṃkhittaṃ).
     1. Saṃyojanasampayutto dhammo saṃyojanasampayut-
tassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo . . . (ekaṃ,
paṭiccasadisaṃ).
     2. Saṃyojanasampayutto dhammo . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. Sahajātā saṃyojanasampayuttā
khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena pac-
cayo. Uddhaccasahagatā khandhā mohassa cittasamuṭṭhā-
nānañ ca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā4
saṃyojanasampayuttā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa
atthipaccayena paccayo.
     3. Saṃyojanasampayutto dhammo . . .
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. here inserts formula 4. K. has formula 1. Cf. p. 17, § 2.
2 B. repeats formula 4.
3 R. Vatthupurejātaṃ || vatthu, etc.
4 S. substitutes ekaṃ paṭiccasarisaṃ.


[page 233]
                     Atthivāro.                     233
     Purejātaṃ1 vatthu saṃyojanasampayuttānaṃ khandhānaṃ
vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
     Saṃyojanasampayutto eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhā-
naṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena pac-
cayo; dve . . . Uddhaccasahagato eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ
khandhānaṃ mohassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca . . .2
     4. Saṃyojanavippayutto dhammo . . .
     Sahajātaṃ. purejātaṃ. pacchājātaṃ āhāraṃ indriyaṃ . . .
(saṃkhittaṃ, vitthāretabbaṃ).
     5. Saṃyojanavippayutto dhammo . . .
     Sahajātaṃ. purejātaṃ. Sahajāto uddhaccasahagato moho
sampayuttānaṃ3 khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
Purejātaṃ:-- cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ assādeti
abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo . . . pe . . . domanassaṃ
uppajjati. Vatthu saṃyojanasampayuttānaṃ3 khandhānaṃ
atthipaccayena paccayo.
     6. Saṃyojanavippayutto dhammo . . .
     Sahajātaṃ . . .2 khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca
rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. Purejātaṃ:-- cakkhuṃ
. . . pe . . . vattuṃ ārabbha uddhaccasahagatā khandhā
ca moho ca uppajjanti. Vatthu uddhaccasahagatānaṃ
khandhānaṃ mohassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo.
     7. Saṃyojanasampayutto ca saṃyojanavippayutto ca . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. Sahajāto saṃyojanasampayutto
eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ atthi-
paccayena paccayo; dve . . . Uddhaccasahagato eko
khandho ca moho ca tiṇṇannaṃ . . .5
     8. Saṃyojanasampayutto ca . . .
     Sahajātaṃ. purejātaṃ. pacchājātaṃ āhāraṃ indriyaṃ.
Sahajātā saṃyojanasampayuttā khandhā ca mahābhūtā
ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
Uddhaccasahagatā khandhā ca moho ca cittasamuṭṭhānā-
naṃ . . .5 Uddhaccasahagatā khandhā ca vatthu ca
mohassa atthipaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā:-- uddhacca-
sahagatā khandhā ca moho ca purejātassa imassa kāyassa
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 R. omits this sentence.
2 As above.
3 R. -yuttakānaṃ.
4 As under 5.
5 As just above.


[page 234]
234                Saṃyojanasampayuttadukaṃ.
atthipaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā saṃyojanasampayuttā
khandhā ca kabaḷiṃkāro āhāro ca imassa . . .1 Pacchājātā
saṃyojanasampayuttā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañ ca
kaṭattā rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
     9. Saṃyojanasampayutto ca . . .
     Sahajātaṃ. purejātaṃ. Sahajāto uddhaccasahagato eko
khandho ca moho ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasam-
uṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo; dve . . .
Sahajāto uddhaccasahagato2 eko khandho ca vatthu3 ca
tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca atthipaccayena pac-
cayo; dve . . . natthipaccayena paccayo . . . vigata- . . .
avigatapaccayena paccayo . . .
          Hetuyā cha.                     kamme cattāri,
          ārammaṇe nava,                    vipāke ekaṃ,
          adhipatiyā pañca,                āhāre cattāri,6
          anantare nava,                    indriye cattāri,
          samanantare nava,4                jhāni cattāri,
          sahajāte nava,                    magge cattāri,
          aññanaññe cha,5                sampayutte cha,
          nissaye nava,                     vippayutte pañca,
          upanissaye nava,                atthiyā nava,
          purejāte tīṇi,                    natthiyā nava,
          pacchājāte tīṇi,                vigate nava,
          āsevane nava,                     avigate nava.
     1. Saṃyojanasampayutto dhammo . . . ārammaṇa- . . .
sahajāta . . . upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
     2. Saṃyojanasampayutto dhammo . . . ārammaṇa- . . .7
pacchājāta- . . . kammapaccayena paccayo.
     3. Saṃyojanasampayutto dhammo . . . ārammaṇa- . . .7
     4. Saṃyojanasampayutto dhammo . . . ārammaṇa- . . .7
purejāta- . . . pacchājāta- . . . kamma- . . . āhāra- . . .
indriyapaccayena paccayo.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 As just above.
2 S. substitutes vicikicchāsahagato.
3 S. omits.
4 B. omits clause.
5 S. nava.
6 B. omits these two clauses.
7 As under 1.


[page 235]
                         Mātikā.                     235
     5. Saṃyojanavippayutto dhammo . . . ārammaṇa- . . .1
purejātapaccayena paccayo.
     6. Saṃyojanavippayutto dhammo . . . ārammaṇa- . . .2
     7. Saṃyojanasampayutto ca . . . ārammaṇa- . . .1
     8. Saṃyojanasampayutto ca . . . ārammaṇa- . . .1
pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
     9. Saṃyojanasampayutto ca . . . ārammaṇa- . . .1
upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
          Nahetuyā nava,               sabbattha nava;
          nārammaṇe nava,           novigate nava,
                                    no-avigate nava.
          Hetupaccayā, nārammaṇe     namagge cha,
           cha . . . (saṃkhittaṃ),     nasampayutte dve,
          nasamanantare cha,           navipayutte tīṇi,
          na-aññamaññe cha,3           nonatthiyā cha,
          na-upanissaye cha . . .     novigate cha.
           (saṃkhittaṃ),
          Nahetupaccayā, ārammaṇe     adhipatiyā pañca . . .
           nava,                (anulomapadāni gaṇitabbāni4) avigate nava.
                    SAṂYOJANASAMPAYUTTA-DUKAṂ niṭṭitaṃ.

1 As under 1.
2 As under 5.
