4 R. gaṇetabbāni.


[page 236]
                               236
                               [XXIII.
                SAṂYOJANO-CEVA-SAṂYOJANIYA-DUKAṂ.]
     1. Saṃyojanañ ceva saṃyojaniyañ ca1 dhammaṃ paṭicca
saṃyojano ceva saṃyojaniyo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupac-
cayā.
     Kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ paṭicca diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ avijjā-
saṃyojanaṃ . . . (cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ).
     2. Saṃyojanañ ceva saṃyojaniyañ dhammaṃ paṭicca
saṃyojaniyo ceva no ca saṃyojano dhammo uppajjati hetu-
paccayā.
     Saṃyojane2 paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhā-
nañ ca rūpaṃ.
     3. Saṃyojanañ ceva saṃyojaniyañ ca dhammaṃ paṭicca
saṃyojano ceva saṃyojaniyo3 ca saṃyojaniyo ceva no ca
saṃyojano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
     Kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ paṭicca diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ avijjā-
saṃyojanaṃ sampayuttakā ca khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca
rūpaṃ . . . (cakkaṃ).
     4. Saṃyojaniyañ ceva no ca saṃyojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca
saṃyojaniyo ceva no ca saṃyojanaṃ dhammo . . .
     Saṃyojaniyañ ceva no ca saṃyojanaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ
paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . .
(paṭisandhi yāva mahābhūtā).
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 K. omits the ca after ceva except in negative clauses.
2 So also R. Cf.p. 195, n. 5.
3 S. has ending in ā here only. R. omits ca between -jano
     and dhammā throughout.


[page 237]
                          Paṭiccavāro.                          237
     5. Saṃyojaniyañ ceva no ca saṃyojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca
saṃyojano ceva saṃyojaniyo . . .
     Saṃyojaniye ceva no ca saṃyojane khandhe paṭicca
saṃyojanā.
     6. Saṃyojaniyañ ceva no ca saṃyojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca
saṃyojano ceva saṃyojaniyo ca saṃyojaniyo ceva no ca
saṃyojano1 ca dhammā . . .
     Saṃyojaniyañ ceva no ca saṃyojanaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ
paṭicca tayo khandhā saṃyojanā ca cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca
rūpaṃ; dve . . .
     7. Saṃyojanañ ceva saṃyojaniyañ ca saṃyojaniyañ ceva
no ca saṃyojanaṃ ca dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃyojano ceva
saṃyojaniyo ca . . .
     Kāmarāgasaṃyojanañ ca sampayuttake ca khandhe
paṭicca diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ . . . (cakkaṃ).
     8. Saṃyojanañ ceva . . . paṭicca saṃyojaniyo ceva no ca
saṃyojano dhammo . . .
     Saṃyojaniyañ ceva no ca saṃyojanaṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca
saṃyojane2 ca paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca
rūpaṃ; dve . . .
     9. Saṃyojanañ ceva . . . paṭicca saṃyojano ceva saṃyo-
janiyo ca saṃyojaniyo ceva no ca saṃyojano3 dhammā
uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
     Saṃyojaniyañ ceva no ca saṃyojanaṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca
kāmarāgasaṃyojanañ ca paṭicca tayo khandhā diṭṭhisaṃyo-
janaṃ avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ4 cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve
. . . (cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ. Saṃyojanagocchake paṭhama-
dukasadisaṃ. Evaṃ imam pi5 dukaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. Ninnā-
nākaraṇaṃ ṭhapetvā lokuttraṃ).
           SAṂYOJANO-CEVA-SAṂYOJANOYA-DUKAṂ niṭṭhitaṃ.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. -janā here only.
2 S. -janañ.
3 S. -yā, -nā, resp.
4 S. omits.
5 S. Imaṃ pana.


[page 238]
                          238
                          [XXIV.
     SAṂYOJANO-CEVA-SAṂYOJANASAMPAYUTTADUKAṂ.]
     1. Saṃyojanañ ceva saṃyojanasampayuttañ dhammaṃ
paṭicca saṃyojano ceva saṃyojanasampayutto dhammo
uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Kāmarāghasaṃyojanaṃ paṭicca diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ avijjā-
saṃyojanaṃ.
     2. Saṃyojanañ ceva saṃyojanasampayuttañ . . . saṃ-
yojanasampayutto ceva no ca saṃyojano dhammo . . .
     Saṃyojane1 paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā.
     3. Saṃyojanañ ceva . . . paṭicca saṃyojano ceva saṃyo-
janasampayutto ca saṃyojanasampayutto ceva no saṃyo-
jano ca dhammā2 . . .
     Kāmarāga- . . . (cf. 1) avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ sampayuttakā
ca khandhā.
     4. Saṃyojanasampayuttañ ceva no ca saṃyojanaṃ
dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃyojanasampayutto ceva no ca saṃyo-
jano dhammo . . .
     Saṃyojanasampayuttañ ceva no ca saṃyojanaṃ ekaṃ
khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā; dve . . .
     5. Saṃyojanasampayuttañ ceva . . . paṭicca saṃyojano
ceva saṃyojanasampayutto ca dhammo . . .
     Saṃyojanasampayutte ceva no ca saṃyojane khandhe
paṭicca saṃyojanā.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. inserts khandhe. R. saṃyojanaṃ.
2 S. -jano dhammo. R. omits last ca as before.


[page 239]
                          Paṭiccavāro; Paccaniyaṃ.                239
     6. Saṃyojanasampayuttañ ceva . . . paṭicca saṃyojano
ceva saṃyojanasampayutto ca saṃyojanasampayutto ceva
no ca saṃyojano1 ca dhammā . . .
     Saṃyojanasampayuttañ ceva no ca saṃyojanaṃ ekaṃ
khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā saṃyojanā ca; dve . . .
     7. Saṃyojanañ ceva saṃyojanasampayuttañ ca saṃyojana-
sampayuttañ ceva no ca saṃyojanañ ca dhammaṃ paṭicca
saṃyojano ceva saṃyojanasampayutto ca . . .
     Kāmarāgasaṃyojanañ ca sampayuttake ca khandhe
paṭicca diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ . . . (cakkaṃ).
     8. Saṃyojanañ ceva . . . paṭicca saṃyojanasampayutto
ceva no ca saṃyojano dhammo . . .
     Saṃyojanasampayuttañ ceva no ca saṃyojanaṃ ekaṃ
khandhañ ca saṃyojane2 ca paṭicca tayo khandhā; dve . . .
     9. Saṃyojanañ ceva . . . paṭicca saṃyojano ceva saṃyo-
janasampayutta ca saṃyojanasampayuttoceva no ca saṃyo-
jano ca dhammā3 uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
     Saṃyojana- . . .4 khandhañ ca kāmarāgasaṃyojanañ ca
paṭicca tayo khandhā diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ;
dve . . . (cakkaṃ).
          Hetuyā nava,                     kamme nava,5
          ārammaṇe nava,                    āhāre nava,
          adhipatiyā nava,                avigate nava.
          sabbattha nava;
     1. Saṃyojanañ ceva saṃyojanasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ
paṭicca saṃyojano6 ceva saṃyojanasampayutto ca dhammo
uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
     Vicikicchāsaṃyojanaṃ paṭicca avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ.
     5. Saṃyojanasampayuttañ ceva no ca saṃyojanaṃ dham-
maṃ paṭicca saṃyojano6 ceva saṃyojanasampayutto ca
dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
     Vicikicchāsahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato
moho.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 So also S.
2 R. and B. saññojanaṃ.
3 S. -jano dhammo uppajjanti.
4 As under 8.
5 B. omits clause
6 S. -janaṃ throughout.


[page 240]
240                Saṃyojano-ceva-saṃyojanasampayuttadukaṃ.
     7. Saṃyojanañ ceva saṃyojanasampayuttaṃ ca saṃyojana-
sampayuttañ ceva no ca saṃyojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca
saṃyojano ceva saṃyojanasampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati
nahetupaccayā.
     Vicikicchāsaṃyojanañ ca sampayuttake ca khandhe
paṭicca avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ.
          Nahetuyā tīṇi,                    nāsevāne nava,
          nādhipatiyā nava,1                nakamme tīṇi,
          napurejāte nava,                navipāke nava,
          napacchājāte nava,                navippayutte nava.
(Evaṃ itare pi dve gaṇanā sahajātavāro pi kātabbo. Paccaya-
vāro pi nissayavāro pi saṃsaṭṭhavāro pi sampayuttavāro pi
paṭiccavārasadisā2.
     Saṃyojano3 ceva saṃyojanasampayutto ca dhammo saṃyo-
janassa ceva saṃyojanasampayuttassa dhammassa hetupac-
cayena paccayo.
     Kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ4 diṭṭhisaṃyojanassa avijjāsaṃyoja-
nassa hetupaccayena paccayo . . . (cakkaṃ).
     2. Saṃyojano3 . . . dhammo saṃyojanasampayuttassa
ceva no ca saṃyojanassa . . .
     Saṃyojanā5 ceva saṃyojanasampayuttā6 ca hetū sampa-
yuttakānaṃ7 khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
     3. Saṃyojano3 . . . dhammo saṃyojanassa ceva saṃyo-
janasampayuttassa ca saṃyojanasampayuttassa ceva no ca
saṃyojanassa ca . . .
     Kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ diṭṭhisaṃyojanassa avijjāsaṃyoja-
nassa sampayuttakānañ7 ca khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena
paccayo.
     1. Saṃyojanañ ceva saṃyojanasampayutto dhammo
saṃyojanassa ceva saṃyojanasampayuttassa ca dhammassa
ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
     Saṃyojane ārabbha saṃyojanā uppajjanti . . . (mūlaṃ
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. tīṇi.
2 R. and B. -sadiso.
3 S. -janaṃ as above.
4 R. -jano.
5 K. -jano.
6 So all texts.
7 So also K. Cf. pp. 230 foll.


[page 241]
                         Adhipativāro.                          241
kātabbaṃ). Saṃyojane1 ārabbha saṃyojanasampayuttā ceva
no ca saṃyojanā khandhā uppajjanti . . . (mūlaṃ kātabbaṃ).
Saṃyojane ārabbha saṃyojanā ca saṃyojanasampayuttakā2
ca khandhā uppajjanti.
     4. Saṃyojanasampayutto ceva no ca saṃyojano dhammo
saṃyojanasampayuttassa ceva no ca saṃyojanassa . . .
     Saṃyojanasampayutte ceva no ca saṃyojane khandhe
ārabbha saṃyojanasampayuttā ceva no ca saṃyojanā
khandhā uppajjanti.
     5. Saṃyojanasampayutto . . . dhammo saṃyojanassa
ceva saṃyojanasampayuttassa . . .
     Saṃyojanasampayutte ceva no ca saṃyojane khandhe
ārabbha saṃyojanā3 uppajjanti.
     6. Saṃyojanasampayutto dhammo saṃyojanassa ceva
saṃyojanasampayuttassa ca saṃyojanasampayuttassa ceva
no ca saṃyojanassa ca . . .
     Saṃyojanasampayutte . . .4 saṃyojanā ca saṃyojana-
sampayuttakā2 ca khandhā uppajjanti.
     7. Saṃyojano ceva saṃyojanasampayutto ca saṃyojana-
sampayutto ceva no ca saṃyojano ca dhammā saṃyojanassa
ceva saṃyojanasampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapacca-
yena paccayo . . . (tīṇi).
     1. Saṃyojanañ ceva saṃyojanasampayutto ca dhammo
saṃyojanassa ceva saṃyojanasampayuttassa dhammassa
adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
     Ārammaṇādhipati . . . (tīṇi).
     4. Saṃyojanasampayutto ceva no ca saṃyojano dhammo
saṃyojanasampayuttassa ceva no ca saṃyojanassa . . .
     Ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati . . . (tīṇi; imāsu
tīsu pi pañhāsu ārammaṇādhipati pi sahajātādhipati5
pi kātabbā).
     7. Saṃyojano ceva saṃyojanasampayutto ca saṃyojana-
sampayutto ceva no ca saṃyojano ca dhammā saṃyojanassa
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 So also S.
2 K. omits saṃyojana.
3 S. -janaṃ.
4 As under 5.
5 B. omits.


[page 242]
242                Saṃyojano-ceva-saṃyojanasampayuttadukaṃ.
ceva saṃyojanasampayuttassa ca dhammassa adhipatipacca-
yena paccayo.
     Ārammaṇādhipati . . . (tīṇi).
     1. Saṃyojano ceva saṃyojanasampayutto ca dhammo
saṃyojanassa ceva saṃyojanasampayuttassa ca dhammassa
anantarapaccayina paccayo . . . (nava. Ninnānākaraṇaṃ.
Vibhajanā natthi. Ārammaṇasadisā1) . . . samanantara-
paccayena paccayo . . . (nava), sahajāta- . . . (nava),2
aññamañña- . . . (nava), nissaya- . . . (nava), upanissaya-
. . .3 (nava); ārammaṇanayena4 kātabbā), āsevanapaccayena
paccayo . . . (nava).
     4. Saṃyojanasampayutto ceva no ca saṃyojano dhammo
saṃyojanasampayuttassa ceva no ca saṃyojanassa dham-
massa kammapaccayena paccayo . . . (tīṇi), āhāra- . . .
(tīṇi), idriya- . . . (tīṇi), jhāna- . . . (tīṇi), magga- . . .
(nava), sampayutta- . . . (nava), vippayutta- . . . (nava),
atthi- . . . (nava), natthi- . . . (nava), vigata- . . . (nava),
avigatapaccayena paccayo . . . (nava).
          Hetuyā tīṇi,                     kamme tīṇi,
          ārammaṇe nava,                    āhāre tīṇi,
          adhipatiyā nava,                indriye tīṇi,
          anantare nava,                    jhāne tīṇi,
          samanantare nava,                magge nava,5
          sahajāte nava,                    sampayutte nava,
          aññamaññe nava,                atthiyā nava,
          nissaye nava,                     natthiyā nava,6
          upanissaye nava,3                vigate nava,6
          āsevane nava,                     avigate nava.
     1. Saṃyojano ceva saṃyojanasampayutto ca dhammo saṃ-
yojanassa ceva saṃyojanasampayuttassa ca dhammassa
ārammaṇā- . . . sahajāta- . . . upanissayapaccayena pac-
cayo. (saṃkhittaṃ. Evaṃ nava pañhā kātabbā. Tīsu yeva
padesu7 parivattetabbā. Nānākhaṇikā8 natthi.)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. -sadiso.
2 S. omits clause.
3 B. omits clause.
4 S. -nayo.
5 B. tīṇi.
6 B. and S. omit clause.
7 K. paresu.
8 Cf. p. 231 §§ 2-4.


[page 243]
                               Paccaniyānulomaṃ.                243
          Nahetuyā nava,                          sabbattha nava;
          nārammaṇe nava,                         novigate1 nava.
          Hetupaccayā, nārammaṇe                namagge tīṇi,
           tīṇi . . . (saṃkhittaṃ),           nasampayutte tīṇi,2
          nasamanatare tīṇi,                     navippayutte tīṇi,
          na-upanissaye tīṇi,                     nonatthiyā tīṇi,
          napurejāte tīṇi . . . (saṃkhittaṃ),     novigate tīṇi.
          Nahetupaccayā, ārammaṇe                adhipatiyā nava,
           nava . . . (anulomapadāni           avigate nava.
               kātabbāni) . . .
     SAṂYOJANO-CEVA-SAṂYOJANASAMPAYUTTA-DUKAṂ niṭṭhitaṃ.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. avigate R. no-avigate.
2 K. and S. omit clause.


[page 244]
                               244
                               [XXV.
                     SAṂYOJANAVIPPAYUTTA-SAṂYOJANIYA-DUKAṂ.]
     1. Saṃyojanavippayutta-saṃyojaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca
saṃyojanavippayutta-saṃyojaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetu-
paccayā.
     Saṃyojanavippayutta-saṃyojaniyaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca
tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve (paṭi-
sandhi yāva asaññasattā1; mahābahūtā).
     2. Saṃyojanavippayutta-saṃyojaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca
saṃyojanavippayutta-asaṃyojaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetu-
paccayā.
     Saṃyojanavippayutta-asaṃyojaniyaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ
paṭicca tayo khandhā; dve . . .
     4. Saṃyojanavippayutta-asaṃyojaniyaṃ dhammaṃ . . .
(dve pañhā kātabbā. Imaṃ dukaṃ cūḷantaraduke2 lokiya-
dukasadisaṃ. Ninnānākaranaṃ).
           SAṂYOJANAVIPPAYUTTA-SAṂYOJANIYA-DUKAṂ niṭṭhitaṃ
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. omits Cf. pp. 6, 7.
2 K. cuḷ-.


[page 245]
                          245
                         [XXVI.
                    GANTHA-DUKAṂ.]
     1. Ganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca gantho dhammo uppajjati
hetupaccayā.
     Sīlabbataparāmāsakāyaganthaṃ1 paṭicca abhijjhākāya-
gantho, abhijjhākāyaganthaṃ paṭicca sīlabbataparāmāsa-
kāyagantho, idaṃsaccābhinivesakāyaganthaṃ paṭicca abhij-
jhākāyagantho, abhijjhākāyaganthaṃ paṭicca idaṃsacca-
bhinivesakāyagantho.
     2. Ganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho dhammo uppaj-
jati hetupaccayā.
     Ganthe4 paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañ
ca rūpaṃ.
     3. Ganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca gantho ca nogantho ca
dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
     Sīlabbataparāmāsakāyaganthaṃ paṭicca abhijjhākāya-
gantho sampayuttakā ca khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca
rūpaṃ . . . (cakkaṃ).
     4. Noganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho dhammo . . .
     Noganthaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā citta-
samuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe
khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā; ekaṃ
mahābhūtaṃ . . . pe . . .2
     5. Noganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca gantho dhammo . . .
     Noganthe khandhe paṭicca ganthā.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 R. and B. sīlabbataparāmāsaṃ kāya- , etc.
2 B. adds rūpaṃ.


[page 246]
246                     Ganthadukaṃ.
     6. Noganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca gantho ca nogantho
ca dhammā . . .
     Noganthaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā ganthā
ca cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . .
     7. Ganthañ ca noganthañ ca dhammaṃ paṭicca gantho . . .
     Sīlabbataparāmāsakāyaganthañ ca sampayuttake ca
khandhe paṭicca abhijjhākāyagantho . . . (cakkaṃ).
     8. Ganthañ ca noganthañ ca dhammaṃ paṭicca no-
gantho . . .
     Noganthaṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca ganthe1 ca paṭicca tayo
khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . .
     9. Ganthañ ca . . . paṭicca gantho ca nogantho ca
dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
     Noganthaṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca sīlabbataparāmāsakāya-
ganthañ ca paṭicca tayo khandhā2 abhijjhākāyagantho citta-
samuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . . (cakkaṃ; saṃkhittaṃ) . . .
ārammaṇapaccayā . . . avigatapaccayā.
          Hetuyā nava,                     vipāke ekaṃ,
          ārammaṇe nava,                    āhāre nava,
          adhipatiyā nava,                avigate nava.
          sabbattha nava;
     4. Noganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho dhammo
uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
     Ahetukaṃ noganthaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ3 paṭicca tayo
khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . . (ahetuka-
paṭisandhi yūva asaññasattā). Vicikicchāsahagato uddhacca-
sahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasaha-
gato moho.
     2. Ganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho dhammo uppaj-
jati nārammaṇapaccayā.
     Ganthe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
     4. Noganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho . . .
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. ganthañ.
2 S. omits last two words.
3 B. omits last two words.


[page 247]
                     Paccaniyaṃ.                          247
     Noganthe khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ . . .
(paṭisandhi yāva asaññasattā).
     8. Ganthañ ca noganthañ ca dhammaṃ paṭicca no-
gantho dhammo uppajjati nārammaṇapaccayā.
     Ganthe ca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca cittasam-
uṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ . . . (saṃkhittaṃ).
     . . . nādhipatipaccayā . . . (nava), nānantarapaccayā
. . . (nava),1 nasamanantarapaccayā . . ., (nava),1 na añña-
maññapaccayā . . . (nava)1, na upanissayapaccayā . . .
(tīṇi).
     1. Ganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca gantho dhammo uppajjati
napurejātapaccayā.
     Arūpe idaṃsaccābhinivesakāyaganthaṃ paṭicca abhijjhā-
kāyagantho, abhijjhākāyaganthaṃ paṭicca idaṃsaccābhini-
vesakāyagantho. (Arūpe sīlabbataparāmāso natthi. Evaṃ
nava pañhā kātabbā.)
          napaccahājātapaccayā (nava),     najhānapaccayā (ekaṃ),
          nāsevanapaccayā (tīṇi),2           namaggapaccayā (ekaṃ),
          nakammapaccayā (tīṇi),           nasampayuttapaccayā (tīṇi)
          navipākapaccayā (nava),           navippayuttapaccayā (pañca),3
          nāhārapaccayā (ekaṃ),           nonatthipaccayā (tīṇi),
          na-indriyapaccayā (ekaṃ),          novigatapaccayā (tīṇi).
          Nahetuyā ekaṃ,                     nakamme tīṇi,
          nārammaṇe tīṇi,                    navipāke nava,
          nādhipatiyā nava,                nāhāre ekaṃ,
          nānantare tīṇi,                    na-indriye ekaṃ,
          nasamanantare tīṇi,                najhāne ekaṃ,
          na-aññamaññe tīṇi,4                namagge ekaṃ,4
          na-upanissaye tīṇi,                nasampayutte tīṇi,
          napurejāte nava,                navippayutte nava,
          napacchājāte nava,                nonatthiyā tīṇi,
          nāsevane nava,                     novigate tīṇi.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 R. and B. tīṇi.
2 K. ekaṃ.
3 R. and B. nava.
4 B. omits clause.


[page 248]
248                     Ganthadukaṃ.
     Hetupaccayā, nārammaṇe tīṇi, nādhipatiyā nava:-- evaṃ
gaṇetabbaṃ.
     Nahetupaccayā, ārammaṇṇe ekaṃ, anantare1 ekaṃ, avigate
ekaṃ.
     (Sahajātavāro pi paṭiccavārasadiso.)
     1. Ganthaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā gantho dhammo uppajjati
hetupaccayā . . . (tīṇi, paṭiccasadisā).2
     4. Noganthaṃ3 dhammaṃ paccayā nogantho dhammo . . .
     Noganthaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā citta-
samuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . . Paṭisandhikkhaṇe
khandhe paccayā vatthu, vatthuṃ paccayā khandhā;
ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ paccayā noganthā
khandhā.
     5. Noganthaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā gantho dhammo . . .
     Noganthe khandhe paccayā ganthā4; vatthuṃ paccayā
ganthā.5
     6. Noganthaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā gantho ca . . .
     Noganthaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā ganthā
ca cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . . Vatthuṃ paccayā
ganthā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
     7. Ganthañ ca noganthañ ca dhammaṃ paccayā gan-
tho . . .
     Sīlabbataparāmāsakāyaganthañ ca sampayuttake ca
khandhe paccayā abhijjhākāyagantho . . . (cakkaṃ).
Sīlabbataparāmāsakāyaganthañ ca vatthuñ ca paccayā
abhijjhākāyagantho . . . (cakkaṃ).
     8. Ganthañ ca noganthañ ca dhammaṃ paccayā no-
gantho . . .
     Noganthaṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca ganthe ca paccayā tayo
khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . . Ganthe ca
vatthuñ ca paccayā noganthā khandhā.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 K. samanantare.
2 S. paṭiccavāra-. R. -sadiso.
3 B. omits § 4.
4 S. khandhā, omitting next clause.
5 B. has noganthe paccayā khandhā vatthu paccayā khandhā.


[page 249]
                         Hetuvāro.                          249
     9. Ganthañ ca noganthañ ca dhammaṃ paccayā gantho
ca nogantho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
     Noganthaṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca sīlabbataparāmāsakāya-
ganthañ ca paccayā tayo khandhā abhijjhākāyagantho ca
cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . . (cakkaṃ). Sīlabbata-
parāmāsakāyaganthañ ca vatthuñ ca paccayā abhijjhākāya-
gantho sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti . . . (cakkaṃ).
          Hetuyā nava,                     adhipatiyā nava,
          ārammaṇe nava,                    avigate nava.
     4. Noganthaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nogantho dhammo
uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
     Ahetukaṃ noganthaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo
khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . . (paṭisandhi
yāva asaññasattā). Cakkhāyatanaṃ paccayā cakkhuviññā-
ṇaṃ, . . . kāyāyatanaṃ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṃ. Vatthuṃ
paccayā ahetuka noganthā khandhā. Vicikicchāsahagate
uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñ ca paccayā vicikic-
chāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho . . . (saṃkhittaṃ).
     Nahetuyā ekaṃ, nārammaṇe tīṇi, nādhipatiyā nava:-- evaṃ
gaṇetabbaṃ.
     Hetupaccayā,1 nārammaṇe tīṇi, nādhipatiyā nava, novi-
gate tīṇi.
     Nahetupaccayā, ārammaṇe ekaṃ, avigate ekaṃ.
     (Nissayavāro pi paccayavārasadiso.2 Saṃsaṭṭhavāro pi
sampayuttavāro3 pi, nava pañhā kātabbā. Rūpaṃ natthi.)
     1. Gantho dhammo ganthassa dhammassa hetupaccayena
paccayo.
     Ganthā hetū4 sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupacca-
yena paccayo.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. omits next seven words.
2 K. paṭiccavāra-.
3 B. omits.
4 K. hetū.


[page 250]
250                     Ganthadukaṃ.
     2. Gantho dhammo noganthassa dhammassa . . .
     Ganthā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasam-
uṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
     3. Gantho dhammo ganthassa ca noganthassa ca . . .
     Ganthā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ ganthānañ
ca cittasammuṭṭhānānañ ca . . .
     4. Nogantho dhammo noganthassa dhammassa . . .
     Nogathā hetū . . .1 hetupaccayena paccayo (paṭisandhi).
     5. Nogantho dhammo ganthassa dhammassa . . .
     Noganthā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetu-
paccayena paccayo.
     6. Nogantho dhammo ganthassa ca . . .2
     7. Gantho ca nogantho ca dhammā ganthassa . . .
     Ganthā ca noganthā ca hetū ganthānaṃ3 hetupaccayena
paccayo.
     8. Gantho ca nogantho ca dhammā noganthassa . . .
     Ganthā ca noganthā ca hetū . . .1
     9. Gantho ca nogantho ca dhammā . . .
     Ganthā ca noganthā ca hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhā-
naṃ ganthānañ ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañ cā rūpānaṃ hetu-
paccayena paccayo.
     1. Gantho dhammo ganthassa dhammassa ārammaṇa-
paccayena paccayo.
     Ganthe ārabbha ganthā uppajjanti . . . (mūlaṃ kātabbaṃ).
Ganthe ārabbha noganthā khandhā uppajjanti . . . (mūlaṃ
kātabbaṃ). Ganthe ārabbha ganthā ca sampayuttakā ca
khandhā uppajjanti.
     4. Nogantho dhammo noganthassa dhammassa āram-
maṇapaccayena paccayo.
     Dānaṃ sīlaṃ uposathakammaṃ taṃ paccavekkhati, pubbe
suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ pacca-
vekkhati. Ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ phalaṃ nib-
banaṃ paccavekkhanti. Nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa vodānassa
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 As under 2.
2 Continue as under 4 to end of section.
3 R. and B. have instead sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ.


[page 251]
                         Adhipativāro.                     251
maggassa phalassa āvajjanāyā ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
Ariyā noganthe pahīnakilese vikkhambhitakilese1 paccavek-
khanti; pubbe . . . cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ noganthe
khandhe aniccato . . . pe . . . domanassaṃ uppajjati;
dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā
saddaṃ suṇāti, cetopariyañāṇena noganthacittasamaṃ-
gissa cittaṃ jānāti. Ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyata-
nassa, ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa,
rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa . . . phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ
kāyaviññāṇassa, noganthā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa ceto-
pariyañāṇassa pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa yathākammū-
pagañāṇassa anāgataṃsañāṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapac-
cayena paccayo.
     5. Nogantho dhammo ganthassa dhammassa . . .
     Dānaṃ sīlaṃ uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ assādeti abhinan-
dati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, . . . pe
. . . domanassaṃ uppajjati.2 Pubbe suciṇṇāni . . . jhānā vuṭṭha-
hitvā jhānaṃ, . . . cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ noganthe
khandhe assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati2
. . . pe . . . domanassaṃ uppajjati.
     6. Nogantho dhammo ganthassa ca noganthassa . . .
     Dānaṃ . . .3 ārabbha ganthā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā
uppajjanti. Pubbe suciṇṇāni . . .3 taṃ ārabbha ganthā ca
sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
     7. Gantho ca nogantho ca dhammā ganthassa . . . pac-
cayo . . . (tīṇi; ārabbhā kātabbā).

cayena paccayo . . . (tīṇi, ārammaṇasadisā; garukāram-
maṇā kātabbā).

     Ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. Ārammaṇādhipati:--
dānaṃ sīlaṃ uposathakammaṃ . . . pubbe . . . jhānā . . . Ariyā

252                     Ganthadukaṃ.
maggā . . . phalaṃ . . . Nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa vodānassa
maggassa phalassa āvajjanāya adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
Cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ noganthe khandhe garuṃ
katvā assādeti adhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati,
diṭṭhi uppajjati, . . . pe . . . Sahajātādhipati:-- noganthā-
dhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañ
ca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.

vatthuṃ noganthe khandhe . . . pe . . . Sahajātādhipati:--
noganthādhipati ganthānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.

     Ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. Ārammaṇādhipati:--
dānaṃ . . . pe . . .1 noganthe khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti
abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā ganthā ca sampayuttakā ca
khandhā uppajjanti. Sahajātādhipati:-- noganthādhipati
sampāyuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ ganthānañ ca cittasamuṭṭhā-
nānañ ca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.

     Ārammaṇādhipati . . . (tīṇi).

cayena paccayo.

thanaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.

anantarapaccayena paccayo. Ganthā vuṭṭhānassa nanatara-
paccayena paccayo.

     Purimā . . .2 ganthānaṃ sampayuttakānañ ca khandhānaṃ
anantarapaccayena paccayo.

                          Upanissayavāro.                     253

anantarapaccayena paccayo . . . (tīṇi).

paccayena paccayo . . . (nava), . . . sahajātapaccayena
paccayo . . . (nava), . . . aññamaññapaccayena paccayo
. . . (nava), . . . nissayapaccayena paccayo . . . (nava)
. . . upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

sayo . . . pe . . . Pakatūpanissayo:-- ganthā ganthānaṃ
. . . (tīṇi).2
     4. Nogantho . . . noganthassa . . . upanissayapacca-
yena paccayo.

saddhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti, . . . pe . . . mānaṃ jappeti
diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti, sīlaṃ . . . pe . . . senāsanaṃ upanissāya
dānaṃ deti, . . . pe . . . saṃghaṃ bhindati; saddhā . . .
pe . . . senāsanaṃ saddhāya . . . pe . . . phalasamāpat-
tiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

     Ārammaṇūpanissayo . . .5 saddhaṃ upanissāya4 . . .

hanati . . . pe . . . saṃghaṃ bhindati; saddhā . . . pe
. . . senāsanaṃ rāgassa . . . pe . . . patthanāya upanis-
sayapaccayena paccayo.

paccayo.

thānaṃ khandhānaṃ. purejātapaccayena paccayo.

ca khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
. . . pacchājātapaccayena paccayo . . . (tīṇi) . . .
āsevanapaccayena paccayo . . . (nava).

paccayena paccayo.

sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca
rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. Nānākhaṇikā:-- no-
ganthā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ
kammapaccayena paccayo.

yuttapaccayena paccayo.

cayo.

dhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ3 vippayuttapacca-
yena paccayo.4

yena paccayo.

kānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ atthi-

yena paccayo.

[page 257]
                         Mātikā                                    257
ganthā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ
atthipaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā ganthā sampayuttakā
ca khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena
paccayo. Pacchājātā ganthā ca kavaḷiṃkāro āhāro ca
imassa . . .1 Pacchājātā ganthā ca rūpajīvitindriyañ ca
kaṭattā rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
     9. Gantho ca . . . dhammā ganthassa ca . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. Sahajāto nogantho eko khandho
ca sīlabbataparāmāsakāyagantho ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ
abhijjhākāyaganthassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ
atthipaccayena paccayo . . . (cakkaṃ). Sahajāto sīlabba-
taparāmāsakāyagantho ca vatthu ca abhijjhākāyaganthassa
ca sampayuttakānañ ca khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena pac-
cayo . . . (cakkaṃ).
          Hetuyā nava,                     indriye tīṇi,2
          ārammaṇe nava,                    jhāne tīṇi,2
          sabbattha nava;                magge nava,
          upanissaye nava,                sampayutte nava,
          purejāte tīṇi,                    vippayutte pañca,4
          pacchājāte tīṇi,2                atthiyā nava,
          āsevane nava,3                    natthiyā nava,2
          kamme tīṇi,                     vigate nava,
          vipāke ekaṃ,                     avigate nava.
          āhāre tīṇi,
     1. Gantho dhammo ganthassa dhammassa ārammaṇa-,
sahajāta-, upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
     2. Gantho dhammo noganthassa dhammassa ārammaṇa-
sahajāta-, upanissaya-, pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
     3. Gantho dhammo ganthassa ca noganthassa ca dham-
massa . . .5
     4. Nogantho dhammo noganthassa dhammassa āram-
maṇa-, sahajāta-, upanissaya-, purejāta-, pacchājāta-,
kamma-, āhāra-, indriyapaccayena paccayo.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 As above.
2 B. omits clause.
3 S. omits clause.
4 S. nava.
5 As under 1.


[page 258]
258                          Ganthadukaṃ.
     5. Nogantho dhammo ganthassa dhammassa ārammaṇa-,
sahajāta-, upanissaya-, purejātapaccayena paccayo.
     6. Nogantho dhammo ganthassa ca . . .1
     7. Gantho2 ca nogantho ca dhammā ganthassa . . .3
     8. Gantho ca nogantho ca dhammā noganthassa . . .4
     9. Gantho ca nogantho ca dhammā ganthassa ca nogan-
thassa ca . . .5
          Nahetuyā nava,                    sabbattha nava;
          nārammaṇe nava,                no-avigate6 nava.
          Hetupaccayā, nārammaṇe           namagge nava,
           nava (saṃkhittaṃ),           nasampayutte tīṇi,
          nasamanantare nava,               navippayutte nava,
          na-aññamaññe tīṇi,                nonatthiyā nava,
          na-upanissaye nava,               novigate nava.
          sabbattha nava;
          Nahetupaccayā, ārammaṇe           adhipatiyā nava,
           nava,
     (anulomapadāni paripuṇṇāni kātabbāni),
                          avigate nava.
                     GANTHA-DUKAN niṭṭhitaṃ.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 As under 5.
2 S. omits §§ 7-9.
3 As under 1.
4 As under 2.
5 As under 1.
6 S. avigate.


[page 259]
                               259
                          [XXVII.
                     GANTHANIYA-DUKAṂ.]
     Ganthaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthaniyo dhammo
uppajjati hetupaccayā,
     Ganthaniyaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ . . . [saṃkhittaṃ, yathā
cūḷantaraduke1 lokiyadukaṃ, evaṃ vibhajitabbaṃ. Ninnānā-
karaṇaṃ].
                GANTHANIYA-DUKAṂ niṭṭhitaṃ.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. and S. cull, --duko.


[page 260]
                          260
                          [XXVIII.
                GANTHASAMPAYUTTA-DUKAṂ.]
     1. Ganthasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthasampa-
yutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Ganthasampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo
khandhā; dve . . .
     2. Ganthasampayuttaṃ . . . ganthavippayutto . . .
     Ganthasampayutte khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhā-
naṃ rūpaṃ. Diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagate khandhe
paṭicca lobho cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ. Domanassa-
sahagate khandhe paṭicca paṭighaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca
rūpaṃ.
     3. Ganthasampayuttaṃ . . . ganthasampayutto ca . . .
     Ganthasampayuttaṃ ekaṃ . . .1 khandhā cittasamuṭṭhā-
nañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . . Diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasaha-
gataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā lobho ca
cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . . Domanassasaha-
gataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā paṭighañ ca
cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . .
     4. Ganthavippayuttaṃ . . . ganthavippayutto . . .
     Ganthavippayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā
cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . . Diṭṭhigatavippa-
yuttaṃ lobhaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Paṭighaṃ
paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe khandhe
paṭicca . . . (saṃkhittaṃ).
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 As under 1.


[page 261]
                          Paṭiccavāro.                     261
     5. Ganthavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca . . .
     Diṭṭhiganthavippayuttaṃ lobhaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā
khandhā. Paṭighaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā.
     6. Ganthavippayuttaṃ . . . ganthasampayutto ca . . .
     Diṭṭhigatavippayuttaṃ lobhaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā
khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ. Paṭighaṃ paṭicca
sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ.
     7. Ganthasampayuttañ ca ganthavippayuttañ ca dham-
maṃ . . .
     Diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca
lobhañ ca paṭicca tayo khandhā; dve . . . Domanassa-
sahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca paṭighañ ca paṭicca tayo
khandhā; dve . . .
     8. Ganthasampayuttañ ca ganthavippayuttañ ca . . .
     Ganthasampayutte khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca
cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasaha-
gate khandhe ca lobhañ ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
Domanassasahagate khandhe ca paṭighañ ca paṭicca citta-
samuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
     9. Ganthasampayuttañ ca ganthavippayuttañ ca dham-
maṃ paṭicca ganthasampayutto ca ganthavippayutto ca
dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
     Diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagataṃ . . .1 khandhā citta-
samuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ. Domanassasahagataṃ . . . tayo
khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . .
     1. Ganthasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthasampa-
yutto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
     Ganthasampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo
khandhā; dve . . .
     2. Ganthasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca . . .
     Diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagate khandhe paṭicca
lobho. Domanassasahagate khandhe paṭicca paṭighaṃ.
     3. Ganthasampayuttaṃ . . . ganthasampayutto ca . . .
     Diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagataṃ . . .2 khandhā lobho

1 As under 7.
2 As under 1.


[page 262]
262                     Ganthasampayuttadukaṃ.
ca; dve . . . Domanassasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca
tayo khandhā paṭighañ1 ca; dve . . .
     4. Ganthavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca . . .
     Ganthavippayuttaṃ ekaṃ . . .2 dve . . . Paṭisandhik-
khaṇe khandhe paṭicca vatthu,3 vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā.
     5. Ganthavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca . . .1
     Diṭṭhigatavippayuttaṃ lobhaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā
khandhā. Paṭighaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā.
     7. Ganthasampayuttañ ca ganthavippayuttañ ca dham-
maṃ paṭicca ganthasampayutto . . .
     Diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca
lobhañ ca paṭicca tayo khandhā; dve . . . Domanassa-
sahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca paṭighañ ca paṭicca tayo
khandhā; dve . . . (saṃkhittaṃ).
          Hetuyā nava,                     vipāke ekaṃ,
          ārammaṇe cha,                     āhāre nava,
          adhipatiyā nava,                indriye nava,
          anantare cha,4                    jhāne nava,
          samanantare cha,                magge nava,
          sahajāte nava,                    sampayutte cha,
          aññamaññe cha,                    vippayutte nava,
          nissaye nava,                     atthiyā nava,
          upanissaye cha,                natthiyā nava,6
          purejāte cha,                     vigate cha,
          āsevane cha,5                     avigate nava.
          kamme nava,
     4. Ganthavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthavippa-
yutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
     Ahetukaṃ ganthavippayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca
tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . .
(ahetukapaṭisandhi yāva asaññasattā). Vicikicchāsahagate
uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato
uddhaccasahagato moho.

[page 263]
                          Paccayavāro.                     263
          Nahetuyā ekaṃ,                    nasamanantare tīṇi,
          nārammaṇe tīṇi,                na-aññamaññe tīṇi,2
          nādhipatiyā nava,                napurejāte satta,
          nānantare tīṇi,1
     (napurejāte vibhajantena arūpaṃ paṭhamaṃ kātabbaṃ.
Rūpaṃ yattha labbhati pacchā kātabbaṃ.3 Paṭighaṃ ārūpe
natthi.)
          napacchājāte nava,                najhāne ekaṃ,
          nāsevane nava,                    namagge ekaṃ,
          nakamme cattāri,                nasampayutte tīṇi,
          navipāke nava,                    navippayutte cha,
          nāhāre ekaṃ,                     nonatthiyā tīṇi,4
          na-indriye ekaṃ,                    novigate tīṇi.
     Hetupaccayā, nārammaṇe ekaṃ,5 nādhipatiyā tīṇi,6 . . .
(evaṃ kātabbaṃ, saṃkhittaṃ) . . . novigate tīṇi.
     Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe                avigate ekaṃ.
     ekaṃ,
     (Sahajātavāro pi evaṃ kātabbo7.)
     1. Ganthasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ganthasampa-
yutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā . . . (tīṇi, paṭicca-
sadisā).
     4. Ganthavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā . . .

sandhikkhaṇe khandhe paccayā vatthu, vatthuṃ paccayā
khandhā; ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ . . . pe . . .8

     Vatthuṃ paccayā ganthasampayuttā khandhā. Diṭṭhi-

     khandhā. S. adds first two words.

264                     Ganthasampayuttadukaṃ.
gatavippayuttaṃ lobhaṃ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā
Paṭighaṃ1 paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā.
     6. Ganthavippayuttaṃ . . . ganthasampayutto ca . . .
     Vatthuṃ paccayā ganthasampayuttā2 khandhā. Mahā-
bhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Diṭṭhigatavippa-
yuttaṃ lobhaṃ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā cittasam-
uṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ. Paṭighaṃ paccayā sampayuttakā
khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ. Vatthuṃ paccayā
diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatā khandhā ca lobho ca.
Vatthuṃ paccayā domanassasahagatā khandhā ca paṭi-
ghañ ca.
     7. Ganthasampayuttañ ca . . . dhammaṃ . . .
     Ganthasampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca vatthuñ ca pac-
cayā tayo khandhā; dve . . . Diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobha-
sahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca vatthuñ ca3 lobhañ ca paccayā
tayo khandhā; dve, . . . Domanassasahagataṃ ekaṃ khan-
dhañ ca vatthuñ ca3 paṭighañ ca paccayā tayo khandhā;
dve . . .

cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasaha-
gate khandhe ca lobhañ ca vatthuñ ca4 paccayā cittasam-
uṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Domanassasahagate khandhe ca paṭighañ
ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Diṭṭhigatavippayutta-
lobhasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñ ca paccayā lobho.
Domanassasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñ ca paccayā paṭi-
ghaṃ.

maṃ paccayā ganthasampayutto ca ganthavippayutto ca

khandhañ ca lobhañ ca paccayā tayo khandhā citta-

                          Paccaniyaṃ.                     265
samuṭṭhanañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . . Domanassasahagataṃ

ca; dve . . . (saṃkhittaṃ).
          Hetuyā nava,                     sabbattha nava;
          arammaṇe nava,                    vipāke ekaṃ,
          adhipatiyā nava,                āhāre nava,
          anantare nava,                    avigate nava.
          samanantare nava,2
     4. Ganthavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ganthavippa-
yutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
     Ahetukaṃ ganthavippayuttaṃ . . . (ahetukapaṭisandhi
yāva asaññasattā). Cakkhāyatanaṃ paccayā cakkhuviñ-
ñāṇaṃ . . .; kāyāyatanaṃ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṃ. Vatthuṃ
paccayā ahetukā ganthavippayuttā khandhā. Vicikicchā-
sahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñ ca paccayā
vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho . . . (saṃ-
khittaṃ).

          nārammaṇe tīṇi,                nāhāre ekaṃ,

          na-upanissaye tīṇi,               namagge ekaṃ,

          napacchājāte nava,                navippayutte cha,4

          nakamme cattāri,

[page 266]
266                          Ganthasampayuttadukaṃ.
          Hetupaccayā, nārammaṇe tīṇi,     nādhipatiyā nava:--
     evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.
          Nahetupaccayā, ārammaṇe ekaṃ,1 avigate2 ekaṃ.
     (Nissayavāro paccayavārasadiso.)
     1. Ganthasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho ganthasam-
payutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Ganthasampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo
khandhā; dve . . .
     2. Ganthasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho ganthavippa-
yutto . . .
     Diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagate khandhe saṃsaṭṭho
lobho. Domanassasahagate khandhe saṃsaṭṭhaṃ paṭighaṃ.
     3. Ganthasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho ganthasam-
payutto ca ganthavippayutto ca dhammā . . .
     Diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃ-
saṭṭhā tayo khandhā lobho ca; dve . . . Domanassasaha-
gataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā paṭighañ ca;
dve . . .
     4. Ganthavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho ganthavippa-
yutto . . .
     Ganthavippayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo
khandhā; dve . . . (paṭisandhi).
     5. Ganthavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho ganthasam-
payutto . . .
     Diṭṭhigatavippayuttaṃ lobhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā sampayuttakā
khandhā. Paṭighaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā sampayuttakā khandhā.
     7. Ganthasampayuttañ ca ganthavippayuttañ ca dham-
maṃ saṃsaṭṭho ganthasampayutto . . .
     Diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca
lobhañ ca saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā; dve . . . Domanassa-
sahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca paṭighañ ca saṃsaṭṭhā tayo
khandhā; dve . . . (saṃkhittaṃ).
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 K. tīṇi,
2 R. has, instead, adhipatiyā.


[page 267]
                          Hetuvāro.                          267
          Hetuyā cha,                     vipāke ekaṃ,
          ārammaṇe cha,1                    āhāre cha,
          adhipatiyā cha,                avigate cha.
          sabbattha cha;
     4. Ganthavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho ganthavippa-
yutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
     Ahetukaṃ ganthavippayuttaṃ . . . pe . . . Ahetuka-
paṭisandhikkhaṇe vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate
khandhe saṃsaṭṭho vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato
moho . . . (saṃkhittaṃ).
          Nahetuyā ekaṃ,                    nakamme cattāri,
          nādhipatiyā cha,                navipāke cha,
          napurejāte cha,                najhāne ekaṃ,
          napacchājāte cha,2                namagge ekaṃ,
          nāsevane cha,                     navippayutte cha.
          Hetupaccayā, nādhipatiyā          nāsevane cha,
           cha,                          nakamme cattāri,
          napurejāte cha,                navipāke cha,2
          napacchājāte cha,                navippayutte cha;
          Nahetupaccayā, ārammaṇe           anantare ekaṃ,3
           ekaṃ,                          avigate ekaṃ.
     1. Ganthasampayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa
dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
     Ganthasampayuttā hetū4 sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ
hetupaccayena paccayo.
     2. Ganthasampayutto dhammo ganthavippayuttassa . . .
     Ganthasampayuttā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. omits clause.
2 B. here continues as in the mātikā above.
3 B. omits clause.
4 K. -yuttā hetu, etc., throughout. S. wavers between -o,
     -ā, and -aṃ (as nominative). Only R. has hetū.


[page 268]
268                          Ganthasampayuttadukaṃ.
hetupaccayena paccayo. Diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasaha-
gato1 hetu lobhassa cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ hetu-
paccayena paccayo. Domanassasahagato hetu paṭighassa
cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca2 . . .
     3. Ganthasampayutto . . . ganthasampayuttassa ca . . .
     Ganthasampayuttā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ3
cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca . . .4 Diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobha-
sahagato hetu sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ lobhassa ca
cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca2 . . . Domanassasahagato hetu
sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ paṭighassa ca cittasam-
uṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
     4. Ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthavippayuttassa . . .
     5Diṭṭhigatavippayutto lobho cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ2 . . .
Paṭighaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena pac-
cayo. (Paṭisandhi.)
     5. Ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa . . .
     Diṭṭhigatavippayutto lobho sampayuttakānaṃ khandhā-
naṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. Paṭighaṃ sampayutta-
kānaṃ2 . . .
     6. Ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa ca . . .
     Diṭṭhigatavippayutto lobho sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ
cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ hetu paccayena paccayo.
Paṭighaṃ sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ . . .2
     7. Ganthasampayutto ca ganthavippayutto ca . . .
     Diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagato hetu ca lobho ca
sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
Domanassasahagato hetu ca paṭighañ ca sampayutta-
kānaṃ . . .2
     8. Ganthasampayutto ca ganthavippayutto ca . . .
     Diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagato hetu ca lobho ca
cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.

1 S. -gataṃ. K. -gatā.
2 As just above.
3 B. ganthasampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetu.
4 As just above. S. here passes to Diṭṭhi- under 4.
5 R. and B. have first: Ganthavippayutto hetu sampayuttakānaṃ
     khandhānaṃ cittasamutthā hetu.


[page 269]
                          Ārammaṇavāro.                     269
Domanassasahagato hetu ca paṭighañ ca cittasamuṭṭhānā-
naṃ . . .1
     9. Ganthasampayutto ca ganthavippayutto ca . . .
     Diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagato hetu ca lobho ca
sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca
rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. Domanassasahagato hetu
ca paṭighañ ca sampayuttakānaṃ . . .1
     1. Ganthasampayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa
dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
     Ganthasampayutte khandhe ārabbha ganthasampayuttā
khandhā uppajjanti . . . (tīsu pi mūlā pucchitabbā).
Ganthasampayutte khandhe ārabbha ganthavippayuttā
khandhā uppajjanti. Ganthasampayutte khandhe ārabbha
diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatā khandhā ca lobho ca
uppajjanti. Domanassasahagatā khandhā ca paṭighañ ca
uppajjanti.
     4. Ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthavippayuttassa . . .
     Dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ uposathakammaṃ taṃ paccavekkhati,
pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ
paccavekkhati. Āriyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ pac-
cavekkhanti, phalaṃ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ paccavek-
khanti. Nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa2 vodānassa maggassa phalas-
sa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Ariyā gantha-
vippayutte pahīnakilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhitakilese
paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti, cakkhuṃ
. . . pe . . . vatthuṃ, ganthavippayutte khandhe ca lobhañ
ca paṭighañ ca aniccato vipassanti3 . . . pe . . .4 assādeti
abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha ganthavippayutto rāgo uppajjati,
. . . pe . . . vicikicchā uddhaccaṃ domanassaṃ uppajjati;
dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā
saddaṃ suṇāti, cetopariyañāṇena ganthavippayuttacitta-
samaṃgissa cittaṃ jānāti. Ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcā-
yatanassa, ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa,
rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa . . . phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ
kāyaviññāṇassa ārammāṇapaccayena paccayo. Gantha-
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 As just above.
2 K. gotrabhu, omitting nibbānaṃ.
3 R. vipassati.
4 Cf. p. 182, § 4.


[page 270]
270                          Ganthasampayuttadukaṃ.
vippayuttā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa cetopariyañāṇassa
pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa yathākammūpagañāṇassa anā-
gataṃsañāṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
     5. Ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa . . .
     Dānaṃ sīlaṃ uposathakammaṃ taṃ assādeti abhinandati,
taṃ ārabbha ganthasampayutto rāgo . . . diṭṭhi . . .
domanassaṃ uppajjati.
     6. Ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa
ca . . .
     Cakkhuṃ. . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ ganthavippayutte
khandhe ca lobhañ ca paṭighañ ca ārabbha diṭṭhigata-
vippayuttalobhasahagatā khandhā ca lobho ca domanassa-
sahagatā khandhā ca paṭighañ ca uppajjanti.
     7. Ganthasampayutto ca ganthavippayutto ca . . .
     Diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagate khandhe ca lobhañ
ca domanassasahagate khandhe ca paṭighañ ca ārabbha
ganthasampayuttā khandhā uppajjanti . . . (mūlaṃ pucchi-
tabbaṃ). Diṭṭhigatavippayutta- . . .1 ārabbha ganthavippa-
yuttā khandhā uppajjanti . . . (mūlaṃ pucchitabbaṃ2).
Diṭṭhigatavippayutta- . . .1 ārabbha diṭṭhigatavippayutta-
lobhasahagatā khandhā ca lobho ca domanassasahagatā
khandhā ca paṭighañ ca uppajjanti.
     1. Ganthasampayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa
dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
     Ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. Ārammaṇādhipati:--
ganthasampayutte khandhe garuṃ katvā ganthasampayuttā
khandhā uppajjanti. Sahajātādhipati:-- ganthasampa-
yuttādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ adhipatipac-
cayena paccayo.
     2. Ganthasampayutto dhammo ganthavippayuttassa . . .
     Ārammaṇādhipati . . .3 garuṃ katvā diṭṭhigatavippa-
yutto lobho uppajjati. Sahajātādhipati:-- ganthasampa-
yuttādhipati cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ adhipatipacca-
yena paccayo. Diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatādhipati
lobhassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca . . . Domanassasaha-
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 As above.
2 R. omits clause.
3 As under 1.


[page 271]
                          Adhipativāro.                     271
gatādhipati paṭighassa cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ
adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
     3. Ganthasampayutto . . . ganthasampayuttassa ca . . .
     Ārammaṇādhipati . . .1 garuṃ katvā diṭṭhigatavippa-
yuttalobhasahagatā khandhā ca lobho ca uppajjanti-
Sahajātādhipati:-- diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatādhi-
pati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ lobhassa ca cittasam-
uṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
Domanassasahagatādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhā-
naṃ paṭighassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañ . . .2
     4. Ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthavippayuttassa . . .
     Ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. Ārammaṇādhipati:--
dānaṃ sīlaṃ uposathakammaṃ taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavek-
khati, pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, jhānā
vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti. Ariyā
maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti,
phalaṃ, nibbānaṃ3 garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti. Nibbānaṃ
gotrabhussa vodānassa maggassa phalassa adhipatipacca-
yena paccayo. Cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ, ganthavip-
payutte khandhe ca lobhañ ca garuṃ katvā assadeti abhinan-
dati, taṃ garuṃ katvā ganthavippayutto rāgo diṭṭhi uppajjati.
Sahajātādhipati:-- ganthavippayuttādhipati sampayutta-
kānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ adhi-
patipaccayena paccayo.
     5. Ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa
dhammassa . . .
     Ārammaṇādhipati:-- dānaṃ . . .4 vuṭṭhāhitvā jhānaṃ
. . . Cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ . . . garuṃ katvā
ganthasampayutto rāgo, diṭṭhi uppajjati.

     Ārammaṇādhipati:-- cakkhuṃ . . . pe5 . . . garuṃ katvā
diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatā khandhā ca lobho ca
uppajjanti.

     Ārammaṇādhipati:-- diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagate

[page 272]
272                          Ganthasampayuttadukaṃ.
khandhe ca lobhañ ca garuṃ katvā ganthasampayuttā
khandhā uppajjanti . . . (mūlaṃ pucchitabbaṃ1). Diṭṭhigata-
. . .2 katvā diṭṭhigatavippayutto lobho uppajjati . . .
(mūlaṃ pucchitabbaṃ3). Diṭṭhigata-2 . . . katvā diṭṭhigata-
vippayuttalobhasahagatā khandhā ca lobho ca uppajjanti.
     1. Ganthasampayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa
dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
     (a) Purimā purimā ganthasampayuttā khandhā pacchi-
mānaṃ pacchimānaṃ ganthasampayuttānaṃ4 khandhānaṃ
anantarapaccayena paccayo . . . (mūlaṃ pucchitabbaṃ).
     (b) Purimā purimā diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatā
khandhā pacchimassa pacchimassa diṭṭhigatavippayuttassa
lobhassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (c) Purimā purimā
domanassasahagatā khandhā pacchimassa pacchimassa
paṭighassa, ganthasampayuttā khandhā vuṭṭhānassa anan-
tarapaccayena paccayo . . . (mūlaṃ pucchitabbaṃ1).
(d) Purimā purimā diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatā
khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ diṭṭhigatavippayutta-
lobhasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ lobhassa ca anantarapacca-
yena paccayo. (e) Purimā purimā domanassasahagatā
khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ domanassasahagatā-
naṃ khandhānaṃ paṭighassa ca anantarapaccayena paccayo.
     4. Ganthavippayutto . . . ganthavippayuttassa . . .
     Purimo purimo diṭṭhigatavippayutto lobho pacchimassa
pacchimassa diṭṭhigatavippayuttassa lobhassa anantara-
paccayena paccayo. Purimaṃ purimaṃ5 domanassa saha-
gataṃ paṭighaṃ pacchimassa pacchimassa paṭighassa ananta-
rapaccayena paccayo. Purimā purimā diṭṭhigatavippayuttā
khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ ganthavippayuttānaṃ6
khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. Anulomaṃ gotra-
bhussa phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo.
     5. Ganthavippayutto . . . ganthasampayuttassa dham-
massa . . .

                     Anantaravāro.                          273

vippayuttānaṃ2 khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.

domanassasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ . . . Āvajjanā gan-
thasampayuttānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena pac-
cayo.

ca anantarapaccayena paccayo. Āvajjanā diṭṭhigatavippa-
yuttalobhasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ lobhassa ca domanassa-
sahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ paṭighassa ca anantarapaccayena
paccayo.

khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. (b) Purimā . . .6
khandhā ca paṭighañ ca pacchimānaṃ . . . khandhānaṃ
anantarapaccayena paccayo . . . (mūlaṃ pucchitabbaṃ).
(c) Purimā . . .7 khandhā ca lobho ca pacchimassa . . .

paṭighassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (e) Diṭṭhigatavip-
payuttalobhasahagatā khandhā ca lobho ca domanassasa-
hagatā khandhā ca paṭighañ ca vuṭṭhānassa anantarapac-
cayena paccayo . . . (mūlaṃ pucchitabbaṃ). (f) Purimā
. . .9 lobho ca pacchimānaṃ . . .5 (g) Purimā . . .8
khandhānaṃ paṭighassa ca anantarapaccayena paccayo.

dhammassa samanantara- . . . sahajāta- . . .10 añña-
mañña- . . . nissaya- . . . upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

sayo . . . pe . . . Pakatūpanissayo:-- ganthasampayuttā

274                          Ganthasampayuttadukaṃ.
khandhā ganthasampayuttānaṃ khandhānaṃ upanissaya-
paccayena paccayo . . . (mūlaṃ pucchitabbaṃ)1 Ganthasam-
payuttā khandhā ganthavippayuttānaṃ . . . (mūlaṃ pucchi-
tabbaṃ).1 Ganthasampayuttā khandhā diṭṭhigatavippa
yuttalobhasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ lobhassa ca upanis-
sayapaccayena paccayo. Domanassasahagatānaṃ khandhā
naṃ paṭighassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
     4. Ganthavippayutto . . . ganthavippayuttassa . . .
     Ārammaṇūpanissayo . . . pe . . . Pakatūpanissayo:--
saddhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti . . . pe . . . samāpattiṃ
uppādeti, mānaṃ jappeti . . . Sīlaṃ . . . pe . . . paññaṃ,2 rāgaṃ
dosaṃ,3 mohaṃ, mānaṃ, patthanaṃ, kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ kāyikaṃ
dukkhaṃ . . . utuṃ4 bhojanaṃ senāsanaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti,
. . . pe . . . samāpattiṃ uppādeti . . . pāṇaṃ hanati . . . pe . . .
saṃghaṃ bhindati, saddhā . . . pe . . . paññā rāgo . . .
pe . . . patthanā senāsanaṃ . . . saddhāya . . . paññāya
rāgassa dosassa mohassa mānassa5 patthanāya upanissaya-
paccayena paccayo.
     5. Ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa
dhammassa . . .
     Ārammaṇūpanissayo . . . pe . . . Pakatūpanissayo:--
saddhaṃ upanissāya mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti. Sīlaṃ
. . . pe . . . pāññaṃ rāgaṃ . . . pe . . . mānaṃ patthanaṃ
senāsanaṃ upanissāya pāṇaṃ hanati . . . pe . . . saṃghaṃ
bhindati. Saddhā . . . pe . . . senāsanaṃ rāgassa dosassa
mohassa mānassa diṭṭhiyā patthanāya6 upanissayapacca-
yena paccayo.
     6. Ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa ca
. . . (tīṇi).
     Saddhaṃ upanissāya mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti,
sīlaṃ . . . pe . . . paññaṃ rāgaṃ dosaṃ mohaṃ mānaṃ
patthanaṃ kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ, senāsanaṃ upanissāya pāṇaṃ
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. adds tīṇi pi. So R., adding upanissaya.
2 B. puññaṃ here only.
3 S. domanassaṃ, omitting dosaṃ, mohaṃ.
4 S. utu.
5 R. omits.
6 S. diṭṭhipatth-.


[page 275]
                          Purejātavāro.                     275
hanati . . . pe . . . saṃghaṃ bhindati, saddhā . . . pe
. . . paññā1 rāgo doso moho māno2 patthanā senāsa-
naṃ diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ
lobhassa ca domanassasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ paṭighassa
ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
     7. Ganthasampayutto ca ganthavippayutto ca . . .
     Ārammaṇūpanissayo . . . pe . . . Pakatūpanissayo:--
diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatā khandhā ca lobho ca
domanassasahagatā lobhañ ca khandhā ca3 paṭighañ ca
ganthasampayuttānaṃ khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena
paccayo . . . (mūlaṃ pucchitabbaṃ). Diṭṭhigatavippayutta-
lobhasahagatā khandhā ca lobho ca domanassasahagatā
khandhā ca paṭighañ ca ganthavippayuttānaṃ khandhānaṃ
diṭṭhigatavippayuttassa lobhassa ca paṭighassa3 ca upanis-
sayapaccayena paccayo . . . (mūlaṃ pucchitabbaṃ). Diṭṭhi-
gatavippayuttalobhasahagatā khandhā ca lobho ca doma-
nassasahagatā khandhā ca paṭighañ ca diṭṭhigatavippa-
yuttalobhasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ lobhassa ca doma-
nassasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ paṭighassa ca upanissaya-
paccayena paccayo.
     4. Ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthavippayuttassa
dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
     Ārammaṇapurejātaṃ, vatthupurejātaṃ. Ārammaṇapure-
jātaṃ:-- cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ aniccato vipassati,
assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha ganthavippayutto rāgo
uppajjati diṭṭhi vicikicchā uddhaccaṃ domanassaṃ uppajjati:
dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ
suṇāti. Rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa . . . phoṭṭhabbā-
yatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa . . . Vatthupurejātaṃ:-- cakkhā-
yatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa . . . kāyāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa,
vatthu ganthavippayuttānaṃ khandhānaṃ diṭṭhigatavip-
payuttassa lobhassa ca paṭighassa ca purejātapaccayena
paccayo.
     5. Ganthavippayutto . . . ganthasampayuttassa . . .
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. saddhaṃ paññaṃ.
2 S. mānaṃ.
3 K. omits.


[page 276]
276                     Ganthasampayuttadukaṃ.
     Ārammaṇapurejātaṃ . . . pe1 . . . vatthuṃ assādeti
abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha ganthasampayutto rāgo uppajjati
diṭṭhi domanassaṃ uppajjati. Vatthupurejātaṃ:-- vatthu
ganthasampayuttānaṃ khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena pac-
cayo.
     6. Ganthavippayutto . . . ganthasampayuttassa ca . . .
     Ārammaṇapurejātaṃ . . . pe1 . . . vatthuṃ ārabbha
diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatā khandhā ca lobho ca
domanassasahagatā khandhā ca paṭighañ ca uppajjanti.
Vatthupurejātaṃ:-- vatthu diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobha-
sahagatānaṃ2 khandhānaṃ lobhassa ca domanassasaha-
gatānaṃ khandhānaṃ paṭighassa ca purejātapaccayena
paccayo.
     2. Ganthasampayutto dhammo ganthavippayuttassa3
dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo . . . (ekaṃ).
     4. Ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthavippayuttassa . . .
(ekaṃ).
     8. Ganthasampayutto ca . . . ganthavippayuttassa
dhammassa . . .
     Pacchājātā diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatā khandhā
ca lobho ca domanassasahagatā khandhā ca paṭighañ ca
purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
     1. Ganthasampayutto dhammo . . . āsevanapaccayena
paccayo . . . (anantarasadisaṃ. Āvajjanā pi vuṭṭhānam4
pi natthi) . . . kammapaccayena paccayo.
     Ganthasampayuttā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ
kammapaccayena paccayo.
     2. Ganthasampayutto . . . ganthavippayuttassa . . .
     Sahajātā, nānākhaṇikā. Sahajātā ganthasampayuttā
cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena pac-
cayo. Diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatā cetanā lobhassa
cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca . . . Domanassasahagatā cetanā
paṭighassa cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca . . . Nānākhaṇikā
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 As under 4.
2 S. vippayuttānaṃ khandhānaṃ.
3 K. -sampayuttassa. Cf. p. 15, § 2.
4 S. omits.


[page 277]
                          Vippayuttavāro.                    277
ganthasampayuttā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā
ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
     3. Ganthasampayutto . . . ganthasampayuttassa ca . . .
     Ganthasampayuttā . . .1 cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca2 . . .
Diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatā cetanā sampayutta-
kānaṃ khandhānaṃ lobhassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca . . .
Domanassasahagatā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ
paṭighassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ kamma-
paccayena paccayo.
     4. Ganthavippayutto . . . ganthavippayuttassa . . .
     Sahajātā, nānākhaṇikā. Sahajātā ganthavippayuttā
cetanā . . .3 Nānākhaṇikā ganthavippayuttā cetanā . . .2
kammapaccayena paccayo.
     4. Ganthavippayutto dhammo . . . vipākapaccayena
paccayo . . . (ekaṃ).
     1. Ganthasampayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa
dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo . . . (cattāri) . . .
indriya- . . . (cattāri) . . . jhāna- . . . (cattāri)4 . . .
magga- . . . (cattāri) . . . sampayuttapaccayena paccayo
. . . (cha).
     2. Ganthasampayutto dhammo ganthavippayuttassa
dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
     Sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ . . . (saṃkhittaṃ,vibhajitabbaṃ).
     4. Ganthavippayutto . . . ganthavippayuttassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ . . . (saṃkhittaṃ).
     5. Ganthavippayutto . . . ganthasampayuttassa . . .
     Purejātaṃ vatthu ganthasampayuttaṃ khandhānaṃ vip-
payuttapaccayena paccayo.
     6. Ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa
ca . . .
     Purejātaṃ vatthu diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatānaṃ
khandhānaṃ lobhassa ca domanassasahagatānaṃ khandhā-
naṃ paṭighassa ca vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.

1 As under 1.
2 As under 2.
3 As under 3.
4 B. omits clause.


[page 278]
278                          Ganthasampayuttadukaṃ.
     8. Ganthasampayutto ca . . . ganthavippayuttassa
dhammassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. Sahajātā diṭṭhigatavippayutta-
lobhasahagatā khandhā ca lobho ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ
rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Domanassasaha-
gatā khandhā ca paṭighañ ca citta- . . . Pacchājātā diṭṭhi-
gatavippayuttalobhasahagatā khandhā ca lobho ca doma-
nassasahagatā khandhā ca paṭighañ ca purejātassa imassa
kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
     1. Ganthasampayutto dhammo . . . atthipaccayena
paccayo . . . (ekaṃ, paṭiccasadisaṃ).
     2. Ganthasampayutto . . . ganthavippayuttassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ1 . . . (saṃkhittaṃ, vibhajitabbaṃ).
     3. Ganthasampayutto . . . ganthasampayuttassa ca . . .
(ekaṃ, paṭiccasadisaṃ).
     4. Ganthavippayutto . . . ganthavippayuttassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātan, pacchājātaṃ1 āhāraṃ indriyaṃ . . .
(saṃkhittaṃ, vibhajitabbaṃ2).
     5. Ganthavippayutto . . . ganthasampayuttassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ.3 Sahajāto diṭṭhigatavippayutto
lobho sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena pac-
cayo. Domanassasahagataṃ paṭighaṃ sampayuttakānaṃ
khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. Purejātaṃ:--
cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ assādeti abhinandati, taṃ
ārabbha ganthasampayutto rāgo . . . pe . . . diṭṭhi
domanassaṃ uppajjati; vatthu ganthasampayuttakānaṃ4
khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
     6. Ganthavippayutto . . . ganthasampayuttassa ca . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. Sahajāto diṭṭhigatavippayutto
lobho sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañ
ca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. Paṭighaṃ sampayutta-
kānaṃ . . .5 Purejātaṃ:-- cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. omits.
2 K. omits.
3 B. omits.
4 K. omits gantha. S. has khandhā samp-.
5 As above.


[page 279]
                          Atthivāro.                         279
ārabbha diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatā khandhā ca
lobho ca domanassasahagatā khandhā ca paṭighañ ca
uppajjanti; vatthu diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatānaṃ
khandhānaṃ lobhassa ca domanassasahagatānaṃ khandhā-
naṃ paṭighassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo.
     7. Ganthasampayutto ca . . . dhammā ganthasampa-
yuttassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. Sahajāto ganthasampayutto eko
khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipac-
cayena paccayo; dve . . . Sahajāto diṭṭhigatavippayutta-
lobhasahagato eko khandho ca lobho ca tiṇṇannaṃ . . .1
paccayo; dve . . . Domanassasahagato eko khandho ca
paṭighañ ca tiṇṇannaṃ . . . dve . . .
     8. Ganthasampayutto ca . . . dhammā ganthavippayut-
tassa . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, paccahājātaṃ āhāraṃ indriyaṃ.
Sahajātā ganthasampayuttā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca
cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
Sahajātā diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatā khandhā ca
lobho2 ca citta- . . . Sahajātā domanassasahagatā
khandhā ca paṭighañ ca citta- . . . Diṭṭhigatavippayutta-
lobhasahagatā khandhā ca vatthu ca lobhassa atthipacca-
yena paccayo. Domanassasahagatā khandhā ca vatthu ca
paṭighassa atthipaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā diṭṭhigata-
vippayuttalobhasahagatā khandhā ca lobho ca domanassa-
sahagatā khandhā ca paṭighañ ca purejātassa imassa
kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā ganthasam-
payuttā3 khandhā ca kabaḷiṃkāro āhāro ca imassa . . .4
Pacchājātā ganthasampayuttā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañ
ca kaṭattā rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
     9. Ganthasampayutto ca ganthavippayutto ca . . .
     Sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. Sahajāto diṭṭhigatavippayutta-
lobhasahagato eko khandho ca lobho ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhā-
naṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañ ca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena pac-

cayo; dve . . . Sahajāto domanassasahagato eko khandho
ca paṭighañ ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañ

          Hetuyā nava,                     purejāte tīṇi,
          ārammaṇe nava,                    pacchājāte tīṇi,
          adhipatiyā nava,                āsevane nava,
          anantare nava,                    kamme cattāri,
          samanantare nava,                vipāke ekaṃ,
          sahajāte nava,1                āhāre cattāri,
          aññamaññe cha,                    indriye cattāri,
          nissaye nava,                     jhāne cattāri,
          upanissaye nava,                magge cattāri,
          sampayutte cha,                natthiyā nava,
          vippayutte pañca,                vigate nava,2
          atthiyā nava,                     avigate nava.
     1. Ganthasampayutto . . . ganthasampayuttassa . . .
ārammaṇa-, sahajāta-, upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
     2. Ganthasampayutto . . . ganthavippayuttassa . . .3
pacchājāta-,4 kammapaccayena paccayo.

. . . ārammaṇa- . . .3
     4. Ganthavippayutto . . . ganthavippayuttassa . . .3
purejāta-, pacchājāta-, kamma-,āhāra-, indriyapaccayena
paccayo.
     5. Ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa . . .3
purejātapaccayena paccayo.
     6. Ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa ca
. . . ārammaṇa- . . .5

[page 281]
                               Mātikā.                     281
     7. Ganthasampayutto ca . . . dhammā ganthasampa-
yuttassa . . .1
     8. Ganthasampayutto ca . . . dhammā ganthavippa-
yuttassa . . .1 pacchājāta paccayena paccayo.

yuttassa ca ganthavippayuttassa ca dhammassa . . .1
          Nahetuyā nava,                    sabbattha nava;
          nārammaṇe nava,                no-avigate nava.2

          nādhipatiyā nava . . .           namagge nava,
           (saṃkhittaṃ) . . .,           nasampayutte tīṇi,
          nasamanantare nava,               navippayutte cha,5

           nava,                          mātikā vitthāretabbā),
                                         avigate nava.

[page 282]
                               282
                          [XXIX.
                GANTHO-CEVA-GANTHANIYA-DUKAṂ.]
     1. Ganthañ ceva ganthaniyañ ca1 dhammaṃ paṭicca
gantho ceva ganthaniyo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Sīlabbataparāmāsakāyaganthaṃ paṭicca abhijjhākāya-
gantho; abhijjhākāyaganthaṃ paṭicca sīlabbataparāmā-
sakāyagantho; idaṃsaccābhinivesakāyaganthaṃ paṭicca
abhijjhākāyagantho; abhijjhākāyaganthaṃ paṭicca idaṃ-
saccābhinivesakāyagantho.
     2. Ganthañ ceva ganthaniyañ ca dhammaṃ paṭicca gan-
thaniyo ceva no ca gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
     Ganthe paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañ
ca rūpaṃ.
     3. Ganthañ ceva ganthaniyañ ca dhammaṃ paṭicca
gantho ceva ganthaniyo ca ganthaniyo ceva no ca gantho
ca2 dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā . . . (paṭiccavāro pi
sahajātavāro pi paccayavāro pi nissayavāro3 pi saṃsaṭṭhavāro
pi sampayuttavāro3 pi ganthadukasadisā. Ninnānākaraṇā4).
     1. Gantho ceva ganthaniyo dhammo ganthassa ceva
ganthaniyassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
     Ganthā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ ganthānaṃ hetupacca-
yena paccayo . . . (evaṃ nava pañhā vitthāretabbā).
     1. Gantho ceva ganthaniyo ca dhammo ganthassa ceva
ganthaniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
     Ganthe ārabbha ganthā uppajjanti . . . (mūlaṃ pucchi-
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 K. omits always.
2 R. omits.
3 B. omits.
4 R. -vāraṃ. -sadisaṃ. -karaṇaṃ.


[page 283]
                          Ārammaṇavāro.                     283
tabbaṃ). Ganthe1 ārabbha ganthaniyā ceva no ca ganthā
khandhā uppajjanti (mūlaṃ pucchitabbaṃ). Ganthe ārabbha
ganthā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
     4. Ganthaniyo ceva no ca gantho dhammo ganthaniyassa
ceva no ca ganthassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
paccayo.
     Dānaṃ sīlaṃ uposathakammaṃ taṃ paccavekkhati, pubbe
suciṇṇāni, jhānaṃ paccavekkhati. Ariyā gotrabhuṃ2 pac-
cavekkhanti, vodānaṃ paccavekkhanti, pahīnakilese vik-
khambhitakilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese
jānanti. Cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ ganthaniye
ceva no ca ganthe khandhe aniccato . . . pe . . . doman-
assaṃ uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya
sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti . . . (sabbaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ)
. . . āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
     5. Ganthaniyo ceva no ca gantho dhammo ganthassa ceva
ganthaniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
     Dānaṃ sīlaṃ uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ assādeti abhi-
nandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi, vicikicchā,
uddhaccaṃ,3 domanassaṃ uppajjati; pubbe suciṇṇāni . . . jhānā
vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ . . . Cakkhuṃ . . . pe . . . vatthuṃ
ganthaniye ceva no ca ganthe khandhe assādeti abhinandati,
taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi . . . pe . . . doman-
assaṃ uppajjati.
     6. Ganthaniyo ceva no ca . . . ganthassa ceva ganthani-
yessa ca ganthaniyassa ceva no ca . . .
     Dānaṃ sīlaṃ . . . jhānaṃ . . . Cakkhuṃ . . . vatthuṃ
. . . khandhe assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha ganthā ca
sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti . . . (evaṃ itare pi
tīṇi vitthāretabbā. Ārabbha kātabbā.4 Imamhi duke lokut-
taraṃ natthi, ganthadukasadisaṃ. Ninnānākaraṇaṃ. Gan-
thaniyaṃ ti niyāmetabbaṃ. Magge nava pañhā kātabbā).
           GANTHO-CEVA-GANTHANIYA-DUKAṂ niṭṭhitaṃ.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. ganthaṃ.
2 B. gotrabhū. S. ariyaṃ gotrabhu.
3 B. and S. omit these two words. R. the former only.
4 B. omits sentence.


[page 284]
                          284
                          [XXX.
                GANTHO-CEVA-GANTHASAMPAYUTTA-DUKAṂ.]
     1. Ganthañ ceva ganthasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca
gantho ceva ganthasampayutto ca1 dhammo uppajjati hetu-
paccayā.
     Sīlabbataparāmāsakāyaganthaṃ paṭicca abhijjhākāya-
gantho; abhijjhākāyaganthaṃ paṭicca sīlabbataparāmā-
sakāyagantho; idaṃsaccābhinivesakāyaganthaṃ paṭicca
abhijjhākāyagantho; abhijjhākāyaganthaṃ paṭicca idaṃ-
saccābhinivesakāyagantho.
     2. Ganthañ ceva ganthasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca
ganthasampayutto ceva no ca gantho dhammo . . .
     Ganthe paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā.
     3. Ganthañ ceva . . . paṭicca gantho ceva . . . gantha-
sampayutto ceva no ca gantho ca dhammā . . .
     Sīlabbataparāmāsakāyaganthaṃ paṭicca abhijjhākāya-
gantho sampayuttakā ca khandhā . . . (cakkaṃ).
     4. Ganthasampayuttañ ceva no ca ganthaṃ dham-
maṃ . . . ganthasampayutte ceva no ca . . .
     Ganthasampayuttañ ceva no ca ganthaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ
paṭicca tayo khandhā; dve . . .
     5. Ganthasampayuttañ ceva no ca ganthaṃ dham-
maṃ . . . gantho ceva . . .
     Ganthasampayutte ceva no ca ganthe khandhe paṭicca
ganthā.
     6. Ganthasampayuttañ ceva no ca ganthaṃ . . . gantho
ceva . . . no ca gantho ca dhammā . . . (cakkaṃ2).
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 K. omits throughout after ceva.
2 I.e., as under 4, adding ganthā ca after khandhā (so R.).


[page 285]
                          Hetuvāro.                          285
     7. Ganthañ ceva ganthasampayuttañ ca . . . gantha-
sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā . . . pe . . .
     8. Ganthañ ceva . . . no ca gantho . . .
     Ganthasampayuttañ ceva no ca ganthaṃ ekaṃ khandhañ
ca ganthe1 ca paṭicca tayo khandhā; dve . . .
     9. Ganthañ ceva . . . no ca gantho ca dhammā uppaj-
janti hetupaccayā.
     Ganthasampayuttañ ceva no ca ganthaṃ ekaṃ khandhañ
ca sīlabbataparāmāsakāyaganthañ ca paṭicca tayo khandha
abhijjhākāyagantho ca; dve . . . (cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ
saṃkhittaṃ).
          Hetuyā nava,                     kamme nava,
          ārammaṇe nava,                    āhāre nava,
          sabbattha nava;                avigate nava,
     1. Ganthañ ceva ganthasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca
gantho ceva ganthasampayutto dhammo uppajjati nādhi-
patipaccayā . . . (saṃkhittaṃ. Idha nahetupaccayo natthi).
          Nādhipatiyā nava,                nakamme tīṇi,
          napurejāte nava,                navipāke nava,
          napacchājāte nava,                navippayutte nava.
          nāsevane nava,
     (Itare pi dve gaṇanā pi sahajātavāro pi paccayavāro pi
nissayavāro2 pi saṃsaṭṭhavāro pi sampayuttavāro pi paṭicca-
vārasadisā3.)
     1. Gantho ceva ganthasampayutto dhammo ganthassa
ceva ganthasampayuttassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena
paccayo.
     Gantho ceva ganthasampayuttā ca hetū sampayutta-
kānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
     2. Gantho ceva . . . no ca ganthassa dhammassa . . .
     Ganthā ceva . . .4
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 S. omits.
2 B. omits.
3 R. -sadiso.
4 As under 1.


[page 286]
286                Gantho-ceva-ganthasampayuttadukaṃ.
     3. Gantho1 ceva . . . no ca ganthassa . . .
     Ganthā ceva ganthasampayuttā ca hetū ganthānaṃ
sampayuttakānañ ca . . .
     4. Ganthasampayutto ceva no ca gantho . . .
     Ganthasampayuttā ceva no ca ganthā hetū2 . . .
     5. Ganthasampayutto ceva no ca gantho . . .
     Ganthasampayuttā . . .3
     6. Ganthasampayutto ceva no ca gantho . . .
     Ganthasampayuttā ceva no ca ganthā hetū gantha-
naṃ sampayuttakānañ ca khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena
paccayo.
     7. Gantho ceva ganthasampayutto ca . . .
     Ganthā ceva ganthasampayuttā ca ganthasampayuttā
ceva no ca ganthā ca hetū ganthānaṃ sampayuttakānañ
ca khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.4
     1. Gantho ceva ganthasampayutto dhammo ganthassa
ceva ganthasampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
paccayo.
     Ganthe ārabbha ganthā uppajjanti . . . (mūlaṃ kātabbaṃ).
Ganthe ārabbha ganthasampayuttā ceva no ca ganthā
khandhā uppajjanti . . .; (mūlaṃ kātabbaṃ). Ganthe
ārabbha ganthā ca ganthasampayuttā ca khandhā uppaj-
janti.5
     4. Ganthasampayutto ceva no ca gantho dhammo . . .
     Ganthasampayutte ceva no ca ganthe khandhe ārabbha
ganthasampayuttā ceva no ca ganthā khandhā uppajjanti6
. . . (mūlaṃ kātabbaṃ). Ganthasampayutte . . .7 ārabbha
ganthā uppajjanti (mūlaṃ kātabbaṃ). Ganthasampayutte
. . .7 ganthā ca ganthasampayuttakā ca khandhā uppaj-
janti. (Evaṃ itare pi tīṇi pañhā kātabbā, ārammaṇasadisā
yeva, adhipatiyā pi anantare pi upanissaye pi vibhaṃgo8 natthi.)

1 S. omits § 3.
2 As under 1.
3 As under 4.
4 R. gives remaining two formula.
5 B. inserts mūlaṃ, etc., again.
6 B. omits to evaṃ . . .
7 As above.
8 R. and B. vibhāgo.


[page 287]
                               Mātikā.                          287
          Hetuyā nava,                     kamme tīṇi,
          ārammaṇe nava,                    āhāre tīṇi,
          adhipatiyā nava,                indriye tīṇi,
          anantare nava,                    jhāne tīṇi,
          samanantare nava,1                magge nava,
          sahajāte nava,                    sampayutte nava,
          aññamaññe nava,                atthiyā nava,
          nissaye nava,                     natthiyā nava,
          upanissaye nava,                vigate nava,
          āsevane nava,2                    avigate nava.
     Arūpā3 yeva paccayā ekekassa tīṇi tīṇi kātabbā. Āram-
maṇañ ca sahajātañ ca upanissayañ ca navasu pi parivatte-
tabbaṃ. Evaṃ pañhāvāre pi sabbaṃ kātabbaṃ.
           GANTHO-CEVA-GANTHASAMPAYUTTA-DUKAṂ niṭṭhitaṃ.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 B. omits clause.
2 K. omits clause.
3 K. rūpā. R. arupaṃ yeva paccayaṃ. B. arūpesu.
     B. adding only paṭiccaṃ, breaks off here, resuming at
     Chapter XXXIII.


[page 288]

                          [XXXI.
                GANTHAVIPPAYUTTA-GANTHANIYA-DUKAṂ.]
     1. Ganthavippayuttaganthaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca gan-
thavippayuttaganthaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . . Paṭi-
sandhikkhaṇe ekaṃ mahabhūtaṃ . . . pe . . . (yathā cūḷan-
taraduke1 lokiyadukaṃ, evaṃ viṭṭhāretabbaṃ. Ninnānāka-
rāṇaṃ).
           GANTHAVIPPAYUTTA-GANTHANIYA-DUKAṂ niṭṭhitaṃ.

paccayā . . . (dve pi gocchakā āsavagocchakasadisā. Ninnā-
nākaraṇā).

[page 289]
                               289
                               XXXIII.
                          NĪVARAṆA-DUKAṂ.]
     1. Nīvaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇo dhammo uppaj-
jati hetupaccayā.
     Kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ paṭicca thīnamiddhanīvaraṇaṃ1
avijjānīvaraṇaṃ; kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ paṭicca uddhacca-
nīvaraṇaṃ avijjānīvaraṇaṃ; kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ paṭicca
avijjānīvaraṇaṃ.2 Vyāpādanīvaraṇaṃ paṭicca thīnamiddha-
nīvaraṇaṃ3 avijjānīvaraṇaṃ; vyāpādanīvaraṇaṃ paṭicca
uddhaccanīvaraṇaṃ avijjānīvaraṇaṃ; vyāpādanīvaraṇaṃ
paṭicca4 kukkuccanīvaraṇaṃ avijjānīvaraṇaṃ; vyāpādanīva-
raṇaṃ paṭicca5 vicikicchānīvaraṇaṃ uddhaccanīvaraṇaṃ avij-
jānīvaraṇaṃ; vyāpādanīvaraṇaṃ paṭicca avijjānīvaraṇaṃ.6
     2. Nīvaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nonīvaraṇo . . .
     Nīvaraṇe paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhā-
nañ ca rūpaṃ.
     3. Nīvaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇo ca . . .
     Kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ paṭicca thīnamiddhanīvaraṇaṃ7
sampayuttakā ca khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ . . .
(cakkaṃ).
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 R. and S. add uddhaccanīvaraṇaṃ. R. and B. thina- throughout.
2 R. and S. omit last clause (three words).
3 R. and S. add uddhacca-.
4 R. inserts thīnamiddha- uddhacca-.
5 R. inserts uddhacca- kukkucca- avijjā-. Vicikicchā-
     paṭicca uddhacca-. Uddhacca- paṭicca avijjā-.
6 S. has instead uddhacca- paṭicca avijjā-.
7 R. adds uddhacca- avijjā-.


[page 290]
290                               Nivaraṇadukaṃ.
     4. Nonīvaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nonīvaraṇo . . .
(paṭisandhi).

     Nonīvaraṇe khandhe paṭicca nīvaraṇā.
     6. Nonīvaraṇaṃ . . . nīvaraṇo ca nonīvaraṇo ca . . .
     Nonīvaraṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā
nīvaraṇā ca cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . .
     9. 1Nīvaraṇañ ca nonīvaraṇañ ca dhammaṃ paṭicca nīva-
raṇo ca nonīvaraṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
     Nonīvaraṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhañ ca kāmacchandhanīvaraṇañ
ca paṭicca tayo khandhā thīnamiddhanīvaraṇaṃ2 avijjānī-
varaṇaṃ; dve . . . (cakkaṃ, saṃkhittaṃ).
          Hetuyā nava,                     sabbattha nava;
          ārammaṇe nava,                    vipāke ekaṃ,
          adhipatiyā nava,                āhāre nava,
          anantare nava,                    avigate nava.
          samanantare nava,
     1. Nīvaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇo dhammo uppaj-
jati nahetupaccayā.
     Vicikicchānīvaraṇaṃ paṭicca avijjānīvaraṇaṃ.3
     4. Nonīvaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nonīvaraṇo . . .
     Ahetukaṃ nonīvaraṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo
khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañ ca rūpaṃ; dve . . . (ahetuka-
paṭisandhi yāva asaññasattā).
     5. Nonīvaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇo . . .
     Vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca
avijjānīvaraṇaṃ.
     7. Nīvaraṇañ ca nonīvaraṇañ ca dhammaṃ paṭicca
nīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.

     sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca thīnamiddha- uddhacca-
     avijjā- . . . cakkaṃ. Then formula 8, with following:

     p. 296, l. 3.
3 R. adds uddhacca- paṭicca avijjā-.


[page 291]
                          Paṭiccavāro.                     291
     Vicikicchānīvaraṇañ ca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca
avijjānīvaraṇaṃ. Uddhaccanīvaraṇañ ca sampayuttake ca
khandhe paṭicca avijjānīvaraṇaṃ.

uppajjati nārammaṇapaccayā.
     Nīvaraṇe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.

uṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ . . . (saṃkhittaṃ) . . .
. . . nādhipatipaccayā . . . nānantara- . . . nasam-
anantara- . . . na-aññamañña- . . . na-upanissayapaccayā.

jati napurejātapaccayā.
